sql.sql:
select ls.djxh,t.rdrq as rdrqq,t.jcfzchrq as rdrqz,ls.ssqq,ls.ssqz from dj_fzchrdxx t,dj_ls_djxhandssq ls where t.rdrq<=ls.ssqz and ls.ssqq<=t.jcfzchrq and t.jcfzchrq is not null and ls.djxh= t.djxh
union all
select ls.djxh,t.rdrq as rdrqq,t.zxfzchrq as rdrqz,ls.ssqq,ls.ssqz from dj_fzchrdxx t,dj_ls_djxhandssq ls where t.rdrq<=ls.ssqz and ls.ssqq<=t.zxfzchrq and t.zxfzchrq is not null and ls.djxh= t.djxh
union all
select ls.djxh,t.rdrq as rdrqq,ls.ssqz+1 as rdrqz,ls.ssqq,ls.ssqz from dj_fzchrdxx t,dj_ls_djxhandssq ls where t.rdrq<=ls.ssqz and t.jcfzchrq is null and t.zxfzchrq is null and ls.djxh= t.djxh

SELECT distinct XJ.XYJJGDJXH, XJ.NSRSBH, XJ.NSRMC, '' shxydm, XJ.ZCDZ, XJ.ZGSWJG_DM, xj.ZGSWJGMC, xj.zfjglx_dm, xj.fzjgcj_dm, xj.bjdyjqysdsyy_dm, xj.hjqylx_dm, xj.jdjnbs, xj.kdqsszyqylx_dm, F.YXQQ DJRQ, xj.lrrq, ba.yxqq, ba.yxqz FROM DJ_HZNSQYXXBAB_XYJGXX XJ, DJ_HZNSQYXXBAB BA, DJ_FZJGXX F WHERE XJ.HZNSUUID = BA.HZNSUUID and xj.djxh = ba.djxh AND F.Djxh = XJ.Djxh and f.fzjghfdnsrsbh = xj.nsrsbh and (f.fzjghfddjxh = '0' or f.fzjghfddjxh is null) and f.yxqq <= f.yxqz and ba.yxqq<=ba.yxqz AND XJ.DJXH = ? AND BA.YXQQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND XJ.YXBZ = 'Y' AND BA.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT distinct XJ.XYJJGDJXH, NSR.NSRSBH, NSR.NSRMC, NSR.shxydm, NSR.ZCDZ, NSR.ZGSWJ_DM ZGSWJG_DM, XJ.ZGSWJGMC, xj.zfjglx_dm, xj.fzjgcj_dm, xj.bjdyjqysdsyy_dm, xj.hjqylx_dm, xj.jdjnbs, xj.kdqsszyqylx_dm, NSR.DJRQ, xj.lrrq, ba.yxqq, ba.yxqz FROM DJ_HZNSQYXXBAB_XYJGXX XJ, DJ_HZNSQYXXBAB BA, DJ_NSRXX NSR WHERE XJ.XYJJGDJXH = NSR.DJXH AND XJ.HZNSUUID = BA.HZNSUUID and ba.yxqq <= ba.yxqz AND XJ.DJXH = ? AND BA.YXQQ < = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND XJ.YXBZ = 'Y' AND BA.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND XJ.XYJJGDJXH != '0' and nsr.YXBZ = 'Y'
select swsx.swsx_dm, swsx.swsxmc, swsx.yxbz, swsx.xybz from v_dm_gy_swsx swsx where swsx.ywlc_dm =?

update dj_nsrxx t set t.gszxrq = (select rq from dj_ls_djxhshxydm d, dj_pzjgxx c where t.shxydm = d.shxydm and t.djxh = c.djxh and c.zzhm = d.zzhm) where exists (select 1 from dj_ls_djxhshxydm d, dj_pzjgxx c where shxydm = d.shxydm and t.djxh = c.djxh and c.zzhm = d.zzhm) and t.nsrzt_dm = '07' and t.gszxrq is null and t.shxyDm is not null and (t.kzztdjlx_dm = '1120' or t.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%')
select t.cyhwuuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.wcjyhdssglzmbh, t.ddrq, t.wcjyd, t.hwcfdd, t.wcjyhwxsdd, t.bydjuuid from Dj_Wbnsrjydsbcyhwxx t where t.wcjyhdssglzmbh = ?
select d.djxh, t.uuid,t.ygzzfjgbz_dm from dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh d, dj_ygzsffxxxdjb t where d.djxh = t.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select
DJXH , GDSLX_DM , SSDABH , NSRSBH , NSRMC , n.KZZTDJLX_DM , DJZCLX_DM , FDDBRXM , FDDBRSFZJLX_DM , SCJYDZ , FDDBRSFZJHM , n.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM , HY_DM , ZCDZ , ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM , JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM , GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM , DJRQ , n.ZZJG_DM , KQCCSZTDJBZ, ZGSWJ_DM , ZGSWSKFJ_DM , SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ , SWDJBLBZ , NSRBM
from dj_nsrxx n, dj_ls_nsrgjxx ls where n.zzjg_dm = ls.zzjg_dm and n.kzztdjlx_dm = ls.kzztdjlx_dm and n.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ls.xzqhsz_dm and (n.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' OR N.KQCCSZTDJBZ IS NULL) and n.yxbz='Y' AND N.KZZTDJLX_DM = ? and n.nsrzt_dm!='07' and n.nsrzt_dm !='10' and n.gdslx_dm=?

select b.yhpzuuid, b.bamxuuid, b.yhpzuuid, b.djxh, b.lcslid, b.zspm_dm, b.zmhm, b.hphm, b.cpxh_1, b.clsbdh, b.fdjhm, b.cbmc, b.cbsbh, b.nynse, b.njmse, b.jmqxq, b.sjjzrq, b.jmqxz, b.jzed, b.qxbz from yh_clcbjmbaxx b where yhpzuuid = ? and (zfbz_1 is null or zfbz_1 = ?) and sjjzrq >= to_date(?,?)

select t.fwsyqkuuid,t.djxh,t.fybh,t.fwtddjlx_dm,t.lcslid,t.zspm_dm,t.fcyz,t.msyz,t.ysyz, t.nynse,t.nzjsr,t.zsfcsbz,t.sl_1,t.yxqq,t.yxqz,t.sbqx_dm,t.nsqx_dm,t.jkqx_dm, t.yskm_dm,t.ysfpbl_dm,t.skgk_dm,t.czrmc,t.czrsfzjzl_dm,t.czrsfzjhm,t.bz, t.sjgsdq,t.syzyfs_dm,t.fyjbxxuuid,fy.fyjbxxuuid,fy.fwzh,fy.dy,fy.lc_1,fy.fh,fy.jg_dm,fy.cx_dm,fy.fwmj,fy.tnmj,fy.fwzldz,fy.xzqhsz_dm,fy.jdxz_dm,t.kcl, fy.ssswjg_dm,fy.bdcxmbh,fy.tdsybh,fy.yxbz,fy.fczyz from dj_fwsyqkdjxx t,dj_fyjbxx fy where t.djxh=? and t.fybh=fy.fybh AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxqz AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= t.yxqq)) AND (1 = ? OR TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxqz) AND t.yxqq <= t.yxqz and fy.yxbz='Y'
select t.zgksfpqduuid from dj_zgswskfjfp_qdxx t where t.lcslid=?

select t.cwkjzdbauuid, t.lcslid, t.kjzdzz_dm, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.cwkjzdbz, t.dzyhptxff_dm, t.dzyhptxffbz, t.zjffbz, t.cbhsffbz, t.kjhsrjmc, t.kjhsrjbz, t.kjhsrjbbh, t.kjhsrjqysj, t.kjhsrjsjklxmc, t.zjfsdl_dm, t.zjfsxl_dm, t.cbhsff_dm, t.kjzdzz_dm, t.kcyqzyqyktzctxff_dm, t.kcyqzyqykqqyzczhff_dm, t.kcyqzyqykfzczjff_dm, t.qycwzd_dm, t.cwzdbz, t.zlbsxl_dm from dj_cwkjzdjhsrjbabgs t where t.cwkjzdbauuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.djxh, a.gdslx_dm, a.ssdabh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.djjg_dm, a.djrq, a.zzjg_dm, a.lrrq, a.kqccsztdjbz, a.jyfw, a.zcdlxdh, a.zcdyzbm, a.scjydlxdh, a.scjydyzbm, a.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, a.cwfzrsfzjhm, a.cwfzryddh, a.lrr_dm, a.shxydm, a.Zgswj_Dm, a.Zgswskfj_Dm, a.Ssgly_Dm, a.zzlx_dm from dj_zcdnsrjbxx_ks a WHERE (a.nsrsbh=? or a.shxydm=?) and gdslx_dm=?

select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid, b.tdqsuuid, b.djxh, b.tdsyzbh, b.zxly, b.ysccczfs_dm, b.czrq, b.zxlcslid, b.zxrq, b.tdsyzfzjgmc, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz, c.tdsyqkuuid, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.tdmj, c.mstdmj, c.ystdmj, c.dwse, c.nynse, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.nsqx_dm, c.sbqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.zscztdsysbz, c.bz, c.lcslid, c.zspm_dm from dj_tdjbxx a, dj_tdqsxx b, dj_tdsyqkdjxx c where a.tdjbxxuuid = b.tdjbxxuuid and a.tdjbxxuuid = c.tdjbxxuuid and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.syqsyxqq < ? and b.syqsyxqz > ? and c.yxqz > = c.yxqq and c.fwtddjlx_dm = '1' and (b.djxh = ? or 1=#macroparam#) and (a.tdsybh = ? or 1=#macroparam#) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1=#macroparam#) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1=#macroparam#) and (a.ssswjg_dm = ? or 1=#macroparam#)

select n.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.ssdabh, n.shxydm from dj_nsrxx n where n.nsrmc = ? and n.zzjg_dm = ? and n.yxbz = 'Y' and n.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '08') and (n.kzztdjlx_dm = '1110' or n.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%')
select sq.zxuuid, sq.djxh, sq.lcslid, sq.zxyy_dm, sq.lrr_dm,sq.lrrq,sq.spjg,sq.zxrq,sq.zfrq_1,sq.zfbz_1 from dj_zxswdjsq sq where sq.djxh = ?

select nsrzt_dm,nsr.djxh,scjydzxzqhsz_dm,nsr.shxydm, nsrsbh , nsrmc , kzztdjlx_dm , scjydz , nsrzt_dm , zzjg_dm , fddbrxm , fddbrsfzjlx_dm , fddbrsfzjhm , pz.zzhm, pz.zzlx_dm, nsr.djrq from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_pzjgxx pz where nsr.djxh = pz.djxh AND NSR.Yxbz='Y' and pz.zzhm = ? and pz.zzlx_dm = ? and nsr.gdslx_dm = ? and( nsr.kzztdjlx_dm =? or nsr.kzztdjlx_dm = ? OR nsr.kzztdjlx_dm like ?)

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.fczyz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, b.fwqsuuid, b.djxh, b.fwcqzsh, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz from dj_fyjbxx a, dj_fwqsxx b where a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid and b.syqsyxqq <= ? and b.syqsyxqz >= ? and a.yxbz='Y' and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm =? or 1 =?) and a.fybh = ?

SELECT RDPZUUID , DJXH , LCSLID , NSRZGLX_DM , YXQQ , YXQZ , SJZZRQ , QXBZ , WSZG , ZFBZ_1 , ZFR_DM , ZFRQ_1 , SJGSDQ FROM RD_NSRZGXX_JGB N WHERE N.DJXH = ? AND n.yxqq<=? AND n.sjzzrq> =? AND n.yxqq<=n.yxqz and (n.zfbz_1='N' OR N.ZFBZ_1 is null)

select ls.djxh, ls.shxydm, ls.xh_2 from dj_ls_djxhShxydm ls where ls.shxydm in (select n.shxydm from dj_nsrxx n where (n.kzztdjlx_dm in ('1110', '1120', '1500') or n.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%') and n.shxydm is not null and n.yxbz='Y')

select cbqkuuid, lcslid, djxh, cbpzhm, cbjdw, cbmc, nynse, bz, yxqq, yxqz, zxlcslid, zxrq, zxly, ysccczfs_dm, czrq, zspm_dm, ssswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, nsqx_dm, sbqx_dm, jkqx_dm, yskm_dm, ysfpbl_dm, skgk_dm, sl_1, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, cbsbh, tscd, fdjgl, zszm_dm from dj_cbqkxx where cbsbh =? and yxqq <=? and yxqz >=?

select a.BDCXMUUID,a.LCSLID,a.BDCXMBH,a.BDCXMMC,a.XMDZ,a.DJXH,a.XMYT_DM,a.XMZTZ,a.GCZZJ,a.KGRQ,a.YJJGRQ, a.YJSFRQ,a.XMSZDSWJG_DM,a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM,a.SSGLY_DM,a.XMGLQSRQ,a.BZ,a.XZQHSZ_DM,a.JDXZ_DM, a.XMFZR,a.LXFS,a.LRR_DM,a.LRRQ,a.XGR_DM,a.XGRQ,a.SJGSDQ,a.ZXRQ,a.YXBZ from dj_bdcxmdjxx a where a.djxh =? and a.bdcxmbh = ? and a.zxrq is null and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.KJBBMCUUID, a.DJXH, a.LCSLID, a.YXBZ, a.CWKJZDBAUUID, a.CWBBZL_DM, a.KJBBBSQX_DM, a.BBBSQ_DM, a.KJBBBZ, a.LRR_DM, a.LRRQ, a.XGR_DM, a.XGRQ, a.SJGSDQ, a.cwkjbblx_dm from dj_cwkjzdba_kjbbmc a where a.cwkjzdbauuid = ? and a.yxbz = ?
select t.rdpzuuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.nsrzglx_dm,t.yxqq,t.yxqz,t.sjzzrq,t.qxbz,t.wszg from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.djxh = ? and t.nsrzglx_dm = '201'

SELECT jb.DJXH,jb.shxydm,jb.GDSLX_DM,jb.SSDABH,jb.NSRSBH,jb.NSRMC,jb.KZZTDJLX_DM,jb.DJZCLX_DM,jb.FDDBRXM, jb.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM,jb.SCJYDZ,jb.FDDBRSFZJHM,jb.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM,jb.NSRZT_DM,jb.HY_DM,jb.ZCDZ, jb.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM,jb.JDXZ_DM,jb.DWLSGX_DM,jb.GDGHLX_DM,jb.DJJG_DM,jb.DJRQ,jb.ZZJG_DM,jb.KQCCSZTDJBZ, jb.ZGSWJ_DM,jb.ZGSWSKFJ_DM,jb.SSGLY_DM,jb.FJMQYBZ,jb.SWDJBLBZ,kz.HJSZD,kz.JYFW,kz.ZCDLXDH, kz.ZCDYZBM,kz.SCJYDLXDH,kz.SCJYDYZBM,kz.HSFS_DM,kz.CYRS,kz.WJCYRS,kz.HHRS,kz.GGRS,kz.GDGRS, kz.ZZJGLX_DM,kz.KJZDZZ_DM,kz.WZ,kz.SWDLRLXDH,kz.SWDLRDZXX,kz.ZCZB,kz.TZZE,kz.ZRRTZBL,kz.WZTZBL, kz.GYTZBL,kz.GYKGLX_DM,kz.ZFJGLX_DM,kz.BZFS_DM,kz.FDDBRGDDH,kz.FDDBRYDDH,kz.FDDBRDZXX,kz.CWFZRXM, kz.CWFZRSFZJZL_DM,kz.CWFZRSFZJHM,kz.CWFZRGDDH,kz.CWFZRYDDH,kz.CWFZRDZXX,kz.BSRXM,kz.BSRSFZJZL_DM, kz.BSRSFZJHM,kz.BSRGDDH,kz.BSRYDDH,kz.BSRDZXX,kz.LSSWDJYXQQ,kz.LSSWDJYXQZ,kz.SWDLRNSRSBH,kz.SWDLRMC,kz.WHSYJSFJFXXDJBZ,kz.ZZSJYLB,kz.YHSJNFS_DM, kz.ZSXMCXBZ_DM,kz.ZZSQYLX_DM,kz.GJHDQSZ_DM,kz.YGZNSRLX_DM FROM dj_nsrxx jb, dj_nsrxx_kz kz WHERE jb.djxh = kz.djxh AND jb.nsrzt_dm = '03' AND jb.djxh = ? AND jb.djxh IN (SELECT kj.djxh FROM dj_kjskdjxx kj WHERE kj.zxbz = 'N') and jb.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.fczyz, b.djxh, b.fwcqzsh, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz from dj_fyjbxx a, dj_fwqsxx b where a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid(+) and a.yxbz = 'Y' and (a.fybh = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) and not EXISTS (select 1 from dj_fyjbxx a, dj_fwqsxx b where a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid and b.syqsyxqz >= ? and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.zxrq is null and (b.djxh=? or 1 = ?) and (a.fybh = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) )

select distinct q.djxh, q.uuid, q.qsdjr, q.qsjsr, q.jbr, q.jbrlxfs, q.slrq, q.slswjg, q.ynsrzt_dm, q.zxrq, q.zgswjgsfcjqs, q.qsyy_dm from dj_qysdsqsdj q where EXISTS (select 1 from dj_nsrxx n where n.djxh = q.djxh and n.nsrzt_dm in ('03', '04') and n.yxbz = 'Y') and q.yxbz = 'Y' AND q.ZXRQ IS NULL AND q.QSDJR between SYSDATE - 3 and SYSDATE

select DJXH, GDSLX_DM, SSDABH, NSRSBH, m.shxydm, NSRMC, KZZTDJLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, SCJYDZ, FDDBRSFZJHM, SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM, HY_DM, ZCDZ, ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM, GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM, DJRQ, ZZJG_DM, KQCCSZTDJBZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ, SWDJBLBZ, NSRBM from dj_nsrxx m where m.djxh in (select n.djxh from dj_wbnsrjydbydj n where (n.zfbz_1 = 'N' or n.zfbz_1 is null) and n.yxbz = 'Y' and n.wcjyhdssglzmbh in (select n.wcjyhdssglzmbh from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx n where n.djxh＝ ? and (1=#macroparam# or n.JYFSDMJH like ? ) and n.yxbz = 'Y')) AND m.yxbz = 'Y'

select tdzsbmuuid, TD.djxh, swjg_dm, tdzsbhlxjh, djr_dm, yxqq, yxqz, TD.sjgsdq， sfdsdkzzsfp, dsdkjg from dj_tdzsbmdjxx td,dj_nsrxx n where td.djxh=n.djxh and n.nsrsbh=? and n.ssdabh=? and n.kzztdjlx_dm=? and n.yxbz='Y' and n.gdslx_dm=?
SELECT rtrim(T.HY_DM) CODE, T.HYMC CAPTION FROM DM_GY_HY T WHERE T.MLBZ = 'Y' AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY T.HY_DM

select a.djxh, a.gdslx_dm, a.ssdabh, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, a.nsrmc, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.djjg_dm, a.djrq, a.zzjg_dm, a.lrrq, a.kqccsztdjbz, b.djxh, b.hjszd, b.jyfw, b.zcdlxdh, b.zcdyzbm, b.scjydlxdh, b.scjydyzbm, b.hsfs_dm, b.cyrs, b.wjcyrs, b.hhrs, b.ggrs, b.gdgrs, b.zzjglx_dm, b.kjzdzz_dm, b.wz, b.swdlrlxdh, b.swdlrdzxx, b.zczb, b.tzze, b.zrrtzbl, b.wztzbl, b.gytzbl, b.gykglx_dm, b.zfjglx_dm, b.bzfs_dm, b.fddbrgddh, b.fddbryddh, b.fddbrdzxx, b.cwfzrxm, b.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, b.cwfzrsfzjhm, b.cwfzrgddh, b.cwfzryddh, b.cwfzrdzxx, b.bsrxm, b.bsrsfzjzl_dm, b.bsrsfzjhm, b.bsrgddh, b.bsryddh, b.bsrdzxx, b.lsswdjyxqq, b.lsswdjyxqz, b.swdlrnsrsbh, b.swdlrmc, b.whsyjsfjfxxdjbz, b.zzsjylb, b.yhsjnfs_dm, b.zsxmcxbz_dm, b.zzsqylx_dm, b.gjhdqsz_dm, b.ygznsrlx_dm, a.ZGSWJ_DM,a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM,a.SSGLY_DM,a.FJMQYBZ,a.SWDJBLBZ from dj_nsrxx a, dj_nsrxx_kz b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm = ? and a.nsrzt_dm in('03','04') and a.fddbrsfzjhm = ? and a.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.kjskdjuuid from dj_kjskdjxx t where t.djxh = ? and( t.zxbz = 'N' or t.zxbz is null) and rownum = '1'

select a.zspm_dm code, a.zspmmc caption, b.swjg_dm, b.sl_1,b.dgbz from dm_gy_zspm a, cs_gy_glb_zspm b where a.zsxm_dm = ? and a.zspm_dm = b.zspm_dm and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y' and b.swjg_dm = ? and b.swjg_dm != '00000000000'

SELECT NSR.ZZJG_DM, NSR.NSRSBH, NSR.SHXYDM, P.PZSLJGLX_DM, NSR.DJXH, NSR.NSRSBH, NSR.NSRZT_DM, NSR.KZZTDJLX_DM, NSR.KQCCSZTDJBZ, nsr.scjydzxzqhsz_dm FROM DJ_NSRXX NSR, DJ_PZJGXX P WHERE NSR.DJXH = P.DJXH AND P.ZZLX_DM = ? AND P.ZZHM = ? AND NSR.GDSLX_DM = ? AND NSR.YXBZ='Y'

select jzygcxmuuid, lcslid, djxh, gcxmbh, gcxmmc, gcxmdz, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, xmfzrxm, xmfzrlxdh, kgrq, jgrq, xmyt_dm, xmys, jzmj, jzycbfs_dm, jsfdjxh, jzyfkfs_dm, jzyglxs_dm, xmglrqq, xmszddfswjg_dm, zgswskfj_dm, ssgly_dm, zxrq, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, jsdwnsrsbh, jsdwmc, zdxmbz from dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb where jzygcxmuuid=?

select j.jxfx2_dmz1 code, j.jyfhbz, xm.zsxmmc caption from dm_kj_jygz j, dm_gy_zsxm xm where j.jylx_dm = ? and j.jxfx1_dmz1 = ? and j.jxfx2_dmz1 = xm.zsxm_dm(+) and j.SWJG_DM = ? and xm.XYBZ = 'Y' and xm.YXBZ = 'Y'
select a.sytdxxuuid,a.tdsybh,c.tdzldz,c.qh,c.tdjbxxuuid from DJ_SYGLXMDJ_TDXX a ,dj_tdjbxx c where a.tdsybh=c.tdsybh(+) and a.xmbh=? and a.yxbz='Y'
select t.clzt,t.clsj,t.xgr_dm from rd_yrdhyqwrdybnsrqc t where t.djxh=?

SELECT
xz.XZQHSZ_DM , xz.XZQHZM_DM , xz.XZQHMC , xz.SJXZQHSZ_DM , xz.XZQHJC , xz.XYBZ , xz.YXBZ , xz.XZQHLMZM_DM , xz.SSXZQMC , xz.SWJG_DM
FROM dm_gy_xzqh xz WHERE XYBZ='Y' AND YXBZ='Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR xz.XZQHSZ_DM =xz.SJXZQHSZ_DM START WITH xz.SJXZQHSZ_DM =?

select nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, scjydzxzqhsz_dm, nsrsbh, nsrmc, t.kzztdjlx_dm, scjydz, nsrzt_dm, zzjg_dm, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, FDDBRSFZJHM, t.djrq, t.ZGSWJ_DM, t.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, t.shxydm , k.zfjglx_dm from dj_nsrxx t , dj_nsrxx_kz k where t.djxh = k.djxh and t.shxydm = ? and t.gdslx_dm = ? and (t.kzztdjlx_dm = ? or t.kzztdjlx_dm = ? OR t.kzztdjlx_dm like ?) and t.kqccsztdjbz = ? and t.yxbz = ?
update dj_nsrzgswjgbgxx z set z.zgswskfj_dm=? where z.djxh=? and z.zgswj_dm=? and ? between z.yxqq and z.yxqz and yxbz='Y'

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.djxh, nsr.ssdabh, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.jdxz_dm, nsr.kzztdjlx_dm, nsr.djzclx_dm, nsr.fddbrxm, nsr.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, nsr.fddbrsfzjhm, nsr.scjydz, nsr.hy_dm, nsr.zcdz, nsr.dwlsgx_dm, nsr.gdslx_dm, nsr.gdslx_dm, nsr.gdghlx_dm, nsr.zzjg_dm, nsr.fjmqybz, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm from dj_wtxysxx wt, dj_nsrxx nsr where wt.stfdjxh = nsr.djxh and ? between wt.xyyxqq and wt.xyyxqz and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and wt.wtfswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and wt.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select uuid, yddjxh, mbddjxh, nsrdzgxlb_dm, yxbz, sjgsdq from dj_djztgxdzb t where t.mbddjxh = ? and (t.nsrdzgxlb_dm = '10' or t.nsrdzgxlb_dm = '11') and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select lb_dm , lbmc , lbcj_dm , kjsm , sxrq , sxrq_2 , szr_dm , szswjg_dm , szrq , xybz from dj_djhzdylbsz szb, (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm = ?) swjgb where szb.szswjg_dm = swjgb.swjg_dm and szb.xybz = 'Y' and szb.sxrq <=? and szb.sxrq_2 >=? and szb.sxrq <=szb.sxrq_2

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.zcdz, d.zcdlxdh, a.fddbrxm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.shxydm, c.fzchrduuid, e.fzchzxuuid, c.rdrq, e.lcslid, e.pcuuid, a.nsrzt_dm from dj_nsrxx a, dj_nsrxx_kz d, dj_fzchrdxx c,dj_fzchzxxx e where a.djxh=d.djxh and a.djxh = c.djxh and a.djxh=e.djxh and c.fzchrduuid=e.fzchrduuid and e.lcslid=? and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.gzjhuuid,a.lcslid,a.bsdw,a.baswjg_dm,a.sjgsdq,a.bsrq_1,a.gzjhbh, a.jhssnd from dj_csgjqyggqdclgzjh a where a.jhssnd =? and a.baswjg_dm IN (SELECT SWJG.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG SWJG CONNECT BY PRIOR SWJG.SWJG_DM = SWJG.SJSWJG_DM START WITH SWJG.SWJG_DM = ? ) and (1=? or a.gzjhbh=?) and a.zfbz_1='N'

select sjswjg.swjg_dm , sjswjg.swjgmc , sjswjg.swjgjc , sjswjg.swjgbz , sjswjg.sjswjg_dm , sjswjg.jgjc_dm , sjswjg.swjgyzbm , sjswjg.swjgdz , sjswjg.swjglxdh , sjswjg.czdh , sjswjg.dzxx , sjswjg.xzqhsz_dm , sjswjg.swjgfzr_dm , sjswjg.gdslx_dm , sjswjg.yxqsrq , sjswjg.yxzzrq , sjswjg.swjgjg , sjswjg.bsfwtbz from dm_gy_swjg swjg, dm_gy_swjg sjswjg where swjg.sjswjg_dm = sjswjg.swjg_dm and swjg.swjg_dm = ? and rownum <=1
select t.lwuuid,t.wcjyzmuuid,t.wcjylwmc,t.wcjylwdd from zm_wcjyhdssglzm_lwxx t where t.wcjyzmuuid=?
select t.swsx_dm,t.swsxmc from V_DM_GY_SWSX t where t.slswsx_dm =?

insert into dj_nsrxx_kz (DJXH, HJSZD, JYFW, ZCDLXDH, ZCDYZBM, SCJYDLXDH, SCJYDYZBM, HSFS_DM, CYRS, WJCYRS, HHRS, GGRS, GDGRS, ZZJGLX_DM, KJZDZZ_DM, WZ, SWDLRLXDH, SWDLRDZXX, ZCZB, TZZE, ZRRTZBL, WZTZBL, GYTZBL, GYKGLX_DM, ZFJGLX_DM, BZFS_DM, FDDBRGDDH, FDDBRYDDH, FDDBRDZXX, CWFZRXM, CWFZRSFZJZL_DM, CWFZRSFZJHM, CWFZRGDDH, CWFZRYDDH, CWFZRDZXX, BSRXM, BSRSFZJZL_DM, BSRSFZJHM, BSRGDDH, BSRYDDH, BSRDZXX, LSSWDJYXQQ, LSSWDJYXQZ, SWDLRNSRSBH, SWDLRMC, WHSYJSFJFXXDJBZ, ZZSJYLB, YHSJNFS_DM, ZSXMCXBZ_DM, ZZSQYLX_DM, GJHDQSZ_DM, YGZNSRLX_DM, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, QYGLCJBH, QYSSJT_DM) values ('12440100000998573140', null, '经营范围1', '34523543', '264545', '3423423423', '345345', '11', '34', '0', '0', '0', '0', '3', '203', null, null, null, '0', '0', '0', '0', '0', null, '1', '1', null, null, null, '43534534', '202', '345345', null, null, null, '345345', '203', '345345', null, null, null, null, null, null, null, 'N', '01', null, null, '1', '156', '11', '14406820320', to_date('08-12-2014 15:57:06', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('24-07-2015 08:46:11', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '14406823600', null, null, null)

select UUID , YDZGSWJG_DM, YDZGSWSKFJ_DM, JDXZ_DM , MBDZGSWJG_DM, YXQQ , YXQZ , MBDZGSWSKFJ_DM from cs_dj_gdszgswjgfpdzb t where t.ydzgswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.xybz = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' and ? between t.yxqq and t.yxqz
SELECT PZZL_DM, WSPZZG, WSPZHM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, SUM(KJJE) KJJE FROM zm_zysglzmmxxx WHERE djxh = ? AND zfbz_1 = 'N' GROUP BY PZZL_DM, WSPZZG, WSPZHM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.shxydm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydz, c.fzchrduuid, c.rdrq, a.nsrzt_dm, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.pgjg_dm from dj_nsrxx a, dj_fzchrdxx c where a.djxh = c.djxh and c.jcfzchrq is null and c.zxfzchrq is null and a.yxbz = 'Y' and c.rdrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and c.rdrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.zgswj_dm = ? and (a.zgswskfj_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.nsrsbh = ? or a.shxydm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.djzclx_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.hy_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and not exists (select 1 from dj_fzchzxxx zx where c.djxh = zx.djxh and zx.qrrq is null and zx.zfbz_1 = 'N')
select t.zjgdjxh djxh, t.djxh xjjgdjxh, t.zjgnsrsbh nsrsbh, t.zjgmc nsrmc from dj_zjgxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.djxh!=t.zjgdjxh and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between t.yxqq and t.yxqz

select cbqkuuid, lcslid, djxh, cbpzhm, cbjdw, cbmc, nynse, bz, yxqq, yxqz, zxlcslid, zxrq, zxly, ysccczfs_dm, czrq, zspm_dm, ssswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, nsqx_dm, sbqx_dm, jkqx_dm, yskm_dm, ysfpbl_dm, skgk_dm, sl_1, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, cbsbh, tscd, fdjgl, zszm_dm from dj_cbqkxx where djxh=? and yxqq <=? and yxqz >=?

select t.dwzfbauuid, t.lcslid, t.swwstybh, t.djxh, t.jnzfrnsrsbh, t.jnzfrdmc, t.jnzfrlxrxm, t.jnzfrlxdh, t.jnzfrdzhzs, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.jnzfrfhyx_dm, t.yhyywd_dm, t.jnzfrfhzh, t.jwskrlx_dm, t.jwskfmc, t.jwskfdz, t.jwskrshyxmc, t.jwskrshzh, t.jwskfssgjhdqsz_dm, t.jnwjgglbz, t.hthm, t.hthxymc, t.htzje, t.htzjebzsz_dm, t.yjfhrq, t.htzxqxq, t.htzxqxz, t.zgswjg_ds_dm, t.zgswjg_gs_dm, t.zgswjgmc, t.dsjgglm, t.lrrq, t.slrq from zm_fwmydxmdwzfswba t where t.dwzfbauuid = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select a.djxh,b.mbddjxh,c.fzchrduuid,d.lcslid,d.qryj_dm from dj_ls_fzchzx a ,dj_djztgxdzb b,dj_fzchrdxx c,dj_fzchzxxx d where a.djxh=b.yddjxh and b.mbddjxh=c.djxh and b.mbddjxh=d.djxh and a.pcuuid=d.pcuuid and c.jcfzchrq is null and c.zxfzchrq is null and b.nsrdzgxlb_dm=?
select a.bgqnr,a.bghnr,a.djxh from dj_bgdjmx a where a.bgxm_dm=? and a.djxh=? order by a.lrrq desc
select wt.dkfpzl from dj_wtxysxx wt where wt.stfdjxh = ? and wt.dkqxq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and wt.dzqxz < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and wt.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select t.uuid, t.zbuuid, t.lcslid, t.ybssz, t.ybsje, t.lrrq from zm_fwmydxmdwzfswbafhxx_ybs t where t.zbuuid = ?
select t.uuid, t.lcslid, t.xnsrsbh, t.xnsrmc, t.xnsrzgswjg, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj from dj_zxswdj_hbwsxnsrxx t where t.lcslid = ?
select x.hy_dm, x.zsxm_dm, x.zspm_dm, x.new_zspm_dm, x.xse, x.jsyj, x.ybtse, x.sjly, x.skssqq, x.skssqz from dj_ygzsffxxxdjb_xsexx x where x.djxh = ?
select t.qcuuid,t.djxh,t.clzt,t.txfwlb_dm,t.txzt,t.txfssj,t.clsj,t.xgmnsrnhwlwxse,t.xgmnsrnysfwxse,t.xgmnsryrdsbfxqq,t.xgmnsryrdsbfxqz,t.lrrq,t.scsj,t.xgrq from rd_yrdhyqwrdybnsrqc t where t.djxh = ?

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, b.jdxz_dm, b.wcjyzmuuid, b.wcjyhdssglzmbh, b.wcjydxzqhsz_dm, b.lrrq as zmkjrq, b.jyfsdmjh, b.wcjyd, b.swdjd zgswj_dm from dj_zcdnsrjbxx_ks a, zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and (1 = #macroparam# or a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or (b.hxrq is null and b.byrq is null)) and (0 = #macroparam# or b.byrq is not null) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ? or a.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrmc like ?) and (b.zfbz_1 = 'N' or b.zfbz_1 is null) and b.lrrq between ? and ?
select t.tfyuuid,t.djxh,t.hztyqxq,t.hztyqxz from dj_tfyxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.fyrq is null

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.ssdabh, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.zzjg_dm, a.kqccsztdjbz, a.fjmqybz, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.ssgly_dm, a.shxydm, b.hjszd, b.jyfw, b.zcdlxdh, b.zcdyzbm, b.scjydlxdh, b.scjydyzbm, b.zzjglx_dm, b.bsrxm, b.lsswdjyxqq, b.lsswdjyxqz, b.gjhdqsz_dm, c.pzjguuid, c.zzlx_dm, c.zzhm FROM DJ_NSRXX A, DJ_NSRXX_KZ B, DJ_PZJGXX C WHERE A.DJXH = B.DJXH AND A.DJXH = C.DJXH AND (A.NSRMC = ? or A.ZZJG_DM = ? or (A.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM = ? AND A.FDDBRSFZJHM = ?)) AND A.NSRZT_DM != '07' AND A.NSRZT_DM != '10' and A.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.tdsyzbh, a.tdsyzfzjgmc, b.tdjbxxuuid, b.qh, b.tdsybh, b.tdzmj, b.tdzldz, c.sytdxxuuid, c.lcslid, c.tdsybh, c.xmbh, c.yxbz, c.lrr_dm, c.lrrq, c.xgr_dm, c.xgrq, c.sjgsdq from dj_tdqsxx a, dj_tdjbxx b, dj_syglxmdj_tdxx c where a.tdjbxxuuid=b.tdjbxxuuid and b.yxbz = 'Y' and c.yxbz = 'Y' and a.zxrq is null and c.tdsybh = b.tdsybh and ? between a.syqsyxqq and a.syqsyxqz and c.xmbh = ?

select xdmxuuid, ssxduuid, djxh, lcslid, xm_1, ssxdsdlx_dm, fjmnsfs_dm, kjywrdjxh, xyt, xyk, sfsygljy, jmse, xdsl, yxqq, yxqz, bz, yxbz, xybz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, ssxd_dm, sre, ynssde, zggnssflgdsl, htbh, SSJMXZDL_DM, SSJMXZXL_DM, SSJMXZHZ_DM, JMSSPSX_DM from rd_ssxddyspsqmxb where djxh = ? and (1=? or htbh=?) and yxbz='Y'

select SWJG_DM, SWJGMC, SWJGJC, SWJGBZ, SJSWJG_DM, JGJC_DM, SWJGYZBM, SWJGDZ, SWJGLXDH, CZDH, DZXX, XZQHSZ_DM, SWJGFZR_DM, GDSLX_DM, XYBZ, YXBZ, YXQSRQ, YXZZRQ, SWJGJG, BSFWTBZ, GHBZ, XSXH from DM_GY_SWJG h where h.yxbz = 'Y' and h.xybz='Y' start with h.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) connect by prior h.swjg_dm = h.sjswjg_dm
select t.uuid, t.djxh, t.qsdjr, t.qsjsr, t.jbr, t.jbrlxfs, t.slrq, t.slswjg, t.ynsrzt_dm, t.zgswjgsfcjqs, t.qsyy_dm from DJ_QYSDSQSDJ t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.zxrq is null

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.ssdabh, nsr.djrq, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm, nsr.djxh, ygz.uuid, ygz.ygzzhy_dm, ygz.ygzsdzzspm_dm, ygz.hwlwzhy_dm, ygz.swdjrq, ygz.szdjrq, ygz.nrygzsdrq, ygz.ybnsrzgyxqq, ygz.ybnsrzgbz, ygz.rgxgbs_dm, ygz.ybqybz_dm, ygz.hsry_dm, ygz.qcscrq, ygz.yxqq, ygz.yxqz, ygz.yxbz, ygz.sjgsdq, ygz.ygznsrfl_dm, ygz.ygzzhysdhy_dm, ygz.ygzzfjgbz_dm, ygz.zfjgglms_dm, ygz.YGZZZSPMSDHY_DM, kz.ygznsrlx_dm from dj_nsrxx nsr join dj_nsrxx_kz kz on nsr.djxh = kz.djxh join dj_ygzsffxxxdjb ygz on nsr.djxh = ygz.djxh and ygz.yxbz = 'Y' where (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.zgswj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrzt_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.ssgly_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.rgxgbs_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.ygzzhy_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.ygzsdzzspm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.ygznsrfl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.ygzzhysdhy_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.ybqybz_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.swdjrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.swdjrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.szdjrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.szdjrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.nrygzsdrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.nrygzsdrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.qcscrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.qcscrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.HWLWZHY_DM = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.YGZZFJGBZ_DM like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ygz.YGZZZSPMSDHY_DM = ?) and nsr.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and (nsr.kzztdjlx_dm in ('1110', '1120', '1140') or nsr.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%')

select a.ffrq from zm_ptjghglzmdff_mxxx t, zm_ptjghglzmdffxx a where to_number(t.zmdqh)<= to_number(?) and to_number(t.zmdzh)>= to_number(?) and a.djxh = ? and a.ptjzmffuuid = t.ptjzmffuuid and not exists (select 1 from zm_ptjghglzmdhxxx aa where to_number(aa.zmdhm) =to_number(?))
select mx.djxh, mx.demc, mx.zsxm_dm, mx.zspm_dm, mx.zszm_dm, mx.bgrq, mx.bghnr from rd_sfzrdxxbgmx mx where mx.djxh = ? and mx.zsxm_dm = ? and mx.demc = ?

select t.qyjtdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, q.qyssjt_dm, q.qyssjtmc, q.jtdjxh, q.jtnsrsbh, q.ssdq, t.qyjtuuid from dj_qyjtjqcydwrd_qyjtxx t,DJ_QYSSJT q where t.qyjtuuid = q.qyjtuuid and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and q.yxbz='Y' and q.xybz = 'Y' and t.qyjtdjuuid =?

select b.bmduuid,b.djxh,n.nsrsbh,n.nsrmc,n.zgswj_dm,b.yxqq,b.yxqz,b.whr_dm,b.whrq,b.sjgsdq,b.yxbz from DJ_BMDGL b,DJ_NSRXX n where b.djxh = n.djxh and b.yxbz = 'Y' and n.yxbz='Y' and (1 = ? or n.shxydm = ?) and (1 = ? or n.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and n.zgswj_dm = ? and b.yxqz > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.yxqq < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select qxuuid, rdpzuuid, lcslid, hdslid, djxh, nsrzglx_dm, sy, yj_1, zjsjqk, zgqxrq, ywpzuuid, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj from rd_swrdzgqxqdspb where lcslid = ? and hdslid = ? and zfbz_1='N'

select nsr.DJJG_DM, nsr.DJRQ, nsr.DJXH, nsr.DJZCLX_DM, nsr.DWLSGX_DM, nsr.FDDBRSFZJHM, nsr.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, nsr.FDDBRXM, nsr.FJMQYBZ, nsr.GDGHLX_DM, nsr.GDSLX_DM, nsr.HY_DM, nsr.JDXZ_DM, nsr.KQCCSZTDJBZ, nsr.KZZTDJLX_DM, nsr.LRRQ, nsr.LRR_DM, nsr.NSRMC, nsr.NSRSBH, nsr.shxydm, nsr.NSRZT_DM, nsr.SCJYDZ, nsr.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, nsr.SJGSDQ, nsr.SJTB_SJ, nsr.SSDABH, nsr.SSGLY_DM, nsr.SWDJBLBZ, nsr.XGRQ, nsr.XGR_DM, nsr.ZCDZ, nsr.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, nsr.ZGSWJ_DM, nsr.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, nsr.ZZJG_DM, nsr.nsrztlx_dm, fyhy.FYHYUUID, fyhy.HY_DM FYHY, fyhy.XH, fyhy.YXBZ, kz.BSRXM, kz.FDDBRYDDH, kz.ZCZB, kz.ZSXMCXBZ_DM, kz.YHSJNFS_DM, kz.CWFZRSFZJZL_DM, kz.TZZE, kz.SCJYDLXDH, kz.ZCDYZBM, kz.JYFW, kz.YGZNSRLX_DM, kz.WHSYJSFJFXXDJBZ, kz.SJTB_SJ, kz.CWFZRDZXX, kz.GYKGLX_DM, kz.GYTZBL, kz.WZTZBL, kz.ZRRTZBL, kz.BSRSFZJHM, kz.CWFZRYDDH, kz.FDDBRDZXX, kz.SWDLRDZXX, kz.KJZDZZ_DM, kz.GGRS, kz.HHRS, kz.ZCDLXDH, kz.SWDLRNSRSBH, kz.BSRGDDH, kz.CWFZRSFZJHM, kz.WZ, kz.SCJYDYZBM, kz.BSRDZXX, kz.ZFJGLX_DM, kz.ZZJGLX_DM, kz.ZZSJYLB, kz.BSRYDDH, kz.BSRSFZJZL_DM, kz.CWFZRXM, kz.BZFS_DM, kz.GDGRS, kz.HJSZD, kz.SWDLRMC, kz.LSSWDJYXQZ, kz.LSSWDJYXQQ, kz.CWFZRGDDH, kz.FDDBRGDDH, kz.SWDLRLXDH, kz.WJCYRS, kz.CYRS, kz.HSFS_DM, kz.SJGSDQ, kz.GJHDQSZ_DM, kz.ZZSQYLX_DM, pz.kyslrq, pz.pzzmhwjh, pz.zzhm, pz.pzsljglx_dm, pz.pzsljg_dm, pz.scjyqxq, pz.scjyqxz, pz.zzhm, pz.zzlx_dm, nsr.pgjg_dm from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, dj_nsrfyhyxx fyhy, DJ_PZJGXX pz where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and nsr.djxh = fyhy.djxh(+) and nsr.nsrbm = ? and nsr.gdslx_dm = ? and pz.djxh(+) = nsr.djxh and nsr.yxbz = 'Y'
select distinct(w.dzsphm) from dj_wcjyhdqksbbxx_wsxx w where w.djxh = ? and w.dzsphm is not null and w.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.zszm_dm code, a.zszmmc caption, b.swjg_dm, b.sl_1, b.zsl, b.dgbz, b.yxqz, b.yxqq from dm_gy_zszm a, cs_gy_glb_zszm b where a.zspm_dm = ? and a.zszm_dm = b.zszm_dm and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y' and b.swjg_dm = ? and b.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.yxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.swjg_dm != '00000000000'

select ls.djxh, ls.gdslx_dm, ls.ssdabh, ls.nsrsbh, ls.nsrmc, ls.djjg_dm, ls.kzztdjlx_dm, ls.kqccsztdjbz, ls.djzclx_dm, ls.nsrzt_dm, ls.gdghlx_dm, ls.fddbrxm, ls.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, ls.fddbrsfzjhm from dj_nsrxx_ls ls where ls.djxh = ? order by ls.lrrq desc
select t.wcjyhwmc,t.hwuuid,t.wcjyzmuuid from zm_wcjyhdssglzm_hwxx t where t.wcjyzmuuid=?
Select * From WBJH_YH_CLGZSMSTCML Where Nh = ? And Nnch = ? Order By To_Number(Cnyh)

select xduuid, djxh, lcslid, hdslid, nsrjndz, nsrlx_dm, jnlxdh, jnyzbm, nsrjwdz, jwlxdh, jwyzbm, fhgdly, sqrxmyw, flmc, flyjt, flyjk, gjhdqsz_dm, cjzmswjgmc, cjzmrq, yxqq, yxqz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, ywpzuuid, zstybz, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, dsfmc, nsrgcrhdsfssjmbz, dlsbjbr, dlsbrq, slswsx_dm, fjmxxssxddysqspyj_dm, yqsprq, yqsply, htbh, slswjg_dm, slr_dm, slrq from rd_ssxddysqspb t where htbh = ? and djxh= ? and zstybz = 'Y' and zfbz_1='N'
select PZZL_DM, PZZLMC, PZME, XJPZBZ, XYBZ, YXBZ, SWJG_DM, WBPZBZ, WHPBZ, PHCD, PZLBJC, TYRQ, PZDL_DM, STXJGLBZ, SJPZZL_DM, PZDLBZ, PZZLBZ, PZXLBZ, BZ from dm_pz_pzzl t where t.pzzl_dm=?

SELECT XZ.XZQHSZ_DM, XZ.XZQHZM_DM, XZ.XZQHMC, XZ.SJXZQHSZ_DM, XZ.XZQHJC, XZ.XYBZ, XZ.YXBZ, XZ.XZQHLMZM_DM, XZ.SSXZQMC, XZ.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_XZQH XZ WHERE XYBZ = 'Y' AND YXBZ = 'Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR XZ.SJXZQHSZ_DM = XZ.XZQHSZ_DM START WITH XZ.XZQHSZ_DM = ?
select g.glgluuid,g.lb_dm,g.djxh from dj_djhglgl g where g.djxh = ? and g.lb_dm in(#macroparam#) and TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= g.yxqq and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <=g.yxqz
delete from dj_nsrfyhyxx t where t.djxh = ?
select t.* from rd_ybnsrrdsqspb t where t.djxh = ?

select a.ssdabh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.zzjg_dm, a.hjszd, a.jyfw, a.zcdlxdh, a.zcdyzbm, a.scjydlxdh, a.scjydyzbm, a.hsfs_dm, a.cyrs, a.wjcyrs, a.hhrs, a.ggrs, a.gdgrs, a.zzjglx_dm, a.kjzdzz_dm, a.wz, a.swdlrlxdh, a.swdlrdzxx, a.zczb, a.tzze, a.zrrtzbl, a.wztzbl, a.gytzbl, a.gykglx_dm, a.zfjglx_dm, a.bzfs_dm, a.fddbrgddh, a.fddbryddh, a.fddbrdzxx, a.cwfzrxm, a.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, a.cwfzrsfzjhm, a.cwfzrgddh, a.cwfzryddh, a.cwfzrdzxx, a.bsrxm, a.bsrsfzjzl_dm, a.bsrsfzjhm, a.bsrgddh, a.bsryddh, a.bsrdzxx, a.lsswdjyxqq, a.lsswdjyxqz, a.swdlrnsrsbh, a.swdlrmc, a.zzsjylb, a.gjhdqsz_dm, a.ygznsrlx_dm, a.zjgnsrsbh, a.zjgmc, a.zjgzcdz, a.zjgzcdzyzbm, a.yxqq, a.zjgfddbrxm, a.yxqz, a.zjglxdh, a.zjgjyfw, a.pzsljglx_dm, a.pzsljg_dm, a.pzsljgmc, a.pzzmhwjh, a.zzlx_dm, a.zzhm, a.kyslrq, a.scjyqxq, a.scjyqxz, a.lrrq, a.tyshxydm, a.nsrswjg, a.scztbh, a.xxczlx, a.globalbusinessid, a.xh, a.qfjg_dm, a.frzs, a.frzsyzbm, a.zcxs, a.hzrq from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx a, (select gs.xh from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx gs, wbjh_cj_sj_bgxx b where gs.xh = b.p_xh and (1 = #macroparam# or b.tyshxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or gs.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.bgrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.bgrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and not exists (select q.shxydm from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx q where q.xh_2 = b.xh) group by gs.xh) b where a.xh = b.xh
select uuid , yddjxh , mbddjxh , nsrdzgxlb_dm, yxbz from dj_djztgxdzb dzb where dzb.yddjxh = ? and dzb.nsrdzgxlb_dm = ? and dzb.yxbz='Y'
select j.uuid, j.djxh, j.nsqx_dm, j.jbzqyy_dm from rd_jbzqrdjgb j where j.djxh = ? and j.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and j.yxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and j.yxqz>=j.yxqq and j.zfbz_1='N'
delete from dj_ls_djxhshxydm ls where exists (select qf.shxydm from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx qf where ls.xh_2 = qf.xh_2 and qf.clbz = 'Y')
select distinct ls.djxh, dj.ssdabh from yh_ls_zgmc ls, dj_nsrxx dj where ls.djxh = dj.djxh and dj.yxbz = 'Y'

select glgluuid, djxh, lb_dm, yxqq, yxqz, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj from dj_djhglgl t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxqq >= t.yxqz and exists (select 1 from cs_dj_zkzpxgmnsrglgljkxx d where d.lb_dm = t.lb_dm and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xybz = 'Y') order by t.yxqq

select n.djxh, ls.shxydm, ls.xh_2, ls.swjg_dm, ls.zzhm, ls.rq, ls.nsrsbh, ls.xzqhsz_dm, ls.hy_dm, ls.scjydz, ls.nsrmc, ls.jyfw, ls.kyslrq from dj_nsrxx n, dj_ls_djxhshxydm ls where n.zgswj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or n.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and n.shxydm = ls.shxydm and n.yxbz = 'Y' and n.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '08') and n.GSZXRQ is null and (n.kzztdjlx_dm = '1110' or n.kzztdjlx_dm = '1120' or n.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%') and rownum <= 500
select t.rduuid, t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.swsx_dm, t.jwzcqymcyw, t.gjhdqsz_dm, t.fddbr, t.qdr_dm, t.qdrq, t.qdswjg_dm, t.zgswj_dm from rd_jwzczzgl t where t.lcslid = ?
select distinct x.zsxm_dm, x.zsxmmc from dm_gy_zsxm x, cs_gy_glb_zsxm z where x.xybz = 'Y' and x.yxbz = 'Y' and z.zsxm_dm = x.zsxm_dm and z.yxbz = 'Y' and z.xybz = 'Y' order by zsxm_dm

select t.uuid, t.cxmlpc_dm, t.xnyqcxsccsyhcx_dm, t.scqymc, t.clxh, t.tymc, t.cpmc_1, t.fdjpl, t.hdzkrs, t.xs_1, t.dws, t.pfbz_1, t.zhrlxhl, t.zhgkrlxhl, t.zczbzl, t.rlnyzlmc, t.ztgczzl, t.zdsjzzl, t.clcp, t.cddxslc, t.dlxdczzzl, t.dlxdczznl, t.jmzlx_dm, t.bz, t.qdr_dm, t.qdrq, t.qdswjg_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj from yh_ccsssyhqccxml t where t.clxh = ?

select RDPZUUID, DJXH, LCSLID, NSRZGLX_DM, YXQQ, YXQZ, SJZZRQ, QXBZ, WSZG, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, SJGSDQ from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb n where n.djxh = ? and n.nsrzglx_dm = ? and n.sjzzrq > ? and n.Qxbz = ? and (n.zfbz_1 is null or n.zfbz_1 = 'N')
select d.kjskdjuuid, d.djxh, d.kjywfsrq, d.djrq, d.zxbz, d.lsfskjywbz from dj_kjskdjxx d where d.djxh = ? and (d.zxbz = 'N' or d.zxbz is null)
select b.* from TD_FXMX_JKTXB t,TD_FXMX_JKTX_DCXXB b where t.txxxsb_dm in ('0301','0302') and t.scsj > ? and t.fxmxxh = b.fxmxxh

select wt.wszg, wt.wtxysuuid, wz.wtxyzzuuid, xx.djxh, xx.nsrsbh as stfnsrsbh, xx.nsrmc as stdzrmc, kz.zcdlxdh as stdzrlxdh, xx.fddbrxm as stffddbr, xx.zcdz as lxdz, kz.zcdlxdh as lxdh, wt.hjszddz, wt.xjzddz as xjzdz, wt.dzfw as wtdzfw, wt.dzqxq, wt.dzqxz, wt.dzszjfj as wtdzszjfj, wt.jsyjjsl from dj_nsrxx xx, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, dj_wtxysxx wt, dj_wtxyzzxx wz where kz.djxh = xx.djxh and wt.stfdjxh = xx.djxh and wz.wtxysuuid = wt.wtxysuuid and wz.ggbz = 'N' and xx.djxh = ?
select j.djxh,min(j.yxqq) yxqq from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb j ,dj_ls_djxhshxydm ls where j.nsrzglx_dm in ('201', '202') and (j.zfbz_1 is null or j.zfbz_1 = 'N') and j.djxh = ls.djxh group by j.djxh

select t.qcuuid, t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.zlcslid, t.sndzzssjjne, t.sndyyssjjne, t.sndxfssjjne, t.sndqysdssjjne, t.sfyrd, t.snddfqtgshjsjjne, t.bndzzsyjjne, t.bndyysyjjne, t.bndxfsyjjne, t.bndqysdsyjjne, t.bnddfqtgshjyjjne, t.fdcxmtze, t.jknd, t.zdsyhjkjc_dm, t.zsbs, t.zssm, t.gszgswjmc, t.dszgswjmc, t.sjje_1, t.snjkjc, t.szswjg_dm, t.sxxm_dm, t.sxtj_dm from dj_zdsyjknsrcxqc t where t.jknd = ? and t.djxh = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'
select a.CD, a.GJHDQSZ_DM, a.CLSCQY_DM, a.CDSX, a.ZGSWJG_DM, a.CLSCQYMC from DM_ZS_CLSCQY a
update dj_nsrzgswjgbgxx z set z.yxqz=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') where z.djxh=? and z.zgswj_dm=? and ? between z.yxqq and z.yxqz and yxbz='Y'

select n.djxh, n.gdslx_dm, n.ssdabh, n.nsrsbh, n.shxydm, n.nsrmc, n.kzztdjlx_dm, n.djzclx_dm, n.fddbrxm, n.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, n.scjydz, n.fddbrsfzjhm, n.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, n.nsrzt_dm, n.hy_dm, n.zcdz, n.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, n.jdxz_dm, n.dwlsgx_dm, n.gdghlx_dm, n.djjg_dm, n.djrq, n.zzjg_dm, n.kqccsztdjbz, n.zgswj_dm, n.zgswskfj_dm, n.ssgly_dm, n.fjmqybz, n.lrrq, n.swdjblbz, n.sjgsdq from dj_nsrxx n, dj_nsrxx_kz kz where n.djxh = kz.djxh and n.nsrsbh = ? and n.gdslx_dm = ? and (n.kzztdjlx_dm in ('1110','1120') or n.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%') and n.yxbz = 'Y'

select tdzzsxmuuid, djxh, tdzzsxmbh, tdzzsxmmc, jdxz_dm, xxdz, khyh, yhzh, xmjsqssj, xmjszzsj, zyscb, dwyscb, kftdzmj, kfjzzmj, fdczrhtmc, bz, xmszddfswjg_dm, zgswskfj_dm, xzqhsz_dm,tdzzsxmzt_dm,qsssqq,qsssqz,pgjg_dm from dj_tdzzsxmxx where tdzzsxmuuid = ? and yxbz = 'Y'
select fy.hy_dm from dj_nsrfyhyxx fy where fy.djxh = ? and fy.yxbz = 'Y'

select b.clbz,b.xh_2, nvl(b.rgqfswjg_dm, b.thswjg_dm) rgqfswjg_dm from dj_ls_djxhshxydm a, wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx b where a.xh_2 = b.xh_2 and b.yxbz = 'Y' and (b.rgqfswjg_dm is not null or b.thswjg_dm is not null)

Select count(a.zguuid) count from yh_zgmc a where a.djxh = ? And ( a.ldhtqsrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.ldhtjsrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) and a.SXSYHRYBZ = 'Y' and a.xsssyhzjlx_dm in (#macroparam#)

select a.JZYGCXMUUID,a.LCSLID,a.DJXH,a.GCXMBH,a.GCXMMC,a.GCXMDZ,a.XZQHSZ_DM,a.JDXZ_DM,a.XMFZRXM,a.XMFZRLXDH, a.KGRQ,a.JGRQ,a.XMYT_DM,a.XMYS,a.JZMJ, a.JZYCBFS_DM,a.JSFDJXH,a.JZYFKFS_DM,a.JZYGLXS_DM,a.XMGLRQQ,a.XMSZDDFSWJG_DM,a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM,a.SSGLY_DM,a.ZXRQ, a.ZFBZ_1,a.ZFR_DM,a.ZFRQ_1,a.LRR_DM,a.LRRQ,a.XGR_DM,a.XGRQ,a.SJGSDQ,a.ZDXMBZ from dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb a where a.djxh=? and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.zxrq is null
select j.jylx_dm, j.jxfx1_dm1, j.jxfx2_dm1, j.dmlb from dm_kj_jylx j where ? like j.dmlb and j.xybz = 'Y' and j.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.djxh jsdwdjxh, t.nsrsbh, t.shxydm,t.nsrmc, a.gcxmbh jsqgcxmbh, a.gcxmmc,a.* from DJ_NSRXX t, DJ_JZYGCXMQKDJXXB a where t.djxh = a.djxh and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.jzycbfs_dm in ('1', '3','4','9') and a.zxrq is null and t.djxh=? and t.yxbz='Y'

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.shxydm, nsr.scjydz, nsr.djzclx_dm, nsr.hy_dm, kz.jyfw, nsr.jdxz_dm, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm yssgly_dm from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and nsr.yxbz='Y' and nsr.gdslx_dm = ? and nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and (1 = ? or nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ?) and (1 = ? or nsr.hy_dm in (select h.hy_dm from dm_gy_hy h where h.xlbz = 'Y' and h.xybz = 'Y' and h.yxbz = 'Y' start with h.hy_dm = ? connect by prior h.hy_dm = h.sjhy_dm)) and (1 = ? or nsr.djzclx_dm in (select d.djzclx_dm from dm_dj_djzclx d where d.xlbz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xlbz = 'Y' start with d.djzclx_dm = ? connect by prior d.djzclx_dm = d.sjdjzclx_dm)) and (1 = ? or nsr.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or nsr.jdxz_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or nsr.ssgly_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or nsr.ssgly_dm is null) and rownum < 900

select n.tdsybh, n.tdzldz, n.ssswjg_dm, n.xzqhsz_dm, n.jdxz_dm, n.tddj_dm, n.tdzmj, n.yxbz, n.qh, n.tdjbxxuuid, m.tdqsuuid, m.syqsyxqq, m.syqsyxqz, n.djxh, n.tdsyqkuuid, n.fwtddjlx_dm, n.tdmj, n.mstdmj, n.ystdmj, n.dwse, n.nynse, n.yxqq, n.yxqz, n.nsqx_dm, n.sbqx_dm, n.jkqx_dm, n.yskm_dm, n.ysfpbl_dm, n.skgk_dm, n.zscztdsysbz, n.bz, n.lcslid, n.tdczrmc, n.tdczrsfzjhm, n.czrsfzjzl_dm, n.zspm_dm from (select b.tdsybh, b.tdqsuuid, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz from dj_tdqsxx b where (1 = ? or (TO_DATE(? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.syqsyxqz AND TO_DATE(? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= b.syqsyxqq)) AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.syqsyxqz)) AND b.syqsyxqq <= b.syqsyxqz) m, (select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid, c.tdsyqkuuid, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.tdmj, c.mstdmj, c.ystdmj, c.dwse, c.nynse, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.nsqx_dm, c.sbqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.zscztdsysbz, c.bz, c.lcslid, c.djxh, c.tdczrmc, c.tdczrsfzjhm, c.czrsfzjzl_dm, c.zspm_dm from dj_tdjbxx a,dj_tdsyqkdjxx c where a.tdsybh=c.tdsybh AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= c.yxqz AND TO_DATE( ? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= c.yxqq )) AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE( ? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= c.yxqz)) and c.djxh = ? AND c.yxqq <= c.yxqz and c.fwtddjlx_dm = '2') n where n.tdsybh = m.tdsybh(+)

select a.uuid, a.djxh, a.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm, a.tzfhhhrzjhm, a.tzfhhhrmc, a.tzfjjxz_dm, a.tzbl, a.gjhdqsz_dm, a.dz, a.yxqq, a.tzje, a.yxqz, a.fpbl, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.sjgsdq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq from dj_tzfxx a where a.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm = ? and a.tzfhhhrmc = ? and a.tzfhhhrzjhm = ? and a.yxqq<=a.yxqz and (1=? or (a.yxqq<=? and a.yxqz>=? ))

select t.qycyscqyuuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.qycyscqylx_dm, t.ssnd, t.yyjgnl, t.yyjylyjgl, t.zhspl, t.qysl, t.bmfzr, t.zbrxm, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq from dj_qycyscqyjbqkdjb t where t.djxh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select l.uuid, l.djxh, l.swsx_dm, l.skssqq, l.skssqz, l.sbuuid, l.yzpzxh, l.jmse from yh_xejmtzlsxx l where l.djxh = ? and l.swsx_dm = ? and l.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and l.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')
SELECT RDPZUUID , DJXH , LCSLID, NSRZGLX_DM, YXQQ, YXQZ, SJZZRQ, QXBZ, WSZG, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1 FROM RD_NSRZGXX_JGB J WHERE J.LCSLID = ?
select t.zjjcuuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.ffrq, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.swzjhm, t.swzjglzt_dm, t.swzjzl_dm from dj_nsrzjjcxx t where t.djxh = ? and (t.swzjglzt_dm = ? or t.swzjglzt_dm = ?)

select a.uuid, a.djxh, a.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm, a.tzfhhhrzjhm, a.tzfhhhrmc, a.tzfjjxz_dm, a.tzbl, a.gjhdqsz_dm, a.dz, a.yxqq, a.tzje, a.yxqz, a.fpbl, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.sjgsdq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq from dj_tzfxx a where a.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm = ? and a.tzfhhhrmc = ? and a.tzfhhhrzjhm = ? and a.yxqq<=a.yxqz and (1=? or (a.yxqq<=? and a.yxqz>=? )) and a.djxh = ?

select fzchrduuid, djxh, lcslid, rdyy, ysyskzz, rdrq, rdr_dm, rdswjg_dm, xgsxrq, jcfzchrq, zxfzchrq, ggrq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, ggr_dm, ggswjg_dm, xgsxr_dm, jcr_dm_1, jcswjg_dm_1 from dj_fzchrdxx where jcfzchrq is null and zxfzchrq is null and djxh=?

select b.lcswsx_dm, b.lcswsxmc, c.swsx_dm, c.swsxmc from cs_gy_slswsxylcswsxdzb t, dm_gy_lcswsx b, dm_gy_swsx c where t.lcswsx_dm = b.lcswsx_dm and b.ywlc_dm = c.ywlc_dm and t.slswsx_dm = c.slswsx_dm and b.ywlc_dm in (select t.ywlc_dm from dm_gy_ywlc t where t.ywfl_dm = 'A03' and t.ywlc_dm != 'LCA031001' and t.ywlc_dm != 'LCA032005')
select d.dlysjyxkuuid,d.dkbauuid,d.dlysjyxkzhm,d.yxqq,d.yxqz,d.lrr_dm, d.lrrq, d.xgr_dm,d.xgrq,d.sjgsdq, d.sjtb_sj from dj_hwysxgmdkzzsfp_dljyxkxx d where d.dkbauuid = ? and d.yxbz='Y'

select ckzhuuid, djxh, lcslid, yhzhxz_dm, xzqhsz_dm, zhmc, yhhb_dm, yhzh, hbsz_dm, yhkhdjzh, ffrq, tszhbz, khrq, bgrq, zxrq, bz, yxqq, yxqz, yhyywd_dm, sbjbjg, sbbm, sbfzhbz, sbdjxh, djkskzhbz, sxjszhbz, sxjfzhbz, tfzhbz, yxbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, y.cktszhbz, y.khyhhh, y.qsyhhh from dj_nsrckzhzhxx y where (1=? or yxqq >=to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1=? or yxqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd')) and djxh=?
select t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg, t.dqsypzhm pzhm, t.pzqshm, t.pzzzhm from zm_wspzhkxx t where t.lcslid = ? and t.zfbz_1 != 'Y'
select tdzsbmuuid, djxh, swjg_dm, tdzsbhlxjh, djr_dm, yxqq, yxqz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq， sfdsdkzzsfp, dsdkjg from dj_tdzsbmdjxx where djxh = ?

select xduuid, djxh, lcslid, hdslid, nsrjndz, nsrlx_dm, jnlxdh, jnyzbm, nsrjwdz, jwlxdh, jwyzbm, fhgdly, sqrxmyw, flmc, flyjt, flyjk, gjhdqsz_dm, cjzmswjgmc, cjzmrq, yxqq, yxqz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, ywpzuuid, zstybz, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, dsfmc, nsrgcrhdsfssjmbz, dlsbjbr, dlsbrq, slswsx_dm, fjmxxssxddysqspyj_dm, yqsprq, yqsply, htbh, slswjg_dm, slr_dm, slrq from rd_ssxddysqspb where djxh = ? and zfbz_1 = 'N'

select t.fwsyqkuuid, t.djxh, t.fybh, t.fwtddjlx_dm, t.lcslid, t.zspm_dm, t.fcyz, t.msyz, t.ysyz, t.nynse, t.nzjsr, t.zsfcsbz, t.sl_1, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.sbqx_dm, t.nsqx_dm, t.jkqx_dm, t.kcl, t.yskm_dm, t.ysfpbl_dm, t.skgk_dm, t.czrmc, t.czrsfzjzl_dm, t.czrsfzjhm, t.bz, t.sjgsdq, t.syzyfs_dm, t.fyjbxxuuid, fy.fyjbxxuuid, fy.fwzh, fy.dy, fy.lc_1, fy.fh, fy.jg_dm, fy.cx_dm, fy.fwmj, fy.tnmj, fy.fwzldz, fy.xzqhsz_dm, fy.jdxz_dm, fy.ssswjg_dm, fy.bdcxmbh, fy.tdsybh, fy.yxbz, fy.fczyz from dj_fwsyqkdjxx t, dj_fyjbxx fy where t.fybh = ? and t.fybh = fy.fybh AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxqz AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= t.yxqq)) AND (1 = ? OR TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxqz) AND t.yxqq <= t.yxqz and fy.yxbz='Y'

select zb.gcxmbh, zb.gcxmmc, zb.gcxmdz, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.shxydm, zb.zgswskfj_dm, zb.xmszddfswjg_dm, zb.ZDXMBZ, nsr.djxh from dj_jzyxmdj_zfbgcxmxx t, dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb zb where t.gcxmbh = ? and nsr.djxh = zb.djxh and t.fbgcxmbh = zb.gcxmbh and nsr.yxbz='Y'

select hbflhqkuuid, hbflbguuid, djxh, hbflhnsrsbh, hbflhnsrmc, hbflhfzrxm, hbflhscjydz, bz from Dj_Hbflbg_Hbflhjbqk where (1 = #macroparam# or djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or hbflbguuid = ?) and yxbz = 'Y'

select xdmxuuid, xdmxgcuuid, xduuid, djxh, lcslid, xm_1, htbh, ssxdsdlx_dm, fjmnsfs_dm, kjywrdjxh, xyt, xyk, sre, ynssde, sfsygljy, t.zggnssflgdsl, jmse, yxqq, yxqz, bz, yxbz, xybz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, ssxd_dm, xdsl, SSJMXZDL_DM, SSJMXZXL_DM, SSJMXZHZ_DM, JMSSPSX_DM from rd_ssxddyspsqmxgcb t where lcslid=? and yxbz='Y'

select hwuuid, wcjyzmuuid, djxh, lcslid, wcjyhwmc, wcjyhwsl, wcjyhwxsdd, wcjyhwyxqxq, wcjyhwyxqxz, wcjyhwzz, yxbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, htbh from zm_wcjyhdssglzm_hwxx t where t.wcjyzmuuid = ? and t.yxbz = ?

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.djxh, nsr.ssdabh, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.jdxz_dm, nsr.kzztdjlx_dm, nsr.djzclx_dm, nsr.fddbrxm, nsr.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, nsr.fddbrsfzjhm, nsr.scjydz, nsr.hy_dm, nsr.zcdz, nsr.dwlsgx_dm, nsr.gdslx_dm, nsr.gdslx_dm, nsr.gdghlx_dm, nsr.zzjg_dm, nsr.fjmqybz, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm, nsr.shxydm from qx_swjg_zns qx, dj_wtxysxx wt, dj_nsrxx nsr where qx.ccm like ? and qx.swjg_dm = wt.wtfswjg_dm and wt.stfdjxh = nsr.djxh and wt.xyyxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and wt.xyyxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and wt.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select n.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.shxydm from dj_nsrxx n, dj_wbnsrjydbydj w where n.djxh = w.djxh and w.wcjyhdssglzmbh = ? and nvl(w.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and w.yxbz = ? and n.yxbz = ?

SELECT T.GSXZGLJG_DM CODE, T.GSXZGLJGMC CAPTION, T.SJGSXZGLJG_DM PCODE FROM DM_GY_GSXZGLJG T where T.YXBZ = 'Y' and T.XYBZ='Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR T.GSXZGLJG_DM = T.SJGSXZGLJG_DM START WITH T.XZQHSZ_DM = ? UNION ALL SELECT T.GSXZGLJG_DM CODE, T.GSXZGLJGMC CAPTION, T.SJGSXZGLJG_DM FROM DM_GY_GSXZGLJG T WHERE T.GSXZGLJG_DM = ? and T.YXBZ = 'Y' and T.XYBZ='Y'
SELECT WJZUUID,GCXMBH,DJXH,WCJYHDSSGLZMBH,WCJYHDSSGLZMFFDW,YXBZ, LRR_DM,LRRQ,XGR_DM,XGRQ,SJGSDQ,JZYGCXMUUID FROM dj_jzyxmdj_wcjyhdssglzmxx T WHERE T.WCJYHDSSGLZMBH =? and t.gcxmbh != ? AND YXBZ = 'Y'
select t.jcfpqkuuid, t.tfyuuid, t.jhfpzl_dm, t.djxh, t.fp_dm, t.fpqshm, t.fpzzhm, t.fpsl, t.lhbz from dj_tysqxx_jcfpqk t where t.djxh = ? and t.lhbz = 'N' and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select djxh, zjgnsrsbh, zjgdjxh, zjgmc, zjgzcdz, zjgzcdzyzbm, yxqq, yxqz, '' zgswj_dm, '' zfjglx_dm, '' shxydm from dj_zjgxx z where z.djxh = ? and (1=? or (z.yxqq <=? and z.yxqz >=?)) and (1=? or (z.yxqq <=? and z.yxqz >=?)) and (z.zjgdjxh='0' or z.zjgdjxh is null) and z.yxqq <=z.yxqz and z.yxbz='Y' union all select n.djxh, n.nsrsbh zjgnsrsbh, z.zjgdjxh, n.nsrmc zjgmc, n.zcdz zjgzcdz, k.zcdyzbm zjgzcdzyzbm, yxqq, yxqz, n.zgswj_dm, k.zfjglx_dm, n.shxydm from dj_zjgxx z,dj_nsrxx n,dj_nsrxx_kz k where z.zjgdjxh=n.djxh and z.zjgdjxh=k.djxh and (1=? or (z.yxqq <=? and z.yxqz >=?)) and (1=? or (z.yxqq <=? and z.yxqz >=?)) and z.yxbz='Y' and z.yxqq <=z.yxqz and z.djxh = ? and n.yxbz = 'Y'
select d.xh_2 from dj_ls_djxhshxydm d, dj_nsrxx t where d.shxydm = t.shxydm and t.yxbz = 'Y'
select dkbauuid,lcslid,djxh,hyjh,ccdwhj,zfbz_1,zfr_dm,zfrq_1,lrr_dm,lrrq,xgr_dm, xgrq,sjgsdq,sjtb_sj from dj_hwysxgmdkzzsfp where djxh = ? and zfbz_1='N'
select t.uuid, t.djxh, t.ghlb_dm from dj_ghrdxxb t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and djxh = ?
SELECT TFYUUID,TYLCSLID,FYLCSLID,DJXH,HZTYQXQ,HZTYQXZ,FYRQ, CLTYBZ,CLFYBZ,LRR_DM,LRRQ,XGR_DM,XGRQ,SJGSDQ,YXBZ FROM dj_tfyxx WHERE djxh = ? and fyrq is not null AND YXBZ='Y'
select t.xzqhsz_dm, t.xzqhmc from dm_gy_xzqh t where t.xzqhjc = 1 and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xzqhsz_dm not in ('820000', '810000')

select a.swjg_dm as qfjg_dm, a.shxydm, a.xh_2, a.swjg_dm, a.zzhm, a.rq, a.nsrsbh, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.hy_dm, a.scjydz, a.nsrmc, a.jyfw, a.kyslrq , a.zzjg_dm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.fddbrsfzjhm from dj_ls_djxhshxydm a where rownum <= 1000

select n.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.ssdabh, n.shxydm from dj_nsrxx n, dj_pzjgxx pz where n.djxh = pz.djxh and pz.zzlx_dm = ? and pz.zzhm = ? and n.yxbz = 'Y' and n.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '08') and (n.kzztdjlx_dm = '1120' or n.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%')
select a.swsx_dm,a.swjg_dm,a.jmxmdl_dm,a.jmxmxl_dm,a.jmwj_dm from cs_yh_swsxjmwjdzb a where a.yxbz='Y' and a.yxbz='Y' and a.swsx_dm=?

SELECT n.djxh, n.gdslx_dm, n.ssdabh, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.kzztdjlx_dm, n.djzclx_dm, n.fddbrxm, n.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, n.scjydz, n.fddbrsfzjhm, n.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, n.nsrzt_dm, n.hy_dm, n.zcdz, n.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, n.jdxz_dm, n.dwlsgx_dm, n.gdghlx_dm, n.djjg_dm, n.djrq, n.zzjg_dm, n.kqccsztdjbz, n.lrr_dm, n.lrrq, n.xgr_dm, n.xgrq, n.sjgsdq, n.zgswj_dm, n.zgswskfj_dm, n.ssgly_dm, n.fjmqybz, n.swdjblbz, n.nsrbm, n.shxydm, n.pgjg_dm, n.gszxrq, kz.hjszd, kz.jyfw, kz.zcdlxdh, kz.zcdyzbm, kz.scjydlxdh, kz.scjydyzbm, kz.hsfs_dm, kz.cyrs, kz.wjcyrs, kz.hhrs, kz.ggrs, kz.gdgrs, kz.zzjglx_dm, kz.kjzdzz_dm, kz.wz, kz.swdlrlxdh, kz.swdlrdzxx, kz.zczb, kz.tzze, kz.zrrtzbl, kz.wztzbl, kz.gytzbl, kz.gykglx_dm, kz.zfjglx_dm, kz.bzfs_dm, kz.fddbrgddh, kz.fddbryddh, kz.fddbrdzxx, kz.cwfzrxm, kz.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, kz.cwfzrsfzjhm, kz.cwfzrgddh, kz.cwfzryddh, kz.cwfzrdzxx, kz.bsrxm, kz.bsrsfzjzl_dm, kz.bsrsfzjhm, kz.bsrgddh, kz.bsryddh, kz.bsrdzxx, kz.lsswdjyxqq, kz.lsswdjyxqz, kz.swdlrnsrsbh, kz.swdlrmc, kz.whsyjsfjfxxdjbz, kz.zzsjylb, kz.yhsjnfs_dm, kz.zsxmcxbz_dm, kz.zzsqylx_dm, kz.gjhdqsz_dm, kz.ygznsrlx_dm, kz.qyglcjbh, kz.qyssjt_dm, kz.nsrywmc, kz.ywzcdz, kz.fddbrzs, kz.fddbrzsyzbm, kz.zcxs FROM dj_nsrxx n, dj_nsrxx_kz kz WHERE n.djxh = kz.djxh and n.ssdabh = ? AND (1 = ? or n.kzztdjlx_dm LIKE ?) AND n.gdslx_dm = ? AND (n.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' OR N.KQCCSZTDJBZ IS NULL) and n.yxbz = 'Y'
select JGZNXH , ZN_DM , SWJG_DM , SJSWJG_DM , CCM from QX_SWJG_ZNS n where n.swjg_dm=? and n.yxbz='Y'

select cs.tddj_dm, cs.swjg_dm, cs.zspm_dm from cs_dj_tddjzspmdzb cs, (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm =?) jg where cs.swjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm and cs.xybz = 'Y' and cs.yxbz = 'Y' and cs.tddj_dm = ?

select b.jsfdjxh zfbjsfdjxh, b.jzygcxmuuid zfbgcxmuuid, b.gcxmbh zfbgcxmbh, b.gcxmmc zfbgcxmmc, b.gcxmdz zfbgcxmdz, b.xmys zfbgcxmys, b.ZDXMBZ, a.gcxmbh zbfgcxmbh from (select * from dj_jzyxmdj_zfbgcxmxx where yxbz = 'Y') a, dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb b where b.gcxmbh = a.fbgcxmbh(+) and b.djxh = ?

select t.qfjg_dm, t.ssdabh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.djzclx_dm, t.fddbrxm, t.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.fddbrsfzjhm, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrzt_dm, t.hy_dm, t.zcdz, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.dwlsgx_dm, t.gdghlx_dm, t.zzjg_dm, t.hjszd, t.jyfw, t.zcdlxdh, t.zcdyzbm, t.scjydlxdh, t.scjydyzbm, t.hsfs_dm, t.cyrs, t.wjcyrs, t.hhrs, t.ggrs, t.gdgrs, t.zzjglx_dm, t.kjzdzz_dm, t.wz, t.swdlrlxdh, t.swdlrdzxx, t.zczb, t.tzze, t.zrrtzbl, t.wztzbl, t.gytzbl, t.gykglx_dm, t.zfjglx_dm, t.bzfs_dm, t.fddbrgddh, t.fddbryddh, t.fddbrdzxx, t.cwfzrxm, t.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, t.cwfzrsfzjhm, t.cwfzrgddh, t.cwfzryddh, t.cwfzrdzxx, t.bsrxm, t.bsrsfzjzl_dm, t.bsrsfzjhm, t.bsrgddh, t.bsryddh, t.bsrdzxx, t.lsswdjyxqq, t.lsswdjyxqz, t.swdlrnsrsbh, t.swdlrmc, t.zzsjylb, t.gjhdqsz_dm, t.ygznsrlx_dm, t.zjgnsrsbh, t.zjgmc, t.zjgzcdz, t.zjgzcdzyzbm, t.yxqq, t.zjgfddbrxm, t.yxqz, t.zjglxdh, t.zjgjyfw, t.pzsljglx_dm, t.pzsljg_dm, t.pzsljgmc, t.pzzmhwjh, t.zzlx_dm, t.zzhm, t.kyslrq, t.scjyqxq, t.scjyqxz, t.lrrq, t.xxczlx, t.tyshxydm, t.SCZTBH, t.NSRSWJG, t.xh, t.zcxs,t.FRZS from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.tyshxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.xh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.kyslrq between ? and ?)

SELECT nsrxx.DJXH, GDSLX_DM, SSDABH, NSRSBH, SHXYDM, NSRMC, KZZTDJLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, SCJYDZ, FDDBRSFZJHM, SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM, HY_DM, ZCDZ, ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM, GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM, DJRQ, ZZJG_DM, KQCCSZTDJBZ, ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SSGLY_DM, p.zzlx_dm, p.zzhm FROM DJ_NSRXX NSRXX,dj_pzjgxx p WHERE p.djxh=nsrxx.djxh and FDDBRSFZJLX_DM = ? AND FDDBRSFZJHM = ? AND NSRXX.YXBZ = 'Y'

select n.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.shxydm,n.nsrmc, j.hdzxqq deyxqq, j.sjzxqz deyxqz from dj_nsrxx n, zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j where n.zgswj_dm = ? and n.zgswskfj_dm = ? and n.yxbz='Y' and (1 = #macroparam# or n.ssgly_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or n.hy_dm = ?) and n.djxh = j.djxh and (1 = #macroparam# or j.hdzxqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or j.sjzxqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or n.nsrsbh = ? or n.shxydm=?) and (j.zfbz_1 is null or j.zfbz_1 = 'N') and j.sjzxqz > j.hdzxqq and not exists (select 1 from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb jg where jg.djxh = n.djxh and jg.nsrzglx_dm = '201' and (jg.zfbz_1='N' OR jg.zfbz_1 is null) and jg.yxqq <= sysdate and (jg.sjzzrq is null or jg.sjzzrq >= sysdate))

select n.DJXH, GDSLX_DM, SSDABH, NSRSBH, NSRMC, KZZTDJLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, SCJYDZ, FDDBRSFZJHM, SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM, HY_DM, ZCDZ, ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM, GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM, DJRQ, ZZJG_DM, KQCCSZTDJBZ, ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ, SWDJBLBZ, NSRBM, YXBZ, SHXYDM, GSDJXH, QRBZ, QRR_DM, QRRQ, LYBZ, GSZGSWJ_DM, GSZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZGSWJMC, ZGSWSKFJMC, XGSDJXH, HJSZD, JYFW, ZCDLXDH, ZCDYZBM, SCJYDLXDH, SCJYDYZBM, HSFS_DM, CYRS, WJCYRS, HHRS, GGRS, GDGRS, ZZJGLX_DM, KJZDZZ_DM, WZ, SWDLRLXDH, SWDLRDZXX, ZCZB, TZZE, ZRRTZBL, WZTZBL, GYTZBL, GYKGLX_DM, ZFJGLX_DM, BZFS_DM, FDDBRGDDH, FDDBRYDDH, FDDBRDZXX, CWFZRXM, CWFZRSFZJZL_DM, CWFZRSFZJHM, CWFZRGDDH, CWFZRYDDH, CWFZRDZXX, BSRXM, BSRSFZJZL_DM, BSRSFZJHM, BSRGDDH, BSRYDDH, BSRDZXX, LSSWDJYXQQ, LSSWDJYXQZ, SWDLRNSRSBH, SWDLRMC, WHSYJSFJFXXDJBZ, ZZSJYLB, YHSJNFS_DM, ZSXMCXBZ_DM, ZZSQYLX_DM, GJHDQSZ_DM, YGZNSRLX_DM, QYGLCJBH, QYSSJT_DM, NSRYWMC, YWZCDZ, YGZNSRLXDMJH from dj_nsrxx_ygz n, dj_nsrxx_kz_ygz k where n.gsdjxh = k.djxh and n.nsrsbh = ? and n.gdslx_dm = ? and n.yxbz = 'Y' AND N.QRBZ = 'N'

select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid from dj_tdjbxx a where a.yxbz='Y' and (a.tdsybh = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?)

select t.uuid, t.sfxxbgbuuid, t.th, t.cybzhgsgfbl, t.gjhdqsz_dm, t.yfjmnsrgx, t.tgggscybzrgsgfbl, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.yxbz, t.mc1 from YH_FJMNSRXSSSXDBGB_CGQK t where t.sfxxbgbuuid = ?

SELECT T.RDPZUUID, T.ZFSBZ, T.RDZSUUID, T.DJXH, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.RDYXQQ, T.RDYXQZ, T.HY_DM, T.SBQX_DM, T.NSQX_DM, T.JKQX_DM, T.SLHDWSE,
T.YSKM_DM, T.YSFPBL_DM, T.SKGK_DM, T.ZSDLFS_DM, T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSL, T.YXBZ, T.LRRQ, T.Gfjbjg_Dm, T.Zsxmcxbz_Dm, T.Jfjc_Dm FROM RD_SFZRDXXB T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSXM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSDLFS_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.NSQX_DM = ?) AND T.RDYXQQ < T.RDYXQZ
select t.uuid, t.sfxxbgbuuid, t.lwhdjdkssj, t.lwhdjdjssj, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.yxbz from YH_FJMNSRXSSSXDBGB_Jdqk t where t.sfxxbgbuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select b.uuid, b.dsdjxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, b.wcjyhdssglzmbh, b.WCJYHDQKSBUUID, b.sfybjbz, b.fqrq, b.bjfs, B.Rwuuid from dj_nsrxx a, dj_wcjyqksbqdrw b where a.djxh = b.dsdjxh and b.sfybjbz = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or b.bjfs = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ? or a.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.wcjyhdssglzmbh like ?) and b.yxbz = ? and b.fqrq between ? and ?

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.fczyz, c.fwsyqkuuid, c.djxh, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.lcslid, c.zspm_dm, c.fcyz, c.msyz, c.ysyz, c.nynse, c.nzjsr, c.zsfcsbz, c.sl_1, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.sbqx_dm, c.nsqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.czrmc, c.czrsfzjzl_dm, c.czrsfzjhm, c.bz, c.kcl, c.syzyfs_dm, C.PKBZ from dj_fyjbxx a,dj_fwsyqkdjxx c where a.fyjbxxuuid=c.fyjbxxuuid and c.yxqz>c.yxqq and c.fwtddjlx_dm='2' and a.yxbz='Y' and (a.ssswjg_dm =? or 1 =?) and a.xzqhsz_dm = ? and a.jdxz_dm = ?

select wcjyzmuuid, wcjydxzqhsz_dm, wcjyhdssglzmbh, zmyxqxq, zmyxqxz, wszzrq from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx z where hxrq is not null and byrq is not null and djxh = ? and (z.zfbz_1 = 'N' OR Z.ZFBZ_1 is NULL) and yxbz = 'Y'

select UUID, DJXH , ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YXBZ, YXQQ , YXQZ , LRR_DM , LRRQ , XGR_DM , XGRQ
from dj_nsrzgswjgbgxx n where n.djxh in (#macroparam#) and n.yxbz='Y' AND N.YXQQ<n.yxqz

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm ,nsr.nsrmc, nsr.scjydz, qc.hzqxq, qc.hzqxz, qc.hznd, qc.hzrq_2, qc.swzjzl_dm, nsr.ZGSWJ_DM, nsr.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, nsr.SSGLY_DM, kz.jyfw from DJ_NSRHZQC qc, dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz where nsr.djxh = qc.djxh and nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and qc.hznd = ? and qc.swjg_dm = ? and qc.swzjzl_dm = ? and qc.zfbz_1 = 'N' and qc.hzrq_2 is null AND QC.SWJG_DM = NSR.ZGSWJ_DM and (1 = ? or nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or nsr.djrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or nsr.djrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or nsr.nsrzt_dm = ?) and nsr.yxbz = 'Y'

select d.bydjuuid, d.wcjyzmuuid, d.djxh, d.lcslid, d.wcjyhdssglzmbh, d.swdjd, d.wcjyd, d.wcjyhtzje, d.swdjdswjgyj, d.wcjydswjgyj, d.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxq, d.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxz, d.wcjyhdssglzmqfrq, d.bsrxm, d.lxdh, d.sqrq, d.bysj, d.sblcslid, d.ywcjyhdssglzmbh, d.lrr_dm, d.lrrq, d.xgr_dm, d.xgrq, d.jyfsdmjh, d.scjydswjgmc, d.scjydswjglxdh, d.jgszdqysdszsfs_dm, d.jgszdqysdshsjgmc, d.jgszdqysdshsjg_dm from dj_wbnsrjydbydj d, zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx z where d.djxh = ? and d.wcjyzmuuid = z.wcjyzmuuid and d.sblcslid is not null and (z.zfbz_1 = 'N' or z.zfbz_1 is null) and (d.zfbz_1 = 'N' or d.zfbz_1 is null) and z.hxrq is null and d.yxbz = 'Y' and z.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.tdsyqkuuid,t.djxh,t.tdsybh,t.fwtddjlx_dm,t.tdmj,t.mstdmj,t.ystdmj,t.dwse,t.nynse,t.yxqq, t.yxqz,t.nsqx_dm,t.sbqx_dm,t.jkqx_dm,t.yskm_dm,t.ysfpbl_dm,t.skgk_dm,t.zscztdsysbz,t.bz, t.sjgsdq,t.lcslid,t.zspm_dm,t.tdjbxxuuid,td.tdzldz,td.ssswjg_dm,td.xzqhsz_dm,td.jdxz_dm,td.tddj_dm,td.tdzmj, td.yxbz,td.qh,td.tdjbxxuuid from dj_tdsyqkdjxx t,dj_tdjbxx td where t.djxh=? and t.tdsybh= td.tdsybh AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxqz AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= t.yxqq)) AND (1 = ? OR TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxqz) AND t.yxqq <= t.yxqz

select t.qyjtdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, q.qyssjt_dm, q.qyssjtmc, q.jtdjxh, q.jtnsrsbh, q.ssdq, t.qyjtuuid from dj_qyjtjqcydwrd_qyjtxx t,DJ_QYSSJT q where t.qyjtuuid = q.qyjtuuid and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and q.yxbz='Y' and q.xybz = 'Y' and t.qyjtuuid =?

select n.LRR_DM, n.YXQQ, n.XGR_DM, n.LRRQ, n.ZFRQ_1, n.QXBZ, n.XGRQ, n.ZFR_DM, n.LCSLID, n.RDPZUUID, n.NSRZGLX_DM, n.SJZZRQ, n.DJXH, n.SJGSDQ, n.ZFBZ_1, n.YXQZ, n.WSZG, n.SJTB_SJ from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb n where n.djxh = ? and (n.zfbz_1='N' or n.zfbz_1 is null)

select uuid, yddjxh, mbddjxh, nsrdzgxlb_dm, yxbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj, ydzgswjg_dm, mbdzgswjg_dm from dj_djztgxdzb t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.yddjxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.mbddjxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.ydzgswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.mbdzgswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrdzgxlb_dm = ?)

select b.lcswsx_dm, b.lcswsxmc, c.swsx_dm, c.swsxmc,d.zsxm_dm from cs_gy_slswsxylcswsxdzb t, dm_gy_lcswsx b, v_dm_gy_swsx c,cs_yh_swsxjmxzdzb d where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xybz = 'Y' and t.lcswsx_dm = b.lcswsx_dm and b.ywlc_dm = c.ywlc_dm and t.slswsx_dm = c.slswsx_dm and c.swsx_dm=d.swsx_dm(+) and b.ywlc_dm in (select t.ywlc_dm from dm_gy_ywlc t where t.ywfl_dm = 'A03' and t.ywlc_dm != 'LCA031001' and t.ywlc_dm != 'LCA032005')

select * from (select gs.*, rg.rgqfswjg_dm, rg.qrbz, rg.uuid from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx gs, wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx rg where gs.xh = rg.xh_2(+) and (1 = ? or gs.tyshxydm = ?) and (1 = ? or gs.nsrmc like ?) and gs.xxczlx = ? and gs.kyslrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and gs.kyslrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (rg.yxbz = 'Y' or rg.yxbz is null) and (rg.zfbz_1 = 'N' or rg.yxbz is null)) jg where jg.rgqfswjg_dm is null and jg.qfjg_dm is null

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.fczyz, b.djxh, b.fwcqzsh, b.syqsyxqz from dj_fyjbxx a, dj_fwqsxx b where a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid(+) and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xzqhsz_dm = ? and a.jdxz_dm = ? and (a.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) and not EXISTS (select 1 from dj_fyjbxx c, dj_fwqsxx d where c.fyjbxxuuid = d.fyjbxxuuid and d.syqsyxqz >= ? and c.yxbz = 'Y' and d.zxrq is null and c.xzqhsz_dm = ? and c.jdxz_dm = ? and (c.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) and a.fyjbxxuuid=c.fyjbxxuuid )

select nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh,nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.scjydz from dj_nsrxx nsr where not exists(select 1 from dj_nsrhzqc qc where qc.swjg_dm =? and qc.hznd=? and qc.zfbz_1='N' and qc.djxh = nsr.djxh and qc.hzrq_2 is null) and nsr.zgswj_dm=? and nsr.gdslx_dm=? and (nsr.kzztdjlx_dm = ? or nsr.kzztdjlx_dm like ?) and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and (1=? or nsr.djrq >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=? or nsr.djrq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=? or nsr.nsrzt_dm=?) and (1=? or nsr.zgswskfj_dm=?) and nsr.yxbz = 'Y'

select n.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.ssdabh, n.shxydm from dj_nsrxx n where n.nsrmc = ? and n.fddbrsfzjlx_dm = ? and n.fddbrsfzjhm = ? and n.yxbz = 'Y' and n.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '08') and (n.kzztdjlx_dm = '1120' or n.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%')
select a.cxmlpc_dm from (select c.*, c.clcp || c.clxh as cpxh from yh_ccsssyhqccxml c) a where a.cpxh = ?

select a.CWKJZDBAUUID,a.DJXH,a.LCSLID,a.CWKJZDBZ,a.DZYHPTXFF_DM,a.DZYHPTXFFBZ,a.ZJFFBZ,a.CBHSFFBZ,a.KJHSRJMC,a.KJHSRJBZ,a.KJHSRJBBH, a.KJHSRJQYSJ,a.KJHSRJSJKLXMC,a.ZJFSDL_DM,a.ZJFSXL_DM,a.CBHSFF_DM,a.KJZDZZ_DM,a.KCYQZYQYKTZCTXFF_DM,a.KCYQZYQYKQQYZCZHFF_DM, a.KCYQZYQYKFZCZJFF_DM,a.YXQQ,a.YXQZ,a.LRRQ,a.LRR_DM,a.XGR_DM,a.XGRQ,a.SJGSDQ,ZLBSXL_DM from dj_cwkjzdjhsrjbabgs a where a.djxh=? and a.yxqq<=? and a.yxqz >=? and a.yxbz='Y'
select b.TDSYBH, tdzldz, ssswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, tddj_dm, tdzmj, tdjbxxuuid, qh from dj_ls_tdqkdjxx a, dj_tdjbxx b where a.tdsybh = b.tdsybh and b.yxbz = 'Y'
select SSWFLX_DM,SWJCCLJDSZG,FDQGLLX,YXQQ,YXQZ from rd_ybnsrfdqglsqb t where t.djxh = ?

select t.tdsyqkuuid,t.djxh,t.tdsybh,t.fwtddjlx_dm,t.tdmj,t.mstdmj,t.ystdmj,t.dwse,t.nynse,t.yxqq, t.yxqz,t.nsqx_dm,t.sbqx_dm,t.jkqx_dm,t.yskm_dm,t.ysfpbl_dm,t.skgk_dm,t.zscztdsysbz,t.bz, t.sjgsdq,t.lcslid,t.zspm_dm,t.tdjbxxuuid,td.tdzldz,td.ssswjg_dm,td.xzqhsz_dm,td.jdxz_dm,td.tddj_dm,td.tdzmj, td.yxbz,td.qh,td.tdjbxxuuid from dj_tdsyqkdjxx t,dj_tdjbxx td where t.djxh=? and t.tdsybh=? and t.tdsybh= td.tdsybh AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxqz AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= t.yxqq)) AND (1 = ? OR TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxqz) AND t.yxqq <= t.yxqz
select a.zfbuuid,a.jzygcxmuuid,a.gcxmbh,a.sybgcxmbh,a.fbgcxmbh,a.sjgsdq from dj_jzyxmdj_zfbgcxmxx a where a.yxbz='Y' and a.gcxmbh in (#macroparam#)
select t.tfyuuid, t.tylcslid, t.djxh, t.hztyqxq, t.hztyqxz, t.cltybz, t.clfybz, t.yxbz, t.sjgsdq from dj_tfyxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.hztyqxq > ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.cltybz = 'N'
delete from Dj_Ls_Djxhshxydm

select distinct j.jxfx1_dmz1 code, j.jyfhbz, pm.zspmmc caption, pm.sl_1, pm.xybz, pm.zsl from dm_kj_jygz j, dm_gy_zspm pm where j.jylx_dm = ? and j.jxfx2_dmz1 = ? and j.jxfx1_dmz1 = pm.zspm_dm(+) and j.swjg_dm = ? and pm.yxbz = 'Y' and pm.xybz = 'Y'

select distinct a.xh from yh_ls_zgmc a, yh_zgmc b where a.xsssyhzjlx_dm = b.xsssyhzjlx_dm and a.xsssyhzjhm = b.xsssyhzjhm and a.ldhtjsrq >= b.ldhtqsrq and a.ldhtqsrq <= b.ldhtjsrq and b.xsssyhzjlx_dm is not null and b.xsssyhzjhm is not null and b.yxbz='Y'
select ygz.uuid, ygz.djxh from dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls, dj_ygzsffxxxdjb ygz where ls.djxh = ygz.djxh and ygz.yxbz = 'Y'

select d.shxydm from dj_nsrxx t, dj_ls_djxhshxydm d where t.shxydm = d.shxydm and t.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '08') and (t.kzztdjlx_dm = '1110' or t.kzztdjlx_dm = '1120' or t.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%') and t.yxbz='Y'
SELECT COUNT(1) + 1 AS NUM FROM DJ_NSRZJJCXX T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.SWZJZL_DM = ?

select FZJGQYMC, FZJGQYDZ, FZJGTYSHXYDM, FZJGZCH, FZJGLXDH from WBJH_CJ_SJ_FZJGXX where (1 = #macroparam# or FZJGZCH = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or FZJGQYMC = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or xh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or p_xh = ?)

SELECT T.RDPZUUID, T.ZFSBZ, T.RDZSUUID, T.DJXH, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.RDYXQQ, T.RDYXQZ, T.HY_DM, T.SBQX_DM, T.NSQX_DM, T.JKQX_DM, T.SLHDWSE, T.ZSFS_DM, T.YSKM_DM, T.YSFPBL_DM, T.SKGK_DM, T.ZSDLFS_DM, T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSL, T.HDSE, T.YSSDL, T.HDBL, T.YNSE, T.YJQX_DM, T.YJFS_DM, T.YXBZ, T.LRRQ, T.Gfjbjg_Dm, T.Zsxmcxbz_Dm, T.Jfjc_Dm FROM RD_SFZRDXXB T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSXM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSDLFS_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSFS_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.NSQX_DM = ?) AND T.RDYXQQ < T.RDYXQZ

insert into yh_jmsspjg (YHPZUUID, DJXH, LCSLID, JMSSPSX_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, JMXMDL_DM, JMXMXL_DM, JMWJ_DM, JMLX_DM, JMFS_DM, JMZLX_DM, JMQXQ, JMQXZ, SSJMXZHZ_DM, SSJMXZDL_DM, SSJMXZXL_DM, JZFD, JZSL, JZED, SJJZRQ, WSZG, YXBZ, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, SSJMSBLM_DM, LMDYBZ, QXBZ, ZTRQ, JMHYSFPBL) values ('8AB9E49F9EDCFABC123CDF6C650C1 ', '20114101230000002401', 'F7AF114AFBC6AFDJHGKLA7883CBE69C2', 'SXA031007004', '10104', null, '10', '999', null, '3', '01', '02', to_date('01-01-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-12-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '0004021907', '02', '19', '0', '0', '0', to_date('31-12-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, 'Y', 'N', null, null, '24406060735', to_date('05-10-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, null, '24406060700', null, null, 'N', 'N', null, null)
SELECT SWJG_DM,LCSWSX_DM,PZZL_DM,FPYJ,HBYJ,HBXJX,DYSCX, ZTHGZ,ZDDYTS,XYBZ,YXBZ FROM CS_ZM_WSZMKJDYPZ WHERE swjg_dm = ? AND lcswsx_dm = ? AND (1=? OR PZZL_DM = ?) AND yxbz = 'Y' AND xybz = 'Y'

select mx.hznsmxuuid, mx.hznsuuid, mx.lcslid, mx.djxh, mx.zsxm_dm, mx.bhznsrsfsqbz, mx.bhzrdjxh, mx.bhznsqynsrsbh, mx.bhznsqynsrmc, mx.sbjnfs_dm, mx.yzl, mx.desl_1, mx.bhznsrynsms, mx.hznsyxqq, mx.hznsyxqz, mx.bhznsqydz, mx.bhznsqydjzclx_dm, mx.bhznsqysysl, mx.bhznsqysfwfzjgbz, mx.hznsfw_dm, mx.yxbz, mx.yzbl, mx.hzqylx_dm, mx.yzskfw_dm, mx.sflsqy, kz.ygznsrlx_dm, mx.bhzsjlylx from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb mx, dj_nsrxx_kz kz where mx.bhzrdjxh = kz.djxh(+) and mx.djxh = ? and mx.zsxm_dm = ? and mx.yxbz = 'Y'

select distinct swry.swry_dm,swry.swryxm from dm_gy_swjg j,dm_gy_swry swry,dm_qx_swrysf sf where j.swjg_dm in ( select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.swjg_dm = swjg.sjswjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm = ? and swjg.xybz ='Y' and swjg.yxbz = 'Y' ) and j.swjg_dm = sf.sfswjg_dm and sf.sfyxqz > to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and swry.swry_dm = sf.swry_dm and swry.yxbz = 'Y' and sf.yxbz='Y'

SELECT jb.DJXH, jb.GDSLX_DM, jb.SSDABH, jb.NSRSBH, jb.NSRMC, jb.KZZTDJLX_DM, jb.DJZCLX_DM, jb.FDDBRXM, jb.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, jb.SCJYDZ, jb.FDDBRSFZJHM, jb.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, jb.NSRZT_DM, jb.HY_DM, jb.ZCDZ, jb.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, jb.JDXZ_DM, jb.DWLSGX_DM, jb.GDGHLX_DM, jb.DJJG_DM, jb.DJRQ, jb.ZZJG_DM, jb.KQCCSZTDJBZ, jb.LRR_DM, jb.LRRQ, jb.XGR_DM, jb.XGRQ, jb.SJGSDQ, jb.ZGSWJ_DM, jb.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, jb.SSGLY_DM, kz.HJSZD, kz.JYFW, kz.ZCDLXDH, kz.ZCDYZBM, kz.SCJYDLXDH, kz.SCJYDYZBM, kz.HSFS_DM, kz.CYRS, kz.WJCYRS, kz.HHRS, kz.GGRS, kz.GDGRS, kz.ZZJGLX_DM, kz.KJZDZZ_DM, kz.WZ, kz.SWDLRLXDH, kz.SWDLRDZXX, kz.ZCZB, kz.TZZE, kz.ZRRTZBL, kz.WZTZBL, kz.GYTZBL, kz.GYKGLX_DM, kz.ZFJGLX_DM, kz.BZFS_DM, kz.FDDBRGDDH, kz.FDDBRYDDH, kz.FDDBRDZXX, kz.CWFZRXM, kz.CWFZRSFZJZL_DM, kz.CWFZRSFZJHM, kz.CWFZRGDDH, kz.CWFZRYDDH, kz.CWFZRDZXX, kz.BSRXM, kz.BSRSFZJZL_DM, kz.BSRSFZJHM, kz.BSRGDDH, kz.BSRYDDH, kz.BSRDZXX, kz.LSSWDJYXQQ, kz.LSSWDJYXQZ, kz.SWDLRNSRSBH, kz.SWDLRMC, kz.WHSYJSFJFXXDJBZ, kz.ZZSJYLB, kz.YHSJNFS_DM, kz.ZSXMCXBZ_DM, kz.ZZSQYLX_DM, kz.GJHDQSZ_DM, kz.YGZNSRLX_DM, kz.LRR_DM, kz.LRRQ, kz.XGR_DM, kz.XGRQ, kz.SJGSDQ, jb.SWDJBLBZ, kz.qyglcjbh, kz.qyssjt_dm, jb.shxydm, jb.pgjg_dm, kz.zcxs,kz.fddbrzs,kz.fddbrzsyzbm FROM dj_nsrxx jb, dj_nsrxx_kz kz WHERE jb.djxh = kz.djxh AND jb.djxh = ? and jb.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.shxydm, t.scjydz, t.ssdabh, t.nsrmc, t.kqccsztdjbz, djzclx_DM, kzztdjlx_dm, NSRZT_DM, t.scjydz, t.fddbrxm, t.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, t.fddbrsfzjhm, t.zzjg_dm, p.pzsljglx_dm, p.pzsljg_dm, p.pzsljgmc, p.pzzmhwjh, p.zzlx_dm, p.zzhm, p.kyslrq, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.ssgly_dm from dj_nsrxx t, dj_pzjgxx p where t.nsrmc = ? and (zzjg_dm = ? or (p.zzhm = ? and p.ZZLX_DM = ?)) and t.gdslx_dm = ? and t.djxh = p.djxh(+) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.nsrzt_dm != '10'

select a.djxh jsdwdjxh, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm,a.nsrmc, b.gcxmbh jsqgcxmbh, b.gcxmmc,b.ZDXMBZ from dj_nsrxx a, DJ_JZYGCXMQKDJXXB b, DJ_SYGLXMDJ_TDXX c where a.djxh = b.djxh and b.gcxmbh = c.xmbh and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.zxrq is null and b.jzycbfs_dm = '1' and c.yxbz = 'Y' and c.tdsybh in (#macroparam#) and a.yxbz='Y'
select t.jybfzszzslx_dm,t.jybfzszzslxmc,t.sjjybfzszzslx_dm,t.zcyxqz,t.zcyxqq from dm_rd_jybfzszzslx t where t.jybfzszzslx_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y'
select z.wcjyzmuuid from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx z where 1=1 and z.djxh = ? and z.wcjydxzqhsz_dm = ? and z.zfbz_1 = 'N' and z.hxrq is null AND z.YXBZ='Y'

select t.uuid, t.ydzgswjg_dm, t.ydzgswjgmc, t.mbdswjg_dm, t.ydxzqhsz_dm, t.mbdxzqhsz_dm, t.sdzt, t.xxzt, t.qddm, t.lb_dm, t.ssbzj, t.yddjxh, t.mbddjxh, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.bwnr, t.fhbwnr, t.yxbz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.ksfwxxid from GY_KSFWXX_RZB t where t.lb_dm = ? and (1=#macroparam# or t.ydzgswjg_dm like ?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.mbdswjg_dm like ?) and t.sdzt = ? and t.yxbz = ?

select t.cydwuuid, t.qyjtdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.zlcslid, t.qyjtuuid, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, t.sfqyjtcydw, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.rdswjg_dm, t.sfxycydwqrbz, t.cydwqrbz, t.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.shxydm, n.nsrmc, n.scjydz, '' zgswjgmc, n.zgswj_dm, n.zgswskfj_dm, q.ssdq, q.qyssjt_dm from dj_qyjtjqcydwrd_cydwxx t, dj_nsrxx n,DJ_QYSSJT q where t.qyjtuuid = q.qyjtuuid and q.jtdjxh = n.djxh AND n.yxbz='Y' and n.djxh != 0 and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and q.yxbz='Y' and q.xybz = 'Y' and t.sfqyjtcydw ='Y' and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.yxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz union all select t.cydwuuid, t.qyjtdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.zlcslid, t.qyjtuuid, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, t.sfqyjtcydw, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.rdswjg_dm, t.sfxycydwqrbz, t.cydwqrbz, t.djxh, q.jtnsrsbh nsrsbh, '' shxydm, q.qyssjtmc nsrmc, q.jtscjydz scjydz, q.jtzgswjgmc zgswjgmc, '' zgswj_dm, '' zgswskfj_dm, q.ssdq, q.qyssjt_dm from dj_qyjtjqcydwrd_cydwxx t,DJ_QYSSJT q where t.qyjtuuid = q.qyjtuuid and t.djxh = 0 and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and q.yxbz='Y' and q.xybz = 'Y' and t.sfqyjtcydw ='Y' and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.yxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz union all select t.cydwuuid, t.qyjtdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.zlcslid, t.qyjtuuid, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, t.sfqyjtcydw, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.rdswjg_dm, t.sfxycydwqrbz, t.cydwqrbz, t.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.shxydm, n.nsrmc, n.scjydz, '' zgswjgmc, n.zgswj_dm, n.zgswskfj_dm, '' ssdq, '' qyssjt_dm from dj_qyjtjqcydwrd_cydwxx t, dj_nsrxx n where t.djxh = n.djxh AND n.yxbz='Y' and t.qyjtuuid is null and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.sfqyjtcydw ='Y' and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.yxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz
select t.dwlsgx_dm,t.jfywrlsgxlx_dm from cs_dj_lsgxdzb t where t.xybz='Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select d.ygzsdzzspm_dm, d.ygzsdzzspmmc from cs_dj_ygzzhyzzspmdzb t, dm_gy_ygzsdzzspm d where t.ygzzhy_dm = ? and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between t.yxqq and t.yxqz and t.swjg_dm in (select e.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg e start with e.swjg_dm = ? connect by e.swjg_dm = prior e.sjswjg_dm) and t.ygzsdzzspm_dm = d.ygzsdzzspm_dm and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xybz = 'Y'
select PZJGUUID, DJXH, LCSLID, PZSLJGLX_DM, PZSLJG_DM, PZSLJGMC, PZZMHWJH, ZZLX_DM, ZZHM, KYSLRQ, SCJYQXQ, SCJYQXZ from dj_pzjgxx_ygz p where p.djxh=?

select syjjguuid, hznsuuid, djxh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, zcdz, zcdyzbm, zfjglx_dm, syjjgdjxh, fzjgcj_dm, zgswjgmc, zgswjg_dm, zgswjgdz, zgswjgyzbm, jdjnbs, hjqylx_dm, kdqsszyqylx_dm, yxbz, '' shxydm, zjgzgzt from Dj_Hznsqyxxbab_syjgxx t where t.hznsuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and (syjjgdjxh = '0' or syjjgdjxh is null) union all select syjjguuid, hznsuuid, t.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.zcdz, k.zcdyzbm, t.zfjglx_dm, syjjgdjxh, fzjgcj_dm, zgswjgmc, n.zgswj_dm zgswjg_dm, t.zgswjgdz, t.zgswjgyzbm, jdjnbs, hjqylx_dm, kdqsszyqylx_dm, t.yxbz, n.shxydm, t.zjgzgzt from Dj_Hznsqyxxbab_syjgxx t, dj_nsrxx n, dj_nsrxx_kz k where t.syjjgdjxh = n.djxh and n.djxh = k.djxh and t.hznsuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' AND N.YXBZ = 'Y'

select sqmxuuid, b.squuid, b.lcslid, b.djxh, xmmc, clfse, rlfse, dlfyfse, gzxjfse, jtbtfse, jjfse, yqzjfse, sbzjfse, rjfse, zlqfse, fzljsfse, zmyysymjgyzbkfjzzffse, yfcglzjdpsysffse, xcpsjffse, xgygczdffse, jstszlffse, zlfyffse, cygbmhmgsqddyjkffzxbk, jjkce, wxyj, yqzlfse, sbzlfse, yfhdzjxhdclrlhdlfyfse, zjcsyfhddbqyzzryfyfse, zmyyyfhddygzjffse, zmyyyfhddygzlffse, zmyyyfhddygwxzctxffse, YYFHDZJXGDQTFYFSE, hjs, a.sqkcnd from yh_sqkcsqbab a, yh_sqkc_jjkcyjkffy b where a.squuid=b.squuid and a.djxh=b.djxh and b.djxh=?

select t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.scjydz, t.ssdabh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, djzclx_DM, KZZTDJLX_DM, NSRZT_DM, t.scjydz, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zzjg_dm, kz.jyfw, p.pzsljglx_dm, p.pzsljg_dm, p.pzsljgmc, p.pzzmhwjh, p.zzlx_dm, p.zzhm, p.kyslrq, scjydzxzqhsz_dm , kz.bzfs_dm from dj_nsrxx t, dj_pzjgxx p ,dj_nsrxx_kz kz where t.kzztdjlx_dm LIKE ? AND t.nsrmc=? and t.gdslx_dm =? and t.zgswj_dm in ( #macroparam# ) and t.djxh = p.djxh and t.djxh=kz.djxh AND t.YXBZ='Y' and t.nsrzt_dm !='07' AND p.zzhm=? AND p.zzlx_dm=?
select t.fzjghfddjxh, nsr.nsrzt_dm from dj_fzjgxx t, dj_nsrxx nsr where t.djxh = ? and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between t.yxqq and t.yxqz and t.fzjghfddjxh = nsr.djxh and nsr.yxbz = 'Y'

select jsq.jsqxmuuid, jsq.bdcxmbh, jsq.jsqgcxmbh, jsq.jsdwdjxh, jsq.bdcxmuuid, jzy.gcxmmc from DJ_BDCXMDJXX bdc, DJ_BDCXMDJ_JSQXMXX jsq, DJ_JZYGCXMQKDJXXB jzy where bdc.djxh = jsq.jsdwdjxh and bdc.djxh = jzy.djxh and bdc.bdcxmuuid = jsq.bdcxmuuid and jsq.jsqgcxmbh = ? and jsq.yxbz = 'Y' and jzy.zfbz_1 = 'N' and jzy.zxrq is null and jzy.jzycbfs_dm = '1'

select a.bydjuuid, a.wcjyzmuuid, a.djxh, a.lcslid, a.wcjyhdssglzmbh, a.swdjd, a.wcjyd, a.wcjyhtzje, a.swdjdswjgyj, a.wcjydswjgyj, a.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxq, a.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxz, a.wcjyhdssglzmqfrq, a.bsrxm, a.lxdh, a.sqrq, a.bysj, a.SBLCSLID, a.ywcjyhdssglzmbh, a.sjgsdq, a.jyfsdmjh, a.htdfnsrsbh, a.htdfnsrmc, a.htdfnsrdjxh, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.kjswjg_dm from dj_wbnsrjydbydj a where a.djxh = ? and (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null) and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select sum(t.xmztz) xmztz from dj_bdcxmdjxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.zxrq is null and t.xmyt_dm =?

select distinct gw.gw_dm,gw.gwmc from ( select gn.gw_dm from qx_gw_xtgn gn where gn.xtgn_dm = ? and gn.yxbz='Y' union all select GWGNJ.gw_dm from qx_gw_gnj gwgnj, dm_qx_gnj gnj, qx_gnj_xtgn gngnj where GWGNJ.Gnj_Dm = GNJ.GNJ_DM and gnj.gnj_dm = gngnj.gnj_dm AND GNJ.YXBZ = GNGNJ.YXBZ AND GNJ.YXBZ = GWGNJ.YXBZ AND GNJ.YXBZ = 'Y' AND gngnj.XTGN_DM = ?) re,dm_qx_gw gw where re.gw_dm = gw.gw_dm and gw.yxbz='Y'

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc,a.shxydm, a.gdslx_dm, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.zzjg_dm, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.ssgly_dm, b.jyfw, c.yddjxh, c.mbddjxh, c.nsrdzgxlb_dm from dj_nsrxx a, dj_nsrxx_kz b, (select t.yddjxh, t.mbddjxh, t.nsrdzgxlb_dm from dj_djztgxdzb t where t.yxbz = 'Y') c where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.djxh = c.yddjxh(+) and a.swdjblbz = 'Y' and a.kqccsztdjbz != 'Y' and a.gdslx_dm = '2' and a.nsrzt_dm !=? and a.nsrzt_dm !=? and a.nsrzt_dm !=? and (a.kzztdjlx_dm =? or a.kzztdjlx_dm = ? or a.kzztdjlx_dm = ? or a.kzztdjlx_dm like ?) and (a.nsrsbh=? or a.shxydm=?) and a.yxbz = 'Y'
select bwtdznsruuid, wtxysuuid, djzclx_dm, lsgx_dm, hy_dm, hyf1_dm, jdxz_dm, yxbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq from dj_wtxys_bwtdznsrxx where wtxysuuid=? and yxbz='Y'
