select xm, sfzjlx_dm, sfzjhm from wbjh_cj_sj_jtjyxx t where p_xh = ?

select d.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.SHXYDM, n.nsrmc, n.zcdz, n.zgswj_dm zgswjg_dm, d.bmmc, d.zfjglx_dm, d.jdjnbs, d.kdqsszyqylx_dm, d.bjdyjqysdsyy_dm, d.hjqylx_dm, d.yjdyjyskm_dm, d.yjdyjysjc_dm, d.cyndhqjbz, d.ndhsqjyskm_dm, d.ndhsqjysjc_dm, d.btsldqbs, d.yjdyjysfpbl_dm, d.ndhsqjysfpbl_dm from dj_hznsqyxxbab_dlscjybm d, dj_hznsqyxxbab b, dj_nsrxx n where b.djxh = n.djxh and n.yxbz = 'Y' and d.hznsuuid = b.hznsuuid and n.djxh = ? and b.yxqq < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.yxqz > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and d.yxbz = 'Y' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' ORDER by b.lrrq+1 DESC

select t.kyslrq, t.qfjg_dm as rgqfswjg_dm, t.xxczlx, t.xh, t.tyshxydm, t.nsrmc, t.lrrq, t.scjydz from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.tyshxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like ?) and t.xxczlx = ? and (1= #macroparam# or trunc(t.lrrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.kzztdjlx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.kzztdjlx_dm != ? or t.kzztdjlx_dm is null) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.scjydz like ?) and exists (select 1 from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx b where b.rgqfswjg_dm = ? and b.xh_2 = t.xh and b.zcbz = ? and (b.lrrq, b.xh_2) in (select max(lrrq) over(partition by xh_2) mlrrq, xh_2 from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx c where c.xh_2 = b.xh_2)) union all select t.kyslrq, t.qfjg_dm as rgqfswjg_dm, t.xxczlx, t.xh, t.tyshxydm, t.nsrmc, t.lrrq, t.scjydz from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.tyshxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like ?) and t.xxczlx = ? and (1= #macroparam# or trunc(t.lrrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.kzztdjlx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.kzztdjlx_dm != ? or t.kzztdjlx_dm is null) and t.qfjg_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.scjydz like ?) and not exists (select 1 from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx r where r.xh_2 = t.xh and r.rgqfswjg_dm is not null)

SELECT B.JYBFZSRDUUID, B.DJXH, B.XSHWLX_DM, B.YXQQ, B.YXQZ, C.qx, B.XMMC FROM RD_YBNSRJYBFZSRDJGB B, (select * from CS_RD_JYBFZSLXQXPZB where YXBZ = 'Y' AND XYBZ = 'Y') C WHERE b.djxh = ? AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.YXQZ > to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and B.xshwlx_dm = C.jybfzszzshwlx_dm(+)

select t.qfjg_dm, t.ssdabh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.djzclx_dm, t.fddbrxm, t.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.fddbrsfzjhm, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrzt_dm, t.hy_dm, t.zcdz, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.dwlsgx_dm, t.gdghlx_dm, t.zzjg_dm, t.hjszd, t.jyfw, t.zcdlxdh, t.zcdyzbm, t.scjydlxdh, t.scjydyzbm, t.hsfs_dm, t.cyrs, t.wjcyrs, t.hhrs, t.ggrs, t.gdgrs, t.zzjglx_dm, t.kjzdzz_dm, t.wz, t.swdlrlxdh, t.swdlrdzxx, t.zczb, t.tzze, t.zrrtzbl, t.wztzbl, t.gytzbl, t.gykglx_dm, t.zfjglx_dm, t.bzfs_dm, t.fddbrgddh, t.fddbryddh, t.fddbrdzxx, t.cwfzrxm, t.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, t.cwfzrsfzjhm, t.cwfzrgddh, t.cwfzryddh, t.cwfzrdzxx, t.bsrxm, t.bsrsfzjzl_dm, t.bsrsfzjhm, t.bsrgddh, t.bsryddh, t.bsrdzxx, t.lsswdjyxqq, t.lsswdjyxqz, t.swdlrnsrsbh, t.swdlrmc, t.zzsjylb, t.gjhdqsz_dm, t.ygznsrlx_dm, t.zjgnsrsbh, t.zjgmc, t.zjgzcdz, t.zjgzcdzyzbm, t.yxqq, t.zjgfddbrxm, t.yxqz, t.zjglxdh, t.zjgjyfw, t.pzsljglx_dm, t.pzsljg_dm, t.pzsljgmc, t.pzzmhwjh, t.zzlx_dm, t.zzhm, t.kyslrq, t.scjyqxq, t.scjyqxz, t.lrrq, t.xxczlx, t.tyshxydm, t.SCZTBH, t.NSRSWJG, t.xh from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx t left join wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx w on t.xh = w.xh_2 and w.yxbz ='Y' where t.tyshxydm = ? and (w.clbz = 'N' or w.clbz is null) and t.xxczlx = '1'

select yhpzuuid, djxh, lcslid, jmsspsx_dm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, jmxmdl_dm, jmxmxl_dm, jmwj_dm, jmlx_dm, jmfs_dm, jmzlx_dm, jmqxq, jmqxz, ssjmxzhz_dm, ssjmxzdl_dm, ssjmxzxl_dm, jzfd, jzsl, jzed, sjjzrq, wszg, yxbz, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, htmc, htbh from yh_jmsspjg t where t.yhpzuuid = ?

select b.bmduuid, b.djxh, b.yxqq, b.yxqz, b.whr_dm, b.whrq, b.sjgsdq, b.yxbz, b.lrr_dm, b.lrrq, b.xgr_dm, b.xgrq, b.xgrq from DJ_BMDGL b where b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.djxh = ? and b.yxqq <= ? and b.yxqz >= ?

select distinct t.zspm_dm from dj_cbqkxx t where t.djxh =? and t.yxqz >=? and t.zxrq is null

AND pzzl_dm = ? AND pzzg = ? AND pzqshm <= ? AND pzzzhm >= ? AND zfbz_1 = 'N'

select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid, b.tdqsuuid, b.djxh, b.tdsyzbh, b.zxly, b.ysccczfs_dm, b.czrq, b.zxlcslid, b.zxrq, b.tdsyzfzjgmc, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz from dj_tdjbxx a, dj_tdqsxx b where a.tdjbxxuuid = b.tdjbxxuuid and b.zxrq is null and b.djxh = ? and b.syqsyxqq <= ? and b.syqsyxqz >= ? and a.yxbz='Y'

select distinct(w.dzsphm) from dj_zxjzyxmdjxx j, dj_zxjzyxmdj_wsxx w where w.zxjzyuuid = j.zxjzyuuid and j.djxh = ? and w.dzsphm is not null and (w.zfbz_1 = 'N' or w.zfbz_1 is null) and (j.zfbz_1 = 'N' or j.zfbz_1 is null)

select r.rdpzuuid, r.djxh, r.zfsbz, r.rdzsuuid, r.zsxm_dm, r.zspm_dm, r.zszm_dm, r.rdyxqq, r.rdyxqz, r.hy_dm, r.sbqx_dm, r.nsqx_dm, r.slhdwse, r.yskm_dm, r.zsl, r.ysfpbl_dm, r.skgk_dm, r.jkqx_dm, r.zsdlfs_dm, r.zgswskfj_dm, r.lrr_dm, r.lrrq, r.xgr_dm, r.xgrq, r.sjgsdq, r.yxbz, r.sjtb_sj, r.gfjbjg_dm, r.zsxmcxbz_dm, r.jfjc_dm, r.sfzyzspm from dj_ls_djxhandssq t, rd_sfzrdxxb r where t.uuid = r.rdpzuuid and r.yxbz = 'Y'

select n.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, j.hdzxqq deyxqq, j.sjzxqz deyxqz from dj_nsrxx n, zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j where n.zgswj_dm = ? and n.zgswskfj_dm = ? and n.yxbz='Y' and (1 = ? or n.ssgly_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or n.hy_dm = ?) and n.djxh = j.djxh and (1 = ? or j.hdzxqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or j.sjzxqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=? or n.shxydm = ?) and (j.zfbz_1 is null or j.zfbz_1 = 'N') and j.sjzxqz > j.hdzxqq and not exists (select 1 from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb jg where jg.djxh = n.djxh and jg.nsrzglx_dm = '201' and (jg.zfbz_1='N' OR jg.zfbz_1 is null) and jg.yxqq <= sysdate and (jg.sjzzrq is null or jg.sjzzrq >= sysdate))

select uuid, szysybh, qsxkzbz, qsxkzh, qyshylb_dm, sylxjh_dm, tsyslbjh_dm, nqysjhdxs, nqysjhdbs, qsyxqq, qsyxqz, sysedc_dm, gsgwfgbz, dxsccgsq_dm, qsxkspjg, qslhzjg, qslhzjgxzjb_dm, bgrq, flzlmc, zgswj_dm, zgswskfj_dm, jdxz_dm, qskdz, xzqhsz_dm, zxbz, zxrq from DJ_SZYSSYDJB where djxh = ? and zfbz_1 = 'N' and zxbz = 'N'

SELECT ZJGUUID,DJXH,ZJGNSRSBH,ZJGDJXH,ZJGMC,ZJGZCDZ,ZJGZCDZYZBM,YXQQ, ZJGFDDBRXM,YXQZ,ZJGLXDH,ZJGJYFW,LRR_DM,LRRQ,XGR_DM,XGRQ,SJGSDQ,YXBZ FROM dj_zjgxx WHERE djxh = ? AND yxbz = 'Y' AND yxqq <= ? AND yxqz >= ?

select t.cydwuuid, t.qyjtdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.zlcslid, t.qyjtuuid, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, t.sfqyjtcydw, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.rdswjg_dm, t.sfxycydwqrbz, t.cydwqrbz, t.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.scjydz, '' zgswjgmc, n.zgswj_dm, n.zgswskfj_dm, q.ssdq, q.qyssjt_dm from dj_qyjtjqcydwrd_cydwxx t, dj_nsrxx n,DJ_QYSSJT q where t.qyjtuuid = q.qyjtuuid and n.yxbz='Y' and q.jtdjxh = n.djxh and n.djxh != 0 and q.yxbz='Y' and q.xybz = 'Y' and t.sfxycydwqrbz = 'Y' and t.cydwqrbz = 'N' and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.zlcslid is not null and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.yxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz and t.qyjtdjuuid= ? union all select t.cydwuuid, t.qyjtdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.zlcslid, t.qyjtuuid, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, t.sfqyjtcydw, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.rdswjg_dm, t.sfxycydwqrbz, t.cydwqrbz, t.djxh, q.jtnsrsbh nsrsbh, q.qyssjtmc nsrmc, q.jtscjydz scjydz, q.jtzgswjgmc zgswjgmc, '' zgswj_dm, '' zgswskfj_dm, q.ssdq, q.qyssjt_dm from dj_qyjtjqcydwrd_cydwxx t,DJ_QYSSJT q where t.qyjtuuid = q.qyjtuuid and t.djxh = 0 and q.yxbz='Y' and q.xybz = 'Y' and t.sfxycydwqrbz = 'Y' and t.cydwqrbz = 'N' and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.zlcslid is not null and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.yxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz and t.qyjtdjuuid= ? union all select t.cydwuuid, t.qyjtdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.zlcslid, t.qyjtuuid, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, t.sfqyjtcydw, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.rdswjg_dm, t.sfxycydwqrbz, t.cydwqrbz, t.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.scjydz, '' zgswjgmc, n.zgswj_dm, n.zgswskfj_dm, '' ssdq, '' qyssjt_dm from dj_qyjtjqcydwrd_cydwxx t, dj_nsrxx n where t.djxh = n.djxh AND n.yxbz='Y' and t.qyjtuuid is null and t.sfxycydwqrbz = 'Y' and t.cydwqrbz = 'N' and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.zlcslid is not null and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.yxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz and t.qyjtdjuuid= ?

select t.fwsyqkuuid, t.djxh, t.fybh, t.fwtddjlx_dm, t.lcslid, t.zspm_dm, t.fcyz, t.msyz, t.ysyz, t.nynse, t.nzjsr, t.zsfcsbz, t.sl_1, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.sbqx_dm, t.nsqx_dm, t.jkqx_dm, t.yskm_dm, t.ysfpbl_dm, t.skgk_dm, t.czrmc, t.czrsfzjzl_dm, t.czrsfzjhm, t.bz, t.sjgsdq, t.syzyfs_dm, t.fyjbxxuuid, fy.fyjbxxuuid, fy.fwzh, fy.dy, fy.lc_1, fy.fh, fy.jg_dm, fy.cx_dm, fy.fwmj, fy.tnmj, fy.fwzldz, fy.xzqhsz_dm, fy.jdxz_dm, fy.ssswjg_dm, fy.bdcxmbh, fy.tdsybh, fy.yxbz, fy.fczyz, t.kcl from dj_fwsyqkdjxx t, dj_fyjbxx fy where t.djxh = ? and t.fybh = ? and t.fybh = fy.fybh AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxqz AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= t.yxqq)) AND (1 = ? OR TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxqz) AND t.yxqq <= t.yxqz and fy.yxbz='Y'
select sgxkzuuid, gcxmbh, djxh, sgxkzbh, sgxkzffjg, sgxkzffrq, yxbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, jzygcxmuuid from dj_jzyxmdj_sgxkzxx where jzygcxmuuid=? and yxbz='Y'

select t.uuid, t.sfxxbgbuuid, t.djxh, t.kjdjxh, t.fjmnsrzzgjnjyhdlx_dm, t.fjmnsrzzgcsgcjtlx, t.gcxmmc, t.gcxmdd, t.gcxmzcbsmc, t.htydksrq, t.htydjsrq, t.sjkssshtrq, t.yjjsrq, t.fjmnsrzzgjngyryrs, t.fjmnsrpqdzgjnryrs, t.lwhdzyssryxm, t.lwhdzyssrysfzjlxhsfzjhm, t.htydssfwxmkssj, t.htydwcyjffwxmsjhyjsj, t.zzgssfwsjgzksrq, t.pqrywssfwxmdycddzgrq, t.xmyjljcxsj, t.fjmnsrylwjsfglgxbz, t.xmmc, t.xmdd, t.syktzrzyzzhtydksrq, t.syktzrzyzzhtydjsrq, t.syktzrzyzzsjkszyrq, t.syktzrzyzzzyyjcxsj, t.gdyycsmc, t.gdyycsdz, t.hdsyzbxzhfzxzbz, t.kzjyhdqksm, t.fjmnsrdlrlx_dm, t.dldlrmc, t.dlfbzyzftj, t.zmcsdlyeybyjdlrbz, t.yqyfjmnsrmyqdhtbz, t.jcyfjmnsrmyqdhtbz, t.dfjmnsryyslbz, t.qbdbfjmnsrbz, t.dlrhdsyzbxzhfzxzbz, t.dlrkzjyhdqksm, t.yxdgdyycsbz, t.jyhdkssj, t.jyhdjshyjjssj, t.wxjnqysdsflyj, t.ylyyzgqtdqtlsdbz, t.jqtdqtlsdxsssxddybz, t.bz, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj from YH_FJMNSRXSSSXDDYQKBGBB t where t.sfxxbgbuuid = ?
select substr(d.ygzzfjgbz_dm, 3, 4) from dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh t join dj_ygzsffxxxdjb d on t.djxh = d.djxh and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.ygzzfjgbz_dm is not null
select * from dj_zjgxx a where a.djxh = ? and ? between a.yxqq and a.yxqz

select djxh,'' kzztdjlx_dm,'' nsrzt_dm,fzjghfddjxh, fzjghfdnsrsbh, fzjghfdmc, fzjghfddz, '' zcdyzbm, '' zfjglx_dm, '' zgswj_dm, to_date('') kyslrq, '' shxydm from dj_fzjgxx fz where fz.djxh = ? and fz.yxqq <=? and fz.yxqz >=? and (fz.fzjghfddjxh='0' or fz.fzjghfddjxh is null) union all select n.djxh, n.kzztdjlx_dm, n.nsrzt_dm, fz.fzjghfddjxh, n.nsrsbh fzjghfdnsrsbh, n.nsrmc fzjghfdmc, n.zcdz fzjghfddz, k.zcdyzbm, k.zfjglx_dm, n.zgswj_dm, p.kyslrq, n.shxydm from dj_fzjgxx fz,dj_nsrxx n,dj_nsrxx_kz k,dj_pzjgxx p where fz.fzjghfddjxh=n.djxh and fz.fzjghfddjxh=k.djxh and fz.fzjghfddjxh=p.djxh and fz.djxh = ? and n.yxbz = 'Y' and fz.yxqq <=? and fz.yxqz >=? and n.nsrzt_dm != ? and n.nsrzt_dm ! = ? and n.nsrzt_dm ! = ? and (n.kzztdjlx_dm = '1110' or n.kzztdjlx_dm = '1130' or n.kzztdjlx_dm is null)
select g.glgluuid,g.lb_dm,g.djxh from dj_djhglgl_jc2bqyhx g where g.djxh = ? and g.lb_dm in(#macroparam#) and TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= g.yxqq and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <=g.yxqz

select zjguuid , m.djxh , zjgnsrsbh , zjgdjxh , zjgmc , zjgzcdz , zjgzcdzyzbm , yxqq , zjgfddbrxm , yxqz , zjglxdh , zjgjyfw , n.nsrzt_dm from dj_zjgxx m , dj_nsrxx n where m.zjgdjxh = n.djxh and m.djxh =? and m.yxbz=? and m.yxqq < ? and m.yxqz > ?

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm, nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.scjydz, nsr.djzclx_dm, nsr.hy_dm, kz.jyfw, nsr.jdxz_dm, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm yssgly_dm from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, dj_djhglgl gl where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and gl.djxh = nsr.djxh AND NSR.YXBZ='Y' and nsr.gdslx_dm = ? and nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and (1 = ? or nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm=?) and (1 = ? or nsr.hy_dm in (select h.hy_dm from dm_gy_hy h where h.xlbz = 'Y' and h.xybz = 'Y' and h.yxbz = 'Y' start with h.hy_dm = ? connect by prior h.hy_dm = h.sjhy_dm)) and (1 = ? or nsr.djzclx_dm in (select d.djzclx_dm from dm_dj_djzclx d where d.xlbz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xlbz = 'Y' start with d.djzclx_dm = ? connect by prior d.djzclx_dm = d.sjdjzclx_dm)) and (1 = ? or nsr.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or nsr.jdxz_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or nsr.ssgly_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or nsr.ssgly_dm is null) and gl.lb_dm = ? and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between gl.yxqq and gl.yxqz

select tdzzsxmuuid, djxh, tdzzsxmbh, tdzzsxmmc, jdxz_dm, xxdz, khyh, yhzh, xmjsqssj, xmjszzsj, zyscb, dwyscb, kftdzmj, kfjzzmj, fdczrhtmc, bz, xmszddfswjg_dm, zgswskfj_dm, xzqhsz_dm, tdzzsxmzt_dm, qsssqq, qsssqz,pgjg_dm from dj_tdzzsxmxx where djxh = ? and tdzzsxmbh = ? and yxbz = 'Y'

select a.DJXH, a.DJZCLX_DM, a.FDDBRSFZJHM, a.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, a.FDDBRXM, a.JYFW, a.LRRQ, a.LRR_DM, a.LXDH, a.NSRMC, a.NSRSBH, a.SCJYDZ, a.SJGSDQ, a.SJTB_SJ, a.XGRQ, a.XGR_DM, a.XZQHSZ_DM, a.YZBM, a.ZGSWJGMC, a.ZGSWJG_DM, a.ZZJG_DM from dj_xtwnsrdjxx a ,dj_ls_lsnsrxxzhb ls where a.nsrsbh=ls.nsrsbh

select a.zsxm_dm code, b.zsxmmc caption, a.swjg_dm from cs_gy_glb_zsxm a, dm_gy_zsxm b, (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm = ?) c where a.zsxm_dm = b.zsxm_dm and b.xybz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and c.swjg_dm = a.swjg_dm and c.swjg_dm != '00000000000'
select t.hy_dm, t.hymc, t.mlbz, t.dlbz, t.zlbz, t.xlbz, t.sjhy_dm, t.xybz, t.yxbz from dm_gy_hy t connect by prior t.hy_dm = t.sjhy_dm start with t.sjhy_dm = 'E'
select t.ssjmxz_dm, t.jmzlx_dm,j.jmzlxmc from CS_GY_SSJMXZYJMZLXDZB t,DM_YH_JMZLX j where t.jmzlx_dm=j.jmzlx_dm and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and j.yxbz = 'Y' and j.xybz = 'Y' and t.ssjmxz_dm = ?

select a.zfbuuid,c.djxh,c.nsrsbh,c.nsrmc,c.shxydm,b.jsfdjxh,b.gcxmbh,b.gcxmmc,b.xmys,b.ZDXMBZ from dj_jzyxmdj_zfbgcxmxx a ,dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb b ,dj_nsrxx c where a.sybgcxmbh=b.gcxmbh and b.djxh=c.djxh and a.yxbz='Y' and ZFBZ_1='N' and a.jzygcxmuuid=? and c.yxbz='Y'

select t.swsx_dm, t.zsxm_dm, t.jmxmxl_dm, t.jmxmdl_dm, t.jmlx_dm, t.jmzlx_dm, t.jmsl, t.jmed, t.jmfd, t.fedslklrlx_dm, t.ssjmsblm_dm, t.swjg_dm from cs_swsx_zsxm t where t.swsx_dm =? and t.yxbz='Y' and t.xybz='Y' and t.swjg_dm in (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg where swjg.yxbz='Y' and swjg.xybz='Y' connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm =?) order by t.swjg_dm desc

select wt.wszg, wt.wtxysuuid, wt.stfdjxh as djxh, xx.nsrmc as stdzrmc, xx.nsrsbh as stfnsrsbh, kz.zcdlxdh as stdzrlxdh, xx.fddbrxm as stffddbr, xx.zcdz as lxdz, kz.zcdlxdh as lxdh, wt.hjszddz, wt.xjzddz as xjzdz, wt.dzfw as wtdzfw, wt.dzqxq, wt.dzqxz, wt.dzszjfj as wtdzszjfj, wt.jsyjjsl from dj_nsrxx xx, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, dj_wtxysxx wt where wt.stfdjxh = kz.djxh(+) and xx.djxh(+) = wt.stfdjxh and xx.zgswj_dm = ? and wt.ggbz = 'N' and wt.zzrq is null and wt.xyqdrq >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and wt.xyqdrq <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and(1 = ? or xx.zgswskfj_dm = ?)

SELECT UUID , DJXH, TZZE , HBSZ_DM , YXBZ
FROM dj_nsrxx_tzzexx t WHERE t.djxh=? AND t.yxbz='Y'

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.scjydz, qc.YZQXQ, qc.YZQXZ, qc.yznd, qc.yzrq, qc.swzjzl_dm, nsr.ZGSWJ_DM, nsr.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, nsr.SSGLY_DM, kz.jyfw from DJ_NSRYZQC qc, dj_nsrxx nsr,dj_nsrxx_kz kz where nsr.djxh = qc.djxh and nsr.djxh=kz.djxh and qc.yznd =? and qc.swjg_dm =? and qc.swzjzl_dm = ? and qc.zfbz_1='N' AND QC.SWJG_DM=NSR.ZGSWJ_DM and qc.yzrq is null AND NSR.ZGSWSKFJ_DM=? AND NSR.YXBZ='Y'
select t.swsx_dm,t.jmlx_dm,t.jmslsx, t.jmslxx,t.jmfd,t.jmed from cs_yh_swsxjmlxdzb t where t.swsx_dm =? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y'

select a.djxh, a.gdslx_dm, a.ssdabh, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, a.nsrmc, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.djjg_dm, a.djrq, a.zzjg_dm, a.kqccsztdjbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.sjgsdq, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.ssgly_dm, a.fjmqybz, a.swdjblbz, a.nsrbm from dj_nsrxx a where a.nsrbm = ? and a.gdslx_dm = ? and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select g.swjg_dm,g.nsqx_dm,g.sbqx_dm,g.jkqx_dm from cs_dj_mrqxgz g, (select c.swjg_dm from cs_dj_mrqxgz c, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where c.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and c.xybz = 'Y' and c.yxbz = 'Y' and c.zsxm_dm = ? and c.zspm_dm = ? and rownum = 1) k where g.swjg_dm = k.swjg_dm and g.zsxm_dm = ? and g.zspm_dm = ?

select b.hznsmxuuid, b.hznsuuid, b.lcslid, b.djxh, b.zsxm_dm, b.bhznsrsfsqbz, b.bhzrdjxh, b.bhznsqynsrsbh, b.bhznsqynsrmc, b.sbjnfs_dm, b.yzl, b.desl_1, b.bhznsrynsms, b.hznsyxqq, b.hznsyxqz, b.bhznsqydz, b.bhznsqydjzclx_dm, b.bhznsqysysl, b.bhznsqysfwfzjgbz, b.hznsfw_dm, b.yzskfw_dm, b.sjgsdq from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb b where b.bhzrdjxh = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# or b.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or (to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.hznsyxqz and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= b.hznsyxqq)) and (1 = #macroparam# or to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.hznsyxqz) and b.yxbz = 'Y'

select wt.wszg, wt.wtxysuuid, wz.wtxyzzuuid, wt.stfdjxh as djxh, xx.nsrmc as stdzrmc, xx.nsrsbh as stfnsrsbh, kz.zcdlxdh as stdzrlxdh, xx.fddbrxm as stffddbr, xx.zcdz as lxdz, kz.zcdlxdh as lxdh, wt.hjszddz, wt.xjzddz as xjzdz, wt.dzfw as wtdzfw, wt.dzqxq, wt.dzqxz, wt.dzszjfj as wtdzszjfj, wt.jsyjjsl from dj_nsrxx xx, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, dj_wtxysxx wt, dj_wtxyzzxx wz where wt.stfdjxh = kz.djxh(+) and xx.djxh(+) = wt.stfdjxh and wz.wtxysuuid = wt.wtxysuuid and xx.zgswj_dm = ? and wz.ggbz = 'N' and wt.xyqdrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and wt.xyqdrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and(1 = ? or xx.zgswskfj_dm = ?)
select s.djxh,s.dkdjdsdjzsxm_dm,s.dkdjdsdjskywnr,s.yxqq,s.yxqz,s.dkdjskqkuuid,s.kjskdjuuid from dj_kjskdjxx k, dj_dkdjdsdjskywqk s where k.djxh = ? and k.zxbz = 'N' and k.kjskdjuuid = s.kjskdjuuid
select t.yskm_dm, t.yskmmc, t.zsxm_dm, t.sjyskm_dm from dm_gy_yskm t where t.yskm_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y'

select t.tdsyqkuuid,t.djxh,t.tdsybh,t.fwtddjlx_dm,t.tdmj,t.mstdmj,t.ystdmj,t.dwse,t.nynse,t.yxqq, t.yxqz,t.nsqx_dm,t.sbqx_dm,t.jkqx_dm,t.yskm_dm,t.ysfpbl_dm,t.skgk_dm,t.zscztdsysbz,t.bz, t.sjgsdq,t.lcslid,t.zspm_dm,t.tdjbxxuuid,td.tdzldz,td.ssswjg_dm,td.xzqhsz_dm,td.jdxz_dm,td.tddj_dm,td.tdzmj, td.yxbz,td.qh,td.tdjbxxuuid from dj_tdsyqkdjxx t,dj_tdjbxx td where t.tdsybh=? and t.tdsybh= td.tdsybh AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxqz AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= t.yxqq)) AND (1 = ? OR TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.yxqz) AND t.yxqq < t.yxqz

select JDXZ_DM code , JDXZMC caption from dm_gy_jdxz jd where jd.xybz = 'Y' AND jd.yxbz = 'Y' AND jd.jdxz_dm in ( select zb.jdxz_dm from cs_dj_jdxzxzqhdzb zb where zb.xzqhsz_dm = ? and zb.gdslx_dm = ? and zb.yxbz = 'Y' and zb.xybz = 'Y' )

select a.JZYGCXMUUID,a.LCSLID,a.DJXH,a.GCXMBH,a.GCXMMC,a.GCXMDZ,a.XZQHSZ_DM,a.JDXZ_DM,a.XMFZRXM,a.XMFZRLXDH, a.KGRQ,a.JGRQ,a.XMYT_DM,a.XMYS,a.JZMJ, a.JZYCBFS_DM,a.JSFDJXH,a.JZYFKFS_DM,a.JZYGLXS_DM,a.XMGLRQQ,a.XMSZDDFSWJG_DM,a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM,a.SSGLY_DM,a.ZXRQ, a.ZFBZ_1,a.ZFR_DM,a.ZFRQ_1,a.LRR_DM,a.LRRQ,a.XGR_DM,a.XGRQ,a.SJGSDQ,a.ZDXMBZ from dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb a where a.djxh=? and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.zxrq is not null
select jgssswjg_dm from gy_ws_wszb t where t.lcslid= ? and t.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and t.jgssswjg_dm is not null;

select y.uuid,y.xnyqclb_dm,y.xnyqclx_dm,y.clscqy_dm,d.clscqymc,y.clxh, y.tymc,y.cddxslc,y.zczbzl,y.dlxdczzzl,y.dlxdczznl,y.yxbz,y.zfbz_1,y.qdr_dm,y.qdrq,y.qdswjg_dm,y.lrr_dm,y.lrrq,y.sjgsdq from YH_XNYQCCLGZSMSCXML y,DM_ZS_CLSCQY d where y.yxbz='Y' and y.zfbz_1='N' and y.clscqy_dm=d.clscqy_dm and d.clscqymc = ? and (1 = ? or y.xnyqclb_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or y.xnyqclx_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or y.clxh = ?)

select DJXH, GDSLX_DM, SSDABH, nsr.NSRSBH, nsr.NSRMC, KZZTDJLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, SCJYDZ, FDDBRSFZJHM, SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM, HY_DM, ZCDZ, ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM, GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM, DJRQ ZZJG_DM, KQCCSZTDJBZ, nsr.ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ, SWDJBLBZ, SJTB_SJ, NSRBM from dj_nsrxx nsr where nsr.nsrsbh = ? and nsr.zgswj_dm = ? and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and nsr.kzztdjlx_dm = '1140'

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, b.jdxz_dm, b.wcjyzmuuid, b.wcjyhdssglzmbh, b.wcjydxzqhsz_dm, b.lrrq as zmkjrq, b.jyfsdmjh, b.wcjyd ,b.swdjd zgswj_dm from dj_nsrxx a, zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh and (1 = #macroparam# or a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or (b.hxrq is null and b.byrq is null)) and (0 = #macroparam# or b.byrq is not null) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ? or a.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrmc like ?) and (b.zfbz_1 = 'N' or b.zfbz_1 is null) and b.lrrq between ? and ?

insert into DJ_BLXTTBSBRZXX (UUID,NSRSBH,CSBM,SWJG_DM,YY,NR,ZXSJ,FWBM,LRR_DM,CLBZ,Sjgsdq,LRRQ) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select wcjyzmuuid, djxh, lcslid, wcjydxzqhsz_dm, wcjyd, swjgjg, zg, nh, wh, bylcslid, wcjyhdssglzmbh, swdjd, swdjdswjgyj, ywcjyhdssglzmbh, jyfsdmjh, jdxz_dm, swjgjbrxm, swjgjbrqzrq, swjgfzrxm, swjgfzrqzrq, wszzrq, zmyxqxq, zmyxqxz, wcjyhtzje, hxrq, hxlcslid, byrq, ywpzuuid, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj, jydswjg_dm, jydswjgmc, dzwgzbz, wcjyhdssglzmffdw, yxbz, swjgmc, lxr, lxdh, wcjyzhy_dm, htdfnsrsbh, htdfnsrmc, htdfnsrdjxh, swjglxdh, qysdsgljgbz, jbr, jbrzj, jbrsj, lxrsj, kjzmuuid, kjswjg_dm from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx t where t.wcjyzmuuid = ? and t.yxbz = ?

select t.fwsyqkuuid, t.djxh, t.fybh, t.fwtddjlx_dm, t.lcslid, t.zspm_dm, t.fcyz, t.msyz, t.ysyz, t.nynse, t.nzjsr, t.zsfcsbz, t.sl_1, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.sbqx_dm, t.nsqx_dm, t.jkqx_dm, t.yskm_dm, t.ysfpbl_dm, t.skgk_dm, t.czrmc, t.czrsfzjzl_dm, t.czrsfzjhm, t.bz, t.sjgsdq, t.syzyfs_dm, t.fyjbxxuuid, fy.fyjbxxuuid, fy.fwzh, fy.dy, fy.lc_1, fy.fh, fy.jg_dm, fy.cx_dm, fy.fwmj, fy.tnmj, fy.fwzldz, fy.xzqhsz_dm, fy.jdxz_dm, fy.ssswjg_dm, fy.bdcxmbh, fy.tdsybh, fy.yxbz, fy.fczyz, t.kcl, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.hy_dm, n.djzclx_dm, n.nsrzt_dm from dj_fwsyqkdjxx t, dj_fyjbxx fy, dj_ls_djxhandssq ls,dj_nsrxx n where t.djxh = ls.djxh and t.fybh = fy.fybh and ls.djxh = n.djxh(+) and fy.yxbz = 'Y' and ls.ssqq >= t.yxqq and ls.ssqz <= t.yxqz AND t.yxqq < t.yxqz and (fy.ssswjg_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and t.pkbz = 'Y' and(n.yxbz='Y' or n.yxbz is null)

select d.djxh from dj_nsrxx t join dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh d on t.djxh = d.djxh where substr(t.hy_dm, 1, 2) != '61' and not exists( select 1 from dj_nsrfyhyxx h where t.djxh = h.djxh and substr(h.hy_dm, 1, 2) = '61'and h.yxbz = 'Y' )

select bdcxmuuid, lcslid, bdcxmbh, bdcxmmc, xmdz, djxh, xmyt_dm, xmztz, gczzj, kgrq, yjjgrq, yjsfrq, xmszdswjg_dm, zgswskfj_dm, ssgly_dm, xmglqsrq, bz, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, xmfzr, lxfs, lrr_dm, zxrq, yxbz from dj_bdcxmdjxx where zxrq is null and bdcxmbh=? and djxh=?
select uuid, wcjyhdqksbuuid, djxh, pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzhm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, sjje, yxbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj, dzsphm from dj_wcjyhdqksbbxx_wsxx where wcjyhdqksbuuid = ?

select m.mstcuuid,m.bbuuid,m.lcslid,m.xh,m.nh,m.nnch,m.cnyh,m.mslb_dm,m.msmx_dm,m.cp,m.xh_3, m.scqymc,m.clyt,m.clgzsrlnyzl_dm,m.zygdzz,m.cltpn,m.cltpw,m.sjgsdq from WBJH_YH_CLGZSMSTC m where m.mslb_dm = ? and (1 = ? or m.nh = ?) and (1 = ? or m.NNCH = ?) and (1 = ? or m.cnyh = ?) and (1 = ? or m.cp like ?) and (1 = ? or m.xh_3 like ?) and (1 = ? or m.msmx_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or m.scqymc like ?)
select t.bdcxmuuid,t.bdcxmbh,t.bdcxmmc from DJ_BDCXMDJXX t where t.djxh=? and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zxrq is null

select d.ygzsdzzspm_dm, d.ygzsdzzspmmc from cs_dj_ygzzhyzzspmdzb t, dm_gy_ygzsdzzspm d where t.ygzzhy_dm = ? and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between t.yxqq and t.yxqz and t.swjg_dm in (select e.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg e start with e.swjg_dm = ? connect by e.swjg_dm = prior e.sjswjg_dm) and t.ygzsdzzspm_dm = d.ygzsdzzspm_dm and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xybz = 'Y'

select nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.scjydz, nsr.hy_dm, kz.scjydlxdh, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and nsr.kzztdjlx_dm != '1140' and nsr.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' and nsr.zgswj_dm = ? and nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrzt_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.jdxz_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.ssgly_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.hy_dm in (select h.hy_dm from dm_gy_hy h where h.xlbz = 'Y' and h.xybz = 'Y' and h.yxbz = 'Y' start with h.hy_dm = ? connect by prior h.hy_dm = h.sjhy_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.djzclx_dm in (select d.djzclx_dm from dm_dj_djzclx d where d.xlbz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xlbz = 'Y' start with d.djzclx_dm = ? connect by prior d.djzclx_dm = d.sjdjzclx_dm)) and not exists (select 1 from dj_djhglgl t where t.djxh = nsr.djxh and t.lb_dm = ? and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz)
select t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.kjzl_dm, t.wszg from zm_zysglzm t where t.lcslid = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

SELECT KJSSWSZMUUID,DJXH,LCSLID,NSPZHKZL_DM,KJSSWSZMYY_DM,HZKJQQ,HZKJQZ,DZDSRHKJYWRDJXH, PZZL_DM,PZZG,PZQSHM,PZZZHM,DQSYPZHM,HJJE,SBUUID,SQLY,SBFBZ,DKDJBZ,ZFBZ_1,TFRQ,TFR_DM, YWPZUUID,LRR_DM,LRRQ,XGR_DM,XGRQ,SJGSDQ,DZSPHM FROM zm_wspzhkxx WHERE djxh = ? AND dzdsrhkjywrdjxh = ? AND dzsphm = ? AND zfbz_1 = 'N' AND dkdjbz = 'Y'

select a.RDRQ, a.RDR_DM, a.LB_DM, a.SSDQ, a.QYSSJTMC, a.YXBZ, a.QYSSJT_DM, a.JTZGSWJGMC, a.JTSCJYDZ, a.JTCJ_DM, a.JTDJXH, a.JTNSRSBH, a.BHBQYSSJT_DM, a.HBBJ, a.XYBZ, a.QYJTUUID, a.RDSWJG_DM from dj_qyssjt a where a.JTDJXH =? and a.yxbz='Y' and a.xybz='Y'
select jg.swjg_dm code,jg.swjgmc caption,jg.jgjc_dm from qx_swjg_zns z, dm_gy_swjg jg where z.ccm like ? and z.zn_dm = ? and z.swjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm and jg.swjgbz = '0'

select wcjyzmhxuuid, lcslid, djxh, sqsx, sqr, sqrq, jydswjg_dm, jydswjgjbr, wcjyhdssglzmbh, wcjyzmhxyy_dm, wcjyzmuuid, ywpzuuid, jydswjgmc, zfbz_1, zfrq_1, zfr_dm, sjjyqjq, sjjyqjz, ddrq, bysj, hwcfdd, sfzdhx, qrhxbz from zm_wcjyzmhxxx t where t.wcjyzmhxuuid = ?

select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid, b.tdqsuuid, b.djxh, b.tdsyzbh, b.zxly, b.ysccczfs_dm, b.czrq, b.zxlcslid, b.zxrq, b.tdsyzfzjgmc, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz, c.tdsyqkuuid, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.tdmj, c.mstdmj, c.ystdmj, c.dwse, c.nynse, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.nsqx_dm, c.sbqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.zscztdsysbz, c.bz, c.PKBZ, c.lcslid, c.zspm_dm from dj_tdjbxx a,dj_tdqsxx b,dj_tdsyqkdjxx c where a.tdjbxxuuid=b.tdjbxxuuid and a.tdjbxxuuid=c.tdjbxxuuid and b.zxrq is null and b.djxh = c.djxh and b.djxh = ? and b.syqsyxqq <= ? and b.syqsyxqz >= ? and c.yxqz >= c.yxqq and a.yxbz='Y' and c.fwtddjlx_dm!='2'

select sp.yhpzuuid, sp.djxh, sp.jmsspsx_dm, sp.zsxm_dm, sp.zspm_dm, sp.jmxmdl_dm, sp.jmxmxl_dm, sp.jmwj_dm, sp.jmlx_dm, sp.jmfs_dm, sp.jmzlx_dm, sp.ssjmxzhz_dm, sp.ssjmxzdl_dm, sp.ssjmxzxl_dm, cc.bamxuuid, cc.zmhm, cc.hphm, cc.cpxh_1, cc.clsbdh, cc.fdjhm, cc.cbmc, cc.cbsbh, cc.jzed, cc.jzfd, cc.jzsl, cc.jmqxq, cc.jmqxz, cc.nynse, cc.njmse from yh_jmsspjg sp, yh_clcbjmbaxx cc where sp.yhpzuuid = cc.yhpzuuid and sp.djxh = ? and sp.djxh = cc.djxh and sp.zsxm_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR (cc.jmqxq <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) and (1 = #macroparam# OR (decode(cc.sjjzrq,'',cc.jmqxz,cc.sjjzrq) >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) and cc.qxbz = 'N' and cc.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (cc.sjjzrq >= cc.jmqxq or cc.sjjzrq is null)
select x.nsrzt_dm from dj_nsrxx x where x.djxh = ? and x.yxbz='Y'
update dj_nsrxx s set s.nsrzt_dm='06',s.xgrq=sysdate where s.djxh=?

select t.djxh, t.hdqxq, t.sjzxqz, t.zsfs_dm, t.qysdsyjqx_dm, t.qysdsyjfs_dm, t.nhdynssde, t.nhdsdse from zs_hd_qysdshd_jg t where t.djxh = ? and t.hdqxq <= ? and t.sjzxqz >=? and (t.zfbz_1 = 'N' or t.zfbz_1 is null) and t.hdqxq <= t.sjzxqz and rownum =1

select nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.ssgly_dm, jg.yhpzuuid, jg.jmsspsx_dm, jg.jmqxq, jg.jmqxz, jg.sjjzrq, jg.zsxm_dm, jg.ztrq from dj_nsrxx nsr, yh_jmsspjg jg where nsr.djxh = jg.djxh and (nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ?) and jg.jmsspsx_dm = ? and jg.zfbz_1 = ? and nsr.yxbz = ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm not in (?, ?, ?) and jg.jmqxz > jg.jmqxq

select sqmxuuid, squuid, djxh, lcslid, hdslid, jmsspsx_dm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, jmzlx_dm, jmlx_dm, jmfs_dm, ssjmxzhz_dm, ssjmxzdl_dm, ssjmxzxl_dm, jmwj_dm, jmxmdl_dm, jmxmxl_dm, lmdybz, sblm, jmqxq, jmqxz, jzsl, jzfd, jzed,ssjmsblm_dm, yxbz from yh_jmssqspb_mx t where t.lcslid=? and t.squuid=? and t.yxbz='Y'

select t.tdsyqkuuid, t.djxh, t.tdsybh, t.fwtddjlx_dm, t.tdmj, t.mstdmj, t.ystdmj, t.dwse, t.nynse, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.nsqx_dm, t.sbqx_dm, t.jkqx_dm, t.yskm_dm, t.ysfpbl_dm, t.skgk_dm, t.zscztdsysbz, t.bz, t.sjgsdq, t.lcslid, t.zspm_dm, t.tdjbxxuuid, td.tdzldz, td.ssswjg_dm, td.xzqhsz_dm, td.jdxz_dm, td.tddj_dm, td.tdzmj, td.yxbz, td.qh, td.tdjbxxuuid, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.hy_dm, n.djzclx_dm, n.nsrzt_dm from dj_tdsyqkdjxx t, dj_tdjbxx td, dj_ls_djxhandssq ls,dj_nsrxx n where t.djxh = ls.djxh and t.tdsybh = td.tdsybh and t.djxh = n.djxh(+) and td.yxbz = 'Y' and ls.ssqq >= t.yxqq and ls.ssqz <= t.yxqz AND t.yxqq < t.yxqz and (td.ssswjg_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and t.pkbz = 'Y' and n.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.wcjyzmuuid,a.djxh,a.lcslid,a.wcjydxzqhsz_dm,a.wcjyd,a.swjgjg,a.zg, a.nh,a.wh,a.bylcslid,a.wcjyhdssglzmbh,a.swdjd,a.swdjdswjgyj,a.ywcjyhdssglzmbh, a.jyfsdmjh,a.jdxz_dm,a.swjgjbrxm,a.swjgjbrqzrq,a.swjgfzrxm,a.swjgfzrqzrq, a.wszzrq,a.zmyxqxq,a.zmyxqxz,a.wcjyhtzje,a.byrq,a.ywpzuuid,a.sjgsdq from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx a where a.zfbz_1='N' and a.hxrq is null and a.djxh=? and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select n.tdsybh, n.tdzldz, n.ssswjg_dm, n.xzqhsz_dm, n.jdxz_dm, n.tddj_dm, n.tdzmj, n.yxbz, n.qh, n.tdjbxxuuid, m.tdqsuuid, m.syqsyxqq, m.syqsyxqz, n.djxh, n.tdsyqkuuid, n.fwtddjlx_dm, n.tdmj, n.mstdmj, n.ystdmj, n.dwse, n.nynse, n.yxqq, n.yxqz, n.nsqx_dm, n.sbqx_dm, n.jkqx_dm, n.yskm_dm, n.ysfpbl_dm, n.skgk_dm, n.zscztdsysbz, n.bz, n.lcslid, n.tdczrmc, n.tdczrsfzjhm, n.czrsfzjzl_dm, n.zspm_dm from (select b.tdsybh, b.tdqsuuid, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz from dj_tdqsxx b where b.tdsybh = ? AND (1 = ? or (TO_DATE(? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.syqsyxqz AND TO_DATE(? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= b.syqsyxqq)) AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.syqsyxqz)) AND b.syqsyxqq <= b.syqsyxqz) m, (select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid, c.tdsyqkuuid, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.tdmj, c.mstdmj, c.ystdmj, c.dwse, c.nynse, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.nsqx_dm, c.sbqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.zscztdsysbz, c.bz, c.lcslid, c.djxh, c.tdczrmc, c.tdczrsfzjhm, c.czrsfzjzl_dm, c.zspm_dm from dj_tdjbxx a,dj_tdsyqkdjxx c where a.tdsybh=c.tdsybh AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= c.yxqz AND TO_DATE( ? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= c.yxqq )) AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE( ? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= c.yxqz)) and c.djxh = ? and a.tdsybh = ? AND c.yxqq <= c.yxqz and c.fwtddjlx_dm = '2') n where n.tdsybh = m.tdsybh(+)

select t.djxh, t.gdslx_dm, t.ssdabh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.djzclx_dm, t.fddbrxm, t.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.fddbrsfzjhm, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrzt_dm, t.hy_dm, t.zcdz, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.dwlsgx_dm, t.gdghlx_dm, t.djjg_dm, t.djrq, t.zzjg_dm, t.kqccsztdjbz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.ssgly_dm, t.fjmqybz, t.swdjblbz, t.sjtb_sj, t.nsrbm, t.yxbz, t.shxydm, t.pgjg_dm, t.gszxrq from dj_nsrxx t, dj_ls_djxhshxydm d where t.djxh = d.djxh
select t.zdsyhjkjc_dm, t.jknd, t.djxh,t.zdsyuuid,t.lcslid,t.yxqq,t.yxqz from dj_zdsynsrxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.jknd = ?

select t.nsrzt_dm,t.djxh,t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh , t.shxydm, t.nsrmc , t.kzztdjlx_dm , t.scjydz , t.nsrzt_dm , t.zzjg_dm , t.FDDBRXM , t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM , t.FDDBRSFZJHM , t.djrq, t.ZGSWJ_DM, t.ZGSWSKFJ_DM ,k.zfjglx_dm from dj_nsrxx t ,dj_nsrxx_kz k where t.djxh = k.djxh and t.zzjg_dm =? and t.gdslx_dm = ? and (t.kzztdjlx_dm = ? or t.kzztdjlx_dm = ? OR t.kzztdjlx_dm like ?) and t.kqccsztdjbz=? and t.yxbz=?

select wt.wszg, wt.wtxysuuid, xx.djxh, xx.nsrsbh as stfnsrsbh, xx.nsrmc as stdzrmc, kz.zcdlxdh as stdzrlxdh, xx.fddbrxm as stffddbr, xx.zcdz as lxdz, kz.zcdlxdh as lxdh, wt.hjszddz, wt.xjzddz as xjzdz, wt.dzfw as wtdzfw, wt.dzqxq, wt.dzqxz, wt.dzszjfj as wtdzszjfj, wt.wszg, wt.jsyjjsl from dj_nsrxx xx, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, dj_wtxysxx wt where kz.djxh = xx.djxh and wt.stfdjxh = xx.djxh and wt.ggbz = 'N' and xx.djxh = ? and wt.zzrq is null

select nsr.DJJG_DM, nsr.DJRQ, nsr.DJXH, nsr.DJZCLX_DM, nsr.DWLSGX_DM, nsr.FDDBRSFZJHM, nsr.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, nsr.FDDBRXM, nsr.FJMQYBZ, nsr.GDGHLX_DM, nsr.GDSLX_DM, nsr.HY_DM, nsr.JDXZ_DM, nsr.KQCCSZTDJBZ, nsr.KZZTDJLX_DM, nsr.LRRQ, nsr.LRR_DM, nsr.NSRMC, nsr.NSRSBH, nsr.NSRZT_DM, nsr.SCJYDZ, nsr.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, nsr.SJGSDQ, nsr.SJTB_SJ, nsr.SSDABH, nsr.SSGLY_DM, nsr.SWDJBLBZ, nsr.XGRQ, nsr.XGR_DM, nsr.ZCDZ, nsr.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, nsr.ZGSWJ_DM, nsr.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, nsr.ZZJG_DM, nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrztlx_dm, fyhy.FYHYUUID, fyhy.HY_DM FYHY, fyhy.XH, fyhy.YXBZ, kz.BSRXM, kz.FDDBRYDDH, kz.ZCZB, kz.ZSXMCXBZ_DM, kz.YHSJNFS_DM, kz.CWFZRSFZJZL_DM, kz.TZZE, kz.SCJYDLXDH, kz.ZCDYZBM, kz.JYFW, kz.YGZNSRLX_DM, kz.WHSYJSFJFXXDJBZ, kz.SJTB_SJ, kz.CWFZRDZXX, kz.GYKGLX_DM, kz.GYTZBL, kz.WZTZBL, kz.ZRRTZBL, kz.BSRSFZJHM, kz.CWFZRYDDH, kz.FDDBRDZXX, kz.SWDLRDZXX, kz.KJZDZZ_DM, kz.GGRS, kz.HHRS, kz.ZCDLXDH, kz.SWDLRNSRSBH, kz.BSRGDDH, kz.CWFZRSFZJHM, kz.WZ, kz.SCJYDYZBM, kz.BSRDZXX, kz.ZFJGLX_DM, kz.ZZJGLX_DM, kz.ZZSJYLB, kz.BSRYDDH, kz.BSRSFZJZL_DM, kz.CWFZRXM, kz.BZFS_DM, kz.GDGRS, kz.HJSZD, kz.SWDLRMC, kz.LSSWDJYXQZ, kz.LSSWDJYXQQ, kz.CWFZRGDDH, kz.FDDBRGDDH, kz.SWDLRLXDH, kz.WJCYRS, kz.CYRS, kz.HSFS_DM, kz.SJGSDQ, kz.GJHDQSZ_DM, kz.ZZSQYLX_DM, pz.kyslrq, pz.pzzmhwjh, pz.zzhm, pz.pzsljglx_dm, pz.pzsljg_dm, pz.scjyqxq, pz.scjyqxz, pz.zzlx_dm, nsr.pgjg_dm from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, dj_nsrfyhyxx fyhy, DJ_PZJGXX pz where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and nsr.djxh = fyhy.djxh(+) and (nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ?) and nsr.gdslx_dm = ? and pz.djxh(+) = nsr.djxh and nsr.yxbz = 'Y'
select lwuuid, bydjuuid, djxh, wcjylwmc, wcjylwdd, wcjylwyxqxq, wcjylwyxqxz, wcjylwdhtje, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, yxbz, sjgsdq from dj_wbnsrjydbydj_lwxx t where bydjuuid = ? and t.yxbz='Y'

select t.fjjghzhbuuid, t.ssjmsfzmuuid, t.jnfzjgmc_1, t.jnfzjgszd, t.jwfzjgmc_1, t.jwfzjgszgjdq_dm, t.hhqymc, t.hhqynsrsbh, t.hhqydjxh, t.hhqyszgjdq_dm, t.hhqyszd, t.yxbz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_Dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq from zm_zgsszmsfzm_fzjghzhbxx t where t.yxbz='Y' and t.ssjmsfzmuuid=?

select clqkuuid, lcslid, djxh, clpzh, clsbdh, nynse, yxqq, yxqz, zspm_dm, ssswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, nsqx_dm, sbqx_dm, jkqx_dm, yskm_dm, ysfpbl_dm, sl_1, bz, zxrq, zxly, ysccczfs_dm, czrq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, skgk_dm, zbzl, hdzkrs, zxlcslid, pql, zszm_dm from dj_clqkxx where clsbdh=? and yxqq <=? and yxqz >=?
select t.jgjc_dm, t.swjg_dm from CS_YH_TSJMSXSPQXSZB t where t.swsx_dm = ? and t.zsxm_dm = ? and t.spjexx <= ? and t.spjesx > ?

select c.djxh,c.zgswj_dm,c.zgswskfj_dm,d.fzchrduuid from dj_ls_fzchzx a ,dj_djztgxdzb b ,dj_nsrxx c,dj_fzchrdxx d where a.djxh=b.yddjxh and b.mbddjxh=c.djxh and b.mbddjxh=d.djxh and d.jcfzchrq is null and d.zxfzchrq is null and b.nsrdzgxlb_dm=? and c.yxbz='Y'

(select b.lcswsx_dm, b.lcswsxmc, c.swsx_dm, c.swsxmc from cs_gy_slswsxylcswsxdzb t, dm_gy_lcswsx b, dm_gy_swsx c where t.lcswsx_dm = b.lcswsx_dm and t.slswsx_dm = c.slswsx_dm) union (select lc.lcswsx_dm, lc.lcswsxmc, zdy.zdyswsx_dm as swsx_dm,zdy.zdyswsxmc as swsxmc from dm_yh_zdyswsx zdy, cs_gy_slswsxylcswsxdzb csswsx, dm_gy_lcswsx lc where (zdy.bsfs_dm_1 = '01' or zdy.bsfs_dm_1 = '03') and zdy.SLSWSX_DM = csswsx.slswsx_dm and csswsx.lcswsx_dm = lc.lcswsx_dm)

select szb.lb_dm as code, szb.lbmc as caption from dj_djhzdylbsz szb, (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm = ?) swjgb where szb.szswjg_dm = swjgb.swjg_dm and szb.xybz = 'Y' and ? between szb.sxrq and szb.sxrq_2
select zczb, hbsz_dm, zzhm,SCZTBH from WBJH_CJ_SJ_ZZZBXX where (1= #macroparam# or zzhm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or scztbh =?) and (1=#macroparam# or xh=?) and (1=#macroparam# or p_xh=?)
select fy.hy_dm from dj_nsrfyhyxx fy where fy.djxh = ? and fy.yxbz = 'Y'

select cs.csz, cs.swjg_dm from cs_dj_xmdjssjxsz cs, (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm = ?) jg where cs.swjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm and cs.xybz = 'Y' and cs.yxbz = 'Y' and rownum = 1 order by cs.swjg_dm desc

select gl.glgluuid, nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.scjydz, kz.scjydlxdh, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm, gl.lb_dm, gl.yxqq, gl.yxqz, gl.lrrq, gl.lrr_dm, sz.lb_dm, sz.lbmc, sz.kjsm, sz.sxrq, sz.sxrq_2, sz.lbcj_dm, sz.szr_dm, sz.szswjg_dm, sz.szrq from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz,dj_djhglgl gl,dj_djhzdylbsz sz where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and nsr.djxh = gl.djxh and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and gl.lb_dm = sz.lb_dm and sz.xybz='Y' and gl.yxqq < gl.yxqz and gl.yxqz >=? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and nsr.gdslx_dm = ? and(1 = #macroparam# or gl.lb_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrzt_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.jdxz_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1=#macroparam# or nsr.zgswj_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or nsr.zgswj_dm is null ) and (1=#macroparam# or nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or nsr.zgswskfj_dm is null ) and (1=#macroparam# or nsr.ssgly_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1=#macroparam# or nsr.ssgly_dm is null ) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.hy_dm in (select h.hy_dm from dm_gy_hy h where h.xlbz = 'Y' and h.xybz = 'Y' and h.yxbz = 'Y' start with h.hy_dm = ? connect by prior h.hy_dm = h.sjhy_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.djzclx_dm in (select d.djzclx_dm from dm_dj_djzclx d where d.xlbz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xlbz = 'Y' start with d.djzclx_dm = ? connect by prior d.djzclx_dm = d.sjdjzclx_dm)) and rownum < =2000

select jh.GZJHUUID, jh.BSDW, jh.JHSSND, jh.GZJHBH, jh.BSRQ_1, jh.BASWJG_DM, mx.XGZGGQDCLCP, mx.SL, mx.BZ, mx.XGZGGQDCLXH, mx.GZJHMXUUID, mx.GZJG, mx.YT, mx.DJXH from dj_csgjqyggqdclgzjh jh , dj_csgjqyggqdclgzjh_mxxx mx where jh.gzjhuuid= mx.gzjhuuid and jh.zfbz_1='N' and mx.yxbz='Y' and mx.djxh=? and jh.jhssnd=? and mx.xgzggqdclcp like ? and mx.xgzggqdclxh like ?

select a.djxh, a.gdslx_dm, a.ssdabh, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, a.nsrmc, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.djjg_dm, a.djrq, a.zzjg_dm, a.lrrq, a.ssgly_dm, a.kqccsztdjbz, b.djxh, b.hjszd, b.jyfw, b.zcdlxdh, b.zcdyzbm, b.scjydlxdh, b.scjydyzbm, b.hsfs_dm, b.cyrs, b.wjcyrs, b.hhrs, b.ggrs, b.gdgrs, b.zzjglx_dm, b.kjzdzz_dm, b.wz, b.swdlrlxdh, b.swdlrdzxx, b.zczb, b.tzze, b.zrrtzbl, b.wztzbl, b.gytzbl, b.gykglx_dm, b.zfjglx_dm, b.bzfs_dm, b.fddbrgddh, b.fddbryddh, b.fddbrdzxx, b.cwfzrxm, b.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, b.cwfzrsfzjhm, b.cwfzrgddh, b.cwfzryddh, b.cwfzrdzxx, b.bsrxm, b.bsrsfzjzl_dm, b.bsrsfzjhm, b.bsrgddh, b.bsryddh, b.bsrdzxx, b.lsswdjyxqq, b.lsswdjyxqz, b.swdlrnsrsbh, b.swdlrmc, b.whsyjsfjfxxdjbz, b.zzsjylb, b.yhsjnfs_dm, b.zsxmcxbz_dm, b.zzsqylx_dm, b.gjhdqsz_dm, b.ygznsrlx_dm, a.lrr_dm, ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ, SWDJBLBZ, pz.pzsljglx_dm, pz.pzsljg_dm, pz.pzsljgmc, pz.pzzmhwjh, pz.zzlx_dm, pz.zzhm, pz.kyslrq, pz.scjyqxq, pz.scjyqxz from dj_nsrxx a, dj_nsrxx_kz b, dj_pzjgxx pz where a.djxh = b.djxh AND a.djxh = pz.djxh(+) and a.djxh = ?

select t.kyslrq, t.qfjg_dm as rgqfswjg_dm, t.xxczlx, t.xh, t.tyshxydm, t.nsrmc, t.lrrq, t.scjydz from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.tyshxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like ?) and t.xxczlx = ? and trunc(t.lrrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.qfjg_dm is null and (1 = #macroparam# or t.kzztdjlx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.kzztdjlx_dm != ? or t.kzztdjlx_dm is null) and t.qfjg_dm is null and (1 = #macroparam# or t.scjydz like ?) and not exists (select 1 from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx r where r.xh_2 = t.xh)

select hznsuuid, djxh, lcslid, zfjglx_dm, yxqq, yxqz, fzjgcj_dm, kdqsszyqylx_dm, bjdyjqysdsyy_dm, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, btsldqbs, fzjgjxfpbz, jdjnbs, hjqylx_dm, yjdyjyskm_dm, yjdyjysjc_dm, cyndhqjbz, ndhsqjyskm_dm, ndhsqjysjc_dm, yjdyjysfpbl_dm, ndhsqjysfpbl_dm, zjgzgzt from dj_hznsqyxxbab t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxqz > = t.yxqq and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.fczyz, c.fwsyqkuuid, c.djxh, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.lcslid, c.zspm_dm, c.fcyz, c.msyz, c.ysyz, c.nynse, c.nzjsr, c.zsfcsbz, c.sl_1, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.sbqx_dm, c.nsqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.czrmc, c.czrsfzjzl_dm, c.czrsfzjhm, c.bz, c.kcl, c.syzyfs_dm, c.PKBZ from dj_fyjbxx a,dj_fwsyqkdjxx c where a.fyjbxxuuid=c.fyjbxxuuid and c.yxqz>c.yxqq and c.fwtddjlx_dm='2' and a.yxbz='Y' and (a.ssswjg_dm =? or 1 =?) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and c.djxh = ? and a.fybh = ?

select a.djxh,a.gdslx_dm,a.ssdabh,a.nsrsbh,a.nsrmc,a.kzztdjlx_dm,a.djzclx_dm,a.fddbrxm,a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz,a.fddbrsfzjhm,a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm,a.nsrzt_dm,a.hy_dm,a.zcdz,a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm,a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm,a.gdghlx_dm,a.djjg_dm,a.djrq,a.zzjg_dm,a.kqccsztdjbz,a.lrr_dm,a.lrrq,a.sjgsdq, a.zgswj_dm,a.zgswskfj_dm,a.ssgly_dm,a.fjmqybz,a.swdjblbz from dj_nsrxx a where a.shxydm = ? and a.gdslx_dm = ? and a.nsrzt_dm!='07' and a.nsrzt_dm!='10' and a.yxbz='Y'

select hbflqqkuuid, hbflbguuid, djxh, hbflqnsrsbh, hbflqnsrmc, hbflqfzrxm, hbflqscjydz, qsbz, yxbz, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq from DJ_HBFLBG_HBFLQJBQK where (1 = #macroparam# or djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or hbflbguuid = ?) and yxbz = 'Y'

select rduuid, lcslid, djxh, swsx_dm, jwzcqymcyw, gjhdqsz_dm, fddbr, qdr_dm, qdrq, qdswjg_dm, zgswj_dm, cwjcbz, rsjcbz, cwdacfbz, tpqryjzbz, gshh, rdjmsfnd, lxr, lxdh, wszg, zstybz, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1 from rd_jwzczzgl t where t.lcslid=?

select distinct s.yxqq, s.yxqz, jmxz.swsx_dm, jmxz.zsxm_dm, z.zsxmmc, jmxz.ssjmxz_dm, jmxz.ssjmxzdl_dm, s.ssjmxzmc, jmxz.ssjmxzxl_dm, jmxz.swjg_dm, jmxz.sxh, zspm.zspm_dm from cs_yh_swsxjmxzdzb jmxz, CS_GY_SSJMXZZSPMDZB zspm, dm_gy_ssjmxz s, dm_gy_zsxm z where jmxz.ssjmxz_dm = zspm.ssjmxz_dm(+) and jmxz.ssjmxz_dm = s.ssjmxz_dm and jmxz.zsxm_dm = z.zsxm_dm and jmxz.swsx_dm = ? and (1 = ? or jmxz.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or (? like zspm.zspm_dm or zspm.zspm_dm is null )) and (1 = ? or (to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') > = s.yxqq and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') < = s.yxqz)) and jmxz.yxbz = 'Y' and jmxz.xybz = 'Y' and (zspm.yxbz = 'Y' or zspm.xybz is null) and (zspm.xybz = 'Y' or zspm.xybz is null) and s.yxbz = 'Y' and s.xybz = 'Y' and z.yxbz = 'Y' and z.xybz = 'Y'

select b.bmduuid, b.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.shxydm, n.zgswj_dm, b.yxqq, b.yxqz, b.whr_dm, b.whrq, b.sjgsdq, b.yxbz from DJ_BMDGL b, DJ_NSRXX n where b.djxh = n.djxh and b.yxbz = 'Y' and n.yxbz = 'Y' and (1 = ? or n.nsrsbh = ? or n.shxydm=?) and (1 = ? or n.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and n.zgswj_dm = ? and b.yxqz > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.yxqq < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
select t.uuid, t.zczb, t.hbsz_dm, t.yxbz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.djxh from dj_nsrxx_zczbxx t where djxh =? and t.yxbz='Y'
select t.hdzxqq deyxqq,t.sjzxqz deyxqz,t.djxh from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg t where t.sjzxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.hdzxqq < t.sjzxqz and djxh = ? and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')

select t.uuid, t.xdslxh, t.gjhdqsz_dm, t.syssxdtk_dm, t.jzsl, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.xybz, t.yxbz, t.ppgz1, t.ppgz2, t.ppgz3, t.ppgz4, t.ppgz5, t.ppgz6, t.ppgz7, t.ppgz8, t.ppgz9, t.ppgz10 from cs_yh_fjmxdsl t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.syssxdtk_dm = ? and t.gjhdqsz_dm = ?

select fqmsquuid, lcslid, djxh, fqmsqqxq, fqmsqqxz, barq, ywpzuuid, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1 from (select fqmsquuid, lcslid, djxh, fqmsqqxq, fqmsqqxz, barq, ywpzuuid, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1 from yh_nsrfqmsqbaxx t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.djxh=? order by barq desc) where rownum = 1
select tdxxuuid,tdzzsxmuuid,tdsybh,tdsyqsrxzhbhth,tdsrxzhbrq from dj_tdzzsxm_tdxx where tdzzsxmuuid = ? and yxbz = 'Y'

select t.sjtb_sj, t.xdmxuuid, t.ssxduuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.xm_1, t.ssxdsdlx_dm, t.fjmnsfs_dm, t.kjywrdjxh, t.xyt, t.xyk, t.sfsygljy, t.jmse, t.xdsl, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.bz, t.yxbz, t.xybz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.ssxd_dm, t.sre, t.ynssde, t.zggnssflgdsl, t.htbh, t.ssjmxzdl_dm, t.ssjmxzxl_dm, t.ssjmxzhz_dm, t.jmsspsx_dm from RD_SSXDDYSPSQMXB t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxbz ='Y' and t.xybz = 'Y'

SELECT T.RDPZUUID, T.ZFSBZ, T.RDZSUUID, T.DJXH, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.RDYXQQ, T.RDYXQZ, T.HY_DM, T.SBQX_DM, T.NSQX_DM, T.JKQX_DM, T.SLHDWSE, T.YSKM_DM, T.YSFPBL_DM, T.SKGK_DM, T.ZSDLFS_DM, T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSL, T.YXBZ, T.LRRQ, T.Gfjbjg_Dm, T.Zsxmcxbz_Dm, T.Jfjc_Dm FROM RD_SFZRDXXB T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN t.rdyxqq AND T.Rdyxqz AND T.RDYXQQ < T.RDYXQZ

select wtxysuuid, lcslid, wtfswjg_dm, wtdwdz, wtffddbr, hjszddz, xjzddz, xyqdrq, dzszjfj, dzfw, jsyjjsl, dzqxq, dzqxz, xyyxqq, xyyxqz, sxfbljh, qtsx, mxsbbz_1, jzsqdkbz_1, dkfpzl, dkptfpdx, dkptfpnr, dkptfpxgzr, dkqxq, dkqxz, zzrq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, stfdjxh, wszg from dj_wtxysxx where stfdjxh = ? and zfbz_1 = 'N' and xyyxqq <= xyyxqz order by xyqdrq desc, lrrq desc

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.fczyz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, b.fwqsuuid, b.djxh, b.fwcqzsh, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz from dj_fyjbxx a, dj_fwqsxx b where a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid and b.syqsyxqq <= ? and b.syqsyxqz >= ? and a.yxbz='Y' and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm =? or 1 =?) and b.djxh = ? and a.fybh = ?

select n.tdsybh, n.tdzldz, n.ssswjg_dm, n.xzqhsz_dm, n.jdxz_dm, n.tddj_dm, n.tdzmj, n.yxbz, n.qh, n.tdjbxxuuid, m.tdqsuuid, m.syqsyxqq, m.syqsyxqz, n.tdsyqkuuid, n.fwtddjlx_dm, n.tdmj, n.mstdmj, n.ystdmj, n.dwse, n.nynse, n.yxqq, n.yxqz, n.nsqx_dm, n.sbqx_dm, n.jkqx_dm, n.yskm_dm, n.ysfpbl_dm, n.skgk_dm, n.zscztdsysbz, n.bz, n.lcslid, n.tdczrmc, n.tdczrsfzjhm, n.czrsfzjzl_dm, n.zspm_dm, n.PKBZ from (select b.tdsybh, b.tdqsuuid, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz,b.tdjbxxuuid from dj_tdqsxx b where b.syqsyxqz > ? ) m, (select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid, c.tdsyqkuuid, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.tdmj, c.mstdmj, c.ystdmj, c.dwse, c.nynse, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.nsqx_dm, c.sbqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.zscztdsysbz, c.bz, c.lcslid, c.tdczrmc, c.tdczrsfzjhm, c.czrsfzjzl_dm, c.zspm_dm,c.PKBZ from dj_tdjbxx a,dj_tdsyqkdjxx c where a.tdjbxxuuid=c.tdjbxxuuid and c.djxh = ? and c.yxqz >= c.yxqq and a.yxbz='Y' and c.fwtddjlx_dm='2' and (a.tdsybh = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?)) n where n.tdjbxxuuid = m.tdjbxxuuid(+)
delete from dj_ls_djxhandssq
select nvl(sum(a.xmys), 0) gcjkhj from dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb a,dj_jzyxmdj_zfbgcxmxx b where b.gcxmbh =? and a.gcxmbh= b.fbgcxmbh and a.zxrq is null and b.yxbz ='Y'

select djxh, gdslx_dm, ssdabh, nsrsbh, shxydm, nsrmc, kzztdjlx_dm, djzclx_dm, fddbrxm, fddbrsfzjlx_dm, scjydz, fddbrsfzjhm, scjydzxzqhsz_dm, nsrzt_dm, hy_dm, zcdz, zcdzxzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, dwlsgx_dm, gdghlx_dm, djjg_dm, djrq, zzjg_dm, kqccsztdjbz, zgswj_dm, zgswskfj_dm, ssgly_dm from dj_nsrxx n where n.zzjg_dm = ? and n.nsrzt_dm = ? and n.yxbz = 'Y'
select distinct a.xh from yh_ls_zgmc a, yh_zgmc b where a.bh=b.bh and b.yxbz='Y' and a.ldhtjsrq >= b.ldhtqsrq and a.ldhtqsrq <= b.ldhtjsrq and b.djxh=?

select wtxysuuid, lcslid, wtfswjg_dm, wtdwdz, wtffddbr, hjszddz, xjzddz, xyqdrq, dzszjfj, dzfw, jsyjjsl, dzqxq, dzqxz, xyyxqq, xyyxqz, sxfbljh, qtsx, mxsbbz_1, jzsqdkbz_1, dkfpzl, dkptfpdx, dkptfpnr, dkptfpxgzr, dkqxq, dkqxz, zzrq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, stfdjxh, wszg from dj_wtxysxx where stfdjxh = ? and ? between xyyxqq and xyyxqz and zfbz_1 = 'N'

SELECT nsr.DJXH, GDSLX_DM, SSDABH, nsr.NSRSBH, NSRMC, nsr.KZZTDJLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, SCJYDZ, FDDBRSFZJHM, SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, nsr.NSRZT_DM, HY_DM, ZCDZ, ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM, GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM, DJRQ, ZZJG_DM, nsr.KQCCSZTDJBZ, ZGSWJ_DM, nsr.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SSGLY_DM, kz.zcdlxdh, kz.jyfw, LS.Uuid as drlsuuid FROM DJ_NSRXX NSR, DJ_LS_DRJYNSRXX LS, dj_nsrxx_kz kz WHERE (nsr.nsrsbh = ls.nsrsbh or nsr.shxydm = ls.nsrsbh) AND nsr.djxh = kz.djxh AND (NSR.KZZTDJLX_DM = LS.Kzztdjlx_Dm OR LS.Kzztdjlx_Dm is null) AND (NSR.Zgswskfj_Dm = LS.Zgswskfj_Dm OR LS.Zgswskfj_Dm is null) AND (NSR.Kqccsztdjbz = LS.Kqccsztdjbz OR LS.Kqccsztdjbz is null) AND (NSR.Nsrzt_Dm = LS.Nsrzt_Dm OR LS.Nsrzt_Dm is null) AND nsr.gdslx_dm = ? AND NSR.YXBZ = 'Y'

select a.BYLCSLID, a.BYRQ, a.DJXH, a.HXLCSLID, a.HXRQ, a.JDXZ_DM, a.JYFSDMJH, a.LCSLID, a.LRRQ, a.LRR_DM, a.NH, a.SJGSDQ, a.SJTB_SJ, a.SWDJD, a.SWDJDSWJGYJ, a.SWJGFZRQZRQ, a.SWJGFZRXM, a.SWJGJBRQZRQ, a.SWJGJBRXM, a.SWJGJG, a.WCJYD, a.WCJYDXZQHSZ_DM, a.WCJYHDSSGLZMBH, a.WCJYHTZJE, a.WCJYZMUUID, a.WH, a.WSZZRQ, a.XGRQ, a.XGR_DM, a.YWCJYHDSSGLZMBH, a.YWPZUUID, a.ZFBZ_1, a.ZFRQ_1, a.ZFR_DM, a.ZG, a.ZMYXQXQ, a.ZMYXQXZ from ZM_WCJYHDSSGLZMXX a where a.djxh=? and a.byrq is null and a.yxbz='Y' AND (A.ZFBZ_1='N' OR A.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL)

select nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.ssgly_dm, jg.yhpzuuid, jg.jmsspsx_dm, jg.jmqxq, jg.jmqxz, jg.sjjzrq, jg.zsxm_dm, jg.ztrq from dj_nsrxx nsr, yh_jmsspjg jg where nsr.djxh = jg.djxh and nsr.yxbz='Y' and nsr.shxydm = ? and jg.jmsspsx_dm = ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '10', '08') and jg.zfbz_1 = 'N' and jg.ztrq is null union all select nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.ssgly_dm, jg.yhpzuuid, jg.jmsspsx_dm, jg.jmqxq, jg.jmqxz, jg.sjjzrq, jg.zsxm_dm, jg.ztrq from dj_nsrxx nsr, yh_jmsspjg jg where nsr.djxh = jg.djxh AND nsr.yxbz='Y' and nsr.shxydm = ? and jg.jmsspsx_dm = ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '10', '08') and jg.zfbz_1 = 'N' and jg.ztrq is not null
SELECT t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, k.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, k.cwfzrsfzjhm, k.zzjglx_dm FROM dj_nsrxx t, dj_nsrxx_kz k WHERE t.djxh = k.djxh and k.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm = ? and k.cwfzrsfzjhm = ? and k.zzjglx_dm = ?
select jzghxkzuuid, bdcxmbh, jzghxkzhm, jzghxkzfzjgmc, jswz, jsgm, yxbz, lrr_dm, xgr_dm, bdcxmuuid, ghzjzmj, qzzzjzmj, qzggjzmj, rjl from dj_bdcxmdj_jzghxkzxx where yxbz='Y' and bdcxmbh=?

select k.scjydlxdh, a.DJJG_DM, a.DJRQ, a.DJXH, a.DJZCLX_DM, a.DWLSGX_DM, a.FDDBRSFZJHM, a.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, a.FDDBRXM, a.FJMQYBZ, a.GDGHLX_DM, a.GDSLX_DM, a.HY_DM, a.JDXZ_DM, a.KQCCSZTDJBZ, a.KZZTDJLX_DM, a.LRRQ, a.LRR_DM, a.NSRMC, a.NSRSBH, a.NSRZT_DM, a.SCJYDZ, a.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, a.SJGSDQ, a.SJTB_SJ, a.SSDABH, a.SSGLY_DM, a.SWDJBLBZ, a.XGRQ, a.XGR_DM, a.ZCDZ, a.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, a.ZGSWJ_DM, a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, a.shxydm, a.ZZJG_DM, a.pgjg_dm from dj_nsrxx a, dj_nsrxx_kz k, dj_ls_lsnsrxxzhb ls where a.nsrsbh = ls.nsrsbh and a.djxh = k.djxh and a.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '10') and a.yxbz = 'Y' UNION select k.scjydlxdh, a.DJJG_DM, a.DJRQ, a.DJXH, a.DJZCLX_DM, a.DWLSGX_DM, a.FDDBRSFZJHM, a.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, a.FDDBRXM, a.FJMQYBZ, a.GDGHLX_DM, a.GDSLX_DM, a.HY_DM, a.JDXZ_DM, a.KQCCSZTDJBZ, a.KZZTDJLX_DM, a.LRRQ, a.LRR_DM, a.NSRMC, a.NSRSBH, a.NSRZT_DM, a.SCJYDZ, a.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, a.SJGSDQ, a.SJTB_SJ, a.SSDABH, a.SSGLY_DM, a.SWDJBLBZ, a.XGRQ, a.XGR_DM, a.ZCDZ, a.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, a.ZGSWJ_DM, a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, a.shxydm, a.ZZJG_DM, a.pgjg_dm from dj_nsrxx a, dj_nsrxx_kz k, dj_ls_lsnsrxxzhb ls where a.shxydm = ls.nsrsbh and a.djxh = k.djxh and a.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '10') and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select lb_dm , lbmc , lbcj_dm , kjsm , sxrq , sxrq_2 , szr_dm , szswjg_dm , szrq , xybz from dj_djhzdylbsz szb, (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm = ?) swjgb where szb.szswjg_dm = swjgb.swjg_dm and szb.xybz = 'Y' and ? between szb.sxrq and szb.sxrq_2 and szb.lb_dm != '000000000031'

select wt.wszg, wt.wtxysuuid, wt.stfdjxh as djxh, wt.hjszddz, wt.xjzddz as xjzdz, wt.dzfw as wtdzfw, wt.dzqxq, wt.dzqxz, wt.dzszjfj as wtdzszjfj, wt.wszg, wt.jsyjjsl from dj_wtxysxx wt where wt.ggbz = 'N' and wt.stfdjxh = ? and wt.zzrq is null
select gl.GLGLUUID, gl.djxh, gl.lb_dm, gl.yxqq, gl.yxqz,s.uuid from dj_djhglgl gl, dj_ls_djxhandssq s where gl.djxh = s.djxh and gl.yxqq < = s.ssqq and gl.yxqz > = s.ssqz

select j.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, j.yxqq, j.yxqz, j.nsqx_dm, j.uuid from rd_jbzqrdjgb j, dj_nsrxx n where n.zgswj_dm = ? and n.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or n.ssgly_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or n.hy_dm = ?) and n.djxh = j.djxh and (1 = #macroparam# or j.yxqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or j.yxqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or n.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or j.nsqx_dm = ?) and j.yxqq <= j.yxqz and n.yxbz = 'Y' and j.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select n.zgswj_dm jydswjg_dm,n.lrr_dm jydswjgjbr,b.djxh from dj_nsrxx n, dj_wbnsrjydbydj b where n.djxh = b.djxh and b.wcjyzmuuid = ? and (b.zfbz_1 = 'N' or b.zfbz_1 is null) AND N.YXBZ='Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y'
delete from dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh n
select a.xh from yh_ls_zgmc a, yh_zgmc b where a.shbxfzh=b.shbxfzh and a.ldhtjsrq >= b.ldhtqsrq and a.ldhtqsrq <= b.ldhtjsrq and b.yxbz='Y'
delete dj_ls_fwqkdjxx

select a.BZ, a.DJXH, a.GZJG, a.GZJHMXUUID, a.GZJHUUID, a.LCSLID, a.LRRQ, a.LRR_DM, a.SJGSDQ, a.SJTB_SJ, a.SL, a.XGRQ, a.XGR_DM, a.XGZGGQDCLCP, a.XGZGGQDCLXH, a.YT, a.YXBZ from dj_csgjqyggqdclgzjh_mxxx a where a.djxh=? and a.yxbz='Y'

select t.djxh, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, t.qyjtdjuuid, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.scjydz, nsr.zgswj_dm,nsr.ssdabh,nsr.zgswskfj_dm,nsr.shxydm from dj_qyjtcqcydwrdxx t, dj_nsrxx nsr where t.qyjtdjxh = ? and yxqq <= ? and t.yxqz >= ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and nsr.djxh = t.djxh AND nsr.yxbz='Y'
select * from Rd_Nsrzgxx_Jgb t where t.rdpzuuid=?

select AA.cldid,AA.wjlx_dm,AA.ngrq,AA.zbbm_dm, AA.WJH, AA.WJZMC,AA.wjnf,AA.hj_dm_1,AA.ztc,AA.mj_dm,AA.bt_1,AA.tm,AA.ngrsf_dm,AA.swrq,AA.zswz_dm,AA.zswnf,AA.zswh,AA.lwdwmc,AA.tmrq from ( SELECT T.CLDID, T.WJLX_DM, T.NGRQ, T.ZBBM_DM, T.WJNF, T.HJ_DM_1, T.ZTC, T.MJ_DM, T.WJH, T.WJZMC, T.BT_1, T.TM , T.NGRSF_DM, t2.swrq, t2.zswz_dm, t2.zswnf, t2.zswh, t2.lwdwmc, t2.tmrq FROM WJGL_ZH_CLD T, wjgl_zh_cldkz T2 WHERE exists (select 1 from dm_zh_wjlx aa, dm_zh_wtzlx bb where aa.wjlx_dm = t.wjlx_dm and bb.wtzlx_dm = aa.wtzlx_dm and bb.cldlx_dm in (?, ?, ?)) and t.cldid = t2.cldid and nvl(?, nvl(T.HJ_DM_1, 'X')) = nvl(T.HJ_DM_1, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.TM, 'X')) = NVL(T.TM, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.MJ_DM, 'X')) = NVL(T.MJ_DM, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.NGRQ, DATE '1990-01-01')) <= NVL(T.NGRQ, DATE '9999-01-01') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.NGRQ + 1, DATE '9999-01-01')) >= NVL(T.NGRQ, DATE '1990-01-01') AND nvl(?, nvl(T.NGRSF_DM, 'X')) = nvl(T.NGRSF_DM, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.ZBBM_DM, 'X')) = NVL(T.ZBBM_DM, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.WJNF, 'X')) = NVL(T.WJNF, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.WJZmc, 'X')) = NVL(T.WJZmc, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.wjh, 0)) = NVL(T.wjh, 0) AND NVL(?, NVL(t2.swrq, DATE '1990-01-01')) <= NVL(T2.SWRQ, DATE '9999-01-01') AND NVL(?, NVL(T2.SWRQ + 1, DATE '9999-01-01')) >= NVL(T2.SWRQ, DATE '1990-01-01') AND NVL(?, NVL(T2.tmrq, DATE '1990-01-01')) <= NVL(T2.tmrq, DATE '9999-01-01') AND NVL(?, NVL(T2.tmrq + 1, DATE '9999-01-01')) >= NVL(T2.tmrq, DATE '1990-01-01') AND (1 = ? OR T2.Lwdwmc LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND NVL(?, NVL(T2.Zswz_Dm, 'X')) = NVL(T2.Zswz_Dm, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T2.Zswnf, 'X')) = NVL(T2.Zswnf, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T2.Zswh, 0)) = NVL(T2.Zswh, 0) AND NVL(?, NVL(t.qfsj, DATE '1990-01-01')) <= NVL(t.qfsj, DATE '9999-01-01') AND NVL(?, NVL(t.qfsj + 1, DATE '9999-01-01')) >= NVL(t.qfsj, DATE '1990-01-01') and NVL(?, NVL(t.qfyj_dm, 'X')) = NVL(t.qfyj_dm, 'X') and NVL(?, NVL(t.qfrsf_dm, 'X')) = NVL(t.qfrsf_dm, 'X') AND (1 = ? OR t.zsdwlb LIKE '%' || ? || '%') and NVL(?, NVL(t.zcjd_dm, 'X')) = NVL(t.zcjd_dm, 'X') and NVL(?, NVL(t.xxgk_dm, 'X')) = NVL(t.xxgk_dm, 'X') AND (1 = ? OR T.ZTC LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND (1 = ? OR T.ZTC LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND (1 = ? OR T.ZTC LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND (1 = ? OR T.bt_1 LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND (1 = ? OR T.bt_1 LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND (1 = ? OR T2.Lwdwmc LIKE '%' || ? || '%') AND NVL(?, NVL(T2.Zswz_Dm, 'X')) = NVL(T2.Zswz_Dm, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T2.Zswnf, 'X')) = NVL(T2.Zswnf, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T2.Zswh, 0)) = NVL(T2.Zswh, 0) AND NVL(?, NVL(t.qfsj, DATE '1990-01-01')) <= NVL(t.qfsj, DATE '9999-01-01') AND NVL(?, NVL(t.qfsj + 1, DATE '9999-01-01')) >= NVL(t.qfsj, DATE '1990-01-01') and NVL(?, NVL(t.qfyj_dm, 'X')) = NVL(t.qfyj_dm, 'X') and NVL(?, NVL(t.qfrsf_dm, 'X')) = NVL(t.qfrsf_dm, 'X') AND (1 = ? OR T.bt_1 LIKE '%' || ? || '%') and t.swjg_dm in (#macroparam# ) union SELECT T.CLDID, T.WJLX_DM, T.NGRQ, T.ZBBM_DM, T.WJNF, T.HJ_DM_1, T.ZTC, T.MJ_DM, T.WJH, T.WJZMC, T.BT_1, T.TM , T.NGRSF_DM, t2.swrq, t2.zswz_dm, t2.zswnf, t2.zswh, t2.lwdwmc, t2.tmrq FROM WJGL_ZH_CLD t, wjgl_zh_cldkz T2 WHERE exists (select 1 from dm_zh_wjlx aa, dm_zh_wtzlx bb where aa.wjlx_dm = t.wjlx_dm and bb.wtzlx_dm = aa.wtzlx_dm and bb.cldlx_dm in (?,?,?)) and t.cldid = t2.cldid and nvl(?, nvl(T.HJ_DM_1, 'X')) = nvl(T.HJ_DM_1, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.TM, 'X')) = NVL(T.TM, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.MJ_DM, 'X')) = NVL(T.MJ_DM, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.NGRQ, DATE '1990-01-01')) <= NVL(T.NGRQ, DATE '9999-01-01') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.NGRQ + 1, DATE '9999-01-01')) >= NVL(T.NGRQ, DATE '1990-01-01') AND nvl(?, nvl(T.NGRSF_DM, 'X')) = nvl(T.NGRSF_DM, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.ZBBM_DM, 'X')) = NVL(T.ZBBM_DM, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.WJNF, 'X')) = NVL(T.WJNF, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.WJZmc, 'X')) = NVL(T.WJZmc, 'X') AND NVL(?, NVL(T.wjh, 0)) = NVL(T.wjh, 0) AND NVL(?, NVL(t2.swrq, DATE '1990-01-01')) <= NVL(T2.SWRQ, DATE '9999-01-01') AND NVL(?, NVL(T2.SWRQ + 1, DATE '9999-01-01')) >= NVL(T2.SWRQ, DATE '1990-01-01') AND NVL(?, NVL(T2.tmrq, DATE '1990-01-01')) <= NVL(T2.tmrq, DATE '9999-01-01') AND NVL(?, NVL(T2.tmrq + 1, DATE '9999-01-01')) >= NVL(T2.tmrq, DATE '1990-01-01') AND (1 = ? select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid, b.tdqsuuid, b.djxh, b.tdsyzbh, b.zxly, b.ysccczfs_dm, b.czrq, b.zxlcslid, b.zxrq, b.tdsyzfzjgmc, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz, c.tdsyqkuuid, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.tdmj, c.mstdmj, c.ystdmj, c.dwse, c.nynse, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.nsqx_dm, c.sbqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.zscztdsysbz, c.bz, c.lcslid, c.zspm_dm, c.PKBZ from dj_tdjbxx a,dj_tdqsxx b,dj_tdsyqkdjxx c where a.tdjbxxuuid = b.tdjbxxuuid and a.tdjbxxuuid = c.tdjbxxuuid and b.zxrq is null and b.djxh = ? and b.syqsyxqq <= ? and b.syqsyxqz >= ? and c.yxqz >=c.yxqq and a.yxbz='Y' and c.fwtddjlx_dm!='2' and (a.tdsybh = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?)

select b.djxh, b.nsrsbh, b.shxydm, b.nsrmc, b.fddbrxm, b.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, b.fddbrsfzjhm, b.djzclx_dm, b.hy_dm, b.dwlsgx_dm, b.zgswj_dm, b.zgswskfj_dm, b.nsrzt_dm, b.djrq from dj_nsrxx b where b.kzztdjlx_dm = '1140' and (b.nsrsbh = ? or b.shxydm = ? ) and b.yxbz = 'Y'

SELECT nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.shxydm, nsr.fddbrxm, nsr.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, nsr.fddbrsfzjhm, nsrkz.fddbrgddh, nsr.zcdz, nsr.scjydz, nsrkz.scjydyzbm, '1' zjsxyy_dm, fzc.fzchrduuid, fzc.rdrq, zj.zjjcuuid, zj.swzjzl_dm, zj.swzjhm, zj.swzjglzt_dm, zj.lcslid FROM dj_fzchrdxx fzc, dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz nsrkz, dj_nsrzjjcxx zj where fzc.djxh = nsr.djxh and fzc.djxh = zj.djxh and nsr.djxh = nsrkz.djxh and nsr.nsrzt_dm != '03' and fzc.rdrq < ? and zj.swzjglzt_dm = ? and fzc.xgsxrq is null and fzc.ggrq is not null and zj.swzjzl_dm in ('11', '01', '02', '03', '04') and nsr.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.uuid as swsxtzsuuid, g.uuid as wszbuuid, t.wszg, t.tzszl_dm, t.zzr_dm, t.wszzrq, g.ywwsuuid, null qcuuid, null djxh, null clzt, null txfwlb_dm, null txzt, null txfssj, null clsj from dj_swsxtzszzxx t, gy_ws_wszb g where t.djxh = ? and t.tzszl_dm = '26' and t.djxh = g.djxh and t.wszg = g.wszg and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.zfsj is null and t.zfr_dm is null and g.zfr_dm is null and g.zfsj is null union all select t.uuid as swsxtzsuuid, g.uuid as wszbuuid, t.wszg, t.tzszl_dm, t.zzr_dm, t.wszzrq, g.ywwsuuid, qc.qcuuid, qc.djxh, qc.clzt, qc.txfwlb_dm, qc.txzt, qc.txfssj, qc.clsj from dj_swsxtzszzxx t, gy_ws_wszb g, rd_yrdhyqwrdybnsrqc qc where t.djxh = ? and t.tzszl_dm = '29' and t.djxh = g.djxh and t.djxh = qc.djxh(+) and t.wszg = g.wszg and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.zfsj is null and t.zfr_dm is null and g.zfr_dm is null and g.zfsj is null and qc.clzt = '0' and qc.txzt = '1'

select t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.shxydm, t.nsrmc, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.gdslx_dm = ? and t.nsrmc = ? union select t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.shxydm, t.nsrmc, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.gdslx_dm = ? and t.fddbrxm = ? union select t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.shxydm, t.nsrmc, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.gdslx_dm = ? and t.fddbrsfzjlx_dm = ? and t.fddbrsfzjhm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'
select fpzl_dm code, fpzlmc caption from dm_fp_fpzl a where a.zppz_dm in ('0','1','3','5') and a.zkdklx_dm in ('0', '2') and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y'

select csb.slswsx_dm, mxb.djxh, mxb.ssxdsdlx_dm, mxb.ssxduuid, mxb.lrrq from rd_ssxddyspsqmxb mxb, cs_rd_ssxdsdlxsldzb csb, rd_fjmxsssxddyjgb jgb where mxb.ssxdsdlx_dm = csb.ssxdsdlx_dm and mxb.ssxduuid = jgb.ssxduuid and mxb.yxbz = 'Y' and jgb.djxh = ?
select t.* from zm_ptjghglzmdffxx t where t.djxh=?

select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.tdjbxxuuid, a.qh, b.tdqsuuid, b.djxh, b.tdsyzbh, b.zxly, b.ysccczfs_dm, b.czrq, b.zxlcslid, b.zxrq, b.tdsyzfzjgmc, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz, c.tdsyqkuuid, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.tdmj, c.mstdmj, c.ystdmj, c.dwse, c.nynse, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.nsqx_dm, c.sbqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.zscztdsysbz, c.bz, c.lcslid, c.zspm_dm from dj_tdjbxx a,dj_tdqsxx b,dj_tdsyqkdjxx c where a.tdjbxxuuid = b.tdjbxxuuid and a.tdjbxxuuid = c.tdjbxxuuid and b.djxh=c.djxh and a.yxbz='Y' and c.fwtddjlx_dm!='2' AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= c.yxqz AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= c.yxqq and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.syqsyxqz AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= b.syqsyxqq)) AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= c.yxqz and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.syqsyxqz)) and b.djxh = ? and a.tdsybh = ? AND c.yxqq <= c.yxqz AND b.syqsyxqq <= b.syqsyxqz

select t.qtdzzg_dm, t.qtdzzg from cs_pz_qtdzzgb t where t.qtdzzl_dm = ? and t.yxqsrq < ? and t.yxzzrq > ? and t.swjg_dm in (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm and swjg.yxbz = 'Y' and swjg.xybz = 'Y' start with swjg.swjg_dm = ? )

select DJXH , GDSLX_DM, SSDABH, NSRSBH , SHXYDM, NSRMC, KZZTDJLX_DM , DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM , SCJYDZ, FDDBRSFZJHM , SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM , HY_DM , ZCDZ , ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM , JDXZ_DM , DWLSGX_DM , GDGHLX_DM , DJJG_DM , DJRQ , ZZJG_DM , KQCCSZTDJBZ , ZGSWJ_DM , ZGSWSKFJ_DM , SSGLY_DM , FJMQYBZ , SWDJBLBZ , NSRBM , YXBZ from dj_nsrxx n where n.ssdabh=? and n.gdslx_dm=? and n.nsrzt_dm !='07' and n.nsrzt_dm!='10' and n.yxbz='Y'

select distinct t.swjg_dm from dm_kj_jygz t, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where t.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and t.yxqq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (t.yxqz > to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') or t.yxqz is null) and rownum = 1 and t.jylx_dm = ? order by t.swjg_dm desc

select m.mstcuuid,m.bbuuid,m.lcslid,m.xh,m.nh,m.nnch,m.cnyh,m.mslb_dm,m.msmx_dm,m.cp,m.xh_3, m.scqymc,m.clyt,m.clgzsrlnyzl_dm,m.zygdzz,m.cltpn,m.cltpw,m.sjgsdq,m.zch from WBJH_YH_CLGZSMSTC m where m.xh_3 like ? and (1 = ? or m.nh = ?) and (1 = ? or m.NNCH = ?) and (1 = ? or m.cnyh = ?) and (1 = ? or m.cp like ?) and (1 = ? or m.mslb_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or m.msmx_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or m.scqymc like ?) and rownum<=500

select t.uuid, t.djxh, t.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm, t.tzfhhhrzjhm, t.tzfhhhrmc, t.tzfjjxz_dm, t.tzbl, t.gjhdqsz_dm, t.dz, t.yxqq, t.tzje, t.yxqz, t.fpbl, t.tzfhhrdjxh from dj_tzfxx t where t.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm like '2%' and t.tzfhhrdjxh is null and ((t.lrrq >= ? and t.lrrq <= ?) or (t.xgrq >= ? and t.xgrq <= ?))

SELECT fy.FYJBXXUUID,fy.FYBH,fy.FWZH,fy.DY,fy.LC_1,fy.FH,fy.JG_DM,fy.CX_DM, fy.FWMJ,fy.TNMJ,fy.FWZLDZ,fy.XZQHSZ_DM,fy.JDXZ_DM,fy.SSSWJG_DM,fy.yxbz, fy.BDCXMBH,fy.TDSYBH,fy.SJGSDQ,fy.FCZYZ,qs.FWQSUUID,qs.DJXH,qs.FWCQZSH, qs.ZXLY,qs.YSCCCZFS_DM,qs.CZRQ,qs.ZXLCSLID,qs.ZXRQ,qs.SYQSYXQQ,qs.SYQSYXQZ FROM dj_fyjbxx fy, dj_fwqsxx qs WHERE fy.fyjbxxuuid = qs.fyjbxxuuid AND fy.yxbz = 'Y' AND qs.zxrq IS NULL AND qs.djxh = ?

select a.djxh, a.gdslx_dm, a.ssdabh, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, a.nsrmc, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.djjg_dm, a.djrq, a.zzjg_dm, a.kqccsztdjbz, b.hjszd, b.jyfw, b.zcdlxdh, b.zcdyzbm, b.scjydlxdh, b.scjydyzbm, b.hsfs_dm, b.cyrs, b.wjcyrs, b.hhrs, b.ggrs, b.gdgrs, b.zzjglx_dm, b.kjzdzz_dm, b.wz, b.swdlrlxdh, b.swdlrdzxx, b.zczb, b.tzze, b.zrrtzbl, b.wztzbl, b.gytzbl, b.gykglx_dm, b.zfjglx_dm, b.bzfs_dm, b.fddbrgddh, b.fddbryddh, b.fddbrdzxx, b.cwfzrxm, b.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, b.cwfzrsfzjhm, b.cwfzrgddh, b.cwfzryddh, b.cwfzrdzxx, b.bsrxm, b.bsrsfzjzl_dm, b.bsrsfzjhm, b.bsrgddh, b.bsryddh, b.bsrdzxx, b.lsswdjyxqq, b.lsswdjyxqz, b.swdlrnsrsbh, b.swdlrmc, b.whsyjsfjfxxdjbz, b.zzsjylb, b.yhsjnfs_dm, b.zsxmcxbz_dm, b.zzsqylx_dm, b.gjhdqsz_dm, b.ygznsrlx_dm, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.ssgly_dm, a.fjmqybz, a.swdjblbz, j.kyslrq, j.pzjguuid, j.pzsljglx_dm, j.pzsljg_dm, j.pzsljgmc, j.pzzmhwjh, j.zzlx_dm, j.zzhm, j.scjyqxq, j.scjyqxz, a.nsrbm from dj_nsrxx a,dj_nsrxx_kz b,dj_pzjgxx j where a.djxh=b.djxh and a.nsrbm=? and a.djxh = j.djxh(+)

select ssdabh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, kzztdjlx_dm, djzclx_dm, fddbrxm, fddbrsfzjlx_dm, scjydz, fddbrsfzjhm, scjydzxzqhsz_dm, nsrzt_dm, hy_dm, zcdz, zcdzxzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, dwlsgx_dm, gdghlx_dm, zzjg_dm, hjszd, jyfw, zcdlxdh, zcdyzbm, scjydlxdh, scjydyzbm, hsfs_dm, cyrs, wjcyrs, hhrs, ggrs, gdgrs, zzjglx_dm, kjzdzz_dm, wz, swdlrlxdh, swdlrdzxx, zczb, tzze, zrrtzbl, wztzbl, gytzbl, gykglx_dm, zfjglx_dm, bzfs_dm, fddbrgddh, fddbryddh, fddbrdzxx, cwfzrxm, cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, cwfzrsfzjhm, cwfzrgddh, cwfzryddh, cwfzrdzxx, bsrxm, bsrsfzjzl_dm, bsrsfzjhm, bsrgddh, bsryddh, bsrdzxx, lsswdjyxqq, lsswdjyxqz, swdlrnsrsbh, swdlrmc, zzsjylb, gjhdqsz_dm, ygznsrlx_dm, zjgnsrsbh, zjgmc, zjgzcdz, zjgzcdzyzbm, yxqq, zjgfddbrxm, yxqz, zjglxdh, zjgjyfw, pzsljglx_dm, pzsljg_dm, pzsljgmc, pzzmhwjh, zzlx_dm, zzhm, kyslrq, scjyqxq, scjyqxz, lrrq, tyshxydm, nsrswjg, scztbh, xxczlx, globalbusinessid, xh, qfjg_dm, frzs, frzsyzbm, zcxs, hzrq from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.tyshxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and t.xxczlx = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.lrrq > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.lrrq < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and t.kzztdjlx_dm <> '1120' and not exists (select q.shxydm from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx q where q.xh_2 = t.xh and q.clbz = 'Y')

SELECT td.TDSYBH,td.TDZLDZ,td.SSSWJG_DM,td.XZQHSZ_DM,td.JDXZ_DM,td.TDDJ_DM, td.TDZMJ,td.YXBZ,td.LRR_DM,td.LRRQ,td.XGR_DM,td.XGRQ,td.SJGSDQ,td.QH,td.TDJBXXUUID FROM dj_syglxmdj_tdxx gl, dj_tdjbxx td WHERE gl.tdsybh = td.tdsybh AND gl.xmbh = ? AND gl.yxbz = 'Y' AND td.yxbz = 'Y'

select wtxysuuid, wtfswjg_dm, wtdwdz, wtffddbr, hjszddz, xjzddz, xyqdrq, dzszjfj, dzfw, jsyjjsl, dzqxq, dzqxz, xyyxqq, xyyxqz, sxfbljh, qtsx, mxsbbz_1, jzsqdkbz_1, dkfpzl, dkptfpdx, dkptfpnr, dkptfpxgzr, dkqxq, dkqxz, zzrq, stfdjxh, w.wszg, w.lcslid, w.jbjxqx, w.jbjxed from dj_wtxysxx w where w.stfdjxh = ? and w.xyyxqq <= w.xyyxqz and w.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select a.swsx_dm,a.swjg_dm,a.tdjmlx from cs_yh_tdjmswsx a, (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm = ?) b where b.swjg_dm = a.swjg_dm and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select r.djxh, r.nsrsbh, r.nsrmc, r.scjydz, r.zgswskfj_dm, r.ssdabh, r.zgswj_dm, s.rdswjg_dm, s.dcnd, s.qcuuid, s.lcslid, s.ssdcqylx_dm, s.zsbs, s.zssm, s.yxbz from dj_nsrxx r, dj_ssdcqyqc s where r.djxh = s.djxh and s.dcnd = ? and r.yxbz = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or s.yxbz = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or s.zsbs in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or s.ssdcqylx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or s.djxh = ?) and exists (select 1 from dj_ls_djxhshxydm ls where (ls.swjg_dm = r.zgswj_dm or ls.swjg_dm = r.zgswskfj_dm))

select t.fzjghfddjxh djxh, t.fzjghfdmc nsrmc, t.fzjghfdnsrsbh nsrsbh, t.djxh pcode, t.fzjghfddjxh code, level + 1 depth from dj_fzjgxx t where to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between t.yxqq and t.yxqz and t.djxh != t.fzjghfddjxh and t.fzjghfddjxh is not null start with t.djxh = ? and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between t.yxqq and t.yxqz connect by t.djxh = prior t.fzjghfddjxh and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between t.yxqq and t.yxqz
SELECT T.SJHY_DM PCODE, Rtrim(T.HY_DM) CODE, T.HYMC CAPTION, T.XLBZ FROM DM_GY_HY T WHERE T.SJHY_DM = ? AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY T.HY_DM
select t.dzszsluuid, t.wtxysuuid, t.dzszjfj, t.jsyjjsl, t.sxfbl, t.yxbz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq from dj_wtxys_dzszslxx t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.wtxysuuid = ?

SELECT a.LCSLID, a.JMLX_DM, a.JMZLX_DM, a.SSJMXZHZ_DM, a.SSJMXZXL_DM, a.ZFRQ_1, a.LMDYBZ, a.QXBZ, a.JMQXQ, a.JZED, a.WSZG, a.XGRQ, a.SJTB_SJ, a.JMXMXL_DM, a.JMFS_DM, a.YXBZ, a.LRRQ, a.SSJMSBLM_DM, a.ZSPM_DM, a.ZFR_DM, a.LRR_DM, a.JMQXZ, a.JZFD, a.YHPZUUID, a.DJXH, a.JMXMDL_DM, a.SSJMXZDL_DM, a.ZFBZ_1, a.XGR_DM, a.ZTRQ, a.JMSSPSX_DM, a.ZSXM_DM, a.JMWJ_DM, a.SJJZRQ, a.JZSL, a.SJGSDQ FROM YH_JMSSPJG a where a.lcslid=? and a.djxh=?

SELECT SWJG_DM, SWJGMC, SWJGJC, SWJGBZ, SJSWJG_DM, JGJC_DM, SWJGYZBM, SWJGDZ, SWJGLXDH, CZDH, DZXX, XZQHSZ_DM, SWJGFZR_DM, GDSLX_DM, SWJGJG FROM DM_GY_SWJG JG WHERE JG.GDSLX_DM = ? AND JG.XZQHSZ_DM = ? AND jg.xybz='Y' AND JG.YXBZ='Y'
select t.zspm_dm from cs_dj_ygzsdzzspmyzspmdzb t where t.ygzsdzzspm_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y'

SELECT zl.pzzl_dm, zl.pzzlmc, zg.pzzg_dm, zg.pzzg FROM dm_pz_pzzl zl, cs_pz_pzzgb zg WHERE zl.pzzl_dm = zg.pzzl_dm AND zl.pzdlbz = 'N' AND zl.pzzlbz = 'N' AND zl.pzxlbz = 'Y' AND zl.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) AND zg.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) AND (1 = ? OR zl.pzzl_dm IN (#macroparam#)) AND zg.gdsbz = ?
select hy_dm, zzhm, SCZTBH from WBJH_CJ_SJ_FHYXX where (1= #macroparam# or zzhm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or scztbh =?) and (1=#macroparam# or xh=?) and (1=#macroparam# or p_xh=?)

select jzy.djxh djxh, jzy.gcxmbh sybh1, jzy.gcxmmc symc, jzy.gcxmdz sydz, jzy.jdxz_dm, jzy.xmszddfswjg_dm zgswj_dm, jzy.zgswskfj_dm zgswskfj_dm, jzy.ssgly_dm yssgly_dm, 'J' xmbz, jzy.jzygcxmuuid xmuuid, jzy.ZDXMBZ from dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb jzy where jzy.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or jzy.xmszddfswjg_dm = ?) and (jzy.zxrq is null or jzy.zxrq = to_date('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and jzy.zfbz_1 = 'N' union select bdc.djxh djxh, bdc.bdcxmbh sybh1, bdc.bdcxmmc symc, bdc.xmdz sydz, bdc.jdxz_dm, bdc.xmszdswjg_dm zgswj_dm, bdc.zgswskfj_dm zgswskfj_dm, bdc.ssgly_dm yssgly_dm, 'B' xmbz, bdc.bdcxmuuid xmuuid, '' ZDXMBZ from dj_bdcxmdjxx bdc where bdc.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or bdc.xmszdswjg_dm = ?) and bdc.yxbz = 'Y' and (bdc.zxrq is null or bdc.zxrq = to_date('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))

select t.hdjguuid, t.djxh, t.dexm_dm, t.hy_dm, t.hdzxqq, t.hdzxqz, t.sjzxqz, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.ynsjye, t.sl_1, t.hdse, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.ynse, t.wdqzdbz, t.jyxm_dm, t.jsbz_1, t.yssdl, t.jsyj, t.ywpzuuid, t.zxhdbz, t.lcslid, t.zfbz_1, t.sjgsdq from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg t where t.djxh = ? and t.hdzxqz > t.hdzxqq and t.SJZXQZ >= ?

select t.glgluuid, t.djxh, t.lb_dm, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq from dj_djhglgl t where t.djxh = ? and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz and exists (select 1 from cs_dj_zkzpxgmnsrglgljkxx d where d.lb_dm = t.lb_dm and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xybz = 'Y') order by yxqz desc

select a.RDRQ, a.RDR_DM, a.LB_DM, a.SSDQ, a.QYSSJTMC, a.YXBZ, a.QYSSJT_DM, a.JTZGSWJGMC, a.JTSCJYDZ, a.JTCJ_DM, a.JTDJXH, a.JTNSRSBH, a.BHBQYSSJT_DM, a.HBBJ, a.XYBZ, a.QYJTUUID, a.RDSWJG_DM from dj_qyssjt a where a.qyjtuuid =? and a.yxbz='Y' and a.xybz='Y'

select e.nsrsbh from dj_djhglgl t join dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh e on t.djxh = e.djxh join dj_djhglgl d on t.djxh = d.djxh where t.glgluuid != d.glgluuid and t.lb_dm = '000000000031' and d.lb_dm = '000000000031' and t.yxqq <= t.yxqz and d.yxqq <= d.yxqz and ((t.yxqq > d.yxqq and t.yxqq < d.yxqz) or (t.yxqz > d.yxqq and t.yxqz < d.yxqz))

select t.kyslrq, t.qfjg_dm as rgqfswjg_dm, t.xxczlx, t.xh, t.tyshxydm, t.nsrmc, t.lrrq, t.scjydz from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.tyshxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like ?) and t.xxczlx = ? and trunc(t.lrrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (1 = #macroparam# or t.kzztdjlx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.kzztdjlx_dm != ? or t.kzztdjlx_dm is null) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.scjydz like ?) and exists (select 1 from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx b where b.rgqfswjg_dm = ? and b.xh_2 = t.xh and b.zcbz = ? and (b.lrrq, b.xh_2) in (select max(lrrq) over(partition by xh_2) mlrrq, xh_2 from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx c where c.xh_2 = b.xh_2)) union all select t.kyslrq, t.qfjg_dm as rgqfswjg_dm, t.xxczlx, t.xh, t.tyshxydm, t.nsrmc, t.lrrq, t.scjydz from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.tyshxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like ?) and t.xxczlx = ? and trunc(t.lrrq) between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (1 = #macroparam# or t.kzztdjlx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.kzztdjlx_dm != ? or t.kzztdjlx_dm is null) and t.qfjg_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.scjydz like ?) and not exists (select 1 from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx r where r.xh_2 = t.xh and r.rgqfswjg_dm is not null)
select t.zjjcuuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.ffrq, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.swzjhm, t.swzjglzt_dm, t.swzjzl_dm from dj_nsrzjjcxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.swzjglzt_dm = ?

select zguuid, djxh, bh, zgxm, xb_dm, sfzjlx_dm, sfzjhm, gljgbz, ltxrybz, sxsyhrybz, xsssyhlx_dm, xsssyhzjlx_dm, xsssyhzjhm, ldhtzh, ldhtqsrq, ldhtjsrq, shbxfzh, cjrlb_dm, bz, yxbz from yh_zgmc a where a.djxh = ? And a.ldhtqsrq <= ? and a.ldhtjsrq >= ? and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.pmbmgyxxbuuid,t.ajxxuuid,t.djxh,t.nsrsbh,t.nsrmc,t.pmbmswjg_dm,t.swjgjg,t.zg,t.nh,t.wh,t.sy,t.yj_1,t.flyj, t.jdnr,t.fyjg_dm,t.fyjgmc,t.spswjg_dm,t.wszzrq,t.dwmc,t.jdsmc,t.pmbmrq,t.pmbmdd,t.blqx,t.ggnr,t.fyje,t.pmbmsdje,t.pmbmsrje, t.xgfyje,t.djskje,t.djznjje_1,t.djfkje,t.djmswfsdje,t.rqje,t.fhsphwhzqtccly,t.fhcwswjg_dm,t.yxddzlmc,t.pgjdyj, t.pgjdwtlx_dm,t.pgjdstlx_dm,t.hcr_dm,t.hcrq,t.hth,t.wtpmbmhtnr,t.wthtqdrq,t.wthtqdrq,t.wtdwfddbrxm,t.wtdwfddbrzw,t.strxm , t.strgzdw,t.strzw,t.strzjlx_dm,t.strzjhm,t.dlqx,t.wszg,t.jdpgjgmc,t.pmbmjdswszg,t.pgjdbgmc,t.wtdwmc,t.pmbmccmc from fz_pmbmgyxxb t where t.sjslid=$uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm=$value1$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.RDPZUUID, T.ZFSBZ, T.RDZSUUID, T.DJXH, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.RDYXQQ, T.RDYXQZ, T.HY_DM, T.SBQX_DM, T.NSQX_DM, T.JKQX_DM, T.SLHDWSE,
T.YSKM_DM, T.YSFPBL_DM, T.SKGK_DM, T.ZSDLFS_DM, T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSL, T.YXBZ, T.LRRQ, T.Gfjbjg_Dm, T.Zsxmcxbz_Dm, T.Jfjc_Dm FROM RD_SFZRDXXB T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN t.rdyxqq AND T.Rdyxqz
AND T.RDYXQQ < T.RDYXQZ
select t.wcjyhdqksbuuid,t.djxh,t.wcjyhdssglzmbh,t.sjjyqjq,t.sjjyqjz,t.jydz,t.bysj,t.ddrq,t.hwcfdd from dj_wcjyhdqksbbxx t where t.wcjyhdssglzmbh =? and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N')=?
select t.fjmtsxswclbauuid from yh_fjmqygqzrsytsxswclbab t where t.zrfnsrsbh = ? and t.srfnsrsbh = ? and t.bzrqynsrsbh = ?

select t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh like #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like #macroparam#) and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.dwse,a.tddj_dm,b.tddjmc,b.sjtddj_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm,a.jdxz_dm,yxqq dwseyxqq,yxqz dwseyxqz from cs_dj_tddwseszb a,dm_dj_tddj b where a.xzqhsz_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.yxqq <= a.yxqz and a.yxqz >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.tddj_dm = b.tddj_dm and b.xybz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.zfbuuid,c.djxh,c.nsrsbh,c.nsrmc,c.shxydm,b.jsfdjxh,b.gcxmbh,b.gcxmmc,b.xmys,b.ZDXMBZ from dj_jzyxmdj_zfbgcxmxx a ,dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb b ,dj_nsrxx c where a.fbgcxmbh=b.gcxmbh and b.djxh=c.djxh and a.yxbz='Y' and ZFBZ_1='N' and a.jzygcxmuuid=? and c.yxbz='Y'
