select t.kjuuid, t.lcslid,t.djxh,t.zdkjyy,t.htbh,t.xmmc,t.zsfs_dm,t.jsyj_dm,t.hdlrl,t.kcxm_dm,t.sl_1,t.qtsl,t.jsff,t.kjfs,t.kjqx,t.lrr_dm,t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm,t.xgrq,t.ywpzuuid,t.zfbz_1,t.zfr_dm,t.zfrq_1 from rd_zdkjywrxx t where t.djxh=? and t.htbh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select t.qcuuid, t.lcslid, nsr.djxh, t.zlcslid, t.sndzzssjjne, t.sndyyssjjne, t.sndxfssjjne, t.sndqysdssjjne, t.sfyrd, t.snddfqtgshjsjjne, t.bndzzsyjjne, t.bndyysyjjne, t.bndxfsyjjne, t.bndqysdsyjjne, t.bnddfqtgshjyjjne, t.fdcxmtze, t.jknd, t.zdsyhjkjc_dm, t.zsbs, t.zssm, t.gszgswjmc, t.dszgswjmc, t.sjje_1, t.snjkjc, t.szswjg_dm, t.sxxm_dm, t.sxtj_dm, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.scjydz, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.shxydm, nsr.hy_dm from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_zdsyjknsrcxqc t where t.jknd = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.zdsyhjkjc_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ?) and nsr.djxh = t.djxh and nsr.yxbz = ? and t.yxbz = ? and (nsr.kzztdjlx_dm = '1110' or nsr.kzztdjlx_dm = '1120' or nsr.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%') and nsr.kqccsztdjbz = ? and nsr.nsrztlx_dm is null and exists (select 1 from dj_ls_djxhshxydm ls where (ls.swjg_dm = nsr.zgswj_dm or ls.swjg_dm = nsr.zgswskfj_dm))
SELECT SWJG_DM,LCSWSX_DM,PZZL_DM,FPYJ,HBYJ,HBXJX,DYSCX, ZTHGZ,ZDDYTS,XYBZ,YXBZ FROM CS_ZM_WSZMKJDYPZ WHERE swjg_dm = ? AND lcswsx_dm = ? AND yxbz = 'Y' AND xybz = 'Y'

select cbqkuuid, lcslid, djxh, cbpzhm, cbjdw, cbmc, nynse, bz, yxqq, yxqz, zxlcslid, zxrq, zxly, ysccczfs_dm, czrq, zspm_dm, ssswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, nsqx_dm, sbqx_dm, jkqx_dm, yskm_dm, ysfpbl_dm, skgk_dm, sl_1, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, cbsbh, tscd, zszm_dm, fdjgl from dj_cbqkxx where (djxh=? or 1= #macroparam# ) and ( cbsbh=? or 1=#macroparam#) and yxqz >=? and yxqq <=? and zxrq is null

select d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.zgswj_dm, d.kzztdjlx_dm, d.scjydz, d.kqccsztdjbz, d.djzclx_dm, d.hy_dm, d.jdxz_dm, d.dwlsgx_dm, d.pgjg_dm, k.zczb from dj_nsrxx d join dj_nsrxx_kz k on d.djxh = k.djxh where d.zgswj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or d.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or d.nsrsbh = ? or d.shxydm=?) and (1 = #macroparam# or d.pgjg_dm = ?) and d.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.kjbbmcuuid, t.lcslid, t.cwbbzl_dm, t.kjbbbsqx_dm, t.bbbsq_dm, t.kjbbbz, t.sjgsdq, t.cwkjbblx_dm from dj_cwkjzdba_kjbbmc t where t.cwkjzdbauuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'
SELECT Z.FZJGHFDMC, Z.DJXH, Z.FZJGHFDDJXH FROM DJ_FZJGXX Z WHERE Z.FZJGHFDDJXH = ? and z.yxqq<=z.yxqz and z.yxqz> =?

select nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.ssgly_dm, jg.yhpzuuid, jg.jmsspsx_dm, jg.jmqxq, jg.jmqxz, jg.sjjzrq, jg.zsxm_dm, jg.ztrq from dj_nsrxx nsr, yh_jmsspjg jg where nsr.djxh = jg.djxh and jg.jmsspsx_dm = ? and nsr.zgswj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.ssgly_dm = ?) and nsr.nsrzt_dm not in (?, ?, ?) and jg.zfbz_1 = ? and nsr.yxbz = ? and jg.jmqxz > jg.jmqxq

select a.uuid, a.sdxm_dm, a.gjhdqsz_dm, a.xyt, a.xyk, a.ydt, a.ydk, a.bz, a.qsrq, a.sxrq, a.zxrq_1, a.xdsl, a.xybz, a.yxbz, a.zzrq, b.ssxdsdlxmc from cs_rd_xxdsl a, dm_gy_ssxdsdlx b where a.sdxm_dm=b.ssxdsdlx_dm and a.xybz='Y' and a.yxbz='Y' and a.sdxm_dm = ? and a.gjhdqsz_dm = ?
select 1 dkdjqxbz from dj_dkdjdsdjskywqk a where a.djxh=? and a.yxqq<=? and a.yxqz >=? and rownum=1

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.SHXYDM, a.nsrmc, a.ssdabh, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.zzjg_dm, a.kqccsztdjbz, a.fjmqybz, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.ssgly_dm, b.hjszd, b.jyfw, b.zcdlxdh, b.zcdyzbm, b.scjydlxdh, b.scjydyzbm, b.zzjglx_dm, b.bsrxm, b.lsswdjyxqq, b.lsswdjyxqz, b.gjhdqsz_dm, c.pzjguuid, c.zzlx_dm, c.zzhm from dj_nsrxx a,dj_nsrxx_kz b,dj_pzjgxx c where a.djxh=b.djxh and a.djxh=c.djxh and a.zzjg_dm =? and a.nsrzt_dm != '07' and a.nsrzt_dm != '10' and a.yxbz='Y'
select * from pzgl_sql where rownum<=10

select nsr.djxh,nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.fddbrxm, nsr.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, nsr.fddbrsfzjhm,kz.fddbrgddh, nsr.zcdz,nsr.scjydz,nsr.shxydm, kz.scjydyzbm, '2' zjsxyy_dm, qc.hzqxq, qc.hzqxz,zj.zjjcuuid,zj.swzjzl_dm,zj.swzjhm,zj.swzjglzt_dm,zj.lcslid from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, dj_nsrhzqc qc,dj_nsrzjjcxx zj where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and nsr.zgswj_dm = qc.swjg_dm and nsr.djxh = qc.djxh and nsr.djxh=zj.djxh and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and nsr.nsrzt_dm != '03' and qc.hzrq_2 is null and qc.hzqxz < ? and zj.swzjglzt_dm = ? and nsr.zgswj_dm = ? and zj.swzjzl_dm in ('11', '01', '02', '03', '04') and (nsr.zgswskfj_dm=? or 1=?) and (nsr.nsrsbh=? or nsr.shxydm = ? or 1=?)

SELECT nsr.DJXH, nsr.nsrztlx_dm, GDSLX_DM, SSDABH, nsr.NSRSBH, nsr.SHXYDM, NSRMC, KZZTDJLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, SCJYDZ, FDDBRSFZJHM, SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM, HY_DM, ZCDZ, ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM, GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM, DJRQ, ZZJG_DM, KQCCSZTDJBZ, ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SSGLY_DM, kz.zcdlxdh, kz.jyfw, nsr.pgjg_dm FROM DJ_NSRXX NSR, DJ_LS_DJXHNSRSBH LS, dj_nsrxx_kz kz WHERE (NSR.NSRSBH = LS.NSRSBH or NSR.SHXYDM = LS.NSRSBH) AND nsr.djxh = kz.djxh AND NSR.YXBZ = 'Y' AND nsr.gdslx_dm = ?

SELECT RD.RDPZUUID, RD.DJXH, RD.ZFSBZ, RD.RDZSUUID, RD.ZSXM_DM, RD.ZSPM_DM, RD.ZSZM_DM, RD.RDYXQQ, RD.RDYXQZ, RD.HY_DM, RD.SBQX_DM, RD.NSQX_DM, RD.JKQX_DM, RD.YSKM_DM, RD.YSFPBL_DM, RD.SKGK_DM, RD.ZSDLFS_DM, NSR.NSRSBH, NSR.NSRMC, NSR.NSRZT_DM, NSR.JDXZ_DM, NSR.DJZCLX_DM, NSR.JDXZ_DM, NSR.DWLSGX_DM, NSR.SSGLY_DM, NSR.Shxydm, RD.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, P.KYSLRQ, RD.Gfjbjg_Dm, RD.Zsxmcxbz_Dm, RD.Jfjc_Dm FROM DM_QX_ZNJGDZB CSB, RD_SFZRDXXB RD, DJ_NSRXX NSR, DJ_PZJGXX P WHERE CSB.HSJG_DM = ? AND CSB.GLJG_DM = RD.ZGSWSKFJ_DM AND NSR.DJXH = P.DJXH(+) AND RD.DJXH = NSR.DJXH AND RD.RDYXQQ < = ? AND RD.RDYXQZ > = ? AND RD.RDYXQZ > RD.RDYXQQ AND RD.ZSDLFS_DM = ? AND NSR.djxh = ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != '07' and nsr.nsrzt_dm != '05' and nsr.nsrzt_dm != '08' and rd.yxbz = 'Y' and nsr.yxbz = 'Y'
select squuid, xduuid, lcslid, djxh, zllx, flzl, yxbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq from rd_ssxddysp_fbzl where lcslid=? and yxbz='Y'

select djxh, gdslx_dm, ssdabh, nsrsbh, shxydm, nsrmc, kzztdjlx_dm, djzclx_dm, fddbrxm, fddbrsfzjlx_dm, scjydz, fddbrsfzjhm, scjydzxzqhsz_dm, nsrzt_dm, hy_dm, zcdz, zcdzxzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, dwlsgx_dm, gdghlx_dm, djjg_dm, djrq, zzjg_dm, kqccsztdjbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, zgswj_dm, zgswskfj_dm, ssgly_dm, fjmqybz, swdjblbz from dj_nsrxx where zzjg_dm = ? and yxbz = 'Y'
select uuid, yddjxh, mbddjxh, nsrdzgxlb_dm, yxbz, sjgsdq from dj_djztgxdzb t where t.mbddjxh = ? and t.nsrdzgxlb_dm = '10' and t.yxbz = 'Y'
select zns.ccm from qx_swjg_zns zns,qx_jggw_zns t where t.gwxh = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.jgznxh = zns.jgznxh and zns.yxbz = 'Y' and zns.zn_dm = '01' and rownum = 1

select t.jgjc_dm, t.swjg_dm from CS_YH_TSJMSXSPQXSZB t where (t.swsx_dm = ?) and t.zsxm_dm = ? and (1 = ? or t.ZCZBXX <= ?) and (1 = ? or t.ZCZBSX > ?) and t.swjg_dm in (select a.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg a start with a.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior a.sjswjg_dm = a.swjg_dm) order by swjg_dm desc

select t.uuid, t.rduuid, t.tzzbz, t.djxh, t.yxbz, t.tzbl, n.nsrsbh, n.shxydm, n.nsrmc, n.zcdz, n.zgswj_dm, k.zcdlxdh, k.zcdyzbm from rd_jwzczzgl_jntzzybtzzxx t, dj_nsrxx n, dj_nsrxx_kz k where t.rduuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.djxh = n.djxh and n.djxh = k.djxh and n.yxbz = 'Y' union all select t.uuid, t.rduuid, t.tzzbz, t.djxh, t.yxbz, t.tzbl, t.nsrsbh, ''shxydm, t.nsrmc, t.zcdz, t.zgswj_dm, t.zcdlxdh, t.zcdyzbm from rd_jwzczzgl_jntzzybtzzxx t where t.rduuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and djxh = 0
select djxh from dj_zjgxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxqq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqz > to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxbz = ' Y' and rownum = 1

select r.jbzqrduuid,r.djxh,r.jbzqqx_dm,r.jbzqyxqq,r.jbzqyxqz from RD_JBZQRDSQSPB r where r.djxh = ? and r.jbzqyxqz >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and (r.qxrq is null or r.qxrq = to_date('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and r.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.fczyz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, b.fwqsuuid, b.djxh, b.fwcqzsh, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz from dj_fyjbxx a, dj_fwqsxx b where a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid and b.syqsyxqq <= ? and b.syqsyxqz >= ? and a.yxbz='Y' and a.xzqhsz_dm = ? and a.jdxz_dm = ? and (a.ssswjg_dm =? or 1 =?)
select uuid,djxh,jtcyxm,sfzjlx_dm,sfzjhm from dj_jtcyxx where djxh=? and yxbz = 'Y'

select bmuuid, hznsuuid, djxh, bmmc, zfjglx_dm, kdqsszyqylx_dm, jdjnbs, bjdyjqysdsyy_dm, hjqylx_dm, yjdyjyskm_dm, yjdyjysjc_dm, cyndhqjbz, ndhsqjyskm_dm, ndhsqjysjc_dm, btsldqbs, yxbz, yjdyjysfpbl_dm, ndhsqjysfpbl_dm from dj_hznsqyxxbab_dlscjybm t where t.hznsuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid, b.djxh, b.tdsyzbh, b.tdsyzfzjgmc, b.syqsyxqz from dj_tdjbxx a, dj_tdqsxx b where a.tdjbxxuuid = b.tdjbxxuuid and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.djxh=? and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) and not EXISTS (select 1 from dj_tdjbxx c, dj_tdqsxx d where c.tdjbxxuuid = d.tdjbxxuuid and d.syqsyxqz >= ? and c.yxbz = 'Y' and d.zxrq is null and (c.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (c.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (c.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) and a.tdjbxxuuid = c.tdjbxxuuid )
select T.WCJYZMUUID,T.WCJYHDSSGLZMBH from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx t where t.lcslid=? and t.zfbz_1='N' AND T.Yxbz='Y'
select distinct a.xh from yh_ls_zgmc a, yh_zgmc b where a.ldhtzh=b.ldhtzh and b.yxbz='Y' and a.ldhtjsrq >= b.ldhtqsrq and a.ldhtqsrq <= b.ldhtjsrq and b.djxh=?

select t.uuid, t.sfxxbgbuuid, t.djxh, t.kjdjxh, t.zrcclx_dm, t.zrccjtlx, t.sfyss, t.ssjysmc, t.ssgpdm, t.zjcybdczzzcbl, t.zjhjjcybdczzzcbl, t.zgsqbzcblbz, t.zrqzjcgbl, t.zrhzjcgbl, t.szcdfxbz, t.jjcygbzrgszbbz, t.qtcyjjcygbzrgszbbz, t.zjhjjcybzrgsgfbl, t.gljtcgblbz, t.ssxddydfgjqzyybz, t.bzrhhqyzjcybdczzzcbl, t.zhhqyqbzcblbz, t.qtccjtlx, t.yxsccsytkssxddyly, t.xsccsytksrze, t.cbfykcze, t.xsccsytkjmse, t.jmgsdssl, t.gljtzbszd, t.gljtsjgljgszd, t.ylyyzgqtdqtlsdbz, t.jqtdqtlsdxsssxddybz, t.qtsdlx, t.yfjmnsrysjlxbz, t.xsqtsdtksdze, t.xsqtsdtkjmse, t.bz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.bzrhhqyzjhjjcybdczzzcbl from YH_FJMNSRXSSSXDDYQKBGBC t where t.sfxxbgbuuid = ?
select t.uuid from rd_qyfhtsxswclgdtjkjczrdb t where t.zrfmc = ? and t.srfmc = ? and t.bzrqymc= ?
select t.wcjyhdssglzmbh, t.hxrq, t.wcjyzmuuid,t.zmyxqxq,t.zmyxqxz,t.byrq,t.wcjyd from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx t where t.hxrq is null and t.djxh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.BDCXMUUID,a.LCSLID,a.BDCXMBH,a.BDCXMMC,a.XMDZ,a.DJXH,a.XMYT_DM,a.XMZTZ,a.GCZZJ,a.KGRQ,a.YJJGRQ, a.YJSFRQ,a.XMSZDSWJG_DM,a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM,a.SSGLY_DM,a.XMGLQSRQ,a.BZ,a.XZQHSZ_DM,a.JDXZ_DM, a.XMFZR,a.LXFS,a.LRR_DM,a.LRRQ,a.XGR_DM,a.XGRQ,a.SJGSDQ,a.ZXRQ,a.YXBZ from dj_bdcxmdjxx a where a.djxh = ? and a.zxrq is null and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select sqmxuuid, squuid, djxh, lcslid, hdslid, jmsspsx_dm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, jmzlx_dm, jmlx_dm, jmfs_dm, ssjmxzhz_dm, ssjmxzdl_dm, ssjmxzxl_dm, jmwj_dm, jmxmdl_dm, jmxmxl_dm, lmdybz, sblm, jmqxq, jmqxz, jzsl, jzfd, jzed, yxbz from yh_jmssqspb_mx t where t.djxh=? and t.lcslid=? and t.squuid=?
SELECT t.slswsx_dm, t.swjg_dm, t.csz, t.ghlb_dm FROM CS_YH_ZSJSLSWSXYSWJGSZB t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.slswsx_dm = ? and t.swjg_dm=?
Select count(a.zguuid) count from yh_zgmc a where a.djxh = ? And ( a.ldhtqsrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.ldhtjsrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )

select t.qfjg_dm, t.ssdabh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.djzclx_dm, t.fddbrxm, t.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.fddbrsfzjhm, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrzt_dm, t.hy_dm, t.zcdz, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.dwlsgx_dm, t.gdghlx_dm, t.zzjg_dm, t.hjszd, t.jyfw, t.zcdlxdh, t.zcdyzbm, t.scjydlxdh, t.scjydyzbm, t.hsfs_dm, t.cyrs, t.wjcyrs, t.hhrs, t.ggrs, t.gdgrs, t.zzjglx_dm, t.kjzdzz_dm, t.wz, t.swdlrlxdh, t.swdlrdzxx, t.zczb, t.tzze, t.zrrtzbl, t.wztzbl, t.gytzbl, t.gykglx_dm, t.zfjglx_dm, t.bzfs_dm, t.fddbrgddh, t.fddbryddh, t.fddbrdzxx, t.cwfzrxm, t.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, t.cwfzrsfzjhm, t.cwfzrgddh, t.cwfzryddh, t.cwfzrdzxx, t.bsrxm, t.bsrsfzjzl_dm, t.bsrsfzjhm, t.bsrgddh, t.bsryddh, t.bsrdzxx, t.lsswdjyxqq, t.lsswdjyxqz, t.swdlrnsrsbh, t.swdlrmc, t.zzsjylb, t.gjhdqsz_dm, t.ygznsrlx_dm, t.zjgnsrsbh, t.zjgmc, t.zjgzcdz, t.zjgzcdzyzbm, t.yxqq, t.zjgfddbrxm, t.yxqz, t.zjglxdh, t.zjgjyfw, t.pzsljglx_dm, t.pzsljg_dm, t.pzsljgmc, t.pzzmhwjh, t.zzlx_dm, t.zzhm, t.kyslrq, t.scjyqxq, t.scjyqxz, t.lrrq, t.xxczlx, t.tyshxydm, t.SCZTBH, t.NSRSWJG, t.xh, t.zcxs, t.FRZS from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx t where t.tyshxydm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.zzhm = ?)

select t.qcuuid, t.lcslid, nsr.djxh, t.zlcslid, t.sndzzssjjne, t.sndyyssjjne, t.sndxfssjjne, t.sndqysdssjjne, t.sfyrd, t.snddfqtgshjsjjne, t.bndzzsyjjne, t.bndyysyjjne, t.bndxfsyjjne, t.bndqysdsyjjne, t.bnddfqtgshjyjjne, t.fdcxmtze, t.jknd, t.zdsyhjkjc_dm, t.zsbs, t.zssm, t.gszgswjmc, t.dszgswjmc, t.sjje_1, t.snjkjc, t.szswjg_dm, t.sxxm_dm, t.sxtj_dm, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.scjydz, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.shxydm, nsr.hy_dm from dj_nsrxx nsr left join dj_zdsyjknsrcxqc t on nsr.djxh = t.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' where nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and (nsr.kzztdjlx_dm = '1110' or nsr.kzztdjlx_dm = '1120' or nsr.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%') and nsr.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' and nsr.nsrztlx_dm is null and (nsr.djxh = ? or nsr.zgswj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jknd = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.zdsyhjkjc_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ?)

select lcslid, rduuid, bh, kjywrdjxh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, sdxmmc, lrr_dm, lrrq, jbr, sqrxm, sqrgshttmc, zstybz, ffr_dm, ffrq, ffswjg_dm, zfbz_1, zfrq_1, zfr_dm, hdslid, spr_dm, sprq from rd_xgcjjmsfzmh t where t.lcslid=?

SELECT jb.DJXH,jb.GDSLX_DM,jb.SSDABH,jb.NSRSBH,jb.NSRMC,jb.KZZTDJLX_DM,jb.DJZCLX_DM,jb.FDDBRXM, jb.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM,jb.SCJYDZ,jb.FDDBRSFZJHM,jb.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM,jb.NSRZT_DM,jb.HY_DM,jb.ZCDZ, jb.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM,jb.JDXZ_DM,jb.DWLSGX_DM,jb.GDGHLX_DM,jb.DJJG_DM,jb.DJRQ,jb.ZZJG_DM,jb.KQCCSZTDJBZ, jb.shxydm, jb.ZGSWJ_DM,jb.ZGSWSKFJ_DM,jb.SSGLY_DM,jb.FJMQYBZ,jb.SWDJBLBZ,kz.HJSZD,kz.JYFW,kz.ZCDLXDH, kz.ZCDYZBM,kz.SCJYDLXDH,kz.SCJYDYZBM,kz.HSFS_DM,kz.CYRS,kz.WJCYRS,kz.HHRS,kz.GGRS,kz.GDGRS, kz.ZZJGLX_DM,kz.KJZDZZ_DM,kz.WZ,kz.SWDLRLXDH,kz.SWDLRDZXX,kz.ZCZB,kz.TZZE,kz.ZRRTZBL,kz.WZTZBL, kz.GYTZBL,kz.GYKGLX_DM,kz.ZFJGLX_DM,kz.BZFS_DM,kz.FDDBRGDDH,kz.FDDBRYDDH,kz.FDDBRDZXX,kz.CWFZRXM, kz.CWFZRSFZJZL_DM,kz.CWFZRSFZJHM,kz.CWFZRGDDH,kz.CWFZRYDDH,kz.CWFZRDZXX,kz.BSRXM,kz.BSRSFZJZL_DM, kz.BSRSFZJHM,kz.BSRGDDH,kz.BSRYDDH,kz.BSRDZXX,kz.LSSWDJYXQQ,kz.LSSWDJYXQZ,kz.SWDLRNSRSBH,kz.SWDLRMC,kz.WHSYJSFJFXXDJBZ,kz.ZZSJYLB,kz.YHSJNFS_DM, kz.ZSXMCXBZ_DM,kz.ZZSQYLX_DM,kz.GJHDQSZ_DM,kz.YGZNSRLX_DM FROM dj_nsrxx jb, dj_nsrxx_kz kz WHERE jb.djxh = kz.djxh AND jb.nsrzt_dm = '03' AND (jb.nsrsbh = ? or jb.shxydm=?) AND jb.gdslx_dm = ? and jb.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.JZYGCXMUUID,a.LCSLID,a.DJXH,a.GCXMBH,a.GCXMMC,a.GCXMDZ,a.XZQHSZ_DM,a.JDXZ_DM,a.XMFZRXM,a.XMFZRLXDH, a.KGRQ,a.JGRQ,a.XMYT_DM,a.XMYS,a.JZMJ, a.JZYCBFS_DM,a.JSFDJXH,a.JZYFKFS_DM,a.JZYGLXS_DM,a.XMGLRQQ,a.XMSZDDFSWJG_DM,a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM,a.SSGLY_DM,a.ZXRQ, a.ZFBZ_1,a.ZFR_DM,a.ZFRQ_1,a.LRR_DM,a.LRRQ,a.XGR_DM,a.XGRQ,a.SJGSDQ,a.ZDXMBZ from dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb a where a.djxh=? and a.gcxmbh=? and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.zxrq is null

SELECT RDPZUUID , DJXH , LCSLID , NSRZGLX_DM , YXQQ , YXQZ , SJZZRQ , QXBZ , WSZG , ZFBZ_1 , ZFR_DM , ZFRQ_1 , SJGSDQ FROM RD_NSRZGXX_JGB N WHERE N.DJXH = ? AND n.yxqq<=? AND n.sjzzrq> =? AND n.yxqq<=n.yxqz AND (n.zfbz_1='N' OR n.zfbz_1 is null)

select t.wcjyzmuuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.wcjydxzqhsz_dm, t.wcjyd, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh, t.bylcslid, t.wcjyhdssglzmbh, t.swdjd, t.swdjdswjgyj, t.ywcjyhdssglzmbh, t.jyfsdmjh, t.jdxz_dm, t.swjgjbrxm, t.swjgjbrqzrq, t.swjgfzrxm, t.swjgfzrqzrq, t.wszzrq, t.zmyxqxq, t.zmyxqxz, t.wcjyhtzje, t.hxrq, t.hxlcslid, t.byrq, t.ywpzuuid, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.jydswjg_dm, jydswjgmc, t.dzwgzbz, t.wcjyhdssglzmffdw, t.yxbz, t.swjgmc from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.hxrq is null

select c.fszspm_dm code,pm.zspmmc caption,pm.sl_1 from cs_rd_zfsdzb c, dm_gy_zspm pm where c.zsxm_dm = ? and c.fszsxm_dm = ? and c.zspm_dm = ? and c.xybz = 'Y' and c.yxbz = 'Y' and c.fszspm_dm = pm.zspm_dm(+)

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.fczyz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, b.fwqsuuid, b.djxh, b.fwcqzsh, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz from dj_fyjbxx a, dj_fwqsxx b where a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid and b.syqsyxqq <= ? and b.syqsyxqz >= ? and a.yxbz='Y' and (b.djxh = ? or 1= ?) and (a.fybh = ? or 1= ?) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm =? or 1 =?)

select nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, ygz.uuid, ygz.zfjgglms_dm, ygz.ygzzfjgbz_dm from dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls join dj_nsrxx nsr on ls.djxh = nsr.djxh and nsr.kzztdjlx_dm != 1140 and nsr.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' left join dj_ygzsffxxxdjb ygz on nsr.djxh = ygz.djxh and ygz.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.ZGSWJ_DM, t.KQCCSZTDJBZ, t.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, t.ZCDZ, t.gdslx_dm, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.scjydz, t.ssdabh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.djzclx_DM, t.KZZTDJLX_DM, t.NSRZT_DM, t.scjydz, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zzjg_dm, kz.jyfw, p.pzsljglx_dm, p.pzsljg_dm, p.pzsljgmc, p.pzzmhwjh, p.zzlx_dm, p.zzhm, p.kyslrq, scjydzxzqhsz_dm, kz.bzfs_dm from dj_nsrxx t, dj_pzjgxx p, dj_nsrxx_kz kz where (t.kzztdjlx_dm in (1110,1120) or t.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%') and t.gdslx_dm = ? and t.djxh = p.djxh and t.djxh = kz.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.zzjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or p.zzlx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or p.zzhm = ?)

select YHYYWD_DM as code, YHYYWDMC as caption from dm_gy_yhyywd where yhhb_dm = ? and xzqhsz_dm in (select j.xzqhsz_dm from dm_gy_xzqh j start with j.xzqhsz_dm = ? connect by prior j.xzqhsz_dm = j.sjxzqhsz_dm and j.yxbz='Y' AND J.XYBZ='Y') and yxbz='Y' AND XYBZ='Y'

select uuid, djxh, slswsx_dm, lcslid, slr_dm, slrq, slswjg_dm, slyj, hzrq, hzr_dm, hzswjg_dm, xgslrqly, jbr, fzr, sqr, bsrxm, sqrq, sqly, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, bgrq_1 from dj_ysqywslxxb where lcslid=?
select b.* from TD_FXMX_JKTXB t,TD_FXMX_JKTX_DCXXB b where t.txxxsb_dm in ('0301','0302') and t.scsj > ? and t.fxmxxh = b.fxmxxh
select t.nsrztbguuid as uuid from dj_nsrztbgxxb t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxqz > ?
select fyhyuuid, djxh, xh, hy_dm, yxbz from dj_nsrfyhyxx_ks t where t.djxh=? and t.yxbz = ?

select djxh, zjgnsrsbh, zjgdjxh, zjgmc, zjgzcdz, zjgzcdzyzbm, '' zgswj_dm, '' zfjglx_dm, '' shxydm from dj_zjgxx z where z.djxh = ? and z.yxqq <=? and z.yxqz >=? and (z.zjgdjxh='0' or z.zjgdjxh is null) union all select n.djxh, n.nsrsbh zjgnsrsbh, z.zjgdjxh, n.nsrmc zjgmc, n.zcdz zjgzcdz, k.zcdyzbm zjgzcdzyzbm, n.zgswj_dm, k.zfjglx_dm, n.shxydm from dj_zjgxx z,dj_nsrxx n,dj_nsrxx_kz k where z.djxh = ? and z.zjgdjxh=n.djxh and z.zjgdjxh=k.djxh and z.yxqq <=? and z.yxqz >=? and n.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.tfyuuid,t.djxh,t.hztyqxq,t.hztyqxz,t.clfybz from dj_tfyxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.fyrq is null AND YXBZ='Y'
select pzjguuid , djxh , lcslid , pzsljglx_dm , pzsljg_dm , pzsljgmc , pzzmhwjh , zzlx_dm , zzhm , kyslrq , scjyqxq , scjyqxz , sjgsdq , lrr_dm from dj_pzjgxx p where p.djxh = ?
SELECT WJZUUID,GCXMBH,DJXH,WCJYHDSSGLZMBH,WCJYHDSSGLZMFFDW,YXBZ, LRR_DM,LRRQ,XGR_DM,XGRQ,SJGSDQ,JZYGCXMUUID FROM dj_jzyxmdj_wcjyhdssglzmxx WHERE GCXMBH = ? AND YXBZ = 'Y'

select t.fszsxm_dm, t.fszspm_dm, t.hzbz from cs_rd_zfsdzb t, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where t.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.zsxm_dm = ? and (t.zspm_dm = ? or t.zspm_dm = ?) and t.swjg_dm<>'00000000000'

SELECT td.TDSYBH,td.TDZLDZ,td.SSSWJG_DM,td.XZQHSZ_DM,td.JDXZ_DM,td.TDDJ_DM,td.TDZMJ, td.YXBZ,td.SJGSDQ,td.TDJBXXUUID,td.QH,qs.TDQSUUID,qs.DJXH,qs.TDSYZBH,qs.ZXLY, qs.YSCCCZFS_DM,qs.CZRQ,qs.ZXLCSLID,qs.ZXRQ,qs.TDSYZFZJGMC,qs.SYQSYXQQ,qs.SYQSYXQZ FROM dj_tdjbxx td, dj_tdqsxx qs WHERE td.tdjbxxuuid = qs.tdjbxxuuid AND td.yxbz = 'Y' AND qs.zxrq IS NULL AND qs.djxh = ?

select b.djxh,b.nsrsbh,b.nsrmc,b.fddbrxm,b.fddbrsfzjlx_dm,b.fddbrsfzjhm,b.djzclx_dm, b.hy_dm,b.dwlsgx_dm,b.zgswj_dm,b.zgswskfj_dm,b.nsrzt_dm,b.djrq from dj_nsrxx b where b.kzztdjlx_dm='1140' and b.shxydm=? and b.yxbz='Y'

select wcjyzmuuid, djxh, lcslid, wcjydxzqhsz_dm, wcjyd, swjgjg, zg, nh, wh, bylcslid, wcjyhdssglzmbh, swdjd, swdjdswjgyj, ywcjyhdssglzmbh, jyfsdmjh, jdxz_dm, swjgjbrxm, swjgjbrqzrq, swjgfzrxm, swjgfzrqzrq, wszzrq, zmyxqxq, zmyxqxz, wcjyhtzje, hxrq, hxlcslid, byrq, ywpzuuid, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx w where w.wcjyhdssglzmbh=? AND W.YXBZ='Y'
select rd.ssdcqyuuid, rd.lcslid, rd.djxh, rd.ssdcqylx_dm, rd.dcnd, rd.ssdabh, rd.qxrq, rd.yxbz from dj_ssdcqyrdxx rd, Dj_Ls_Djxhshxydm lsb where rd.djxh = lsb.djxh and rd.yxbz = ? and rd.dcnd = ?
SELECT THJUUID,GCXMBH,THJRQ,THJYY,GCJD,YJGJK,YNSKYYS,YNSKCJS,YNSKJYFFJ, FGRQ,YXBZ,LRR_DM,LRRQ,XGR_DM,XGRQ,SJGSDQ,JZYGCXMUUID FROM dj_jzyxmdj_thjjfgqk WHERE GCXMBH = ? AND YXBZ = ?
select c.sytdxxuuid, c.lcslid, c.tdsybh, c.xmbh, c.yxbz from dj_syglxmdj_tdxx c where c.yxbz = 'Y' and c.xmbh = ?
select max(bbh) maxbbh from yh_mscltcbbhdb t where t.bbh like ?

select t.uuid, t.djxh, t.dwzfbauuid, t.htxyhzfzbz_dm, t.htxyhzfpzzje, t.yzfje, t.yzfjebzsz_dm, t.bcfhje, t.bcfhjebzsz_dm, t.yjfhrq, t.yxbz, t.lrrq, t.htxyhzfpzzfbz from zm_fwmydwzfzm_htjezfxx t where t.dwzfbauuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.shxydm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydz, c.fzchrduuid, c.rdrq, a.nsrzt_dm, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx a, dj_fzchrdxx c where a.djxh = c.djxh and c.jcfzchrq is null and c.zxfzchrq is null and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.nsrzt_dm = '05' and c.rdrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select qc.qcuuid, qc.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zcdz, qc.yzgswskfj_dm, jg.swjgdz, jg.swjglxdh, qc.lrrq, qc.nfpzgswskfj_dm from dj_zgswskfjfp_nsrqc qc, dj_nsrxx nsr, dm_gy_swjg jg where qc.zgksfpqduuid =? and qc.yxbz = ? and qc.djxh =nsr.djxh and qc.nfpzgswskfj_dm = jg.swjg_dm and nsr.yxbz = ?
select jgssswjg_dm from gy_ws_wszb t where t.lcslid= ? and t.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and t.jgssswjg_dm is not null

select r.djxh, r.nsrsbh, r.nsrmc, r.fddbrxm, r.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, r.fddbrsfzjhm, r.zzjg_dm, r.shxydm, r.ssdabh, p.zzhm, p.zzlx_dm, s.scjydlxdh, s.scjydyzbm, r.scjydz, r.hy_dm, r.djzclx_dm, s.jyfw, r.jdxz_dm, r.dwlsgx_dm, r.zgswj_dm, r.zgswskfj_dm, r.djrq, s.bsrxm, r.djjg_dm, s.gjhdqsz_dm, r.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, s.szgjdqnsrsbh from dj_nsrxx r, dj_nsrxx_kz s, dj_pzjgxx p where r.djxh = s.djxh and s.djxh = p.djxh and r.nsrmc = ? and r.kzztdjlx_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or r.fddbrsfzjlx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or r.fddbrsfzjhm = ?) and exists (select 1 from dj_ls_djxhshxydm ls where (ls.swjg_dm = r.zgswj_dm or ls.swjg_dm = r.zgswskfj_dm))

select tdzzsxmuuid, djxh, tdzzsxmbh, tdzzsxmmc, jdxz_dm, xxdz, khyh, yhzh, xmjsqssj, xmjszzsj, zyscb, dwyscb, kftdzmj, kfjzzmj, fdczrhtmc, bz, xmszddfswjg_dm, zgswskfj_dm, xzqhsz_dm, tdzzsxmzt_dm,pgjg_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq from dj_tdzzsxmxx where tdzzsxmbh = ? and yxbz = 'Y'

select a.tdsyzbh, a.tdsyzfzjgmc, b.qh, b.tdsybh, b.tdzmj, b.tdzldz from dj_tdqsxx a,dj_tdjbxx b where a.tdjbxxuuid=b.tdjbxxuuid and b.yxbz='Y' and ? between a.syqsyxqq and a.syqsyxqz and a.zxrq is null and a.djxh=?

select t.qcuuid, t.djxh, t.clzt, t.txfwlb_dm, t.txzt, t.txfssj, t.clsj, t.scsj, t.sjtb_sj, n.ssgly_dm, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc from rd_yrdhyqwrdybnsrqc t , dj_nsrxx n where t.djxh = n.djxh and t.lrrq > ? and t.txzt = ? and t.clzt = ? and n.nsrzt_dm not in (#macroparam#) and n.ssgly_dm is not null
delete from dj_ls_drjynsrxx

select a.djxh, a.gdslx_dm, a.ssdabh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.shxydm, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.djjg_dm, a.djrq, a.zzjg_dm, a.kqccsztdjbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.sjgsdq, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.ssgly_dm, a.fjmqybz, a.swdjblbz from dj_nsrxx a where (a.nsrsbh = ? or a.shxydm = ?) and a.gdslx_dm = ? and a.yxbz = 'Y'
select b.fybh, b.fwqsuuid, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz,b.fyjbxxuuid from dj_fwqsxx b,dj_ls_fwqkdjxx a where a.fybh = b.fybh and b.syqsyxqz >=?
select tdzrxxuuid ,tdzzsxmuuid ,zrcx ,zrtdmj ,zrjzmj ,zrhtqdrq from dj_tdzzsxm_tdzrxx where tdzzsxmuuid = ? and yxbz = 'Y'

select hwuuid, bydjuuid, djxh, wcjyhwmc, wcjyhwsl, wcjyhwxsdd, wcjyhwyxqxq, wcjyhwyxqxz, wcjyhwzz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, yxbz, sjtb_sj, htbh from dj_wbnsrjydbydj_hwxx where bydjuuid = ? and yxbz = ?

select tdzzsxmuuid, djxh, tdzzsxmbh, tdzzsxmmc, jdxz_dm, xxdz, khyh, yhzh, xmjsqssj, xmjszzsj, zyscb, dwyscb, kftdzmj, kfjzzmj, fdczrhtmc, bz, xmszddfswjg_dm, zgswskfj_dm, xzqhsz_dm, tdzzsxmzt_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, qsssqq, qsssqz,pgjg_dm from dj_tdzzsxmxx where tdzzsxmbh = ? and yxbz = 'Y'
delete from dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh n
select distinct j.jxfx1_dmz1 code, j.jyfhbz, pm.zspmmc caption, pm.sl_1, pm.xybz from dm_kj_jygz j, dm_gy_zspm pm where j.jylx_dm = ? and j.jxfx1_dmz1 = pm.zspm_dm and pm.xybz = 'Y' and pm.yxbz = 'Y'

select HZQCUUID , DJXH , SWJG_DM, HZBZ_2, HZND, HZQXQ , HZQXZ , lrrq, yhclslid, HZRQ_2, SWZJZL_DM, SFCZBGXX, YWPZUUID , SFCZSWZJBGXX, SFYQ_1 from DJ_NSRHZQC q where q.djxh = ? and q.hzrq_2 is null and q.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select hznsuuid, djxh, lcslid, spwh, fwjg, zsxm_dm, ssswjg_dm, ywpzuuid, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, zstybz, zsrq, zsr_dm, sjtb_sj, zsrq_3, jbrxm, sqrq from rd_hznsqyrdsqspb t where t.hznsuuid =?
select t.jcqtzlqkuuid, t.tfyuuid, t.jcqtswzlmc, t.jcqtswzlsl, t.lhbz from dj_tysqxx_jcqtswzlqk t where t.djxh = ? and t.lhbz = 'N' and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select djxh, hjszd, jyfw, zcdlxdh, zcdyzbm, scjydlxdh, scjydyzbm, hsfs_dm, cyrs, wjcyrs, hhrs, ggrs, gdgrs, zzjglx_dm, kjzdzz_dm, wz, swdlrlxdh, swdlrdzxx, zczb, tzze, zrrtzbl, wztzbl, gytzbl, gykglx_dm, zfjglx_dm, bzfs_dm, fddbrgddh, fddbryddh, fddbrdzxx, cwfzrxm, cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, cwfzrsfzjhm, cwfzrgddh, cwfzryddh, cwfzrdzxx, bsrxm, bsrsfzjzl_dm, bsrsfzjhm, bsrgddh, bsryddh, bsrdzxx, lsswdjyxqq, lsswdjyxqz, swdlrnsrsbh, swdlrmc, whsyjsfjfxxdjbz, zzsjylb, yhsjnfs_dm, zsxmcxbz_dm, zzsqylx_dm, gjhdqsz_dm, ygznsrlx_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj, qyglcjbh, qyssjt_dm from dj_nsrxx_kz t where t.djxh = ?

select kz.djxh from dj_djhglgl g,dj_nsrxx_kz kz where g.djxh =kz.djxh and g.djxh=? and kz.hsfs_dm in(#macroparam#) and g.lb_dm=? and TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= g.yxqq and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <=g.yxqz

select b.bmduuid, b.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.shxydm, n.zgswj_dm, b.yxqq, b.yxqz, b.whr_dm, b.whrq, b.sjgsdq, b.yxbz, b.lrr_dm, b.lrrq, b.xgr_dm, b.xgrq, b.xgrq, b.sjtb_sj from DJ_BMDGL b, DJ_NSRXX n where ? = n.djxh and b.djxh = n.djxh and b.yxbz = 'Y' and n.yxbz = 'Y'

select ssdabh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, kzztdjlx_dm, djzclx_dm, fddbrxm, fddbrsfzjlx_dm, scjydz, fddbrsfzjhm, scjydzxzqhsz_dm, nsrzt_dm, hy_dm, zcdz, zcdzxzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, dwlsgx_dm, gdghlx_dm, zzjg_dm, hjszd, jyfw, zcdlxdh, zcdyzbm, scjydlxdh, scjydyzbm, hsfs_dm, cyrs, wjcyrs, hhrs, ggrs, gdgrs, zzjglx_dm, kjzdzz_dm, wz, swdlrlxdh, swdlrdzxx, zczb, tzze, zrrtzbl, wztzbl, gytzbl, gykglx_dm, zfjglx_dm, bzfs_dm, fddbrgddh, fddbryddh, fddbrdzxx, cwfzrxm, cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, cwfzrsfzjhm, cwfzrgddh, cwfzryddh, cwfzrdzxx, bsrxm, bsrsfzjzl_dm, bsrsfzjhm, bsrgddh, bsryddh, bsrdzxx, lsswdjyxqq, lsswdjyxqz, swdlrnsrsbh, swdlrmc, zzsjylb, gjhdqsz_dm, ygznsrlx_dm, zjgnsrsbh, zjgmc, zjgzcdz, zjgzcdzyzbm, yxqq, zjgfddbrxm, yxqz, zjglxdh, zjgjyfw, pzsljglx_dm, pzsljg_dm, pzsljgmc, pzzmhwjh, zzlx_dm, zzhm, kyslrq, scjyqxq, scjyqxz, lrrq, tyshxydm, nsrswjg, scztbh, xxczlx, globalbusinessid, xh, qfjg_dm, frzs, frzsyzbm, zcxs, hzrq from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.tyshxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and t.xxczlx = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.lrrq > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.lrrq < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and t.qfjg_dm is not null and t.kzztdjlx_dm = '1120' and not exists (select q.shxydm from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx q where q.xh_2 = t.xh and q.clbz = 'Y')

select distinct cs.zdsyhjkjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg, cs_gy_jgcjjgjcdzb dzb, CS_DJ_ZDSYJKJCDZB cs where jg.jgjc_dm = dzb.jgjc_dm and dzb.jgcj_dm = cs.jgcj_dm and dzb.yxbz = 'Y' and dzb.xybz = 'Y' and cs.yxbz = 'Y' and cs.xybz = 'Y' and jg.swjg_dm in (select decode(swjg.swjgbz, 0, swjg.swjg_dm, 1, swjg.sjswjg_dm) from dm_gy_swjg swjg where swjg.swjg_dm = ?)

select k.scjydlxdh, a.DJJG_DM, a.DJRQ, a.DJXH, a.DJZCLX_DM, a.DWLSGX_DM, a.FDDBRSFZJHM, a.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, a.FDDBRXM, a.FJMQYBZ, a.GDGHLX_DM, a.GDSLX_DM, a.HY_DM, a.JDXZ_DM, a.KQCCSZTDJBZ, a.KZZTDJLX_DM, a.LRRQ, a.LRR_DM, a.NSRMC, a.NSRSBH, a.NSRZT_DM, a.SCJYDZ, a.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, a.SJGSDQ, a.SJTB_SJ, a.SSDABH, a.SSGLY_DM, a.SWDJBLBZ, a.XGRQ, a.XGR_DM, a.ZCDZ, a.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, a.ZGSWJ_DM, a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, a.shxydm, a.ZZJG_DM from dj_nsrxx a, dj_nsrxx_kz k, dj_ls_lsnsrxxzhb ls where a.zzjg_dm = ls.sfzjhm and a.djxh = k.djxh and a.nsrzt_dm not in ('07', '10') and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.fczyz, b.djxh, b.fwcqzsh, b.syqsyxqz from dj_fyjbxx a, dj_fwqsxx b where a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.djxh=? and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) and not EXISTS (select 1 from dj_fyjbxx c, dj_fwqsxx d where c.fyjbxxuuid = d.fyjbxxuuid and d.syqsyxqz >= ? and c.yxbz = 'Y' and d.zxrq is null and (c.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (c.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (c.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) and a.fyjbxxuuid = c.fyjbxxuuid )
select t.lwuuid, t.wcjyzmuuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.wcjylwmc, t.wcjylwdd, t.wcjylwyxqxq, t.wcjylwyxqxz, t.wcjylwdhtje, t.yxbz, t.lrrq from zm_wcjyhdssglzm_lwxx t where t.wcjyzmuuid =? and t.yxbz = 'Y'
select swsx_dm,swsxmc from dm_gy_swsx t where t.slswsx_dm=? and t.yxbz='Y' and t.xybz='Y'
select zjjcuuid, djxh, lcslid, ffrq, yxqq, swzjzl_dm, yxqz, swzjhm, swzjglzt_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq from dj_nsrzjjcxx WHERE djxh=? AND swzjglzt_dm in(#macroparam#)
select NSRZGLX_DM, QXBZ, ZFBZ_1, YXQQ, YXQZ, SJZZRQ from (select * from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb order by lrrq desc) t where t.djxh = ? and rownum = 1

select mscxsquuid, djxh, lcslid, sqrq, mscxspsqrlx_dm, scqymc, cllb_dm_1, fdjhm, cp, xh_3, clsbdh, gzrq, jdcxstyfphm, clgzsmjstj_dm, lxdh, yzbm, dz, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, zygdzz, mslb_dm, clyt, zgswskfj_dm, cltpn, cltpw, fj_2, msmx_dm, clgzd, clhgzmhm, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, fp_dm, zstybz, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, hzbz_1, ywpzuuid, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1 from yh_clgzsmjssqspb t where t.zstybz='N' and t.cp=? and t.xh_3=?

select gl.glgluuid, nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrmc,nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.scjydz, kz.scjydlxdh, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm, gl.lb_dm, gl.yxqq, gl.yxqz, gl.lrrq, gl.lrr_dm, sz.lb_dm, sz.lbmc, sz.kjsm, sz.sxrq, sz.sxrq_2, sz.lbcj_dm, sz.szr_dm, sz.szswjg_dm, sz.szrq from dj_nsrxx_kz kz, (select GLGLUUID, DJXH, LB_DM, YXQQ, YXQZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ from dj_djhglgl glb where glb.lb_dm = ? and glb.yxqq < glb.yxqz and glb.yxqz > ?) gl, (select LB_DM, LBMC, LBCJ_DM, KJSM, SXRQ, SXRQ_2, SZR_DM, SZSWJG_DM, SZRQ, XYBZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ from dj_djhzdylbsz zs where zs.xybz = 'Y') sz, (select nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh,nsr.shxydm, nsr.gdslx_dm, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.scjydz from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where nsr.djxh = ls.djxh and nsr.yxbz='Y') nsr where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and nsr.djxh = gl.djxh(+) and gl.lb_dm = sz.lb_dm(+) and nsr.gdslx_dm = ?

select s.dkdjskqkuuid, s.djxh, s.dkdjdsdjzsxm_dm, s.dkdjdsdjskywnr, s.yxqq, s.yxqz, s.dkdjskqkuuid, s.kjskdjuuid from dj_kjskdjxx k, dj_dkdjdsdjskywqk s where k.djxh = ? and (k.zxbz = 'N' or k.zxbz is null) and k.kjskdjuuid = s.kjskdjuuid and s.yxqq <= ? and (s.yxqz >= ? or s.yxqz is null)

SELECT JZYGCXMUUID,LCSLID,DJXH,GCXMBH,GCXMMC,GCXMDZ,XZQHSZ_DM,JDXZ_DM,XMFZRXM,XMFZRLXDH, KGRQ,JGRQ,XMYT_DM,XMYS,JZMJ,JZYCBFS_DM,JSFDJXH,JZYFKFS_DM,JZYGLXS_DM,XMGLRQQ,XMSZDDFSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM,SSGLY_DM,ZXRQ,ZFBZ_1,ZFR_DM,ZFRQ_1,LRR_DM,LRRQ,XGR_DM,XGRQ,SJGSDQ,ZDXMBZ FROM dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb WHERE DJXH = ? AND GCXMBH = ?

select wtxysuuid, lcslid, wtfswjg_dm, wtdwdz, wtffddbr, hjszddz, xjzddz, xyqdrq, dzszjfj, dzfw, jsyjjsl, dzqxq, dzqxz, xyyxqq, xyyxqz, qtsx, mxsbbz_1, jzsqdkbz_1, dkfpzl, dkptfpdx, dkptfpnr, dkptfpxgzr, dkqxq, dkqxz, zzrq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, stfdjxh, wszg, WTDZXYZZYY_DM, sxfbljh, ggbz, ggr_dm, ggrq, zfbz_1, XSBDCHCZBDCDKFPBZ, jbjxqx, jbjxed from dj_wtxysxx where wtxysuuid = ?

select a.JZYGCXMUUID,a.LCSLID,a.DJXH,a.GCXMBH,a.GCXMMC,a.GCXMDZ,a.XZQHSZ_DM,a.JDXZ_DM,a.XMFZRXM,a.XMFZRLXDH, a.KGRQ,a.JGRQ,a.XMYT_DM,a.XMYS,a.JZMJ, a.JZYCBFS_DM,a.JSFDJXH,a.JZYFKFS_DM,a.JZYGLXS_DM,a.XMGLRQQ,a.XMSZDDFSWJG_DM,a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM,a.SSGLY_DM,a.ZXRQ, a.ZFBZ_1,a.ZFR_DM,a.ZFRQ_1,a.LRR_DM,a.LRRQ,a.XGR_DM,a.XGRQ,a.SJGSDQ from dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb a where a.djxh=? and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.zxrq is not null

select distinct jzy.djxh as xmbdjxh,jzy.gcxmbh,jzy.gcxmmc,jzy.gcxmdz from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx t, dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb jzy, dj_jzyxmdj_wcjyhdssglzmxx zm where t.djxh = ? and t.yxbz='Y' and t.byrq is not null and t.wcjyhdssglzmbh = zm.wcjyhdssglzmbh and zm.yxbz = 'Y' and jzy.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.zmyxqxq < = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.zmyxqxz >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and zm.jzygcxmuuid = jzy.jzygcxmuuid

select yhpzuuid, djxh, lcslid, jmsspsx_dm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, jmxmdl_dm, jmxmxl_dm, jmwj_dm, jmlx_dm, jmfs_dm, jmzlx_dm, jmqxq, jmqxz, ssjmxzhz_dm, ssjmxzdl_dm, ssjmxzxl_dm, jzfd, jzsl, jzed, sjjzrq, wszg, yxbz, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1,ssjmsblm_dm from yh_jmsspjg t where t.djxh=? and jmsspsx_dm=? and t.yxbz='Y' and zfbz_1='N' and t.sjjzrq>=t.jmqxq

SELECT B.SFXXBGBUUID, B.FJMXSSSXDDYSBLX_DM, B.SYSSXDTK_DM, B.DJXH, B.KJDJXH, B.HTBH, B.FJMNSRZZGLXDZ, B.FJMNSRZZGYZBM, B.FJMNSRZZGLXDH, B.FJMNSRZJMGMC, B.FJMNSRZJMGNSRSBH, B.FJMNSRZJMGLXDZ, B.FJMNSRZJMGYZBM, B.FJMNSRZJMGLXDH, B.FJMNSRJMG_DM, B.FJMNSRZCD_DM, B.FJMNSRSJGLJGSZD_DM, B.FJMNSRZJGSZD_DM, B.FJMNSRZJMGZYJYHDNR, B.FJMNSRXSSSXDMC, B.FJMNSRZDYDFDZZLXSM, B.GCDYDFSSJMDDYDFGNFLYJ, B.GCDYDFSSJMDSSQK, B.GCZGSSJMBZ, B.HGCNXGJSSJM, B.SFFHXGTKSM, B.BZ, B.KJRJBR, B.ZJJGJBR, B.SLR_DM, B.TBRQ, B.SBRQ, B.SLRQ, B.SJGSDQ, B.LRR_DM, B.LRRQ, B.XGR_DM, B.XGRQ, B.SJTB_SJ, B.JZSL, B.YXQQ, B.YXQZ, B.SSJMXZHZ_DM, B.SSJMXZDL_DM, B.SSJMXZXL_DM, B.YXBZ, B.FJMNSRZDYDFZZLX_DM FROM YH_FJMNSRSSJMSFXXBGB B WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR B.SFXXBGBUUID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR B.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR B.KJDJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR B.HTBH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR B.SYSSXDTK_DM = ?) AND B.YXBZ = 'Y' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TO_DATE(to_char(B.YXQQ,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and TO_DATE(to_char(B.YXQZ,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))

SELECT dj.djxh FROM zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx zm, dj_wbnsrjydbydj dj WHERE zm.bylcslid = dj.lcslid AND zm.wcjyzmuuid = dj.wcjyzmuuid AND zm.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND zm.djxh = ? AND zm.zmyxqxq <= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND zm.zmyxqxz >= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and (dj.zfbz_1 = 'N' or dj.zfbz_1 is null) and zm.yxbz = 'Y' and dj.yxbz = 'Y'

select uuid , djxh , pzzl_dm , pzzg , pzhm, businesscontent, zfbz_1, zfrq_1, zfr_dm , lrrq , lrr_dm ,bkbz from zm_sswszmkjxx z where z.djxh=? and z.pzzl_dm=? and z.pzzg=? and z.pzhm=? and z.zfbz_1='N'

select t.zxjzyuuid, t.xmuuid, t.lcslid, t.gcxmbh, t.djxh, t.gcjshzwh, t.jggcjk, t.xmwgrq, t.xmgljsrq, t.bz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.zfbz_1, t.zfrq_1, t.zfr_dm from DJ_ZXJZYXMDJXX t where xmuuid= ? and (zfbz_1='N' or zfbz_1 is null)

select t.wcjyhwmc, t.hwxssl, t.hwxse, t.xshwjnsk, t.xshwsyfp_dm, t.xshwsyfpfs, t.xshwsyfpqshm, t.xshwsyfpzzhm, t.xshwsyfpzl_dm, t.yjskzsl, t.yyjskje, t.sjhtje, t.kjfpjezk, t.kjfpjedk, t.ybyjskje from dj_wcjyhdqksbbxx_hwxx t where t.wcjyhdqksbuuid = ?

select bydjuuid, wcjyzmuuid, djxh, lcslid, wcjyhdssglzmbh, swdjd, wcjyd, wcjyhtzje, swdjdswjgyj, wcjydswjgyj, wcjyhdssglzmyxqxq, wcjyhdssglzmyxqxz, wcjyhdssglzmqfrq, bsrxm, lxdh, sqrq, bysj, sblcslid, ywcjyhdssglzmbh, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, jyfsdmjh from dj_wbnsrjydbydj t where t.djxh = ? and (t.bydjuuid = ? or 1 = ?) and (t.zfbz_1 = 'N' or t.zfbz_1 is null) and t.sblcslid is null and t.yxbz = 'Y' and not exists (select 1 from dj_wbnsrjydsbcyhwxx a where a.bydjuuid = t.bydjuuid)

select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid, b.tdqsuuid, b.djxh, b.tdsyzbh, b.zxly, b.ysccczfs_dm, b.czrq, b.zxlcslid, b.zxrq, b.tdsyzfzjgmc, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz from dj_tdjbxx a, dj_tdqsxx b where a.tdjbxxuuid = b.tdjbxxuuid and b.syqsyxqq <= ? and b.syqsyxqz >= ? and a.yxbz='Y' and b.zxrq is null and (b.djxh = ? or 1 = #macroparam#) and (a.tdsybh = ? or 1 = #macroparam#) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = #macroparam#) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = #macroparam#) and (a.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=#macroparam#)

select T.RDPZUUID, T.ZFSBZ, T.RDZSUUID, T.DJXH, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.RDYXQQ, T.RDYXQZ, T.HY_DM, T.SBQX_DM, T.NSQX_DM, T.JKQX_DM, T.SLHDWSE,
T.YSKM_DM, T.YSFPBL_DM, T.SKGK_DM, T.ZSDLFS_DM, T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSL, T.YXBZ, T.LRRQ, T.Gfjbjg_Dm, T.Zsxmcxbz_Dm, T.Jfjc_Dm from rd_sfzrdxxb t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.rdyxqz > t.rdyxqq and t.djxh = ?

select wcjyhdqksbuuid, lcslid, djxh, wcjyhdssglzmbh, sjjyqjq, sjjyqjz, ddrq, bysj, jydz, hwcfdd, swjgyj, shswjg_dm, shr_dm, shrq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, bydjuuid, sjtb_sj, zfbz_1, zfrq_1, zfr_dm, ysbbz from dj_wcjyhdqksbbxx t where t.wcjyhdqksbuuid = ?
select ydghuuid, bdcxmbh, jsydghxkzbh, jsydghxkzfzjgmc, ydwz, ydmj, yxbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, bdcxmuuid from dj_bdcxmdj_ydghxx where yxbz='Y' and bdcxmbh=?
select UUID , YDDJXH , MBDDJXH , NSRDZGXLB_DM , YXBZ from DJ_DJZTGXDZB m where m.yddjxh=? and m.yxbz='Y'

select a.uuid, a.djxh, a.tzfhhhrzjzl_dm, a.tzfhhhrzjhm, a.tzfhhhrmc, a.tzfjjxz_dm, a.tzbl, a.gjhdqsz_dm, a.dz, a.yxqq, a.tzje, a.yxqz, a.fpbl, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.sjgsdq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq from dj_tzfxx a where a.djxh = ? and a.yxqq <= ? and a.yxqz >= ?

select gl.glgluuid, nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.scjydz, kz.scjydlxdh, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm, gl.lb_dm, gl.yxqq, gl.yxqz, gl.lrrq, gl.lrr_dm, sz.lb_dm, sz.lbmc, sz.kjsm, sz.sxrq, sz.sxrq_2, sz.lbcj_dm, sz.szr_dm, sz.szswjg_dm, sz.szrq from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, dj_djhglgl gl, dj_djhzdylbsz sz where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and nsr.djxh = gl.djxh and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and gl.lb_dm = sz.lb_dm and sz.xybz = 'Y' and gl.yxqq < gl.yxqz and gl.yxqz > = ? and nsr.gdslx_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or gl.lb_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrzt_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.jdxz_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.zgswj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.zgswj_dm is null) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.zgswskfj_dm is null) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.ssgly_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.ssgly_dm is null) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.hy_dm in ( select h.hy_dm from dm_gy_hy h where h.xlbz = 'Y' and h.xybz = 'Y' and h.yxbz = 'Y' start with h.hy_dm = ? connect by prior h.hy_dm = h.sjhy_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.djzclx_dm in (select d.djzclx_dm from dm_dj_djzclx d where d.xlbz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xlbz = 'Y' start with d.djzclx_dm = ? connect by prior d.djzclx_dm = d.sjdjzclx_dm)) and rownum < = 2000

select b.xh,b.p_xh,b.tyshxydm,b.zzhm,b.bgdjtzswh,b.bgxm,b.bgrq,b.bgqnr,b.bghnr from wbjh_cj_sj_bgxx b where b.tyshxydm = ? and b.zzhm = ? and not exists (select q.xh_2 from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx q where b.xh = q.xh_2 and q.zybgbz is not null)

select n.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.shxydm, n.nsrmc, n.scjydz, n.djzclx_dm, p.pzsljg_dm, n.fddbrsfzjhm, n.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, n.fddbrxm, kz.jyfw, ZCDZ, p.pzsljgmc, n.Kzztdjlx_Dm, kz.LSSWDJYXQQ, kz.LSSWDJYXQZ from dj_nsrxx n, dj_pzjgxx p,dj_nsrxx_kz kz where p.djxh = n.djxh and n.djxh=kz.djxh and n.djxh=? and n.yxbz='Y'

select distinct j.jxfx2_dmz1 code, j.jyfhbz, pm.zspmmc caption, pm.sl_1, pm.xybz, pm.zsl from dm_kj_jygz j, dm_gy_zspm pm where j.jylx_dm = ? and j.jxfx1_dmz1 in (#macroparam#) and j.jxfx2_dmz1 = pm.zspm_dm(+) and j.swjg_dm =? and pm.yxbz = 'Y' and pm.xybz = 'Y'
select t.ssjmxz_dm,t.zspm_dm from CS_GY_SSJMXZZSPMDZB t where ? like t.zspm_dm and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y'

select t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.scjydz, t.ssdabh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, djzclx_DM, KZZTDJLX_DM, NSRZT_DM, t.scjydz, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zzjg_dm, kz.jyfw, p.pzsljglx_dm, p.pzsljg_dm, p.pzsljgmc, p.pzzmhwjh, p.zzlx_dm, p.zzhm, p.kyslrq, scjydzxzqhsz_dm , kz.bzfs_dm from dj_nsrxx t, dj_pzjgxx p ,dj_nsrxx_kz kz where t.kzztdjlx_dm like ? AND t.nsrmc=? and t.gdslx_dm =? and t.zgswj_dm in ( #macroparam# ) and t.djxh = p.djxh and t.djxh=kz.djxh AND t.yxbz='Y' and t.nsrzt_dm !='07' AND t.zzjg_dm=?

select bamxuuid, djxh, lcslid, zspm_dm, zmhm, hphm, cpxh_1, clsbdh, fdjhm, cbmc, cbsbh, jzed, jzfd, jzsl, jmqxq, jmqxz, nynse, njmse, dybz, yhpzuuid from yh_clcbjmbaxx t where ( clsbdh = ? or cbsbh = ? ) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and ( jmqxq <= to_date( ? , 'yyyy-mm-dd') ) and ( to_date( ?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= decode( t.sjjzrq, '',t.jmqxz, t.sjjzrq ) )

select a.zszm_dm code, a.zszmmc caption, b.swjg_dm, b.sl_1, b.dgbz, b.yxqz, b.yxqq from dm_gy_zszm a, cs_gy_glb_zszm b where a.zspm_dm = ? and a.zszm_dm = b.zszm_dm and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y' and b.swjg_dm = ? and b.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.yxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.swjg_dm != '00000000000'

select a.dwse,a.tddj_dm,b.tddjmc,b.sjtddj_dm,a.yxqq,a.yxqz from cs_dj_tddwseszb a,dm_dj_tddj b where a.xzqhsz_dm =? and a.yxqq <= a.yxqz and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and (a.jdxz_dm =? or a.jdxz_dm is null) and a.tddj_dm = b.tddj_dm and b.xybz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y'
select dwjzxxuuid, bdcxmbh, jzyxsbh, szfdjxh, yxbz, lrr_dm, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, bdcxmuuid, szfnsrsbh, szfnsrmc from dj_bdcxmdj_dwjzxx where yxbz='Y' and bdcxmbh = ?
select t.* from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb t where t.djxh = ?

select zspm_dm code, zspmmc caption, sl from (select t.zspm_dm, t.zspmmc, t.jldw_dm, t.sl_1 sl, t.yxbz, t.xybz from dm_gy_zspm t connect by prior t.zspm_dm = t.sjzspm_dm start with t.zspm_dm = ?)where xybz= 'Y' and yxbz='Y'
select LB_DM , LBMC , LBCJ_DM , KJSM , SXRQ, SXRQ_2, SZR_DM , SZSWJG_DM , SZRQ , XYBZ from dj_djhzdylbsz t where t.xybz='Y'

select ls.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.shxydm, n.nsrmc from rd_jbzqrdjgb j, dj_ls_djxhandssq ls, dj_nsrxx n where j.djxh = ls.djxh and ls.djxh = n.djxh and ls.ssqq <= j.yxqz and ls.ssqz >= j.yxqq and (ls.uuid is null or j.uuid <> ls.uuid) and n.yxbz = 'Y' and j.zfbz_1 = 'N' and j.yxqq<j.yxqz

select sp.djxh, mx.jmsspsx_dm, mx.zsxm_dm, mx.zspm_dm, mx.jmzlx_dm, mx.jmlx_dm, mx.jmfs_dm, mx.ssjmxzhz_dm, jg.jmqxq, jg.jmqxz, jg.sjjzrq from yh_jmssqspb sp, yh_jmssqspb_mx mx, yh_jmsspjg jg where sp.lcslid = ? and sp.lcslid = mx.lcslid and sp.lcslid = jg.lcslid
select DKDJSKQKUUID , KJSKDJUUID , DJXH , DKDJDSDJSKYWNR, DKDJDSDJZSXM_DM, YXQQ, YXQZ from dj_dkdjdsdjskywqk a where a.djxh = ? and a.yxqq <= ?
SELECT GZJHUUID,LCSLID,BSDW,BASWJG_DM,LRRQ,LRR_DM,XGRQ, XGR_DM,SJGSDQ,BSRQ_1 FROM DJ_CSGJQYGGQDCLGZJH WHERE BASWJG_DM = ? AND BSRQ_1 >= ? AND BSRQ_1 <= ? AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select t.msmx_dm,t.msmxmc,t.zygdzz from cs_yh_zygdzzdzb t
SELECT TFYUUID,TYLCSLID,FYLCSLID,DJXH,HZTYQXQ,HZTYQXZ,FYRQ, CLTYBZ,CLFYBZ,LRR_DM,LRRQ,XGR_DM,XGRQ,SJGSDQ,YXBZ FROM dj_tfyxx WHERE djxh = ? AND YXBZ='Y'

select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid, b.djxh, b.tdsyzbh, b.tdsyzfzjgmc, b.syqsyxqz from dj_tdjbxx a, dj_tdqsxx b where a.tdjbxxuuid = b.tdjbxxuuid(+) and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.tdsybh = ? and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) and not EXISTS (select 1 from dj_tdjbxx c, dj_tdqsxx d where c.tdjbxxuuid = d.tdjbxxuuid and d.syqsyxqz >= ? and c.yxbz = 'Y' and d.zxrq is null and c.tdsybh = ? and (c.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (c.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (c.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) and a.tdjbxxuuid = b.tdjbxxuuid )

select zguuid, djxh, bh, zgxm, xb_dm, sfzjlx_dm, sfzjhm, gljgbz, ltxrybz, sxsyhrybz, xsssyhlx_dm, xsssyhzjlx_dm, xsssyhzjhm, ldhtzh, ldhtqsrq, ldhtjsrq, shbxfzh, cjrlb_dm, bz, yxbz from yh_zgmc a where a.djxh = ? And a.ldhtqsrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.ldhtjsrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and a.SXSYHRYBZ = 'Y' and a.xsssyhzjlx_dm in (#macroparam#)

with ysq as (select uuid, djxh, slswsx_dm, lcslid, slr_dm, slrq, slswjg_dm, slyj, hzrq, hzr_dm, hzswjg_dm, xgslrqly, jbr, fzr, sqr, bsrxm, sqrq, sqly, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, bgrq_1 from dj_ysqywslxxb where djxh = ? and slswsx_dm = ? order by lrrq desc) select * from ysq where rownum = 1
select t.bydjuuid, t.wcjyzmuuid, t.sblcslid, t.wcjyhdssglzmbh, t.djxh, t.jyfsdmjh jyfs_dm, t.kjswjg_dm from dj_wbnsrjydbydj t where t.wcjyhdssglzmbh = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N') = ? and t.yxbz = ?
select t.ssjmxz_dm, t.ssjmxzmc, t.yxqq, t.yxqz from dm_gy_ssjmxz t where t.ssjmxz_dm = ?

select t.tdsyqkuuid, t.djxh, t.tdsybh, t.fwtddjlx_dm, t.tdmj, t.mstdmj, t.ystdmj, t.dwse, t.nynse, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.nsqx_dm, t.sbqx_dm, t.jkqx_dm, t.yskm_dm, t.ysfpbl_dm, t.skgk_dm, t.zscztdsysbz, t.bz, t.sjgsdq, t.lcslid, t.zspm_dm, t.tdjbxxuuid, td.tdzldz, td.ssswjg_dm, td.xzqhsz_dm, td.jdxz_dm, td.tddj_dm, td.tdzmj, td.yxbz, td.qh, td.tdjbxxuuid, n.nsrsbh, n.shxydm, n.nsrmc, n.hy_dm, n.djzclx_dm, n.nsrzt_dm from dj_tdsyqkdjxx t, dj_tdjbxx td,dj_nsrxx n where t.tdsybh = td.tdsybh and t.djxh = n.djxh(+) and td.yxbz = 'Y' and ? >= t.yxqq and ? <= t.yxqz AND t.yxqq < t.yxqz and t.pkbz = 'Y' and td.ssswjg_dm =? and (n.yxbz='Y' OR n.yxbz is null)

select t.kyslrq, t.qfjg_dm as rgqfswjg_dm, t.xxczlx, t.xh, t.tyshxydm, t.nsrmc, t.lrrq, t.scjydz from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx t where (1 = ? or t.tyshxydm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.nsrmc like ?) and t.xxczlx = ? and t.lrrq > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.lrrq < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and(1 = ? or t.qfjg_dm is null) and(1 = ? or t.kzztdjlx_dm = ?) and(1 = ? or t.kzztdjlx_dm != ? or t.kzztdjlx_dm is null)

select b.hznsmxuuid,b.hznsuuid,b.lcslid,b.djxh,b.zsxm_dm,b.bhznsrsfsqbz,b.bhzrdjxh, b.bhznsqynsrsbh,b.bhznsqynsrmc,b.sbjnfs_dm,b.yzl,b.desl_1,b.bhznsrynsms,b.hznsyxqq,b.hznsyxqz,b.bhznsqydz, b.bhznsqydjzclx_dm,b.bhznsqysysl,b.bhznsqysfwfzjgbz,b.hznsfw_dm,b.sjgsdq from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb b where b.hznsuuid=? and b.yxbz='Y'

select t.zxuuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.zxyy_dm, t.sfbxsf, t.xdjxh, t.zxyysm, t.scjydz, t.qddzgswjg_dm, t.pzjgmc, t.pzwh, t.pzrq, t.spjg, t.zxrq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sfqyqjsj, t.sfqydjsk, t.sfqycktszg, t.hbfllx_dm, t.qddscjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.slrq, t.zfbz_1 from dj_zxswdjsq t where t.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N') and (1 = #macroparam# or t.spjg = ?)
select uuid, rduuid, dz, yzbm, lxdh, xgbmbz, yxbz, bmmc from rd_jwzczzgl_xgbmxx t where t.rduuid =? and t.yxbz='Y'
SELECT SJQTZLUUID, ZXUUID , DJXH , LCSLID , SJQTSWZLZL, SJQTSWZLSL FROM dj_zxswdjsq_sjqtswzlqk q WHERE q.lcslid=? and q.yxbz='Y'

select d.slyszuuid,d.dkbauuid,d.slyszhm,d.cblx_dm_1,d.cblxmc_1,d.cbpzhm, d.cbdw,d.yxbz,d.lrr_dm,d.lrrq,d.xgr_dm,d.xgrq,d.sjgsdq,d.sjtb_sj from dj_hwysxgmdkzzsfp_slyszxx d where d.dkbauuid = ? and d.yxbz='Y'
select t.wcjyzmuuid,t.djxh,t.lcslid from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx t where t.wcjyzmuuid=? AND t.yxbz='Y'

select b.lrrq,b.hznsuuid,b.djxh,b.lcslid,b.spwh,b.fwjg,b.zsxm_dm,b.ssswjg_dm, b.ywpzuuid,b.sjgsdq,b.zsrq,b.zsr_dm from (select a.lrrq,a.hznsuuid,a.djxh,a.lcslid,a.spwh,a.fwjg,a.zsxm_dm,a.ssswjg_dm, a.ywpzuuid,a.sjgsdq,a.zsrq,a.zsr_dm from RD_HZNSQYRDSQSPB a where a.djxh=? and a.zsxm_dm=? and a.zfbz_1='N' and a.zstybz='Y' order by a.lrrq+1 desc) b where rownum =1

select n.nsrsbh,n.shxydm,n.nsrmc,z.zjdjnbs from dj_hznsqyxxbab h, dj_hznsqyxxbab_syjgxx s, dj_nsrxx n, (select a.djxh as syjdjxh, b.Xyjjgdjxh as xyjdjxh,b.jdjnbs zjdjnbs,a.yxqq zyxqq,a.yxqz zyxqz from dj_hznsqyxxbab a, dj_hznsqyxxbab_xyjgxx b where a.hznsuuid = b.hznsuuid and (a.zfbz_1 is null or a.zfbz_1 != 'Y')and b.yxbz='Y' and b.xyjjgdjxh=?) z where H.HZNSUUID = S.HZNSUUID and s.Syjjgdjxh = z.syjdjxh and h.djxh = z.xyjdjxh and s.syjjgdjxh = n.djxh and h.jdjnbs!=z.zjdjnbs and (h.zfbz_1 is null or h.zfbz_1 != 'Y') and h.yxqq<=z.zyxqz and h.yxqz>=z.zyxqq and h.hznsuuid=? and h.djxh =?
update zm_sswszmkjxx set zfbz_1 = ?, zfr_dm = ?, zfrq_1 = to_Date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD'), xgrq = to_Date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') where djxh = ? and pzzl_dm = ? and pzzg = ? and pzhm = ?
SELECT t.wcjyzmuuid,t.wcjyhdssglzmbh, t.djxh , t.byddjxh FROM Dj_Wcjyhdssglzm_Fkb t WHERE t.wcjyzmuuid=?

select dwse, t.yxqq, t.yxqz,jdxz_dm from cs_dj_tddwseszb t where t.tddj_dm = ? and t.xzqhsz_dm=? and (t.jdxz_dm =? or t.jdxz_dm is null) and (1 =? OR (t.yxqq <= ? and t.yxqz >= ? )) and t.yxqq <= t.yxqz and t.yxqz >= ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz ='Y'

select a.djxh, a.gdslx_dm, a.ssdabh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.djjg_dm, a.djrq, a.zzjg_dm, a.kqccsztdjbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.ssgly_dm, a.fjmqybz, a.swdjblbz, a.sjtb_sj, a.nsrbm, a.yxbz, a.shxydm from dj_nsrxx a where a.djxh = ? and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.uuid, t.sfxxbgbuuid, d.flzlmc, d.flzl_dm, t.fbzluuid, t.djxh, t.kjdjxh, t.tjrq_1, t.yxbz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj from YH_FJMNSRXSSSXDBGB_TJZL t, YH_FJMNSRXSSSXDBGB_TJZLQD d where t.fbzluuid = d.fbzluuid and t.sfxxbgbuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select b.UUID, b.BZRQYDJXH, b.BZRQYNSRSBH, b.BZRQYMC, b.BZRQYDZ, b.BZRQYLXR, b.BZRQYLXDH, b.BZRQYSZDZGSWJG, b.SRFDJXH, b.SRFNSRSBH, b.SRFMC, b.SRFDZ, b.SRFLXR, b.SRFLXDH, b.SRFSSGJDQ, b.SRFJNSZDZGSWJG, b.ZRFDJXH, b.ZRFNSRSBH, b.ZRFMC, b.ZRFSSGJDQ, b.SY59HWDQTDQX, b.ZRFCYDGFZBZRQYQBGFDBL, b.SRFGQZFJEZJYZFZEDBL, b.GQZRJYZFZE, b.GQZRJYZFZEZGQZFJE, b.GQZRHTHXYSXSJ, b.BZRQYGSDJBGRQ, b.ZRFBZ from RD_QYFHTSXSWCLGDTJKJCZRDB b where b.srfdjxh = ? and (b.zfbz_1 is null or b.zfbz_1 = 'N')

select nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.scjydz,nsr.shxydm from dj_nsrxx nsr where not exists (select 1 from dj_nsryzqc qc where qc.swjg_dm = ? and qc.yznd = ? and qc.zfbz_1 = 'N' and qc.djxh = nsr.djxh and qc.yzrq is null) and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and nsr.zgswj_dm = ? and nsr.gdslx_dm = ? and (nsr.kzztdjlx_dm = ? or nsr.kzztdjlx_dm like ?) and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and (1=? or nsr.djrq >to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=? or nsr.djrq <to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=? or nsr.nsrzt_dm=?) and (1=? or nsr.zgswskfj_dm=?)

select t.nxsxduuid, t.ssjmsfzmuuid, t.nxsxdmc_1, t.nxsxdtk, t.nsxzdsrje, t.yjjmsje, t.yxbz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq from zm_zgsszmsfzm_xsxdxx t where t.yxbz='Y' and t.ssjmsfzmuuid=?

select tzfhhhrzjzl_dm, tzfhhhrzjhm, tzfhhhrmc, tzfjjxz_dm, tzbl, gjhdqsz_dm, dz, yxqq, tzje, yxqz, fpbl, zzhm, SCZTBH from wbjh_cj_sj_tzfxx t where (1 = #macroparam# or zzhm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or scztbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or xh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or p_xh = ?) and (to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') between t.yxqq and t.yxqz or t.yxqq is null or t.yxqz is null)

select t.wcjyzmuuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.wcjydxzqhsz_dm, t.bylcslid, t.wcjyhdssglzmbh, t.swjgjg, t.swdjdswjgyj, t.ywcjyhdssglzmbh, t.jyfsdmjh, t.jdxz_dm, t.swjgjbrxm, t.swjgjbrqzrq, t.swjgfzrxm, t.swjgfzrqzrq, t.wszzrq, t.zmyxqxq, t.zmyxqxz, t.wcjyhtzje, t.hxrq, t.hxlcslid, t.byrq, t.ywpzuuid, t.jydswjg_dm, t.jydswjgmc, t.dzwgzbz, t.wcjyhdssglzmffdw, t.swdjd, t.wcjyd from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx t where t.djxh = ? and hxrq is not null and zfbz_1 = 'N' AND T.YXBZ='Y'
select squuid, ssxdqyuuid, lcslid, djxh, gljydfmc, szd, zfje, yxbz, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, gljylx_dm from rd_ssxddysp_qyjyzfqk where lcslid=? and yxbz='Y'
select ssxduuid, lcslid, djxh, ztbz, cxbz, qxbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq from rd_fjmxsssxddyjgb where djxh=? and yxbz ='Y'
Select t.yspzfjlsh,t.yspzywzj_2 from WBJH_YSPZ_FJSJB t Where t.yspzywzj_2 In (#macroparam#)
select t.* from yh_clcbjmbaxx t where t.yhpzuuid = ?
select fyhyuuid, djxh, xh, hy_dm, yxbz from dj_nsrfyhyxx t where t.djxh=? and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.cydwuuid, t.qyjtdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.zlcslid, t.qyjtuuid, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, t.sfqyjtcydw, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.rdswjg_dm, t.sfxycydwqrbz, t.cydwqrbz, t.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.shxydm, n.scjydz, '' zgswjgmc, n.zgswj_dm, n.zgswskfj_dm, q.ssdq, q.qyssjt_dm from dj_qyjtjqcydwrd_cydwxx t, dj_nsrxx n,DJ_QYSSJT q where t.qyjtuuid = q.qyjtuuid and q.jtdjxh = n.djxh AND N.YXBZ='Y' and n.djxh != 0 and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and q.yxbz='Y' and q.xybz = 'Y' and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.yxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz and t.zlcslid= ? union all select t.cydwuuid, t.qyjtdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.zlcslid, t.qyjtuuid, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, t.sfqyjtcydw, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.rdswjg_dm, t.sfxycydwqrbz, t.cydwqrbz, t.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.shxydm, n.scjydz, '' zgswjgmc, n.zgswj_dm, n.zgswskfj_dm, '' ssdq, '' qyssjt_dm from dj_qyjtjqcydwrd_cydwxx t, dj_nsrxx n where t.djxh = n.djxh AND n.yxbz='Y' and t.qyjtuuid is null and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.yxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz and t.zlcslid= ?
select distinct t.zspm_dm from dj_clqkxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxqz >= ? and t.zxrq is null
select squuid, djxh, lcslid, hdslid, qddybscjysrrq, balx_dm, jmsxmfbhsbz, schlnd, jmyjsfzq, jmfdsfhl, ywpzuuid, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1 from yh_jmssqspb t where t.djxh=? and t.lcslid=?

select hwuuid, wcjyhdqksbuuid, lcslid, wcjyhwmc, hwxssl, hwxse, xshwjnsk, xshwsyfp_dm, xshwsyfpfs, xshwsyfpqshm, xshwsyfpzzhm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, xshwsyfpzl_dm, djxh, sjtb_sj, fpzlmc, yjskzsl, yyjskje, sjhtje, kjfpjezk, kjfpjedk, ybyjskje, htbh, zsxm_dm, fkswjgmc, fkswjg_dm, zfbz_1, zfrq_1, zfr_dm from dj_wcjyhdqksbbxx_hwxx where wcjyhdqksbuuid = ?

SELECT jb.TDSYBH,jb.TDZLDZ,jb.SSSWJG_DM,jb.XZQHSZ_DM,jb.JDXZ_DM,jb.TDDJ_DM,jb.TDZMJ, jb.SJGSDQ,jb.QH,jb.TDJBXXUUID,sy.TDSYQKUUID,sy.DJXH,sy.FWTDDJLX_DM,sy.TDMJ, sy.MSTDMJ,sy.YSTDMJ,sy.DWSE,sy.NYNSE,sy.YXQQ,sy.YXQZ,sy.NSQX_DM,sy.SBQX_DM, sy.JKQX_DM,sy.YSKM_DM,sy.YSFPBL_DM,sy.SKGK_DM,sy.ZSCZTDSYSBZ,sy.BZ,sy.LCSLID, sy.ZSPM_DM,sy.TDJBXXUUID,sy.TDCZRMC,sy.TDCZRSFZJHM,sy.CZRSFZJZL_DM FROM dj_tdjbxx jb, dj_tdsyqkdjxx sy WHERE jb.tdjbxxuuid = sy.tdjbxxuuid AND jb.yxbz = 'Y' AND sy.yxqq <= ? AND sy.yxqz >= ? AND sy.djxh = ?
select a.djxh,b.csggjtglbmmc from dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh a, dj_csggjtglbmycsgjqyml b where a.djxh = b.djxh

SELECT jb.DJXH, jb.GDSLX_DM, jb.SSDABH, jb.NSRSBH, jb.shxydm, jb.NSRMC, jb.KZZTDJLX_DM, jb.DJZCLX_DM, jb.FDDBRXM, jb.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, jb.SCJYDZ, jb.FDDBRSFZJHM, jb.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, jb.NSRZT_DM, jb.HY_DM, jb.ZCDZ, jb.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, jb.JDXZ_DM, jb.DWLSGX_DM, jb.GDGHLX_DM, jb.DJJG_DM, jb.DJRQ, jb.ZZJG_DM, jb.KQCCSZTDJBZ, jb.ZGSWJ_DM, jb.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, jb.SSGLY_DM, jb.FJMQYBZ, jb.SWDJBLBZ, kz.HJSZD, kz.JYFW, kz.ZCDLXDH, kz.ZCDYZBM, kz.SCJYDLXDH, kz.SCJYDYZBM, kz.HSFS_DM, kz.CYRS, kz.WJCYRS, kz.HHRS, kz.GGRS, kz.GDGRS, kz.ZZJGLX_DM, kz.KJZDZZ_DM, kz.WZ, kz.SWDLRLXDH, kz.SWDLRDZXX, kz.ZCZB, kz.TZZE, kz.ZRRTZBL, kz.WZTZBL, kz.GYTZBL, kz.GYKGLX_DM, kz.ZFJGLX_DM, kz.BZFS_DM, kz.FDDBRGDDH, kz.FDDBRYDDH, kz.FDDBRDZXX, kz.CWFZRXM, kz.CWFZRSFZJZL_DM, kz.CWFZRSFZJHM, kz.CWFZRGDDH, kz.CWFZRYDDH, kz.CWFZRDZXX, kz.BSRXM, kz.BSRSFZJZL_DM, kz.BSRSFZJHM, kz.BSRGDDH, kz.BSRYDDH, kz.BSRDZXX, kz.LSSWDJYXQQ, kz.LSSWDJYXQZ, kz.SWDLRNSRSBH, kz.SWDLRMC, kz.WHSYJSFJFXXDJBZ, kz.ZZSJYLB, kz.YHSJNFS_DM, kz.ZSXMCXBZ_DM, kz.ZZSQYLX_DM, kz.GJHDQSZ_DM, kz.YGZNSRLX_DM, jb.nsrbm FROM dj_nsrxx jb, dj_nsrxx_kz kz WHERE jb.djxh = kz.djxh AND jb.nsrzt_dm = '03' AND jb.nsrbm = ? AND jb.gdslx_dm = ? and jb.yxbz = 'Y'

select yhpzuuid, djxh, lcslid, jmsspsx_dm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, jmxmdl_dm, jmxmxl_dm, jmwj_dm, jmlx_dm, jmfs_dm, jmzlx_dm, jmqxq, jmqxz, ssjmxzhz_dm, ssjmxzdl_dm, ssjmxzxl_dm, jzfd, jzsl, jzed, yxbz, htmc, htbh from yh_jmsspjg t where djxh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = ? and yxbz = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or zsxm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zspm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jmsspsx_dm = ?) and ((jmqxq <= to_date(?, ?) and sjjzrq >= to_date(?, ?)) or (jmqxq <= to_date(?, ?) and sjjzrq >= to_date(?, ?)) or (jmqxq > to_date(?, ?) and sjjzrq < to_date(?, ?))) and sjjzrq >= jmqxq

select t.uuid, t.ydzgswjg_dm, t.ydzgswjgmc, t.mbdswjg_dm, t.ydxzqhsz_dm, t.mbdxzqhsz_dm, t.sdzt, t.xxzt, t.qddm, t.lb_dm, t.ssbzj, t.yddjxh, t.mbddjxh, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.bwnr, t.fhbwnr, t.yxbz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.ksfwxxid from GY_KSFWXX_RZB t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.uuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.lb_dm = ?) and (t.xxzt = ? or t.xxzt = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or (t.lrrq BETWEEN to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) ) and t.sdzt = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y'
select gcglryqkuuid, rduuid, djxh, gcglryxm, gjhdqsz_dm, xb_dm, jnjzdd, dz, sfzjzl_dm, sfzjhm, yzbm, lxdh, hj_1, tpqbl, rybz, yxbz from rd_jwzczzgl_xgryxx t where t.rduuid =? and t.yxbz='Y'

select n.nsrsbh,n.shxydm,n.gdslx_dm from dj_nsrxx n where (n.KZZTDJLX_DM = ? or n.KZZTDJLX_DM like ? or n.KZZTDJLX_DM =? or n.KZZTDJLX_DM = ? or n.KZZTDJLX_DM = ?) and n.FDDBRSFZJHM=? and n.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM =? and n.yxbz='Y'

select t2.jzygcxmuuid, t2.gcxmbh, t2.gcxmmc, t2.zgswskfj_dm, t2.ZDXMBZ, a.wcjyhdssglzmbh, a.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxz zmyxqxz from dj_wbnsrjydbydj a, DJ_JZYXMDJ_WCJYHDSSGLZMXX t1, DJ_JZYGCXMQKDJXXB t2 where a.djxh = ? and a.wcjyhdssglzmbh = t1.wcjyhdssglzmbh and (t1.jzygcxmuuid = t2.jzygcxmuuid) and a.sblcslid is not null and (a.zfbz_1 = 'N' or a.zfbz_1 is null) and t1.yxbz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and not exists (select 1 from dj_wbnsrjydbydj c where c.ywcjyhdssglzmbh = a.wcjyhdssglzmbh and c.yxbz = 'Y' and (c.zfbz_1 = 'N' or c.zfbz_1 is null)) union
select null as jzygcxmuuid, null as gcxmbh, null as gcxmmc, null as zgswskfj_dm, null as ZDXMBZ, aa.wcjyhdssglzmbh, aa.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxz as zmyxqxz from dj_wbnsrjydbydj aa where aa.djxh = ? and aa.sblcslid is not null and (aa.zfbz_1 = 'N' or aa.zfbz_1 is null) and aa.yxbz = 'Y' and not exists (select 1 from dj_wbnsrjydbydj c where c.ywcjyhdssglzmbh = aa.wcjyhdssglzmbh and c.yxbz='Y' and (c.zfbz_1 = 'N' or c.zfbz_1 is null)) and not exists (select 1 from DJ_JZYXMDJ_WCJYHDSSGLZMXX t where t.wcjyhdssglzmbh = aa.wcjyhdssglzmbh and t.yxbz = 'Y')

select mx.lrrq,mx.xdsl from rd_ssxddysqspb sq, rd_ssxddyspsqmxb mx where sq.djxh = ? and sq.xduuid = mx.xduuid and sq.yxqq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and (sq.yxqz >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') or sq.yxqz is null) and sq.zstybz = 'Y' and mx.yxbz = 'Y'

select m.mstcuuid,m.bbuuid,m.lcslid,m.xh,m.nh,m.nnch,m.cnyh,m.mslb_dm,m.msmx_dm,m.cp,m.xh_3, m.scqymc,m.clyt,m.clgzsrlnyzl_dm,m.zygdzz,m.cltpn,m.cltpw,m.sjgsdq from WBJH_YH_CLGZSMSTC m where m.cp like ? and m.xh_3 like ? and nvl(m.scqymc,'无'） like ?

select t.rdpzuuid, t.djxh, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.lrr_dm, t.sjgsdq from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb t where t.yxqz < to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.yxqz < t.sjzzrq and t.nsrzglx_dm = '202' and (t.zfbz_1='N' OR t.ZFBZ_1 is null)
select * from dj_wtxysxx t where t.stfdjxh = ? and ? between t.xyyxqq and t.xyyxqz and zfbz_1 = 'N' and xyyxqq <= xyyxqz
select ssjmxz_dm from cs_gy_ssjmxzzspmdzb where ssjmxz_dm in (?)

select e.djxh from dj_ygzsffxxxdjb t join dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh e on t.djxh = e.djxh join dj_ygzsffxxxdjb d on t.djxh = d.djxh where t.uuid != d.uuid and t.yxbz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y' and (t.yxqq between d.yxqq and d.yxqz or t.yxqz between d.yxqq and d.yxqz)

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.fczyz, b.fwqsuuid, b.fwcqzsh, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz, c.djxh, c.fwsyqkuuid, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.lcslid, c.zspm_dm, c.fcyz, c.msyz, c.ysyz, c.nynse, c.nzjsr, c.zsfcsbz, c.sl_1, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.sbqx_dm, c.nsqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.syzyfs_dm, c.bz, c.kcl, C.PKBZ from dj_fyjbxx a, dj_fwqsxx b,dj_fwsyqkdjxx c where a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid and a.fyjbxxuuid=c.fyjbxxuuid and b.syqsyxqq <= ? and b.syqsyxqz >= ? and c.yxqz>c.yxqq and a.yxbz='Y' and c.fwtddjlx_dm in(#macroparam#) and (a.ssswjg_dm =? or 1 =?) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and a.fybh = ?
select t.jgjc_dm, t.swjg_dm from CS_YH_TSJMSXSPQXSZB t where t.swsx_dm = ? and t.zsxm_dm = ? and t.ZCZBXX <= ? and t.ZCZBSX > ?
select GLGLUUID, DJXH, LB_DM , YXQQ , YXQZ from dj_djhglgl n where n.djxh in(#macroparam#) and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') between n.yxqq and n.yxqz and n.lb_dm=?

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.scjydz, qc.YZQXQ, qc.YZQXZ, qc.yznd, qc.yzrq, qc.swzjzl_dm, nsr.ZGSWJ_DM, nsr.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, nsr.SSGLY_DM, kz.jyfw from DJ_NSRYZQC qc, dj_nsrxx nsr,dj_nsrxx_kz kz where nsr.djxh = qc.djxh and nsr.djxh=kz.djxh and qc.yznd =? and qc.swjg_dm =? and qc.swzjzl_dm = ? and qc.zfbz_1='N' and qc.yzrq is null and nsr.yxbz='Y' AND QC.SWJG_DM=NSR.ZGSWJ_DM and (1=? or nsr.zgswskfj_dm=?) and (1=? or nsr.djrq >to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=? or nsr.djrq <to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=? or nsr.nsrzt_dm=?)

select t.xdmxuuid, t.ssxduuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.xm_1, t.ssxdsdlx_dm, t.fjmnsfs_dm, t.kjywrdjxh, t.xyt, t.xyk, t.sfsygljy, t.jmse, t.xdsl, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.bz, t.ssxd_dm, t.sre, t.ynssde, t.zggnssflgdsl, t.htbh from rd_ssxddyspsqmxb t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between t.yxqq and t.yxqz

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.fczyz, b.fwqsuuid, b.fwcqzsh, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz, c.djxh, c.fwsyqkuuid, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.lcslid, c.zspm_dm, c.fcyz, c.msyz, c.ysyz, c.nynse, c.nzjsr, c.zsfcsbz, c.sl_1, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.sbqx_dm, c.nsqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.syzyfs_dm, c.bz, c.kcl from dj_fyjbxx a, dj_fwqsxx b,dj_fwsyqkdjxx c where a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid and a.fyjbxxuuid=c.fyjbxxuuid and b.syqsyxqq <= ? and b.syqsyxqz >= ? and c.yxqz>=? and c.yxqz>c.yxqq and a.yxbz='Y' and c.fwtddjlx_dm in(#macroparam#) and (b.djxh = ? or 1= ?) and (a.fybh = ? or 1= ?) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm =? or 1 =?)

select zjguuid, hznsuuid, djxh, zjgnsrsbh, zjgdjxh, zjgmc, zjgzcdz, zjgzcdzyzbm, zgswjg_dm, zgswjgmc, zgswjgdz, zgswjgyzbm, t.yxbz, '' shxydm from dj_hznsqyxxbab_zjgxx t where t.hznsuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and (zjgdjxh = '0' or zjgdjxh is null) union all select zjguuid, hznsuuid, t.djxh, n.nsrsbh zjgnsrsbh, t.zjgdjxh, n.nsrmc zjgmc, n.zcdz zjgzcdz, k.zcdyzbm zjgzcdzyzbm, n.zgswj_dm zgswjg_dm, zgswjgmc, zgswjgdz, zgswjgyzbm, t.yxbz, n.shxydm from dj_hznsqyxxbab_zjgxx t, dj_nsrxx n, dj_nsrxx_kz k where t.zjgdjxh = n.djxh and n.djxh = k.djxh and t.hznsuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and n.yxbz = 'Y'
update dj_tdsyqkdjxx t set t.xgr_dm = ? ,t.xgrq = ?,t.yxqz=to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-DD') where t.tdsybh = ? AND t.djxh=? and yxqz >=to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-DD')

select t.djxh,t.ssdabh, t.nsrsbh, t.shxydm, nsrmc, FDDBRXM, t.djzclx_dm, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, zzjg_Dm, scjydz, nsrzt_dm, scjydzxzqhsz_Dm, FDDBRSFZJHM, t.scjydz, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, T.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM from dj_nsrxx t where (((t.zzjg_dm = ? or (t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM = ? and t.FDDBRSFZJHM = ? ) or t.nsrmc = ? ) and t.kzztdjlx_dm = ?) or ( t.zzjg_dm = ? and (t.kzztdjlx_dm = ? or t.kzztdjlx_dm = ?))) and t.gdslx_dm = ? and t.yxbz='Y'

select a.ZFRQ_1, a.LCSLID, a.WSZG, a.QXBZ, a.SJZZRQ, a.YXQQ, a.LRRQ, a.RDPZUUID, a.LRR_DM, a.ZFR_DM, a.NSRZGLX_DM, a.XGR_DM, a.ZFBZ_1, a.YXQZ, a.DJXH from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb a where a.rdpzuuid=? and (a.zfbz_1='N' OR a.ZFBZ_1 is null)

select t.cydwuuid, t.qyjtdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.zlcslid, t.qyjtuuid, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, t.sfqyjtcydw, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.rdswjg_dm, t.sfxycydwqrbz, t.cydwqrbz, t.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.shxydm, n.nsrmc, n.scjydz, '' zgswjgmc, n.zgswj_dm, n.zgswskfj_dm, q.ssdq, q.qyssjt_dm from dj_qyjtjqcydwrd_cydwxx t, dj_nsrxx n,DJ_QYSSJT q where t.qyjtuuid = q.qyjtuuid and q.jtdjxh = n.djxh and n.yxbz='Y' and n.djxh != 0 and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and q.yxbz='Y' and q.xybz = 'Y' and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.yxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz and t.qyjtdjuuid= ? union all select t.cydwuuid, t.qyjtdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.zlcslid, t.qyjtuuid, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, t.sfqyjtcydw, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.rdswjg_dm, t.sfxycydwqrbz, t.cydwqrbz, t.djxh, q.jtnsrsbh nsrsbh, '' shxydm, q.qyssjtmc nsrmc, q.jtscjydz scjydz, q.jtzgswjgmc zgswjgmc, '' zgswj_dm, '' zgswskfj_dm, q.ssdq, q.qyssjt_dm from dj_qyjtjqcydwrd_cydwxx t,DJ_QYSSJT q where t.qyjtuuid = q.qyjtuuid and t.djxh = 0 and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and q.yxbz='Y' and q.xybz = 'Y' and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.yxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz and t.qyjtdjuuid= ? union all select t.cydwuuid, t.qyjtdjuuid, t.lcslid, t.zlcslid, t.qyjtuuid, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm, t.sfqyjtcydw, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.rdswjg_dm, t.sfxycydwqrbz, t.cydwqrbz, t.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.shxydm, n.nsrmc, n.scjydz, '' zgswjgmc, n.zgswj_dm, n.zgswskfj_dm, '' ssdq, '' qyssjt_dm from dj_qyjtjqcydwrd_cydwxx t, dj_nsrxx n where t.djxh = n.djxh AND N.YXBZ='Y' and t.qyjtuuid is null and t.yxbz='Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.yxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz and t.qyjtdjuuid= ?

select zguuid, djxh, bh, zgxm, xb_dm, sfzjlx_dm, sfzjhm, gljgbz, ltxrybz, sxsyhrybz, xsssyhlx_dm, xsssyhzjlx_dm, xsssyhzjhm, ldhtzh, ldhtqsrq, ldhtjsrq, shbxfzh, cjrlb_dm, bz, yxbz, ywpzuuid, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq from yh_zgmc a where djxh=? and ldhtjsrq>=ldhtqsrq and (1=? or a.bh=?) and (1=? or a.xsssyhzjhm =?) and (1=? or a.zgxm like ?) and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select nsr.DJJG_DM, nsr.DJRQ, nsr.DJXH, nsr.DJZCLX_DM, nsr.DWLSGX_DM, nsr.FDDBRSFZJHM, nsr.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, nsr.FDDBRXM, nsr.FJMQYBZ, nsr.GDGHLX_DM, nsr.GDSLX_DM, nsr.HY_DM, nsr.JDXZ_DM, nsr.KQCCSZTDJBZ, nsr.KZZTDJLX_DM, nsr.LRRQ, nsr.LRR_DM, nsr.NSRMC, nsr.NSRSBH, nsr.shxydm, nsr.NSRZT_DM, nsr.SCJYDZ, nsr.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, nsr.SJGSDQ, nsr.SJTB_SJ, nsr.SSDABH, nsr.SSGLY_DM, nsr.SWDJBLBZ, nsr.XGRQ, nsr.XGR_DM, nsr.ZCDZ, nsr.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, nsr.ZGSWJ_DM, nsr.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, nsr.ZZJG_DM, kz.BSRDZXX, kz.BSRGDDH, kz.BSRSFZJHM, kz.BSRSFZJZL_DM, kz.BSRXM, kz.BSRYDDH, kz.BZFS_DM, kz.CWFZRDZXX, kz.CWFZRGDDH, kz.CWFZRSFZJHM, kz.CWFZRSFZJZL_DM, kz.CWFZRXM, kz.CWFZRYDDH, kz.CYRS, kz.FDDBRDZXX, kz.FDDBRGDDH, kz.FDDBRYDDH, kz.GDGRS, kz.GGRS, kz.GJHDQSZ_DM, kz.GYKGLX_DM, kz.GYTZBL, kz.HHRS, kz.HJSZD, kz.HSFS_DM, kz.JYFW, kz.KJZDZZ_DM, kz.LSSWDJYXQQ, kz.LSSWDJYXQZ, kz.SCJYDLXDH, kz.SCJYDYZBM, kz.SWDLRDZXX, kz.SWDLRLXDH, kz.SWDLRMC, kz.SWDLRNSRSBH, kz.TZZE, kz.WHSYJSFJFXXDJBZ, kz.WJCYRS, kz.WZ, kz.WZTZBL, kz.YGZNSRLX_DM, kz.YHSJNFS_DM, kz.ZCDLXDH, kz.ZCDYZBM, kz.ZCZB, kz.ZFJGLX_DM, kz.ZRRTZBL, kz.ZSXMCXBZ_DM, kz.ZZJGLX_DM, kz.ZZSJYLB, kz.ZZSQYLX_DM from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, qx_swjg_zns znsa, DM_QX_ZNJGDZBKZ_JCJG dzb where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and nsr.zgswskfj_dm = dzb.gljg_dm AND znsa.Yxbz = 'Y' and dzb.jcjg_dm = znsa.swjg_dm and znsa.zn_dm = ? and znsa.ccm like ? and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.fddbrxm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or kz.scjydlxdh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or kz.cwfzrxm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.djzclx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrmc = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.scjydz like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.fddbrsfzjlx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.fddbrsfzjhm = ?) and rownum < = 100

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.djxh, nsr.shxydm, t.tdzsbhlxjh from dj_tdzsbmdjxx t, dj_nsrxx nsr where (t.swjg_dm = ? or t.dsdkjg=?) and t.djxh = nsr.djxh and t.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and nsr.yxbz = 'Y'

SELECT T.RDPZUUID, T.ZFSBZ, T.RDZSUUID, T.DJXH, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.RDYXQQ, T.RDYXQZ, T.HY_DM, T.SBQX_DM, T.NSQX_DM, T.JKQX_DM, T.SLHDWSE, T.YSKM_DM, T.YSFPBL_DM, T.SKGK_DM, T.ZSDLFS_DM, T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSL, T.YXBZ, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGRQ, T.GFJBJG_DM, T.ZSXMCXBZ_DM, T.JFJC_DM, T.SFZYZSPM FROM RD_SFZRDXXB T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= T.RDYXQZ AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= T.RDYXQQ)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= T.RDYXQZ) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSXM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSDLFS_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.NSQX_DM = ?) AND T.RDYXQQ < T.RDYXQZ
