update dj_fwsyqkdjxx t set t.xgr_dm = ?,t.xgrq = ?,t.yxqz=to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-DD') where t.fybh = ? AND t.djxh=? and yxqz >=to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-DD')

select t.tdzzsxmuuid, t.djxh, t.tdzzsxmbh, t.tdzzsxmmc, t.jdxz_dm, t.xxdz, t.khyh, t.yhzh, t.xmjszzsj, t.dwyscb, t.kfjzzmj, t.kftdzmj, t.zyscb, t.xmjsqssj, t.fdczrhtmc, t.bz, t.xmszddfswjg_dm, t.tdzzsxmzt_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.yxbz, t.sjgsdq, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.qsssqq, t.qsssqz,t.pgjg_dm from dj_tdzzsxmxx t where t.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or t.tdzzsxmbh = ?) and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select uuid, gsdjxh, dsdjxh, fqrq, wcjyhdssglzmbh, sfybjbz, bjsj, bjfs, rwuuid, jbr_dm, ywlx, dqbljg, qdswjgmc, yxbz, sjgsdq, lrr_dm, lrrq, sjtb_sj, xgr_dm, xgrq, wcjyhdqksbuuid, gswcjyhdqksbuuid from dj_wcjyqksbqdrw b where b.wcjyhdqksbuuid = ? and b.yxbz = ?

select gl.glgluuid, gl.djxh, gl.lb_dm, gl.yxqq, gl.yxqz, gl.lrr_dm, gl.lrrq, gl.xgrq, gl.xgr_dm, gl.sjgsdq from dj_djhglgl gl where gl.djxh = ? and gl.yxqq < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and gl.yxqz > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT ba.CSGJMLUUID, ba.LCSLID, ba.DJXH, ba.CSGGJTGLBMMC, ba.XZQHSZ_DM, ba.BZ, ba.YXQQ, ba.YXQZ, ba.YXBZ, ba.BAR_DM, ba.BARQ, ba.BASWJG_DM, ba.LRR_DM, ba.LRRQ, ba.XGR_DM, ba.XGRQ, ba.SJGSDQ, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrmc FROM dj_csggjtglbmycsgjqyml ba, dj_nsrxx nsr WHERE ba.djxh = nsr.djxh AND ba.baswjg_dm = ? AND ba.yxqq <= ? AND ba.yxqz >= ? AND ba.yxbz = 'Y' AND NSR.YXBZ='Y'
select t.mxuuid, t.ccxxuuid, t.cpylx_dm, t.cgbh, t.yxbz, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.djxh from dj_qycyscqyjbqkdj_ccxxmxb t where t.ccxxuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'
select yspz_xmllsh, yspz_xmlbh, yspz_xmlsj, lrr_dm, lrrq, sjgsdq, yspz_xmlztxx, ywfl_dm, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsrq from yspz_xmlsjb_new n where n.yspz_xmllsh = ?

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydz, a.shxydm, c.fzchrduuid, c.rdrq, c.rdyy, c.ggrq from dj_nsrxx a, dj_fzchrdxx c where a.djxh = c.djxh and c.jcfzchrq is null and c.zxfzchrq is null and a.yxbz = 'Y' and c.rdrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and c.rdrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.zgswj_dm = ? and (a.zgswskfj_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.ssgly_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.djzclx_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.hy_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.kzztdjlx_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and c.ggr_dm is null and ROWNUM < 1001

select t.mxuuid, t.hznsuuid, t.djxh, t.zsxm_dm, t.hzqylx_dm, t.bhznsrsfsqbz, t.bhzrdjxh, t.bhznsqynsrsbh, t.bhznsqynsrmc, t.sbjnfs_dm, t.yzl, t.desl_1, t.yzbl, t.hznsyxqq, t.hznsyxqz, t.bhznsqydz, t.bhznsqysfwfzjgbz, t.hznsfw_dm, t.yxbz, t.zsbs, t.hznsmxuuid, t.yzskfw_dm, t.sflsqy, kz.ygznsrlx_dm, t.yhznsuuid, t.bcczlx_dm, t.yhznsmxuuid, t.bhzsjlylx from rd_hznsqyrdsq_bhzmxxx t, dj_nsrxx_kz kz where t.hznsuuid = ? and t.bhzrdjxh = kz.djxh(+) and yxbz = ? and zsbs = ?

select jmxz.yxqq, jmxz.yxqz, t.swsx_dm, t.zsxm_dm, x.zsxmmc, t.ssjmxz_dm, t.ssjmxzdl_dm, jmxz.ssjmxzmc, t.ssjmxzxl_dm, t.swjg_dm, t.sxh from cs_yh_swsxjmxzdzb t, dm_gy_ssjmxz jmxz, dm_gy_zsxm x where t.swsx_dm = ? and jmxz.ssjmxz_dm = t.ssjmxz_dm and t.zsxm_dm = x.zsxm_dm

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydz, a.shxydm, c.fzchrduuid, c.rdrq, c.rdyy, c.ggrq from dj_nsrxx a, dj_fzchrdxx c, dj_djhglgl d where a.djxh = c.djxh and c.djxh = d.djxh and c.jcfzchrq is null and c.zxfzchrq is null and a.yxbz = 'Y' and c.rdrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and c.rdrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.zgswj_dm = ? and (a.zgswskfj_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.ssgly_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.djzclx_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.hy_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.kzztdjlx_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and d.lb_dm = ? and c.ggr_dm is null AND ROWNUM < 1001

select glgluuid, djxh, lb_dm, yxqq, yxqz, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj from dj_djhglgl t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxqq < t.yxqz and t.yxqz < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and exists (select 1 from cs_dj_zkzpxgmnsrglgljkxx d where d.lb_dm = t.lb_dm and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xybz = 'Y') order by t.yxqq desc

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.djxh, nsr.ssdabh, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.jdxz_dm, nsr.kzztdjlx_dm, nsr.djzclx_dm, nsr.fddbrxm, nsr.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, nsr.fddbrsfzjhm, nsr.scjydz, nsr.hy_dm, nsr.zcdz, nsr.dwlsgx_dm, nsr.gdslx_dm, nsr.gdslx_dm, nsr.gdghlx_dm, nsr.zzjg_dm, nsr.fjmqybz, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm, nsr.shxydm from dj_ls_swjg jg, dj_wtxysxx wt, dj_nsrxx nsr where jg.swjg_dm = wt.wtfswjg_dm and wt.stfdjxh = nsr.djxh and wt.xyyxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and wt.xyyxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and wt.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select nsr.DJJG_DM, nsr.DJRQ, nsr.DJXH, nsr.DJZCLX_DM, nsr.DWLSGX_DM, nsr.FDDBRSFZJHM, nsr.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, nsr.FDDBRXM, nsr.FJMQYBZ, nsr.GDGHLX_DM, nsr.GDSLX_DM, nsr.HY_DM, nsr.JDXZ_DM, nsr.KQCCSZTDJBZ, nsr.KZZTDJLX_DM, nsr.LRRQ, nsr.LRR_DM, nsr.NSRMC, nsr.NSRSBH, nsr.NSRZT_DM, nsr.SCJYDZ, nsr.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, nsr.SJGSDQ, nsr.SJTB_SJ, nsr.SSDABH, nsr.SSGLY_DM, nsr.SWDJBLBZ, nsr.XGRQ, nsr.XGR_DM, nsr.ZCDZ, nsr.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, nsr.ZGSWJ_DM, nsr.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, nsr.ZZJG_DM, fyhy.FYHYUUID, fyhy.HY_DM FYHY, fyhy.XH, fyhy.YXBZ, kz.BSRXM, kz.FDDBRYDDH, kz.ZCZB, kz.ZSXMCXBZ_DM, kz.YHSJNFS_DM, kz.CWFZRSFZJZL_DM, kz.TZZE, kz.SCJYDLXDH, kz.ZCDYZBM, kz.JYFW, kz.YGZNSRLX_DM, kz.WHSYJSFJFXXDJBZ, kz.SJTB_SJ, kz.CWFZRDZXX, kz.GYKGLX_DM, kz.GYTZBL, kz.WZTZBL, kz.ZRRTZBL, kz.BSRSFZJHM, kz.CWFZRYDDH, kz.FDDBRDZXX, kz.SWDLRDZXX, kz.KJZDZZ_DM, kz.GGRS, kz.HHRS, kz.ZCDLXDH, kz.SWDLRNSRSBH, kz.BSRGDDH, kz.CWFZRSFZJHM, kz.WZ, kz.SCJYDYZBM, kz.BSRDZXX, kz.ZFJGLX_DM, kz.ZZJGLX_DM, kz.ZZSJYLB, kz.BSRYDDH, kz.BSRSFZJZL_DM, kz.CWFZRXM, kz.BZFS_DM, kz.GDGRS, kz.HJSZD, kz.SWDLRMC, kz.LSSWDJYXQZ, kz.LSSWDJYXQQ, kz.CWFZRGDDH, kz.FDDBRGDDH, kz.SWDLRLXDH, kz.WJCYRS, kz.CYRS, kz.HSFS_DM, kz.SJGSDQ, kz.GJHDQSZ_DM, kz.ZZSQYLX_DM, pz.kyslrq, nsr.shxydm from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, dj_nsrfyhyxx fyhy, DJ_PZJGXX pz where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and nsr.djxh = fyhy.djxh(+) and nsr.shxydm = ? and nsr.gdslx_dm = ? and pz.djxh(+) = nsr.djxh and nsr.yxbz = 'Y'

select p.kyslrq from dj_hznsqyxxbab h,dj_nsrxx n,dj_pzjgxx p where h.Djxh = N.DJXH and h.djxh=p.djxh and n.yxbz='Y' and h.jdjnbs='Y' and h.fzjgcj_dm='10' and (h.zfbz_1 is null or h.zfbz_1 != 'Y') and to_char(p.kyslrq,'yyyy') >=to_char(h.yxqq,'yyyy') and h.hznsuuid = ?
select t.tqzjzysjzbuuid, t.tqzjzysjuuid, t.zjmc, t.ys, t.zjcc, t.nrzy, t.je, t.thbz, t.zjsssq, t.tqzjthqduuid from JC_TQZJZYSJ_ZB T where t.tqzjzysjuuid = $uuid$

select n.DJXH, GDSLX_DM, SSDABH, NSRSBH, NSRMC, KZZTDJLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, SCJYDZ, FDDBRSFZJHM, SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM, HY_DM, ZCDZ, ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM , GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM, DJRQ, ZZJG_DM, KQCCSZTDJBZ, ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ, SWDJBLBZ, NSRBM, YXBZ, SHXYDM, GSDJXH, QRBZ, QRR_DM, QRRQ, LYBZ, GSZGSWJ_DM, GSZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZGSWJMC, ZGSWSKFJMC, XGSDJXH, HJSZD, JYFW, ZCDLXDH, ZCDYZBM, SCJYDLXDH, SCJYDYZBM, HSFS_DM, CYRS, WJCYRS, HHRS, GGRS, GDGRS, ZZJGLX_DM, KJZDZZ_DM, WZ, SWDLRLXDH, SWDLRDZXX, ZCZB, TZZE, ZRRTZBL, WZTZBL, GYTZBL, GYKGLX_DM, ZFJGLX_DM, BZFS_DM, FDDBRGDDH, FDDBRYDDH, FDDBRDZXX, CWFZRXM, CWFZRSFZJZL_DM, CWFZRSFZJHM, CWFZRGDDH, CWFZRYDDH, CWFZRDZXX, BSRXM, BSRSFZJZL_DM, BSRSFZJHM, BSRGDDH, BSRYDDH, BSRDZXX, LSSWDJYXQQ, LSSWDJYXQZ, SWDLRNSRSBH, SWDLRMC, WHSYJSFJFXXDJBZ, ZZSJYLB, YHSJNFS_DM, ZSXMCXBZ_DM, ZZSQYLX_DM, GJHDQSZ_DM, YGZNSRLX_DM, QYGLCJBH, QYSSJT_DM, NSRYWMC, YWZCDZ, YGZNSRLXDMJH from dj_nsrxx_ygz n, dj_nsrxx_kz_ygz k where n.gsdjxh= k.djxh and n.djxh = ?

select fzchrduuid, djxh, lcslid, rdyy, ysyskzz, rdrq, rdr_dm, rdswjg_dm, xgsxrq, jcfzchrq, zxfzchrq, ggrq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, ggr_dm, ggswjg_dm, xgsxr_dm, jcr_dm_1, jcswjg_dm_1 from dj_fzchrdxx t where djxh=?
select r.lcslid, r.ssdcqyuuid, r.djxh, r.ssdcqylx_dm from dj_ssdcqyrdxx r where r.djxh = ? and r.dcnd = ? and r.qxrq is null and r.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.swsx_dm,t.ssjmxz_dm,t.jmwj_dm from cs_yh_swsxssjmxzdzb t where t.xybz='Y' and t.yxbz='Y'

select t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.shxydm, t.nsrmc, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.nsrzt_dm, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.djrq, t.ZGSWJ_DM, t.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, k.zfjglx_dm from dj_nsrxx t, dj_nsrxx_kz k where t.djxh = k.djxh and t.nsrmc = ? and t.fddbrsfzjhm = ? and t.fddbrsfzjlx_dm =? and ( t.kzztdjlx_dm =? or t.kzztdjlx_dm = ? OR t.kzztdjlx_dm like ? ) and t.gdslx_dm = ? and t.kqccsztdjbz=? and t.yxbz = ?

select DJXH , GDSLX_DM , SSDABH , NSRSBH , SHXYDM, NSRMC , KZZTDJLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM , FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, SCJYDZ , FDDBRSFZJHM , SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM, HY_DM, ZCDZ, ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM , JDXZ_DM , DWLSGX_DM, GDGHLX_DM , DJJG_DM, DJRQ , ZZJG_DM , KQCCSZTDJBZ , ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM , SSGLY_DM from dj_nsrxx n where n.nsrsbh like ? and n.yxbz = 'Y' and (n.kzztdjlx_dm = '1120' or substr(kzztdjlx_dm, 0,3)='113')
select FYHYUUID, DJXH, XH, HY_DM, YXBZ from dj_nsrfyhyxx_ygz h where h.djxh=?

select jms.yhpzuuid, jms.djxh, jms.lcslid, jms.jmsspsx_dm, jms.zsxm_dm, jms.zspm_dm, jms.jmxmdl_dm, jms.jmxmxl_dm, jms.jmwj_dm, jms.jmlx_dm, jms.jmfs_dm, jms.jmzlx_dm, jms.jmqxq, jms.jmqxz, jms.ssjmxzhz_dm, jms.ssjmxzdl_dm, jms.ssjmxzxl_dm, jms.jzfd, jms.jzsl, jms.jzed, jms.sjjzrq, jms.wszg, jms.yxbz, jms.zfbz_1, jms.zfr_dm, jms.zfrq_1, jms.qxbz, cgs.clsbdh from yh_jmsspjg jms, yh_clgzsjmbaxx cgs where jms.djxh = ? and jms.zfbz_1 = ? and jms.yxbz = ? and jms.jmqxz > jms.jmqxq and jms.yhpzuuid = cgs.yhpzuuid(+)

select cs.tddj_dm, cs.swjg_dm, cs.zspm_dm from cs_dj_tddjzspmdzb cs, (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm =?) jg where cs.swjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm and cs.xybz = 'Y' and cs.yxbz = 'Y' and cs.tddj_dm in (#macroparam#)

select whsyjsfdjuuid, djxh, lcslid, jbrxm, jbrgddh, jbryddh, lsgx_dm, zytzbl, dftzbl, wlsgxtzbl, tbrq, jnywr, kjywr, dysm, ggysfyxcekc, jnqx, sbqx_dm, zsl, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, zyjysbl, dfjysbl from dj_whsyjsfjfxxdjb where djxh = ? and (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null)

select t.uuid, t.sfxxbgbuuid, t.zgswjgmc, t.sj, t.sdje, t.jmsje, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.yxbz from YH_FJMNSRXSSSXDBGB_XSQK t where t.sfxxbgbuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'

SELECT a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.djxh, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.nsrzt_dm FROM dj_tfyxx t, dj_nsrxx a WHERE t.fyrq <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.clfybz = 'N' and t.cltybz = 'Y' AND t.YXBZ = 'Y' and t.djxh = a.djxh and a.yxbz = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.djxh, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.nsrzt_dm FROM dj_tfyxx t, dj_nsrxx a WHERE t.hztyqxz <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.fyrq IS NULL AND t.clfybz = 'N' and t.cltybz = 'Y' AND t.YXBZ = 'Y' and t.djxh = a.djxh and a.yxbz = 'Y' UNION ALL select zsjnsr.nsrsbh, zsjnsr.nsrmc, zsjnsr.djxh, zsjnsr.zgswj_dm, zsjnsr.zgswskfj_dm, gznsr.nsrzt_dm from dj_djztgxdzb dzb, dj_nsrxx zsjnsr, dj_nsrxx gznsr where zsjnsr.djxh = dzb.yddjxh and gznsr.djxh = dzb.mbddjxh and dzb.nsrdzgxlb_dm = '10' and dzb.yxbz = 'Y' and zsjnsr.nsrzt_dm = '04' and zsjnsr.yxbz='Y'
SELECT SGXKZUUID,GCXMBH,DJXH,SGXKZBH,SGXKZFFJG,SGXKZFFRQ,YXBZ, LRR_DM,LRRQ,XGR_DM,XGRQ,SJGSDQ,JZYGCXMUUID FROM dj_jzyxmdj_sgxkzxx WHERE GCXMBH = ? AND YXBZ = 'Y'
select max(substr(t.ygzzfjgbz_dm, ?, ?)) from dj_ygzsffxxxdjb t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.zfjgglms_dm = ?) and t.ygzzfjgbz_dm is not null and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.bydjuuid, a.wcjyzmuuid, a.djxh, a.lcslid, a.wcjyhdssglzmbh, a.swdjd, a.wcjyd, a.wcjyhtzje, a.swdjdswjgyj, a.wcjydswjgyj, a.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxq, a.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxz, a.wcjyhdssglzmqfrq, a.bsrxm, a.lxdh, a.sqrq, a.bysj, a.ywcjyhdssglzmbh, a.sjgsdq, a.jyfsdmjh, a.htdfnsrsbh, a.htdfnsrmc, a.htdfnsrdjxh, a.scjydswjgmc, a.scjydswjglxdh, a.jgszdqysdszsfs_dm, a.jgszdqysdshsjgmc, a.jgszdqysdshsjg_dm, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.kjswjg_dm, a.qysdsgljgbz from dj_wbnsrjydbydj a where a.sblcslid is null and a.djxh = ? and (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null) and a.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.djzclx_dm from cs_dj_zjzldjzclxdzb t where t.sfzjzl_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y'

select qc.qcuuid, qc.zgswjgfpuuid, qc.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.hy_dm, kz.jyfw, nsr.djzclx_dm, nsr.jdxz_dm, nsr.scjydz, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm, nsr.zcdz, nsr.kzztdjlx_dm,nsr.nsrzt_dm, qc.yzgswjg_dm, qc.nfpzgswjg_dm, qc.yxbz from dj_zgswjgfp_nsrqc qc,dj_nsrxx nsr,dj_nsrxx_kz kz where qc.zgswjgfpuuid = ? and qc.yxbz = ? and qc.djxh = nsr.djxh and nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and nsr.yxbz = ?

select a.RDRQ, a.RDR_DM, a.LB_DM, a.SSDQ, a.QYSSJTMC, a.YXBZ, a.QYSSJT_DM, a.JTZGSWJGMC, a.JTSCJYDZ, a.JTCJ_DM, a.JTDJXH, a.JTNSRSBH, a.BHBQYSSJT_DM, a.HBBJ, a.XYBZ, a.QYJTUUID, a.RDSWJG_DM from dj_qyssjt a where (1=? or a.ssdq in (select xzqhsz_dm from dm_gy_xzqh CONNECT BY PRIOR xzqhsz_dm = sjxzqhsz_dm START WITH xzqhsz_dm=?)) and a.qyssjt_dm=? and (1=? or a.jtnsrsbh=?) and (1=? or a.jtcj_dm=?) and (1=? or a.lb_dm=?) and (1=? or a.qyssjtmc like ?) and a.yxbz='Y' and a.xybz='Y'

select hwuuid, wcjyzmhxuuid, djxh, lcslid, wcjyhwmc, hwxssl, hwxse, xshwjnsk, yxbz, xshwsyfp_dm, xshwsyfpfs, xshwsyfpqshm, xshwsyfpzzhm, xshwsyfpzl_dm, yjskzsl, yyjskje, sjhtje, kjfpjezk, kjfpjedk, ybyjskje, htbh, zsxm_dm from zm_wcjyzmhxxx_hwxx t where t.wcjyzmhxuuid = ?

select t.bgdjmxuuid,t.djxh,t.lcslid,t.bgxm_dm,t.bgqnr,t.bghnr, t.pzjgmc,t.pzwj,t.lrr_dm,t.lrrq,t.xgr_dm,t.xgrq,t.sjgsdq,t.gluuid from dj_bgdjmx t ,dm_dj_bgxm a where a.bgxm_dm = t.bgxm_dm and t.djxh=?

SELECT a.yhpzuuid,a.djxh,a.jmsspsx_dm,a.zsxm_dm,a.zspm_dm,a.jmxmdl_dm,a.jmxmxl_dm,a.jmwj_dm,a.jmlx_dm, a.jmfs_dm,a.jmzlx_dm,a.jmqxq,a.jmqxz,a.ssjmxzhz_dm,a.ssjmxzdl_dm,a.ssjmxzxl_dm,a.jzfd,a.jzsl,a.jzed, a.sjjzrq,a.sjgsdq,t.bamxuuid,t.clgzsmjstj_dm,t.clsbdh,t.jmse FROM yh_jmsspjg a, yh_clgzsjmbaxx t WHERE a.yhpzuuid = t.yhpzuuid and (1=? or t.djxh = ?) AND a.zsxm_dm = ? AND a.sjjzrq > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.clsbdh = ? and (a.jmqxq is null or a.sjjzrq >= a.jmqxq)

select t.lb_dm, t.lbmc, t.lbcj_dm, t.sxrq, t.sxrq_2, t.szr_dm, t.szswjg_dm, t.szrq, t.xybz, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq from dj_djhzdylbsz t where t.xybz = 'Y' and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between t.sxrq and t.sxrq_2 and exists (select 1 from cs_dj_zkzpxgmnsrglgljkxx d where d.lb_dm = t.lb_dm and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xybz = 'Y')

select fyjbxxuuid, b.fybh, fwzh, dy, lc_1, fh, jg_dm, cx_dm, fwmj, tnmj, fwzldz, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, ssswjg_dm, bdcxmbh, tdsybh, fczyz sjtb_sj from dj_ls_fwqkdjxx a,dj_fyjbxx b where a.fybh=b.fybh and b.yxbz='Y'
delete from dj_ls_djxhandssq

SELECT DJXH , GDSLX_DM , SSDABH , NSRSBH , NSRMC , shxydm KZZTDJLX_DM , DJZCLX_DM , FDDBRXM , FDDBRSFZJLX_DM , SCJYDZ , FDDBRSFZJHM , SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM , HY_DM , ZCDZ , ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM , JDXZ_DM , DWLSGX_DM , GDGHLX_DM , DJJG_DM , DJRQ , ZZJG_DM , KQCCSZTDJBZ , ZGSWJ_DM , ZGSWSKFJ_DM , SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ , SWDJBLBZ , SJTB_SJ from dj_nsrxx nsr where (nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ?) and nsr.gdslx_dm = ? and nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ? AND nsr.nsrzt_dm !='07' AND nsr.nsrzt_dm!='10' and nsr.yxbz='Y'

select t.mstcuuid, t.lcslid, t.mslb_dm, t.msmx_dm, t.cp, t.xh_3, t.scqymc, t.clyt, t.clgzsrlnyzl_dm, t.zygdzz, t.cltpn, t.cltpw, t.scqymc, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq from WBJH_YH_CLGZSMSTC t where t.bbuuid is null

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.fczyz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, b.fwqsuuid, b.djxh, b.fwcqzsh, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz from dj_fyjbxx a, dj_fwqsxx b where a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid and b.syqsyxqq <= ? and b.syqsyxqz >= ? and a.yxbz='Y' and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm =? or 1 =?) and b.djxh = ?
select * from DM_GY_GDZCZJFS where yxbz='Y'

select tmxfsuuid, djxh, lcslid, cplx_dm, ycllx_dm, yxftlcpsjscnldn, snycpyllyzcdn, snycpyllywgdn, rlycpyllywgdn, rlycpyllyzcdn, fjlsndcl, fjlzqbcpbl, qtfjlsndcl, qtfjlzqbcpbl, qtccpsndcl, qtccpzqbcpbl, snysjkr, rlysjkr, ljlzzsl, ljzzyltrklljgs, ljzzcpccklljgs, lxsczzsl, lxsczzyltrklljgs, lxsczzcpccklljgs, fjctzzsl, fjctzzyltrklljgs, fjctzzcpccklljgs, pxzzsl, pxzzyltrklljgs, pxzzcpccklljgs, yyzzyxqx, wxhxcpscxkzfzdwmc, wxhxcpscxkzzjhm, wxhxcpscxkzyxqx, ywpzuuid, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, qxrq, ztrq, hfrq_1 from yh_snyrlysyqytmxfszgbab t where t.zfbz_1='N' and t.djxh=?

select jmxz.yxqq,jmxz.yxqz,t.swsx_dm, t.zsxm_dm,x.zsxmmc, t.ssjmxz_dm, t.ssjmxzdl_dm,jmxz.ssjmxzmc, t.ssjmxzxl_dm,t.swjg_dm,t.sxh from cs_yh_swsxjmxzdzb t,dm_gy_ssjmxz jmxz,dm_gy_zsxm x where t.swsx_dm =? and jmxz.ssjmxz_dm= t.ssjmxz_dm and t.zsxm_dm=x.zsxm_dm and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and jmxz.xybz='Y' and jmxz.yxbz='Y' and (1=? or (to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >=jmxz.yxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <=jmxz.yxqz))
select a.jmzlx_dm,a.swsx_dm from cs_yh_swsxjmzlxdzb a where a.swsx_dm=? and a.yxbz='Y' and a.xybz='Y'

select mscxsquuid, djxh, lcslid, sqrq, mscxspsqrlx_dm, scqymc, cllb_dm_1, fdjhm, cp, xh_3, clsbdh, gzrq, jdcxstyfphm, clgzsmjstj_dm, lxdh, yzbm, dz, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, zygdzz, mslb_dm, clyt, zgswskfj_dm, cltpn, cltpw, fj_2, msmx_dm, clgzd, clhgzmhm, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, fp_dm, zstybz, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, hzbz_1, ywpzuuid, zfbz_1, zfr_dm,clmc,sbsbm,bz,xzzz, zfrq_1 from yh_clgzsmjssqspb t where lcslid<>? and t.cp=? and t.xh_3=?

SELECT T.RDPZUUID, T.ZFSBZ, T.RDZSUUID, T.DJXH, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.RDYXQQ, T.RDYXQZ, T.HY_DM, T.SBQX_DM, T.NSQX_DM, T.JKQX_DM, T.SLHDWSE,
T.YSKM_DM, T.YSFPBL_DM, T.SKGK_DM, T.ZSDLFS_DM, T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSL, T.YXBZ, T.LRRQ, T.Gfjbjg_Dm, T.Zsxmcxbz_Dm, T.Jfjc_Dm FROM RD_SFZRDXXB T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > T.RDYXQZ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSXM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.ZSDLFS_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.NSQX_DM = ?) AND T.RDYXQQ < T.RDYXQZ

select tdzzsxmuuid, djxh, tdzzsxmbh, tdzzsxmmc, jdxz_dm, xxdz, khyh, yhzh, xmjsqssj, xmjszzsj, zyscb, dwyscb, kftdzmj, kfjzzmj, fdczrhtmc, bz, xmszddfswjg_dm, zgswskfj_dm, xzqhsz_dm, tdzzsxmzt_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, qsssqq, qsssqz, pgjg_dm from dj_tdzzsxmxx where djxh = ? and tdzzsxmmc = ? and yxbz = 'Y'
select j.yhpzuuid,j.jmsspsx_dm from yh_jmsspjg j where j.djxh = ? and j.jmsspsx_dm = ? and j.yxbz = 'Y' and j.zfbz_1 = 'N' and j.qxbz = 'N' and j.ztrq is null and j.sjjzrq>j.jmqxq

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc,nsr.shxydm , nsr.ssdabh, nsr.scjydz, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.djxh from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_ssdcqyrdxx rdjg, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh lsb where nsr.ssdabh = rdjg.ssdabh and lsb.djxh = nsr.djxh and rdjg.qxrq is null and (rdjg.dcnd = ? or rdjg.dcnd is null ) and nsr.yxbz = ? and rdjg.yxbz = ?

select k.scjydlxdh, a.DJJG_DM, a.DJRQ, a.DJXH, a.DJZCLX_DM, a.DWLSGX_DM, a.FDDBRSFZJHM, a.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, a.FDDBRXM, a.FJMQYBZ, a.GDGHLX_DM, a.GDSLX_DM, a.HY_DM, a.JDXZ_DM, a.KQCCSZTDJBZ, a.KZZTDJLX_DM, a.LRRQ, a.LRR_DM, a.NSRMC, a.NSRSBH, a.NSRZT_DM, a.SCJYDZ, a.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, a.SJGSDQ, a.SJTB_SJ, a.SSDABH, a.SSGLY_DM, a.SWDJBLBZ, a.XGRQ, a.XGR_DM, a.ZCDZ, a.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, a.ZGSWJ_DM, a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, a.shxydm, a.ZZJG_DM, p.kyslrq, ls.ssqq, ls.ssqz from dj_nsrxx a, dj_nsrxx_kz k, dj_pzjgxx p, dj_ls_djxhandssq ls where a.djxh = ls.djxh and a.djxh = k.djxh and a.djxh = p.djxh(+) and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.bamxuuid, t.squuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.kjfwmc_1, t.jsfwdwmc, t.gjhdqsz_dm, t.fwfsd, t.htmc, t.htbh, t.kjysfwmc_dm, t.htzmzjk, t.htydfkrq, t.htzmdkjfwjjbz from yh_kjysfwmsbab t where t.djxh = ? and t.jsfwdwmc = ? and t.kjysfwmc_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.htmc = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.htbh = ?)

select qxuuid, c.yhpzuuid, a.lcslid, hdslid, a.djxh, ssyhzgqxyy_dm, zstybz, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, qdswjg_dm, qxyy, qxrq, gljy_dm, gljysm, b.nsrsbh, b.shxydm, a.ztrq, b.nsrmc, b.ssgly_dm, c.jmsspsx_dm, c.jmqxq, c.jmqxz, c.sjjzrq, c.zsxm_dm from dj_nsrxx b, yh_ssyhzgqxsqspb a, yh_jmsspjg c where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.yhpzuuid = c.yhpzuuid and a.lcslid = ? and b.yxbz = 'Y'

select
n.DJXH , GDSLX_DM , SSDABH , NSRSBH , NSRMC , n.KZZTDJLX_DM , DJZCLX_DM , FDDBRXM , FDDBRSFZJLX_DM , SCJYDZ , FDDBRSFZJHM , n.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM , HY_DM , ZCDZ , ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM , JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM , GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM , DJRQ , n.ZZJG_DM , KQCCSZTDJBZ, ZGSWJ_DM , ZGSWSKFJ_DM , SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ , SWDJBLBZ , NSRBM PZSLJGLX_DM , PZSLJG_DM , PZSLJGMC , PZZMHWJH , p.ZZLX_DM , p.ZZHM , KYSLRQ , SCJYQXQ , SCJYQXZ
from dj_nsrxx n, dj_pzjgxx p, dj_ls_nsrgjxx ls where (n.zzjg_dm = ls.zzjg_dm or ls.zzhm = p.zzhm) and n.kzztdjlx_dm = ls.kzztdjlx_dm and n.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ls.xzqhsz_dm and n.yxbz='Y' and (n.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' OR N.KQCCSZTDJBZ IS NULL) AND (N.KZZTDJLX_DM =? or N.KZZTDJLX_DM like ?) and n.djxh = p.djxh and n.nsrzt_dm!='07' and n.nsrzt_dm !='10' and n.gdslx_dm=?
select p.sl_1,p.yxqq,p.yxqz from cs_gy_glb_zspm p where p.zspm_dm = ? and p.yxbz = 'Y' and p.xybz = 'Y' and p.swjg_dm = ? and p.swjg_dm != '00000000000'

select swjg_dm , swjgmc , swjgjc , swjgbz , sjswjg_dm , jgjc_dm , swjgyzbm , swjgdz , swjglxdh , czdh , dzxx , xzqhsz_dm , swjgfzr_dm , gdslx_dm , swjgjg from dm_gy_swjg jg where jg.swjgbz=? and jg.sjswjg_dm=?

select j.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.shxydm, n.nsrmc, j.yxqq, j.yxqz, j.nsqx_dm, j.uuid from rd_jbzqrdjgb j, dj_nsrxx n where n.zgswj_dm = ? and n.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or n.ssgly_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or n.hy_dm = ?) and n.djxh = j.djxh and (1 = #macroparam# or j.yxqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or j.yxqz <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or n.nsrsbh = ? or n.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or j.nsqx_dm = ?) and j.yxqq <= j.yxqz and n.yxbz = ? and j.qxrq is null and j.zfbz_1=? and j.yxqz >= ?
select distinct t.zspm_dm from dj_tdsyqkdjxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxqz >=?

select RDPZUUID, DJXH, ZFSBZ, RDZSUUID, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, RDYXQQ, RDYXQZ, HY_DM, SBQX_DM, NSQX_DM, SLHDWSE, YSKM_DM, ZSL, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, JKQX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YXBZ, GFJBJG_DM, ZSXMCXBZ_DM, JFJC_DM from rd_sfzrdxxb_ygz n where n.djxh=? and n.yxbz='Y'

select d.djxh, d.gdslx_dm, d.ssdabh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.kzztdjlx_dm, d.djzclx_dm, d.fddbrxm, d.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, d.scjydz, d.fddbrsfzjhm, d.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, d.nsrzt_dm, d.hy_dm, d.zcdz, d.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, d.jdxz_dm, d.dwlsgx_dm, d.gdghlx_dm, d.djjg_dm, d.djrq, d.zzjg_dm, d.kqccsztdjbz, d.lrr_dm, d.lrrq, d.xgr_dm, d.xgrq, d.sjgsdq, d.zgswj_dm, d.zgswskfj_dm, d.ssgly_dm, d.fjmqybz, d.swdjblbz, d.sjtb_sj, d.nsrbm, d.yxbz, d.shxydm from dj_wbnsrjydbydj t, zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx z, dj_nsrxx d where t.djxh = ? and t.wcjyzmuuid = z.wcjyzmuuid and z.djxh = d.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and z.yxbz = 'Y' and z.zfbz_1 != 'Y'

select n.tdsybh, n.tdzldz, n.ssswjg_dm, n.xzqhsz_dm, n.jdxz_dm, n.tddj_dm, n.tdzmj, n.yxbz, n.qh, n.tdjbxxuuid, m.tdqsuuid, m.syqsyxqq, m.syqsyxqz, n.djxh, n.tdsyqkuuid, n.fwtddjlx_dm, n.tdmj, n.mstdmj, n.ystdmj, n.dwse, n.nynse, n.yxqq, n.yxqz, n.nsqx_dm, n.sbqx_dm, n.jkqx_dm, n.yskm_dm, n.ysfpbl_dm, n.skgk_dm, n.zscztdsysbz, n.bz, n.lcslid, n.tdczrmc, n.tdczrsfzjhm, n.czrsfzjzl_dm, n.zspm_dm from (select b.tdsybh, b.tdqsuuid, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz from dj_tdqsxx b where b.tdsybh = ? AND (1 = ? or (TO_DATE(? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.syqsyxqz AND TO_DATE(? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= b.syqsyxqq)) AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.syqsyxqz)) AND b.syqsyxqq <= b.syqsyxqz) m, (select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid, c.tdsyqkuuid, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.tdmj, c.mstdmj, c.ystdmj, c.dwse, c.nynse, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.nsqx_dm, c.sbqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.zscztdsysbz, c.bz, c.lcslid, c.djxh, c.tdczrmc, c.tdczrsfzjhm, c.czrsfzjzl_dm, c.zspm_dm from dj_tdjbxx a,dj_tdsyqkdjxx c where a.tdsybh=c.tdsybh AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= c.yxqz AND TO_DATE( ? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= c.yxqq )) AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE( ? , 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= c.yxqz)) and a.tdsybh = ? AND c.yxqq <= c.yxqz and c.fwtddjlx_dm = '2') n where n.tdsybh = m.tdsybh(+)
select t.uuid, t.sfxxbgbuuid, t.xh, t.hx_1, t.yttbka, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjtb_sj, t.yxbz from YH_FJMNSRXSSSXDDYQKBGB_YS t where t.sfxxbgbuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select T.DJXH, T.TZFHHHRMC, T.TZFHHHRZJZL_DM, T.TZFHHHRZJHM, T.GJHDQSZ_DM, T.DZ, T.FPBL, T.YXQQ, T.YXQZ, T.TZFHHRDJXH from DJ_TZFXX T where T.DJXH = ? and T.TZFHHHRZJZL_DM like '2%' and T.DZ is not null and T.FPBL is not null

select a.djxh, a.gdslx_dm, a.ssdabh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.djjg_dm, a.djrq, a.zzjg_dm, a.lrrq, a.kqccsztdjbz, b.djxh, b.hjszd, b.jyfw, b.zcdlxdh, b.zcdyzbm, b.scjydlxdh, b.scjydyzbm, b.hsfs_dm, b.cyrs, b.wjcyrs, b.hhrs, b.ggrs, b.gdgrs, b.zzjglx_dm, b.kjzdzz_dm, b.wz, b.swdlrlxdh, b.swdlrdzxx, b.zczb, b.tzze, b.zrrtzbl, b.wztzbl, b.gytzbl, b.gykglx_dm, b.zfjglx_dm, b.bzfs_dm, b.fddbrgddh, b.fddbryddh, b.fddbrdzxx, b.cwfzrxm, b.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, b.cwfzrsfzjhm, b.cwfzrgddh, b.cwfzryddh, b.cwfzrdzxx, b.bsrxm, b.bsrsfzjzl_dm, b.bsrsfzjhm, b.bsrgddh, b.bsryddh, b.bsrdzxx, b.lsswdjyxqq, b.lsswdjyxqz, b.swdlrnsrsbh, b.swdlrmc, b.whsyjsfjfxxdjbz, b.zzsjylb, b.yhsjnfs_dm, b.zsxmcxbz_dm, b.zzsqylx_dm, b.gjhdqsz_dm, b.ygznsrlx_dm, a.lrr_dm, a.shxydm, ZGSWJ_DM,ZGSWSKFJ_DM,SSGLY_DM,FJMQYBZ,SWDJBLBZ, pz.pzsljglx_dm,pz.pzsljg_dm,pz.pzsljgmc,pz.pzzmhwjh,pz.zzlx_dm,pz.zzhm, pz.kyslrq,pz.scjyqxq,pz.scjyqxz from dj_nsrxx a,dj_nsrxx_kz b,dj_pzjgxx pz where a.djxh=b.djxh AND a.djxh=pz.djxh(+) and a.djxh=?
select 1 from dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb a where a.gcxmbh = ?

select hznsuuid, djxh, lcslid, zfjglx_dm, yxqq, yxqz, fzjgcj_dm, hzhbnsqyjglb_dm, kdqsszyqylx_dm, bjdyjqysdsyy_dm, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, btsldqbs from dj_hznsqyxxbab t where t.hznsuuid = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select 1 from dj_bdcxmdjxx a where a.bdcxmbh = ?

select * from (select gs.*, rg.rgqfswjg_dm, rg.qrbz, rg.uuid from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx gs, wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx rg where gs.xh = rg.xh_2(+) and (1 = ? or gs.tyshxydm = ?) and (1 = ? or gs.nsrmc like ?) and gs.xxczlx = ? and gs.kyslrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and gs.kyslrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and (rg.yxbz = 'Y' or rg.yxbz is null) and (rg.zfbz_1 = 'N' or rg.yxbz is null) and (rg.zcbz = ? or rg.zcbz is null)) jg where (jg.rgqfswjg_dm = ? or (jg.rgqfswjg_dm is null and jg.qfjg_dm = ?))
select p_xh, tyshxydm, zzhm, zxyy, hzrq from wbjh_cj_sj_zxxx t

select a.zspm_dm code, a.zspmmc caption, a.jldw_dm, b.sl_1 from ( select t.zspm_dm, t.zspmmc, t.jldw_dm, t.yxbz, t.xybz from dm_gy_zspm t connect by prior t.zspm_dm = t.sjzspm_dm start with t.zspm_dm = ?)a, cs_gy_glb_zspm b where a.zspm_dm = b.zspm_dm and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.swjg_dm= ? and to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') between b.yxqq and b.yxqz

select a.zspm_dm code, a.zspmmc caption, a.sjzspm_dm , b.sl_1 sl, b.sl_1 zsl from dm_gy_zspm a, cs_gy_glb_zspm b where a.zspm_dm = b.zspm_dm and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and a.zsxm_dm= ? and b.swjg_dm= ?

select a.DJJG_DM, a.DJRQ, a.DJXH, a.DJZCLX_DM, a.DWLSGX_DM, a.FDDBRSFZJHM, a.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, a.FDDBRXM, a.FJMQYBZ, a.GDGHLX_DM, a.GDSLX_DM, a.HY_DM, a.JDXZ_DM, a.KQCCSZTDJBZ, a.KZZTDJLX_DM, a.LRRQ, a.LRR_DM, a.NSRMC, a.NSRSBH, a.NSRZT_DM, a.SCJYDZ, a.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, a.SJGSDQ, a.SJTB_SJ, a.SSDABH, a.SSGLY_DM, a.SWDJBLBZ, a.XGRQ, a.XGR_DM, a.ZCDZ, a.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, a.ZGSWJ_DM, a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, a.ZZJG_DM from dj_nsrxx a ,dj_ls_lsnsrxxzhb ls where a.ssdabh = ls.ssdabh and a.nsrzt_dm not in ('07','10') and a.yxbz='Y'

select t.uuid, t.shxydm, t.rgqfswjg_dm, t.qrbz, t.thswjg_dm, t.thyy, t.yxbz, t.zfbz_1, t.zcbz, t.czsj, t.czry_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.xh_2, t.clbz from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx t where t.xh_2 = ?

select clqkuuid, lcslid, djxh, clpzh, clsbdh, nynse, yxqq, yxqz, zspm_dm, ssswjg_dm, xzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, nsqx_dm, sbqx_dm, jkqx_dm, yskm_dm, ysfpbl_dm, sl_1, bz, zxrq, zxly, ysccczfs_dm, czrq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, skgk_dm, zbzl, hdzkrs, zxlcslid, pql, zszm_dm from dj_clqkxx where djxh=? and yxqq <=? and yxqz >=?
select q.xh_2 from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx q, dj_ls_djxhshxydm ls where ls.xh_2 = q.xh_2 and q.zybgbz is not null

select djxh, gdslx_dm, ssdabh, nsrsbh, m.shxydm, nsrmc, kzztdjlx_dm, djzclx_dm, fddbrxm, fddbrsfzjlx_dm, scjydz, fddbrsfzjhm, scjydzxzqhsz_dm, nsrzt_dm, hy_dm, zcdz, zcdzxzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, dwlsgx_dm, gdghlx_dm, djjg_dm, djrq, zzjg_dm, kqccsztdjbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, zgswj_dm, zgswskfj_dm, ssgly_dm, fjmqybz, swdjblbz, nsrbm from dj_nsrxx m where m.djxh in (select n.djxh from dj_wbnsrjydbydj n where (n.zfbz_1 = 'N' or n.zfbz_1 is null) and n.yxbz = 'Y' and n.wcjyhdssglzmbh in (select n.wcjyhdssglzmbh from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx n where n.djxh＝ ? and n.yxbz = 'Y')) AND m.yxbz = 'Y'
select UUID, ZCZB, HBSZ_DM, YXBZ, DJXH from dj_nsrxx_zczbxx_ygz z where z.djxh=?
select swry.swry_dm, swry.swryxm, swrysf.sfswjg_dm from dm_qx_swrysf swrysf, dm_gy_swry swry where swrysf.swry_dm = swry.swry_dm and ? between swrysf.sfyxqq and swrysf.sfyxqz and swrysf.sfswjg_dm = ?

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.kzztdjlx_dm, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.scjydz, kz.scjydlxdh, nsr.djzclx_dm, nsr.hy_dm, kz.jyfw, nsr.jdxz_dm, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm, nsr.kqccsztdjbz from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, dj_djhglgl gl where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and gl.djxh = nsr.djxh AND NSR.YXBZ='Y' and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and nsr.gdslx_dm = ? and nsr.kzztdjlx_dm !=? and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.jdxz_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrzt_dm = ?) and nsr.zgswj_dm = ? and (1=#macroparam# or nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or nsr.zgswskfj_dm is null ) and (1=#macroparam# or nsr.ssgly_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1=#macroparam# or nsr.ssgly_dm is null ) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.hy_dm in (select h.hy_dm from dm_gy_hy h where h.xlbz = 'Y' and h.xybz = 'Y' and h.yxbz = 'Y' start with h.hy_dm = ? connect by prior h.hy_dm = h.sjhy_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.djzclx_dm in (select d.djzclx_dm from dm_dj_djzclx d where d.xlbz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xlbz = 'Y' start with d.djzclx_dm = ? connect by prior d.djzclx_dm = d.sjdjzclx_dm)) and gl.lb_dm = ? and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between gl.yxqq and gl.yxqz and rownum < =2000

select t.glgluuid, t.djxh, t.lb_dm, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq from dj_djhglgl t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxqq < t.yxqz and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between t.yxqq and t.yxqz and exists (select 1 from cs_dj_zkzpxgmnsrglgljkxx d where d.lb_dm = t.lb_dm and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xybz = 'Y')

select t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.shxydm, t.scjydz, t.ssdabh, t.nsrmc, djzclx_DM, kzztdjlx_dm, NSRZT_DM, t.scjydz, t.fddbrxm, t.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, t.fddbrsfzjhm, t.zzjg_dm, p.pzsljglx_dm, p.pzsljg_dm, p.pzsljgmc, p.pzzmhwjh, p.zzlx_dm, p.zzhm, p.kyslrq, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm from dj_nsrxx t, dj_pzjgxx p where t.nsrmc = ? and (zzjg_dm = ? or (p.zzhm = ? and p.ZZLX_DM = ?)) and t.gdslx_dm = ? and t.kzztdjlx_dm = ? and t.djxh = p.djxh(+) and t.yxbz='Y' and t.nsrzt_dm != '07' and t.nsrzt_dm != '10'

select t.uuid, t.cxmlpc_dm, t.xnyqcxsccsyhcx_dm, t.clscqy_dm, t.clxh, t.tymc, t.cpmc_1, t.fdjpl, t.hdzkrs, t.xs_1, t.dws, t.pfbz_1, t.rlxhl, t.zhgkrlxhl, t.zczbzl, t.rlnyzlmc, t.ztgczzl, t.zdsjzzl, t.clcp, t.cddxslc, t.dlxdczzzl, t.dlxdczznl, t.jmzlx_dm, t.bz, t.qdr_dm, t.qdrq, t.qdswjg_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.jnxqclb_dm from yh_ccsssyhqccxml t, yh_ls_clxh ls where (t.clxh = ls.clxh or t.tymc||t.clxh = ls.clxh) and t.cxmlpc_dm in ( #macroparam#) and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N')

select t.cwkjzdbauuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.kjzdzz_dm, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.cwkjzdbz, t.dzyhptxff_dm, t.dzyhptxffbz, t.zjffbz, t.cbhsffbz, t.kjhsrjmc, t.kjhsrjbz, t.kjhsrjbbh, t.kjhsrjqysj, t.kjhsrjsjklxmc, t.zjfsdl_dm, t.zjfsxl_dm, t.cbhsff_dm, t.kjzdzz_dm, t.kcyqzyqyktzctxff_dm, t.kcyqzyqykqqyzczhff_dm, t.kcyqzyqykfzczjff_dm, t.zlbsxl_dm from dj_cwkjzdjhsrjbabgs t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select d.zspm_dm from rd_sfzrdxxb d where d.zsxm_dm = ? and d.yxbz = 'Y' and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') between d.rdyxqq and d.rdyxqz and d.djxh in (select t.djxh from rd_sfzrdxxb t where t.djxh = ? and t.zsxm_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') between t.rdyxqq and t.rdyxqz group by t.djxh having count(*) = 1 )

select wcjyzmuuid, djxh, lcslid, wcjydxzqhsz_dm, wcjyd, swjgjg, zg, nh, wh, bylcslid, wcjyhdssglzmbh, swdjd, swdjdswjgyj, ywcjyhdssglzmbh, jyfsdmjh, jdxz_dm, swjgjbrxm, swjgjbrqzrq, swjgfzrxm, swjgfzrqzrq, wszzrq, zmyxqxq, zmyxqxz, wcjyhtzje, hxrq, hxlcslid, byrq, ywpzuuid, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj, jydswjg_dm, jydswjgmc, dzwgzbz, wcjyhdssglzmffdw, yxbz, swjgmc, lxr, lxdh, wcjyzhy_dm, htdfnsrsbh, htdfnsrmc, htdfnsrdjxh, swjglxdh, qysdsgljgbz, jbr, jbrzj, jbrsj, lxrsj, kjzmuuid, kjswjg_dm from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx w where w.wcjyhdssglzmbh = ? AND W.YXBZ = ?

select mx.GJJGPTJZL, mx.GJJGPTJJEY from zm_ptjghglzmdhxxx t, zm_ptjghglzmdhx_mxxx mx where t.zmdhm = ? and t.ghfdjxh = ? and mx.ptjzmhxuuid = t.ptjzmhxuuid and mx.yxbz = 'Y'

select rduuid, lcslid, djxh, swsx_dm, jwzcqymcyw, gjhdqsz_dm, fddbr, qdr_dm, qdrq, qdswjg_dm, zgswj_dm, cwjcbz, rsjcbz, cwdacfbz, tpqryjzbz, gshh, rdjmsfnd, lxr, lxdh, wszg, zstybz, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1 from rd_jwzczzgl t where t.djxh=? and t.swsx_dm=? and t.zfbz_1!='Y'

select a.BDCXMUUID,a.LCSLID,a.BDCXMBH,a.BDCXMMC,a.XMDZ,a.DJXH,a.XMYT_DM,a.XMZTZ,a.GCZZJ,a.KGRQ,a.YJJGRQ, a.YJSFRQ,a.XMSZDSWJG_DM,a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM,a.SSGLY_DM,a.XMGLQSRQ,a.BZ,a.XZQHSZ_DM,a.JDXZ_DM, a.XMFZR,a.LXFS,a.LRR_DM,a.LRRQ,a.XGR_DM,a.XGRQ,a.SJGSDQ,a.ZXRQ,a.YXBZ from dj_bdcxmdjxx a where a.bdcxmbh = ? and a.zxrq is null and a.yxbz = 'Y'

update rd_sfzrdxxb r set r.zgswskfj_dm = (select d.nsrsbh from dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh d where d.djxh = r.djxh), r.xgr_dm = ?, r.xgrq = sysdate where exists(select 1 from dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh d where d.djxh = r.djxh)

select a.djxh, a.gdslx_dm, a.ssdabh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.djjg_dm, a.djrq, a.zzjg_dm, a.lrrq, a.kqccsztdjbz, a.jyfw, a.zcdlxdh, a.zcdyzbm, a.scjydlxdh, a.scjydyzbm, a.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, a.cwfzrsfzjhm, a.cwfzryddh, a.lrr_dm, a.shxydm, a.Zgswj_Dm, a.Zgswskfj_Dm, a.Ssgly_Dm, a.zzlx_dm from dj_zcdnsrjbxx_ks a WHERE a.djxh=?

SELECT DJXH , JMSSPSX_DM , ZSXM_DM , ZSPM_DM , SSYHLX_DM , JMQXQ , JMQXZ , JZFD , JZSL , JZED , SJGSDQ , JMXMDL_DM , JMXMXL_DM, JMWJ_DM , JMLX_DM , NYNSE , NJMSE , SJNYNSE , JMZLX_DM , UUID , ZBUUID , SFQY FROM dj_zxswdj_qyyhxx z WHERE z.lcslid=?

SELECT t.shxydm, t.xh_2, t.swjg_dm, t.zzhm, t.rq, t.nsrsbh, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.hy_dm, t.scjydz, t.nsrmc, t.jyfw, t.kyslrq ,t.zzjg_dm, t.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, t.fddbrsfzjhm FROM dj_ls_djxhshxydm t WHERE not exists ( SELECT 1 from dj_nsrxx n where n.nsrmc = t.nsrmc and (n.kzztdjlx_dm = ? or n.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%') and (1 = #macroparam# or n.zzjg_dm =t.zzjg_dm) and (1 = #macroparam# or n.fddbrsfzjhm = t.fddbrsfzjhm) and (1 = #macroparam# or n.fddbrsfzjlx_dm = t.fddbrsfzjlx_dm) and n.yxbz = ? and n.nsrzt_dm not in (?, ?) and n.kqccsztdjbz =? and n.nsrztlx_dm is null and n.shxydm is null)
select t.uuid, t.djxh, t.gdmc, t.gdzcdz, t.gdjmg_dm, t.yxbz, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjtb_sj, t.sfxxbgbuuid from YH_FJMNSRSSJMSFXXBGB_GDXX t where t.sfxxbgbuuid = ?
select fy.hy_dm from dj_nsrfyhyxx fy where fy.djxh = ? and fy.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.dwzfbauuid, t.lcslid, t.swwstybh, t.djxh, t.jnzfrnsrsbh, t.jnzfrdmc, t.jnzfrlxrxm, t.jnzfrlxdh, t.jnzfrdzhzs, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.jnzfrfhyx_dm, t.yhyywd_dm, t.jnzfrfhzh, t.jwskfmc, t.jwskfdz, t.jwskrshyxmc, t.jwskrshzh, t.jwskfssgjhdqsz_dm, t.jnwjgglbz, t.hthm, t.hthxymc, t.htzje, t.htzjebzsz_dm, t.yjfhrq, t.htzxqxq, t.htzxqxz, t.zgswjg_ds_dm, t.zgswjg_gs_dm, t.zgswjgmc, t.dsjgglm, t.lrrq from zm_fwmydxmdwzfswba t where t.djxh = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select t.glgluuid, t.djxh, t.lb_dm, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq from dj_djhglgl t where t.djxh = ? and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between t.yxqq and t.yxqz and exists (select 1 from cs_dj_zkzpxgmnsrglgljkxx d where d.lb_dm = t.lb_dm and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xybz = 'Y')

SELECT nsr.DJXH, GDSLX_DM, SSDABH , nsr.NSRSBH , nsr.shxydm, NSRMC , KZZTDJLX_DM , DJZCLX_DM , FDDBRXM , FDDBRSFZJLX_DM , SCJYDZ , FDDBRSFZJHM , SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM , NSRZT_DM , HY_DM , ZCDZ , ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM , JDXZ_DM , DWLSGX_DM , GDGHLX_DM , DJJG_DM , DJRQ , ZZJG_DM , KQCCSZTDJBZ , ZGSWJ_DM , ZGSWSKFJ_DM , SSGLY_DM, kz.zcdlxdh, kz.jyfw FROM DJ_NSRXX NSR, DJ_LS_DJXHNSRSBH LS,dj_nsrxx_kz kz WHERE NSR.NSRSBH = LS.NSRSBH AND nsr.djxh=kz.djxh AND NSR.NSRZT_DM != '10' AND NSR.NSRZT_DM != '07' AND nsr.nsrzt_dm!='08' AND nsr.gdslx_dm=? AND NSR.YXBZ='Y'

select djxh, gdslx_dm, ssdabh, nsrsbh, shxydm, nsrmc, kzztdjlx_dm, djzclx_dm, fddbrxm, fddbrsfzjlx_dm, scjydz, fddbrsfzjhm, scjydzxzqhsz_dm, nsrzt_dm, hy_dm, zcdz, zcdzxzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, dwlsgx_dm, gdghlx_dm, djjg_dm, djrq, zzjg_dm, kqccsztdjbz, zgswj_dm, zgswskfj_dm, ssgly_dm from dj_nsrxx n where n.shxydm = ? and n.nsrzt_dm = ? and n.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.fczyz, b.fwqsuuid, b.fwcqzsh, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz, c.djxh, c.fwsyqkuuid, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.lcslid, c.zspm_dm, c.fcyz, c.msyz, c.ysyz, c.nynse, c.nzjsr, c.zsfcsbz, c.sl_1, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.sbqx_dm, c.nsqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.syzyfs_dm, c.bz, c.kcl, C.PKBZ from dj_fyjbxx a, dj_fwqsxx b,dj_fwsyqkdjxx c where a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid and a.fyjbxxuuid=c.fyjbxxuuid and b.syqsyxqq <= ? and b.syqsyxqz >= ? and c.yxqz>c.yxqq and a.yxbz='Y' and c.fwtddjlx_dm in(#macroparam#) and (a.ssswjg_dm =? or 1 =?) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and b.djxh = ? and a.fybh = ?

select a.jzygcxmuuid, b.gcxmbh, b.gcxmmc, b.zgswskfj_dm, b.ZDXMBZ, a.wcjyhdssglzmbh, c.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxz as zmyxqxz from DJ_JZYXMDJ_WCJYHDSSGLZMXX a, DJ_JZYGCXMQKDJXXB b, dj_wbnsrjydbydj c where a.jzygcxmuuid = b.jzygcxmuuid and a.wcjyhdssglzmbh = c.wcjyhdssglzmbh and c.djxh = b.djxh and (c.wcjyhdssglzmbh = ? OR 1= #macroparam#) and (a.djxh = ? OR 1= #macroparam#) and c.yxbz = 'Y'

select d.bydjuuid, d.wcjyzmuuid, d.djxh, d.lcslid, d.wcjyhdssglzmbh, d.swdjd, d.wcjyd, d.wcjyhtzje, d.swdjdswjgyj, d.wcjydswjgyj, d.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxq, d.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxz, d.wcjyhdssglzmqfrq, d.bsrxm, d.lxdh, d.sqrq, d.bysj, d.sblcslid, d.ywcjyhdssglzmbh, d.lrr_dm, d.lrrq, d.xgr_dm, d.xgrq, d.jyfsdmjh, d.scjydswjgmc, d.scjydswjglxdh, d.jgszdqysdszsfs_dm, d.jgszdqysdshsjgmc, d.jgszdqysdshsjg_dm from dj_wbnsrjydbydj d where d.djxh = ? and d.sblcslid is not null and (d.zfbz_1 = 'N' or d.zfbz_1 is null) and d.yxbz = 'Y'

select SSDABH, NSRSBH, NSRMC, KZZTDJLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, SCJYDZ, FDDBRSFZJHM, SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM, HY_DM, ZCDZ, ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM, GDGHLX_DM, ZZJG_DM, HJSZD, JYFW, ZCDLXDH, ZCDYZBM, SCJYDLXDH, SCJYDYZBM, HSFS_DM, CYRS, WJCYRS, HHRS, GGRS, GDGRS, ZZJGLX_DM, KJZDZZ_DM, WZ, SWDLRLXDH, SWDLRDZXX, ZCZB, TZZE, ZRRTZBL, WZTZBL, GYTZBL, GYKGLX_DM, ZFJGLX_DM, BZFS_DM, FDDBRGDDH, FDDBRYDDH, FDDBRDZXX, CWFZRXM, CWFZRSFZJZL_DM, CWFZRSFZJHM, CWFZRGDDH, CWFZRYDDH, CWFZRDZXX, BSRXM, BSRSFZJZL_DM, BSRSFZJHM, BSRGDDH, BSRYDDH, BSRDZXX, LSSWDJYXQQ, LSSWDJYXQZ, SWDLRNSRSBH, SWDLRMC, ZZSJYLB, GJHDQSZ_DM, YGZNSRLX_DM, ZJGNSRSBH, ZJGMC, ZJGZCDZ, ZJGZCDZYZBM, YXQQ, ZJGFDDBRXM, YXQZ, ZJGLXDH, ZJGJYFW, PZSLJGLX_DM, PZSLJG_DM, PZSLJGMC, PZZMHWJH, ZZLX_DM, ZZHM, KYSLRQ, SCJYQXQ, SCJYQXZ, LRRQ, TYSHXYDM, NSRSWJG, SCZTBH, XXCZLX, GLOBALBUSINESSID, XH from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx g where (1 = ? or g.scjydzxzqhsz_dm in ( #macroparam#)) and (1 = ? or g.tyshxydm = ?) and (1 = ? or g.kyslrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))

select DJXH, GDSLX_DM, SSDABH, nsr.shxydm, nsr.NSRSBH, nsr.NSRMC, KZZTDJLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, SCJYDZ, FDDBRSFZJHM, SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM, HY_DM, ZCDZ, ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM, GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM, DJRQ, ZZJG_DM, KQCCSZTDJBZ, nsr.ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ, SWDJBLBZ, SJTB_SJ, NSRBM from dj_nsrxx nsr, (select n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.zgswj_dm, n.shxydm from dj_nsrxx n where n.kzztdjlx_dm = '1140' and n.djxh = ?) n where (nsr.nsrsbh = n.nsrsbh or nsr.shxydm = n.shxydm) and nsr.nsrmc = n.nsrmc and nsr.zgswj_dm = n.zgswj_dm and nsr.yxbz = 'Y'

SELECT YBNSRSQUUID , DJXH , LCSLID, HDSLID, SQLX, HSDZ, NSRLB_DM , NSRZY_DM, XKYNSRBZ, YSXSE, RDQXSEJSRQQ, RDQXSEJSRQZ, FDDBRYDDH, CWFZRXM , CWFZRSFZJZL_DM, CWFZRSFZJHM, BSRXM, BSRSFZJZL_DM, BSRSFZJHM, BSRYDDH, BBLZZSYBNSRZGRDLX_DM, YWPZUUID , RDYXQQ, SFSXFDQGL, FDQGLRQQ, FDQGLRQZ, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, rd.lrrq FROM rd_ybnsrrdsqspb rd WHERE rd.lcslid=?

select rd.rdpzuuid, rd.djxh, rd.zfsbz, rd.rdzsuuid, rd.zsxm_dm, rd.zspm_dm, rd.rdyxqq, rd.rdyxqz, rd.hy_dm, rd.sbqx_dm, rd.nsqx_dm, rd.jkqx_dm, rd.slhdwse, rd.yskm_dm, rd.ysfpbl_dm, rd.skgk_dm, rd.zsdlfs_dm, rd.zgswskfj_dm, rd.sjgsdq, rd.zszm_dm, rd.zsl, rd.yxbz, rd.lrrq, RD.Gfjbjg_Dm, RD.Zsxmcxbz_Dm, RD.Jfjc_Dm from rd_sfzrdxxb rd, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh lsb where rd.djxh = lsb.djxh and rd.yxbz = 'Y' and rd.rdyxqz > rd.rdyxqq

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.shxydm, nsr.scjydz, nsr.djzclx_dm, nsr.hy_dm, kz.jyfw, nsr.jdxz_dm, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm yzgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, dj_djhglgl gl where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and gl.djxh = nsr.djxh AND nsr.yxbz='Y' and nsr.gdslx_dm = ? and nsr.zgswj_dm = ? and (1=? or nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1=? or nsr.zgswskfj_dm is null ) and (1 = ? or nsr.ssgly_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or nsr.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or nsr.jdxz_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm) and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != ? and (1 = ? or nsr.hy_dm in (select h.hy_dm from dm_gy_hy h where h.xlbz = 'Y' and h.xybz = 'Y' and h.yxbz = 'Y' start with h.hy_dm = ? connect by prior h.hy_dm = h.sjhy_dm)) and (1 = ? or nsr.djzclx_dm in (select d.djzclx_dm from dm_dj_djzclx d where d.xlbz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xlbz = 'Y' start with d.djzclx_dm = ? connect by prior d.djzclx_dm = d.sjdjzclx_dm)) and gl.lb_dm = ? and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between gl.yxqq and gl.yxqz and rownum < 900

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.fczyz, c.fwsyqkuuid, c.djxh, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.lcslid, c.zspm_dm, c.fcyz, c.msyz, c.ysyz, c.nynse, c.nzjsr, c.zsfcsbz, c.sl_1, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.sbqx_dm, c.nsqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.czrmc, c.czrsfzjzl_dm, c.czrsfzjhm, c.bz, c.kcl, c.syzyfs_dm, c.PKBZ from dj_fyjbxx a,dj_fwsyqkdjxx c where a.fyjbxxuuid=c.fyjbxxuuid and c.yxqz>c.yxqq and c.fwtddjlx_dm='2' and a.yxbz='Y' and (a.ssswjg_dm =? or 1 =?) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and c.djxh = ?

select t.wcjyhdqksbuuid, t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.wcjyhdssglzmbh, t.sjjyqjq, t.sjjyqjz, t.ddrq, t.bysj, t.jydz, t.hwcfdd, t.swjgyj, t.shswjg_dm, t.shr_dm, t.shrq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.bydjuuid, t.zfbz_1, t.zfrq_1, t.zfr_dm from dj_wcjyhdqksbbxx t where lcslid = ? and (zfbz_1 = 'N' or zfbz_1 is null)

select rd.rdpzuuid, rd.djxh, rd.zfsbz, rd.rdzsuuid, rd.zsxm_dm, rd.zspm_dm, rd.zszm_dm, rd.rdyxqq, rd.rdyxqz, rd.hy_dm, rd.sbqx_dm, rd.nsqx_dm, rd.jkqx_dm, rd.yskm_dm, rd.ysfpbl_dm, rd.skgk_dm, rd.zsdlfs_dm, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.jdxz_dm, nsr.djzclx_dm, nsr.jdxz_dm, nsr.dwlsgx_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm, nsr.shxydm, rd.zgswskfj_dm, p.kyslrq, rd.gfjbjg_dm, rd.zsxmcxbz_dm, rd.jfjc_dm from dm_qx_znjgdzb csb, rd_sfzrdxxb rd, dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_pzjgxx p where csb.hsjg_dm = ? and csb.gljg_dm = rd.zgswskfj_dm and rd.djxh = nsr.djxh and nsr.djxh = p.djxh(+) and rd.rdyxqq < = ? and rd.rdyxqz > = ? and rd.rdyxqz > rd.rdyxqq and rd.zsdlfs_dm = ? and rd.zgswskfj_dm = ? and nsr.nsrzt_dm != '07' and nsr.nsrzt_dm != '05' and nsr.nsrzt_dm != '08' and rd.yxbz = 'Y' and nsr.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.fczyz, b.djxh, b.fwcqzsh, b.syqsyxqz from dj_fyjbxx a,dj_fwqsxx b where a.fyjbxxuuid = b.fyjbxxuuid(+) and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.fybh = ? and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) and not EXISTS (select 1 from dj_fyjbxx c, dj_fwqsxx d where c.fyjbxxuuid = d.fyjbxxuuid and d.syqsyxqz >= ? and c.yxbz = 'Y' and d.zxrq is null and a.fybh=? and (c.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (c.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (c.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) and a.fyjbxxuuid = c.fyjbxxuuid )

select k.scjydlxdh, a.DJJG_DM, a.DJRQ, a.DJXH, a.DJZCLX_DM, a.DWLSGX_DM, a.FDDBRSFZJHM, a.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, a.FDDBRXM, a.FJMQYBZ, a.GDGHLX_DM, a.GDSLX_DM, a.HY_DM, a.JDXZ_DM, a.KQCCSZTDJBZ, a.KZZTDJLX_DM, a.LRRQ, a.LRR_DM, a.NSRMC, a.NSRSBH, a.NSRZT_DM, a.SCJYDZ, a.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, a.SJGSDQ, a.SJTB_SJ, a.SSDABH, a.SSGLY_DM, a.SWDJBLBZ, a.XGRQ, a.XGR_DM, a.ZCDZ, a.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, a.ZGSWJ_DM, a.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, a.shxydm, a.ZZJG_DM from dj_nsrxx a ,dj_nsrxx_kz k,dj_ls_lsnsrxxzhb ls where a.djxh = ls.djxh and a.djxh=k.djxh and a.nsrzt_dm not in ('07','10') and a.yxbz='Y'

select sq.djxh,mx.xdsl from rd_ssxddysqspb sq, rd_ssxddyspsqmxb mx where sq.djxh = ? and sq.xduuid = mx.xduuid and sq.yxqq<=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and (sq.yxqz>=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') or sq.yxqz is null) and sq.zstybz = 'Y' and mx.yxbz = 'Y'

AND xybz='Y'

select distinct zm.wcjyzmuuid, a.djxh, h.wcjyzmhxuuid, zm.kjzmuuid, h.wcjyhdssglzmbh, zm.wcjydxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, hw.wcjyhwmc htmc from dj_nsrxx a, zm_wcjyzmhxxx h, zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx zm, zm_wcjyhdssglzm_hwxx hw where a.djxh = zm.djxh and h.wcjyzmuuid = zm.wcjyzmuuid and zm.wcjyzmuuid = hw.wcjyzmuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or a.zgswj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zm.wcjydxzqhsz_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.nsrsbh = ? or a.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zm.wcjyhdssglzmbh like ?) and h.qrhxbz = ? and a.yxbz = ? and zm.yxbz = ? and hw.yxbz = ? and nvl(zm.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and nvl(h.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and h.lrrq between ? and ?

select b.hznsmxuuid, b.hznsuuid, b.lcslid, b.djxh, b.zsxm_dm, b.bhznsrsfsqbz, b.bhzrdjxh, b.bhznsqynsrsbh, b.bhznsqynsrmc, b.sbjnfs_dm, b.yzl, b.desl_1, b.bhznsrynsms, b.hznsyxqq, b.hznsyxqz, b.bhznsqydz, b.bhznsqydjzclx_dm, b.bhznsqysysl, b.bhznsqysfwfzjgbz, b.hznsfw_dm, b.sjgsdq, n.nsrzt_dm from rd_hznsqyrdsq_mxb b, dj_nsrxx n, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, rd_nsrzgxx_jgb rd where b.djxh = ? and b.djxh = kz.djxh and b.djxh = rd.djxh and b.bhzrdjxh = n.djxh and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN rd.yxqq and rd.sjzzrq and rd.nsrzglx_dm = ? and rd.yxqq <= rd.yxqz and (rd.zfbz_1 = 'N' or rd.ZFBZ_1 is null) and rd.qxbz = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or b.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or kz.hsfs_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ((b.hznsyxqz is null or to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.hznsyxqz) and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= b.hznsyxqq)) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hznsyxqz is null or to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.hznsyxqz) and b.yxbz = 'Y'
SELECT SJZJQKUUID, ZXUUID , LCSLID , DJXH , SWZJZL_DM, SWZJHM , SJSWZJSL , SJGSDQ FROM dj_zxswdjsq_sjswzjqk s WHERE s.lcslid=? and s.yxbz='Y'
update dj_nsrzgswjgbgxx z set z.yxqz=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') where z.djxh=? and ? between z.yxqq and z.yxqz and yxbz='Y'

select YZQCUUID , DJXH , SWJG_DM, YZBZ, YZND, YZQXQ , YZQXZ , lrrq, YZLCSLID, YZRQ, SWZJZL_DM, SFWFWZ, YWPZUUID , SQYJ , SWJGYJ from DJ_NSRYZQC q where q.djxh = ? and q.yzrq is null and q.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select xduuid, djxh, lcslid, hdslid, nsrjndz, nsrlx_dm, jnlxdh, jnyzbm, nsrjwdz, jwlxdh, jwyzbm, fhgdly, sqrxmyw, flmc, flyjt, flyjk, gjhdqsz_dm, cjzmswjgmc, cjzmrq, yxqq, yxqz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, ywpzuuid, zstybz, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, dsfmc, nsrgcrhdsfssjmbz, dlsbjbr, dlsbrq, slswsx_dm, fjmxxssxddysqspyj_dm, yqsprq, yqsply, htbh, slswjg_dm, slr_dm, slrq from rd_ssxddysqspb where lcslid = ? and djxh= ?

insert into dj_nsrxx (DJXH, GDSLX_DM, SSDABH, NSRSBH, NSRMC, KZZTDJLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, SCJYDZ, FDDBRSFZJHM, SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM, HY_DM, ZCDZ, ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM, GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM, DJRQ, ZZJG_DM, KQCCSZTDJBZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ, SWDJBLBZ, SJTB_SJ, NSRBM, YXBZ, SHXYDM) values ('12440100000998573140', '2', '724304528', '440106724304528', '广州市鹰科工程造价咨询有限公司', '1120', '173', '李洪波', '201', '广州市天河区天河北路179号1810-1812房（本住所限写字楼功能）', '440112197111090331', '440106', '03', '7481', '广州市天河区天河北路179号1810-1812房（本住所限写字楼功能）', '440106', '440106001', '90', '1', '24401060028', to_date('18-08-2003', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '724304528', 'N', '24401701003', to_date('25-08-2000', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '24406060735', to_date('28-07-2015 10:29:26', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24401060028', '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060439', 'Y', 'Y', '12-12月-14 02.48.27.000000 下午', '2345678901', 'Y', '12345')

select t.ffuuid, t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.sy, t.yj_1, t.zgswjg_dm zgswj_dm, t.bgdz swjgdz, t.lxdh swjglxdh, t.wszzrq, t.wszzswjg_dm, t.yxbz, t.dybz, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.wszg, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.zcdz, t.yzgswjg_dm, t.wszzswjgmc from dj_zgswjskfjfp_ffxx t, dj_nsrxx nsr where t.yxbz = ? and t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = nsr.djxh and nsr.yxbz = ?

select mx.lrrq,mx.xdsl,mx.yxqq,mx.yxqz from rd_ssxddysqspb sq, rd_ssxddyspsqmxb mx where sq.djxh = ? and sq.djxh = mx.djxh and mx.yxqq<=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and mx.yxqz >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and sq.zstybz = 'Y' and mx.yxbz = 'Y'
SELECT E.JYBFZSZZSHWLX_DM, E.QX FROM CS_RD_JYBFZSLXQXPZB E WHERE E.JYBFZSZZSHWLX_DM = ? AND E.YXBZ = 'Y' AND E.XYBZ = 'Y'

select uuid, gsdjxh, dsdjxh, fqrq, wcjyhdssglzmbh, sfybjbz, bjsj, bjfs, rwuuid, jbr_dm, ywlx, dqbljg, qdswjgmc, yxbz, sjgsdq, lrr_dm, lrrq, sjtb_sj, xgr_dm, xgrq, wcjyhdqksbuuid, gswcjyhdqksbuuid from dj_wcjyqksbqdrw b where b.sfybjbz = ? and b.dqbljg is null and b.yxbz = ? and b.fqrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select g.gw_dm, g.swjg_dm, g.gwxh, sf.swrysf_dm from qx_swjg_gw g, qx_jggw_swrysf sf where g.gwxh = sf.gwxh and g.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and (exists (select 1 from qx_gw_xtgn x where g.gw_dm = x.gw_dm AND X.YXBZ = 'Y' and x.xtgn_dm = ?) or exists (select 1 from qx_gw_gnj gnj, dm_qx_gnj dm,qx_gnj_xtgn xtgn where g.gw_dm = gnj.gw_dm AND gnj.gnj_dm = dm.gnj_dm and gnj.gnj_dm = xtgn.gnj_dm and xtgn.xtgn_dm = ? and gnj.yxbz = 'Y' AND xtgn.yxbz = 'Y' and dm.yxbz = 'Y')) AND G.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SF.YXBZ = 'Y'
select t.zspm_dm from cs_dj_ygzsdzzspmyzspmdzb t where t.ygzsdzzspm_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y'
select t.uuid,t.pzzl_dm,t.pzzg_dm,t.pzhm,t.zsxm_dm,t.zspm_dm,t.sjje,t.dzsphm from dj_wcjyhdqksbbxx_wsxx t where t.wcjyhdqksbuuid = ?

select xyjjguuid, hznsuuid, djxh, xyjjgdjxh, zgswjgmc, nsrsbh, nsrmc, zcdz, zcdyzbm, zfjglx_dm, fzjgcj_dm, bjdyjqysdsyy_dm, zgswjg_dm, zgswjgdz, zgswjgyzbm, hjqylx_dm, jdjnbs, kdqsszyqylx_dm, yxbz, '' shxydm from Dj_Hznsqyxxbab_Xyjgxx t where t.hznsuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and (xyjjgdjxh = '0' or xyjjgdjxh is null) union all select xyjjguuid, hznsuuid, t.djxh, xyjjgdjxh, zgswjgmc, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.zcdz, k.zcdyzbm, t.zfjglx_dm, fzjgcj_dm, bjdyjqysdsyy_dm, n.zgswj_dm zgswjg_dm, t.zgswjgdz, t.zgswjgyzbm, t.hjqylx_dm, jdjnbs, kdqsszyqylx_dm, t.yxbz, n.shxydm from Dj_Hznsqyxxbab_Xyjgxx t, dj_nsrxx n, dj_nsrxx_kz k where t.xyjjgdjxh = n.djxh and n.djxh = k.djxh and t.hznsuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' AND N.yxbz = 'Y'

select x.rdpzuuid, x.djxh, x.zfsbz, x.rdzsuuid, x.zsxm_dm, x.zspm_dm, x.zszm_dm, x.rdyxqq, x.rdyxqz, x.hy_dm, x.sbqx_dm, x.nsqx_dm, x.slhdwse, x.yskm_dm, x.zsl, x.ysfpbl_dm, x.skgk_dm, x.jkqx_dm, x.zsdlfs_dm, x.zgswskfj_dm, x.lrr_dm, x.lrrq, x.xgr_dm, x.xgrq, x.sjgsdq, x.yxbz, x.gfjbjg_dm, x.zsxmcxbz_dm, x.jfjc_dm from rd_sfzrdxxb x where x.djxh = ? and (1=? or x.zsxm_dm =?) and (1=? or x.zspm_dm =?) and (1=? or x.zszm_dm =?) and (1=? or x.zsdlfs_dm =?) and x.rdyxqq = to_date('9999-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and x.yxbz = 'Y'

with test_fzjg as (select a.fzjghfddjxh,a.djxh from dj_fzjgxx a where a.djxh =? and a.fzjghfddjxh != 0 and a.yxqz > a.yxqq and a.yxqz >= ? ) select b.fzjghfddjxh, c.nsrsbh, c.shxydm, b.djxh from dj_fzjgxx b, dj_nsrxx c where b.fzjghfddjxh = c.djxh and c.yxbz=? and b.djxh != ? and b.fzjghfddjxh != 0 and b.yxqz > b.yxqq and b.yxqz >= ? and b.fzjghfddjxh in (select fzjghfddjxh from test_fzjg)

SELECT XJ.XYJJGDJXH, XJ.NSRSBH, XJ.NSRMC, '' shxydm, XJ.ZCDZ, XJ.ZGSWJG_DM, xj.ZGSWJGMC, xj.zfjglx_dm, xj.fzjgcj_dm, xj.bjdyjqysdsyy_dm, xj.hjqylx_dm, xj.jdjnbs, xj.kdqsszyqylx_dm FROM DJ_HZNSQYXXBAB_XYJGXX XJ, DJ_HZNSQYXXBAB BA WHERE XJ.HZNSUUID = BA.HZNSUUID AND XJ.DJXH = ? AND BA.YXQQ < = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND BA.YXQZ > = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND XJ.YXBZ = 'Y' AND BA.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND XJ.XYJJGDJXH = '0' UNION ALL SELECT XJ.XYJJGDJXH, NSR.NSRSBH, NSR.NSRMC, NSR.shxydm, NSR.ZCDZ, NSR.ZGSWJ_DM ZGSWJG_DM, XJ.ZGSWJGMC, xj.zfjglx_dm, xj.fzjgcj_dm, xj.bjdyjqysdsyy_dm, xj.hjqylx_dm, xj.jdjnbs, xj.kdqsszyqylx_dm FROM DJ_HZNSQYXXBAB_XYJGXX XJ, DJ_HZNSQYXXBAB BA, DJ_NSRXX NSR WHERE XJ.XYJJGDJXH = NSR.DJXH AND XJ.HZNSUUID = BA.HZNSUUID AND XJ.DJXH = ? AND BA.YXQQ < = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND BA.YXQZ > = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND XJ.YXBZ = 'Y' AND BA.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND XJ.XYJJGDJXH != '0' and nsr.YXBZ = 'Y' UNION ALL select d.djxh XYJJGDJXH, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc, n.shxydm, n.zcdz, n.zgswj_dm zgswjg_dm, '' ZGSWJGMC, d.zfjglx_dm, '' fzjgcj_dm, d.bjdyjqysdsyy_dm, d.hjqylx_dm, d.jdjnbs, d.kdqsszyqylx_dm from dj_hznsqyxxbab_dlscjybm d, dj_hznsqyxxbab b, dj_nsrxx n where b.djxh = n.djxh and d.hznsuuid = b.hznsuuid and n.djxh = ? and b.yxqq < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.yxqz > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and d.yxbz = 'Y' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and n.YXBZ = 'Y'

SELECT nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.shxydm, nsr.fddbrxm, nsr.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, nsr.fddbrsfzjhm, nsrkz.fddbrgddh, nsr.zcdz, nsr.scjydz, nsrkz.scjydyzbm, '1' zjsxyy_dm, fzc.fzchrduuid, fzc.rdrq, zj.zjjcuuid, zj.swzjzl_dm, zj.swzjhm, zj.swzjglzt_dm, zj.lcslid FROM dj_fzchrdxx fzc, dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz nsrkz, dj_nsrzjjcxx zj where fzc.djxh = nsr.djxh and fzc.djxh = zj.djxh and nsr.djxh = nsrkz.djxh and nsr.nsrzt_dm != '03' and fzc.rdrq < ? and nsr.zgswj_dm = ? and zj.swzjglzt_dm = ? and fzc.xgsxrq is null and fzc.ggrq is not null and zj.swzjzl_dm in ('11', '01', '02', '03', '04') and (nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ? or 1 = ?) and nsr.yxbz='Y'
select c.zgswjguuid, c.djxh, c.yxbz, c.zgswj_dm, c.zgswskfj_dm, c.zgswjgtssx_dm, c.ssgly_dm from dj_nsrzgswjgxx c where c.djxh=?

select nsr.DJJG_DM, nsr.DJRQ, nsr.DJXH, nsr.DJZCLX_DM, nsr.DWLSGX_DM, nsr.FDDBRSFZJHM, nsr.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, nsr.FDDBRXM, nsr.FJMQYBZ, nsr.GDGHLX_DM, nsr.GDSLX_DM, nsr.HY_DM, nsr.JDXZ_DM, nsr.KQCCSZTDJBZ, nsr.KZZTDJLX_DM, nsr.LRRQ, nsr.LRR_DM, nsr.NSRMC, nsr.NSRSBH, nsr.NSRZT_DM, nsr.SCJYDZ, nsr.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, nsr.SJGSDQ, nsr.SSDABH, nsr.SSGLY_DM, nsr.SWDJBLBZ, nsr.XGRQ, nsr.XGR_DM, nsr.ZCDZ, nsr.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, nsr.ZGSWJ_DM, nsr.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, nsr.ZZJG_DM, nsr.shxydm, kz.BSRDZXX, kz.BSRGDDH, kz.BSRSFZJHM, kz.BSRSFZJZL_DM, kz.BSRXM, kz.BSRYDDH, kz.BZFS_DM, kz.CWFZRDZXX, kz.CWFZRGDDH, kz.CWFZRSFZJHM, kz.CWFZRSFZJZL_DM, kz.CWFZRXM, kz.CWFZRYDDH, kz.CYRS, kz.FDDBRDZXX, kz.FDDBRGDDH, kz.FDDBRYDDH, kz.GDGRS, kz.GGRS, kz.GJHDQSZ_DM, kz.GYKGLX_DM, kz.GYTZBL, kz.HHRS, kz.HJSZD, kz.HSFS_DM, kz.JYFW, kz.KJZDZZ_DM, kz.LSSWDJYXQQ, kz.LSSWDJYXQZ, kz.SCJYDLXDH, kz.SCJYDYZBM, kz.SWDLRDZXX, kz.SWDLRLXDH, kz.SWDLRMC, kz.SWDLRNSRSBH, kz.TZZE, kz.WHSYJSFJFXXDJBZ, kz.WJCYRS, kz.WZ, kz.WZTZBL, kz.YGZNSRLX_DM, kz.YHSJNFS_DM, kz.ZCDLXDH, kz.ZCDYZBM, kz.ZCZB, kz.ZFJGLX_DM, kz.ZRRTZBL, kz.ZSXMCXBZ_DM, kz.ZZJGLX_DM, kz.ZZSJYLB, kz.ZZSQYLX_DM from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, qx_swjg_zns znsa, DM_QX_ZNJGDZBKZ_JCJG dzb where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and nsr.zgswskfj_dm = dzb.gljg_dm and znsa.yxbz = 'Y' and dzb.jcjg_dm = znsa.swjg_dm and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and znsa.zn_dm = ? and znsa.ccm like ? and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.fddbrxm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or kz.scjydlxdh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or kz.cwfzrxm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.djzclx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrmc = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.scjydz like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.fddbrsfzjlx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.fddbrsfzjhm = ?) and rownum <= 100
select bdcxmbh, dzhtsbh, zqrdjxh, yxbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, bdcxmuuid, zqrnsrsbh, zqrmc, dczwxxuuid from dj_bdcxmdj_dczwxx where yxbz='Y' and bdcxmbh=?
select t.qcuuid,t.djxh,t.clzt,t.txfwlb_dm,t.txzt,t.txfssj,t.clsj from rd_yrdhyqwrdybnsrqc t where t.djxh = ? and t.clzt = '0'

select t.uuid, t.sfxxbgbuuid, t.djxh, t.kjdjxh, t.fjmnsrlxgx_dm, t.yyzfgxgsgfbl, t.gfblbz, t.yyzfgxgsgfblhj, t.fjmnsrtzje, t.fjmnsrtzhbsz_dm, t.lxsdmszzhjgbz, t.fjmnsrlxlx_dm, t.ssxddydfzfsybz, t.dkzjqk_dm, t.fhtjzfhjgqc, t.txqsyfqlhcclx_dm, t.syfjcbzlszftxqsyfbz, t.cstxqsyfsddjtqlhcc, t.yzgcsjgysjlxbz, t.tgdlrqdgxsdbz, t.jykzqhczqbz, t.cdxyfxbz, t.whdssxdjmslyeapbz, t.xdsl, t.ssxddydfssgsbz, t.wssxddydfjmbz, t.ssjysmc, t.ssgpdm, t.dkhtll, t.tqscll, t.hktj, t.ylxzfrglgxbz, t.czxjdqthtbz, t.lxydsrzjhtqk, t.yyqszmbz, t.ytxqsyfzfrzjglgxbz, t.txqsyfydsrzjhtqk, t.czsyqhsyqfmzrhtbz, t.tgfwbsqfwfbz, t.fjmnsrfwsj, t.sfgccsjg, t.qtjyhdqkhqtccqk, t.sykjndzczb, t.sykjndglfyje, t.sykjnddsfje, t.sykjndgzxjze, t.zjycjxdshsj, t.zjycjxdshdd, t.sdzfdsgjmbz, t.dgxsdjxssclly, t.djdfgjdqdcxsdswclqk_dm, t.dlrmc, t.dlrsfbzhtj, t.fjmnsrcdfxbz, t.dlsfdqlhyw, t.ylyyzgqtdqtlsdbz, t.jqtdqtlsdxsssxddybz, t.bz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.fjmnsrlxgxqtsm from YH_FJMNSRXSSSXDDYQKBGBA t where t.sfxxbgbuuid = ?
select t.fjmqysquuid,t.djxh from rd_fjmqyrdsqspb t where t.lcslid= ?

select JDXZ_DM code , JDXZMC caption from dm_gy_jdxz jd where jd.xybz = 'Y' AND jd.yxbz = 'Y' AND jd.jdxz_dm in ( select zb.jdxz_dm from cs_dj_jdxzswjgdzb zb where zb.swjg_dm = ? and zb.yxbz = 'Y' and zb.xybz = 'Y' )

select a.jsqxmuuid, a.bdcxmbh, a.jsqgcxmbh, a.jsdwdjxh, a.yxbz, a.lrr_dm, a.xgr_dm, a.bdcxmuuid, b.nsrsbh,b.shxydm,b.nsrmc,c.gcxmmc,c.ZDXMBZ from dj_bdcxmdj_jsqxmxx a,dj_nsrxx b ,dj_jzygcxmqkdjxxb c where a.yxbz='Y' and a.jsdwdjxh=b.djxh and c.gcxmbh=a.jsqgcxmbh and a.bdcxmbh=? AND B.YXBZ='Y'

SELECT b.nsrsbh, b.nsrmc, b.shxydm, b.scjydz, b.zgswj_dm, b.ssdabh, t.dcnd, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.zlcslid, t.ssdcqylx_dm, t.qcuuid FROM dj_ssdcqyqc t, dj_nsrxx b WHERE t.zlcslid = ? and t.djxh = b.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' AND B.YXBZ='Y'
select b.djxh, b.rduuid, b.bblzzsybnsrzgrdlx_dm, b.lcslid, b.sjgsdq, x.sqr, x.lrr_dm, x.slrq from RD_BRDZZSYBSRSQSPB b, dj_ysqywslxxb x where b.lcslid = ? and b.rduuid = x.uuid
delete from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb t where t.djxh = ?
select a.djxh from yh_zgmc a where a.xsssyhzjlx_dm = ? and a.xsssyhzjhm = ? and (a.zguuid!=? or 1=?) and a.ldhtjsrq >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.ldhtqsrq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.yxbz='Y'
select e.nsrsbh from dj_djhglgl t join dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh e on t.djxh = e.djxh where to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz and t.lb_dm = ?
select bg.nsrztbguuid from dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls,dj_nsrztbgxxb bg where ls.djxh=bg.djxh and bg.yxqz > ?

select ssdabh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, kzztdjlx_dm, djzclx_dm, fddbrxm, fddbrsfzjlx_dm, scjydz, fddbrsfzjhm, scjydzxzqhsz_dm, nsrzt_dm, hy_dm, zcdz, zcdzxzqhsz_dm, jdxz_dm, dwlsgx_dm, gdghlx_dm, zzjg_dm, hjszd, jyfw, zcdlxdh, zcdyzbm, scjydlxdh, scjydyzbm, hsfs_dm, cyrs, wjcyrs, hhrs, ggrs, gdgrs, zzjglx_dm, kjzdzz_dm, wz, swdlrlxdh, swdlrdzxx, zczb, tzze, zrrtzbl, wztzbl, gytzbl, gykglx_dm, zfjglx_dm, bzfs_dm, fddbrgddh, fddbryddh, fddbrdzxx, cwfzrxm, cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, cwfzrsfzjhm, cwfzrgddh, cwfzryddh, cwfzrdzxx, bsrxm, bsrsfzjzl_dm, bsrsfzjhm, bsrgddh, bsryddh, bsrdzxx, lsswdjyxqq, lsswdjyxqz, swdlrnsrsbh, swdlrmc, zzsjylb, gjhdqsz_dm, ygznsrlx_dm, zjgnsrsbh, zjgmc, zjgzcdz, zjgzcdzyzbm, yxqq, zjgfddbrxm, yxqz, zjglxdh, zjgjyfw, pzsljglx_dm, pzsljg_dm, pzsljgmc, pzzmhwjh, zzlx_dm, zzhm, kyslrq, scjyqxq, scjyqxz, lrrq, tyshxydm, nsrswjg, scztbh, xxczlx, globalbusinessid, xh, qfjg_dm from wbjh_cj_sj_gsdjxx g where (1 = #macroparam# or g.zzhm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.zzjg_dm = ?)

select t.swsx_dm from CS_YH_SWSXJMXZDZB t where t.zsxm_dm =? and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.swjg_dm in (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm = ?)

select a.djxh, a.gdslx_dm, a.ssdabh, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, a.nsrmc, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.djjg_dm, a.djrq, a.zzjg_dm, a.kqccsztdjbz, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.ssgly_dm, a.fjmqybz, a.swdjblbz from dj_nsrxx a, dj_nsrxx_kz k where (a.nsrsbh = ? or a.shxydm = ?) and a.djxh = k.djxh and a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ? and a.gdslx_dm = ? and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select a.bydjuuid, a.wcjyzmuuid, a.djxh, a.lcslid, a.wcjyhdssglzmbh, a.swdjd, a.wcjyd, a.wcjyhtzje, a.swdjdswjgyj, a.wcjydswjgyj, a.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxq, a.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxz, a.wcjyhdssglzmqfrq, a.bsrxm, a.lxdh, a.sqrq, a.bysj, a.ywcjyhdssglzmbh, a.sjgsdq, a.jyfsdmjh, a.htdfnsrsbh, a.htdfnsrmc, a.htdfnsrdjxh, a.scjydswjgmc, a.scjydswjglxdh, a.jgszdqysdszsfs_dm, a.jgszdqysdshsjgmc, a.jgszdqysdshsjg_dm, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.kjswjg_dm, a.qysdsgljgbz from dj_wbnsrjydbydj a where a.sblcslid is not null and a.djxh = ? and (zfbz_1 = ? or zfbz_1 is null) and a.yxbz = ?

select a.bydjuuid, a.wcjyzmuuid, a.djxh, a.lcslid, a.wcjyhdssglzmbh, a.swdjd, a.wcjyd, a.wcjyhtzje, a.swdjdswjgyj, a.wcjydswjgyj, a.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxq, a.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxz, a.wcjyhdssglzmqfrq, a.bsrxm, a.lxdh, a.sqrq, a.bysj, a.SBLCSLID, a.ywcjyhdssglzmbh, a.sjgsdq, a.jyfsdmjh, a.htdfnsrsbh, a.htdfnsrmc, a.htdfnsrdjxh, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.kjswjg_dm, a.scjydswjgmc, a.scjydswjglxdh, a.qysdsgljgbz, a.jgszdqysdszsfs_dm, a.jgszdqysdshsjgmc, a.jgszdqysdshsjg_dm from dj_wbnsrjydbydj a where a.wcjyzmuuid = ? and (zfbz_1 = ? or zfbz_1 is null) and a.yxbz = ?

select t.djxh, t.nsrsbh as ynsrsbh, t.shxydm as shxy_dm, b.bgdjmxuuid from dj_nsrxx t, dj_bgdjmx b where b.bgxm_dm = '999' and t.djxh = b.djxh and t.nsrsbh != t.shxydm and t.shxydm is not null and t.yxbz = 'Y' and b.bgdjmxuuid not in (select distinct b.bgdjmxuuid from DJ_DSXGNSRSHXYDMMXB b) and rownum <= to_number(?)

select a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.shxydm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydz, c.fzchrduuid, c.rdrq, a.nsrzt_dm, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.pgjg_dm from dj_nsrxx a, dj_fzchrdxx c, dj_djhglgl d where a.djxh = c.djxh and a.djxh = d.djxh and c.jcfzchrq is null and c.zxfzchrq is null and a.yxbz = 'Y' and c.rdrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and c.rdrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.zgswj_dm = ? and (a.zgswskfj_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.nsrsbh = ? or a.shxydm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.djzclx_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.hy_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and d.lb_dm = ? and not exists (select 1 from dj_fzchzxxx zx where c.djxh = zx.djxh and zx.qrrq is null and zx.zfbz_1 = 'N')

select t.jgjc_dm, t.swjg_dm from CS_YH_TSJMSXSPQXSZB t where (t.swsx_dm = ? or t.swsx_dm is null) and t.zsxm_dm = ? and (1 = ? or t.spjexx <= ?) and (1 = ? or t.spjesx > ?) and t.swjg_dm in (select a.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg a start with a.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior a.sjswjg_dm = a.swjg_dm) order by swjg_dm desc

SELECT ba.hznsuuid, ba.djxh, ba.lcslid, ba.zfjglx_dm, ba.yxqq, ba.yxqz, ba.fzjgcj_dm, ba.hzhbnsqyjglb_dm, ba.kdqsszyqylx_dm, ba.bjdyjqysdsyy_dm, ba.zfbz_1, ba.zfr_dm, ba.zfrq_1, ba.lrrq, ba.lrr_dm, ba.xgrq, ba.xgr_dm, ba.sjgsdq, ba.btsldqbs, fzjgjxfpbz, jdjnbs, hjqylx_dm, yjdyjyskm_dm, yjdyjysjc_dm, cyndhqjbz, ndhsqjyskm_dm, ndhsqjysjc_dm, yjdyjysfpbl_dm, ndhsqjysfpbl_dm FROM dj_hznsqyxxbab ba WHERE ba.djxh = ? AND ba.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND ba.yxqq < = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ba.yxqz > = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER by ba.lrrq+1 DESC

select qdxx.zgswjgfpuuid, qdxx.lcslid, qdxx.fpr_dm, qdxx.fprq, qdxx.fpswjg_dm, qdxx.hzbz from dj_zgswjgfp_qdxx qdxx where qdxx.lcslid = ?

select dwse, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, jdxz_dm from cs_dj_tddwseszb t where t.tddj_dm = ? and t.xzqhsz_dm = ? and (t.jdxz_dm = ? or t.jdxz_dm is null) and (1 = ? OR (t.yxqq <= ? and t.yxqz >= ?)) and t.yxqq <= t.yxqz and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y'

select t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t, dj_djhglgl l where t.djxh = l.djxh(+) and t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh like #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or (l.lb_dm in (#macroparam#) and l.yxqq <= l.yxqz and l.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and l.yxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.djxh, t.ssdabh, t.nsrsbh, t.shxydm, nsrmc, FDDBRXM, t.djzclx_dm, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, zzjg_Dm, scjydz, nsrzt_dm, scjydzxzqhsz_Dm, FDDBRSFZJHM, t.scjydz, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, T.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM from dj_nsrxx t where t.shxydm = ? and t.gdslx_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'
