select cs.tddj_dm, cs.swjg_dm, cs.zspm_dm from cs_dj_tddjzspmdzb cs, (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm =?) jg where cs.swjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm and cs.xybz = 'Y' and cs.yxbz = 'Y' and cs.tddj_dm = ?
select tdzzsxmuuid,tdzzsxmbh,tdzzsxmmc from dj_tdzzsxmxx where djxh = ? and yxbz = 'Y'

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.shxydm, nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.kzztdjlx_dm, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.scjydz, kz.scjydlxdh, nsr.djzclx_dm, nsr.hy_dm, kz.jyfw, nsr.jdxz_dm, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm, nsr.kqccsztdjbz, nsr.zcdz from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_nsrxx_kz kz, dj_djhglgl gl where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and gl.djxh = nsr.djxh AND NSR.YXBZ = 'Y' and nsr.gdslx_dm = ? and nsr.kzztdjlx_dm != ? and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.jdxz_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrsbh = ? or nsr.shxydm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.nsrzt_dm in (#macroparam#)) and nsr.zgswj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.zgswskfj_dm is null) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.ssgly_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.ssgly_dm is null) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.hy_dm in (select h.hy_dm from dm_gy_hy h where h.xlbz = 'Y' and h.xybz = 'Y' and h.yxbz = 'Y' start with h.hy_dm = ? connect by prior h.hy_dm = h.sjhy_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsr.djzclx_dm in (select d.djzclx_dm from dm_dj_djzclx d where d.xlbz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xlbz = 'Y' start with d.djzclx_dm = ? connect by prior d.djzclx_dm = d.sjdjzclx_dm)) and gl.lb_dm = ? and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between gl.yxqq and gl.yxqz
select T.wcjyhdssglzmbh, T.wcjyhdssglzmffdw,WJZUUID from dj_jzyxmdj_wcjyhdssglzmxx t where t.djxh=? and t.yxbz='Y'

select tdzzsxmuuid, djxh, tdzzsxmbh, tdzzsxmmc, jdxz_dm, xxdz, khyh, yhzh, xmjsqssj, xmjszzsj, zyscb, dwyscb, kftdzmj, kfjzzmj, fdczrhtmc, bz, xmszddfswjg_dm, zgswskfj_dm, xzqhsz_dm, tdzzsxmzt_dm, qsssqq, qsssqz,pgjg_dm from dj_tdzzsxmxx where djxh = ? and yxbz = 'Y'

select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.tdjbxxuuid, a.qh, b.tdqsuuid, b.djxh, b.tdsyzbh, b.zxly, b.ysccczfs_dm, b.czrq, b.zxlcslid, b.zxrq, b.tdsyzfzjgmc, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz, c.tdsyqkuuid, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.tdmj, c.mstdmj, c.ystdmj, c.dwse, c.nynse, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.nsqx_dm, c.sbqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.zscztdsysbz, c.bz, c.lcslid, c.zspm_dm from dj_tdjbxx a,dj_tdqsxx b,dj_tdsyqkdjxx c where a.tdjbxxuuid = b.tdjbxxuuid and a.tdjbxxuuid = c.tdjbxxuuid and b.djxh=c.djxh and a.yxbz='Y' and c.fwtddjlx_dm!='2' AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= c.yxqz AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= c.yxqq and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.syqsyxqz AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= b.syqsyxqq)) AND (1 = ? OR (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= c.yxqz and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= b.syqsyxqz)) and a.tdsybh = ? AND c.yxqq <= c.yxqz AND b.syqsyxqq <= b.syqsyxqz

update dj_djhglgl t set t.yxqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), t.xgr_dm = ?, t.xgrq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') where t.djxh = ? and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.yxqz and t.lb_dm in (select c.lb_dm from cs_dj_zkzpxgmnsrglgljkxx c group by c.lb_dm)
delete dj_ls_tdqkdjxx

select h.fzjgfduuid, h.djxh, h.fzjghfddjxh, h.fzjghfdnsrsbh, h.fzjghfdmc, h.yxqq, h.fzjghfddz, h.yxqz, h.fzjghfdlxdh, n.nsrzt_dm from dj_fzjgxx h, dj_nsrxx n where h.fzjghfddjxh = n.djxh and h.djxh = ? and h.yxqq < ? and h.yxqz > ?
select t.kjzdzz_dm,t.kjzdzzmc from DM_GY_KJZDZZ t where t.kjzdzz_dm=?

select ? as qfjg, a.shxydm, a.xh_2, a.swjg_dm, a.zzhm, a.rq, a.nsrsbh, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.hy_dm, a.scjydz, a.nsrmc, a.jyfw, a.kyslrq ,a.zzjg_dm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.fddbrsfzjhm from dj_ls_djxhshxydm a where exists (select 1 from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx b where b.rgqfswjg_dm = ? and b.xh_2 = a.xh_2 and (b.lrrq, b.xh_2) in (select max(lrrq) over(partition by xh_2) mlrrq, xh_2 from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx c where c.xh_2 = b.xh_2)) and rownum <= 500 union all select ? as qfjg_dm, a.shxydm, a.xh_2, a.swjg_dm, a.zzhm, a.rq, a.nsrsbh, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.hy_dm, a.scjydz, a.nsrmc, a.jyfw, a.kyslrq,a.zzjg_dm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.fddbrsfzjhm from dj_ls_djxhshxydm a where a.swjg_dm = ? and not exists (select 1 from wbjh_yzymrgqfqrxx r where r.xh_2 = a.xh_2 and r.rgqfswjg_dm is not null) and rownum <= 500
select t.uuid, t.lb_dm, t.tablenames, t.sql, t.yxbz, t.xybz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.ycmessage from CS_DJ_ZKZPXGMNSRGLGLJKXX t where t.lb_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y'
select b.tdsybh, b.tdqsuuid, b.syqsyxqq, b.syqsyxqz,b.tdjbxxuuid from dj_tdqsxx b,dj_ls_tdqkdjxx a where a.tdsybh = b.tdsybh and b.syqsyxqz >=?

select sqmxuuid, djxh, lcslid, jmsspsx_dm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, jmxmdl_dm, jmxmxl_dm, jmwj_dm, jmlx_dm, jmfs_dm, jmzlx_dm, jmqxq, jmqxz, ssjmxzhz_dm, ssjmxzdl_dm, ssjmxzxl_dm, jzfd, jzsl, jzed, yxbz from yh_jmssqspb_mx where djxh = ? and yxbz='Y' and (? is null or zsxm_dm = ?) and (? is null or zspm_dm = ?) and (? is null or jmsspsx_dm = ?) and (? is null or sqmxuuid<>?) and ((jmqxq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and jmqxz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) or (jmqxq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and jmqxz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')) or (jmqxq > to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and jmqxz < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')))

select t.ygzzhy_dm, t.ygzsdzzspm_dm from cs_dj_ygzzhyzzspmdzb t where to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between t.yxqq and t.yxqz and t.swjg_dm in (select e.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg e start with e.swjg_dm = ? connect by e.swjg_dm = prior e.sjswjg_dm) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y'
select rduuid from rd_brdzzsybsrsqspb where djxh = ?

select t.fwsyqkuuid, t.djxh, t.fybh, t.fwtddjlx_dm, t.lcslid, t.zspm_dm, t.fcyz, t.msyz, t.ysyz, t.nynse, t.nzjsr, t.zsfcsbz, t.sl_1, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.sbqx_dm, t.nsqx_dm, t.jkqx_dm, t.yskm_dm, t.ysfpbl_dm, t.skgk_dm, t.czrmc, t.czrsfzjzl_dm, t.czrsfzjhm, t.bz, t.sjgsdq, t.syzyfs_dm, t.fyjbxxuuid, fy.fyjbxxuuid, fy.fwzh, fy.dy, fy.lc_1, fy.fh, fy.jg_dm, fy.cx_dm, fy.fwmj, fy.tnmj, fy.fwzldz, fy.xzqhsz_dm, fy.jdxz_dm, fy.ssswjg_dm, fy.bdcxmbh, fy.tdsybh, fy.yxbz, fy.fczyz, t.kcl, n.nsrsbh, n.shxydm, n.nsrmc, n.hy_dm, n.djzclx_dm, n.nsrzt_dm from dj_fwsyqkdjxx t, dj_fyjbxx fy,dj_nsrxx n where t.fybh = fy.fybh and t.djxh = n.djxh(+) and fy.yxbz = 'Y' and ? >= t.yxqq and ? <= t.yxqz AND t.yxqq < t.yxqz and t.pkbz = 'Y' and fy.ssswjg_dm =? and(n.yxbz='Y' or n.yxbz is null)

SELECT n.DJXH, n.GDSLX_DM, n.SSDABH, n.NSRSBH, n.shxydm, n.NSRMC, n.KZZTDJLX_DM, n.DJZCLX_DM, n.FDDBRXM, n.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, n.SCJYDZ, n.FDDBRSFZJHM, n.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, n.NSRZT_DM, n.HY_DM, n.ZCDZ, n.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, n.JDXZ_DM, n.DWLSGX_DM, n.GDGHLX_DM, n.DJJG_DM, n.DJRQ, n.ZZJG_DM, n.KQCCSZTDJBZ, n.ZGSWJ_DM, n.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, n.SSGLY_DM, n.FJMQYBZ, n.lrrq, n.SWDJBLBZ, n.sjgsdq FROM dj_nsrxx n, dj_nsrxx_kz kz WHERE n.djxh = kz.djxh and n.ssdabh = ? AND (1 = ? or n.kzztdjlx_dm LIKE ?) AND n.gdslx_dm = ? AND (n.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' OR N.KQCCSZTDJBZ IS NULL) and n.yxbz = 'Y'
select zjjcuuid, djxh, lcslid, ffrq, yxqq, swzjzl_dm, yxqz, swzjhm, swzjglzt_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq from dj_nsrzjjcxx WHERE djxh=? AND swzjglzt_dm=?
select t.nsrztbguuid from dj_nsrztbgxxb t,DJ_Ls_Fzchzx d where t.djxh = d.djxh and t.yxqz > ? and t.nsrzt_dm='08'

select y.bamxuuid, y.djxh, y.lcslid, y.zspm_dm, y.zmhm, y.hphm, y.cpxh_1, y.clsbdh, y.fdjhm, y.cbmc, y.cbsbh, y.jzed, y.jzfd, y.jzsl, y.jmqxq, y.jmqxz, y.nynse, y.njmse, y.dybz, y.lrr_dm, y.lrrq, y.xgr_dm, y.xgrq, y.sjgsdq, y.yhpzuuid, y.cbsbh, j.jmsspsx_dm, j.zsxm_dm, j.jmxmdl_dm, j.jmxmxl_dm, j.jmwj_dm, j.jmlx_dm, j.jmfs_dm, j.jmzlx_dm, j.ssjmxzhz_dm, j.ssjmxzdl_dm, j.ssjmxzxl_dm, j.wszg, j.yxbz, j.ssjmsblm_dm, j.lmdybz, j.qxbz, j.ztrq from yh_clcbjmbaxx y, yh_jmsspjg j where y.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or y.clsbdh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or (? >= y.jmqxq and ? <= decode(y.sjjzrq,'',y.jmqxz,y.sjjzrq))) and j.YHPZUUID = y.YHPZUUID and y.qxbz = 'N' and y.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (y.sjjzrq >= y.jmqxq or y.sjjzrq is null)
select cs.kcl from cs_dj_fcyzkclszb cs where cs.swjg_dm =? and cs.xybz = 'Y' and cs.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.uuid, t.djxh, t.qsdjr, t.qsjsr, t.jbr, t.jbrlxfs, t.slrq, t.slswjg, t.ynsrzt_dm from DJ_QYSDSQSDJ t,Dj_Ls_Djxhshxydm n where t.djxh = n.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.zxrq is null

select a.fyjbxxuuid, a.fybh, a.fwzh, a.dy, a.lc_1, a.fh, a.jg_dm, a.cx_dm, a.fwmj, a.tnmj, a.fwzldz, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, a.bdcxmbh, a.tdsybh, a.yxbz, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.fczyz, c.fwsyqkuuid, c.djxh, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.lcslid, c.zspm_dm, c.fcyz, c.msyz, c.ysyz, c.nynse, c.nzjsr, c.zsfcsbz, c.sl_1, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.sbqx_dm, c.nsqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.czrmc, c.czrsfzjzl_dm, c.czrsfzjhm, c.bz, c.kcl, c.syzyfs_dm, c.PKBZ from dj_fyjbxx a,dj_fwsyqkdjxx c where a.fyjbxxuuid=c.fyjbxxuuid and c.yxqz>c.yxqq and c.fwtddjlx_dm='2' and a.yxbz='Y' and (a.ssswjg_dm =? or 1 =?) and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1= ?) and a.fybh = ?
select zx.fzchzxuuid, zx.fzchrduuid, zx.djxh, zx.lcslid, zx.sjgsdq, zx.qryj_dm, zx.qrrq, zx.qrswjg_dm, zx.qryjsm, zx.zfbz_1, zx.zfrq, zx.zfr_dm, zx.pcuuid from dj_fzchzxxx zx where zx.djxh = ?
select glgluuid,djxh,lb_dm,yxqq,yxqz from dj_djhglgl where djxh=? and lb_dm=? and yxqq <= yxqz

select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid, c.djxh, c.tdsyqkuuid, c.fwtddjlx_dm, c.tdmj, c.mstdmj, c.ystdmj, c.dwse, c.nynse, c.yxqq, c.yxqz, c.nsqx_dm, c.sbqx_dm, c.jkqx_dm, c.yskm_dm, c.ysfpbl_dm, c.skgk_dm, c.zscztdsysbz, c.bz, c.lcslid, c.tdczrmc, c.tdczrsfzjhm, c.czrsfzjzl_dm, c.zspm_dm, c.PKBZ from dj_tdjbxx a, dj_tdsyqkdjxx c where a.tdjbxxuuid= c.tdjbxxuuid and c.djxh =? and c.yxqz >= c.yxqq and a.yxbz = 'Y' and c.fwtddjlx_dm = '2'

SELECT T.RDPZUUID, T.ZFSBZ, T.RDZSUUID, T.DJXH, T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.RDYXQQ, T.RDYXQZ, T.HY_DM, T.SBQX_DM, T.NSQX_DM, T.JKQX_DM, T.SLHDWSE, T.YSKM_DM, T.YSFPBL_DM, T.SKGK_DM, T.ZSDLFS_DM, T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSL, T.YXBZ, T.LRRQ, T.Gfjbjg_Dm, T.Zsxmcxbz_Dm, T.Jfjc_Dm FROM RD_SFZRDXXB T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND (TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN T.RDYXQQ AND T.RDYXQZ OR TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN T.RDYXQQ AND T.RDYXQZ) AND T.RDYXQQ < T.RDYXQZ AND T.ZSXM_DM = ? AND T.ZSPM_DM = ?
select a.djxh from yh_zgmc a where a.shbxfzh=? and (a.zguuid!=? or 1=?) and a.ldhtjsrq >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.ldhtqsrq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.yxbz='Y'
select nvl(sum(jmse),0) jmze from yh_xejmtzxx_mx t where t.djxh = ? and t.sssqq >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.sssqz <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

select zspm_dm code, zspmmc caption, sl from (select t.zspm_dm, t.zspmmc, t.jldw_dm, t.sl_1 sl, t.yxbz, t.xybz from dm_gy_zspm t connect by prior t.zspm_dm = t.sjzspm_dm and t.zspm_dm not in (?, ?, ?) start with t.zspm_dm = ?) where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y'

select mscxsquuid, djxh, lcslid, sqrq, mscxspsqrlx_dm, scqymc, cllb_dm_1, fdjhm, cp, xh_3, clsbdh, gzrq, jdcxstyfphm, clgzsmjstj_dm, lxdh, yzbm, dz, clgzsrlnyzl_dm, zygdzz, mslb_dm, clyt, zgswskfj_dm, cltpn, cltpw, fj_2, msmx_dm, clgzd, clhgzmhm, cldw, zws, pql, zypz, fp_dm, zstybz, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, hzbz_1, ywpzuuid, zfbz_1, zfr_dm,clmc,sbsbm,bz,xzzz, zfrq_1 from yh_clgzsmjssqspb where lcslid=?

select n.nsrsbh,n.shxydm,n.nsrmc,z.zjdjnbs from dj_hznsqyxxbab h, dj_hznsqyxxbab_xyjgxx x, dj_nsrxx n, (select a.djxh zfdjxh,b.syjjgdjxh zsyjdjxh,a.jdjnbs zjdjnbs,a.yxqq zyxqq,a.yxqz zyxqz from dj_hznsqyxxbab a, dj_hznsqyxxbab_syjgxx b where a.hznsuuid = b.hznsuuid and (a.zfbz_1 is null or a.zfbz_1 != 'Y')and b.yxbz='Y') z where H.HZNSUUID = x.HZNSUUID and x.xyjjgdjxh = z.zfdjxh and h.djxh = z.zsyjdjxh and x.xyjjgdjxh = n.djxh and x.jdjnbs!=z.zjdjnbs and (h.zfbz_1 is null or h.zfbz_1 != 'Y') and h.yxqq<=z.zyxqz and h.yxqz>=z.zyxqq and x.yxbz='Y' and h.hznsuuid=?
select squuid, ssxdqyuuid, lcslid, djxh, gdmc, gdszd, cgbl, yxbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq from rd_ssxddysp_gdqk where lcslid=? and yxbz='Y'
select ysxkzuuid, bdcxmbh, ysxkzbh, ysxkzfzjg, yszjzmj, yxbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, bdcxmuuid from dj_bdcxmdj_ysxkzxx where yxbz='Y' and bdcxmbh=?

select j.bwtdznsruuid, j.wtxysuuid, j.djzclx_dm, j.lsgx_dm, j.hy_dm, j.hyf1_dm, j.jdxz_dm, j.yxbz from dj_wtxysxx d, Dj_Wtxys_Bwtdznsrxx j where d.wtxysuuid = j.wtxysuuid and d.stfdjxh = ? and d.xyyxqq <= d.xyyxqz and j.yxbz = 'Y' and d.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select DJXH, GDSLX_DM, SSDABH, nsr.NSRSBH, nsr.NSRMC, KZZTDJLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, SCJYDZ, FDDBRSFZJHM, SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM, HY_DM, ZCDZ, ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM, GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM, DJRQ ZZJG_DM, KQCCSZTDJBZ, nsr.ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ, SWDJBLBZ, SJTB_SJ, NSRBM from dj_nsrxx nsr where nsr.shxydm = ? and nsr.zgswj_dm = ? and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' and nsr.kzztdjlx_dm = '1140'
select s.* from CS_DJ_SWJGGXGWXZQHDZB t,dm_gy_swjg s where t.xzqhsz_dm = ? and t.swjg_dm=s.swjg_dm and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and s.yxbz = 'Y' and s.xybz = 'Y'

select t.qxuuid,t.lcslid,t.qxrq,t.ssyhzgqxyy_dm,t.swsx_dm,t.gljy_dm from yh_ssyhzgglmxb t,yh_jmsspjg b where t.djxh=b.djxh and t.djxh=? and b.jmsspsx_dm=? and t.ssyhzgqxyy_dm=? and b.qxbz='Y' and t.qxrq is not null and t.gljy_dm='3'

select gl.glgluuid, nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.scjydz, kz.scjydlxdh, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm, gl.lb_dm, gl.yxqq, gl.yxqz, gl.lrrq, gl.lrr_dm, sz.lb_dm, sz.lbmc, sz.kjsm, sz.sxrq, sz.sxrq_2, sz.lbcj_dm, sz.szr_dm, sz.szswjg_dm, sz.szrq from dj_nsrxx_kz kz, (select GLGLUUID, DJXH, LB_DM, YXQQ, YXQZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ from dj_djhglgl glb where glb.lb_dm = ? and glb.yxqq < glb.yxqz and glb.yxqz > ?) gl, (select LB_DM, LBMC, LBCJ_DM, KJSM, SXRQ, SXRQ_2, SZR_DM, SZSWJG_DM, SZRQ, XYBZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ from dj_djhzdylbsz zs where zs.xybz = 'Y') sz, (select nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.gdslx_dm, nsr.nsrzt_dm, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.scjydz from dj_nsrxx nsr, dj_ls_djxhnsrsbh ls where nsr.nsrsbh = ls.nsrsbh and nsr.nsrzt_dm != '07' and nsr.nsrzt_dm != '10' and nsr.yxbz='Y') nsr where nsr.djxh = kz.djxh and nsr.djxh = gl.djxh(+) and gl.lb_dm = sz.lb_dm(+) and nsr.nsrzt_dm != '07' and nsr.nsrzt_dm != '10' and nsr.gdslx_dm = ?

select b.wjzuuid, b.gcxmbh, b.djxh, a.wcjyhdssglzmbh, b.wcjyhdssglzmffdw, b.yxbz, b.lrr_dm, b.lrrq, b.xgr_dm, b.xgrq, b.sjgsdq, b.jzygcxmuuid from dj_wbnsrjydbydj a ,dj_jzyxmdj_wcjyhdssglzmxx b where a.wcjyhdssglzmbh=b.wcjyhdssglzmbh and b.yxbz='Y' and a.djxh=? and b.jzygcxmuuid=? and (a.zfbz_1 = 'N' or a.zfbz_1 is null) and a.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.jgjc_dm from CS_YH_SWJGKQSPSZB t where (t.zsxm_dm = ? or zsxm_dm is null) and t.swjg_dm = ? and t.yxbz='Y' AND T.XYBZ='Y'

select a.RDRQ, a.RDR_DM, a.LB_DM, a.SSDQ, a.QYSSJTMC, a.YXBZ, a.QYSSJT_DM, a.JTZGSWJGMC, a.JTSCJYDZ, a.JTCJ_DM, a.JTDJXH, a.JTNSRSBH, a.BHBQYSSJT_DM, a.HBBJ, a.XYBZ, a.QYJTUUID, a.RDSWJG_DM from dj_qyssjt a where a.yxbz='Y' and a.xybz='Y'
select t.wcjyhdssglzmbh, t.hxrq, t.wcjyzmuuid from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx t where t.hxrq is not null and t.djxh = ? AND T.YXBZ='Y'

select zm.djxh, zm.wcjyhdssglzmbh, zm.wcjyd, zm.byrq from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx zm, dj_wbnsrjydbydj dj where zm.wcjyhdssglzmbh = dj.wcjyhdssglzmbh and zm.yxbz = 'N' and zm.zfbz_1 = 'N' and dj.yxbz = 'N' and dj.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zm.byrq is not null and dj.bysj is not null

select a.swsx_dm from cs_yh_tdjmswsx a, (select swjg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm start with swjg.swjg_dm = ?) b where b.swjg_dm = a.swjg_dm and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.tdjmlx = '1'

select a.djxh, a.gdslx_dm, a.ssdabh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.djjg_dm, a.djrq, a.zzjg_dm, a.lrrq, a.kqccsztdjbz, a.pgjg_dm, b.djxh, b.hjszd, b.jyfw, b.zcdlxdh, b.zcdyzbm, b.scjydlxdh, b.scjydyzbm, b.hsfs_dm, b.cyrs, b.wjcyrs, b.hhrs, b.ggrs, b.gdgrs, b.zzjglx_dm, b.kjzdzz_dm, b.wz, b.swdlrlxdh, b.swdlrdzxx, b.zczb, b.tzze, b.zrrtzbl, b.wztzbl, b.gytzbl, b.gykglx_dm, b.zfjglx_dm, b.bzfs_dm, b.fddbrgddh, b.fddbryddh, b.fddbrdzxx, b.cwfzrxm, b.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, b.cwfzrsfzjhm, b.cwfzrgddh, b.cwfzryddh, b.cwfzrdzxx, b.bsrxm, b.bsrsfzjzl_dm, b.bsrsfzjhm, b.bsrgddh, b.bsryddh, b.bsrdzxx, b.lsswdjyxqq, b.lsswdjyxqz, b.swdlrnsrsbh, b.swdlrmc, b.whsyjsfjfxxdjbz, b.zzsjylb, b.yhsjnfs_dm, b.zfjglx_dm, b.zsxmcxbz_dm, b.zzsqylx_dm, b.gjhdqsz_dm, b.ygznsrlx_dm, b.nsrywmc, a.lrr_dm, a.shxydm, ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ, SWDJBLBZ, pz.pzsljglx_dm, pz.pzsljg_dm, pz.pzsljgmc, pz.pzzmhwjh, pz.zzlx_dm, pz.zzhm, pz.kyslrq, pz.scjyqxq, pz.scjyqxz, b.zcxs, b.fddbrzs, b.fddbrzsyzbm, a.nsrztlx_dm from dj_nsrxx a, dj_nsrxx_kz b, dj_pzjgxx pz where a.djxh = b.djxh AND a.djxh = pz.djxh(+) and a.djxh = ? and a.yxbz = ?

select ckzhuuid, djxh, lcslid, yhzhxz_dm, xzqhsz_dm, zhmc, yhhb_dm, yhzh, hbsz_dm, yhkhdjzh, ffrq, tszhbz, khrq, bgrq, zxrq, bz, yxqq, yxqz, yhyywd_dm, sbjbjg, sbbm, sbfzhbz, sbdjxh, djkskzhbz, sxjszhbz, sxjfzhbz, tfzhbz, yxbz, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, t.cktszhbz from dj_nsrckzhzhxx t where yhzh=? and djxh <> ? and ? between yxqq and yxqz and yxbz='Y'

select ds.zmzbuuid, ds.lcslid, ds.djxh, ds.ywpzuuid, ds.hznsspwh, ds.zgswskfj_dm, ds.sqrxm, ds.sbrq_1, ds.sqrq, ds.sbnd, ds.lrze, ds.wszzrq, ds.zgswskfj_dm, ds.wszzrq, ds.zgswjgdz, ds.zgswjgyzbm, ds.lxr_dm, ds.lxdh, ds.lrrq, ds.cz, ds.hjjgszdzgswjg_dm from zm_fjmhzsbsds ds where ds.djxh = ?

select t.djxh, t.ssdabh, t.nsrsbh, t.shxydm, nsrmc, FDDBRXM, t.djzclx_dm, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, zzjg_Dm, scjydz, nsrzt_dm, scjydzxzqhsz_Dm, FDDBRSFZJHM, t.scjydz, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, T.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM from dj_nsrxx t where t.shxydm = ? and t.gdslx_dm = ? and t.kzztdjlx_dm like '113_' and t.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.djxh,t.sqlx,t.hsdz,t.nsrlb_dm,t.xkynsrbz,t.cwfzrxm,t.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm,t.cwfzrsfzjhm,t.cwfzrlxdh,t.bsrxm,t.bsrsfzjzl_dm,t.bsrsfzjhm,t.bsryddh from Rd_Ybnsrrdsqspb t where t.ybnsrsquuid = ?

select j.uuid, j.djxh, j.nsqx_dm ynsqx_dm, j.jbzqyy_dm, j.yxqq, j.yxqz from rd_jbzqrdjgb j where j.djxh = ? and j.yxqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and j.yxqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and j.yxqz > j.yxqq and j.zfbz_1='N'

select d.dlyszuuid,d.dkbauuid,d.dlyszhm,d.cllx_dm,d.cllxmc,d.clpzhm, d.cldw,d.yxbz,d.lrr_dm,d.lrrq,d.xgr_dm,d.xgrq,d.sjgsdq,d.sjtb_sj from dj_hwysxgmdkzzsfp_dlyszxx d where d.dkbauuid = ? and d.yxbz='Y'

select a.RDRQ, a.RDR_DM, a.LB_DM, a.SSDQ, a.QYSSJTMC, a.YXBZ, a.QYSSJT_DM, a.JTZGSWJGMC, a.JTSCJYDZ, a.JTCJ_DM, a.JTDJXH, a.JTNSRSBH, a.BHBQYSSJT_DM, a.HBBJ, a.XYBZ, a.QYJTUUID, a.RDSWJG_DM from dj_qyssjt a where a.ssdq in (select xzqhsz_dm from dm_gy_xzqh CONNECT BY PRIOR xzqhsz_dm = sjxzqhsz_dm START WITH xzqhsz_dm=?) and (1=? or a.qyssjt_dm=?) and (1=? or a.jtnsrsbh=?) and (1=? or a.jtcj_dm=?) and (1=? or a.lb_dm=?) and (1=? or a.qyssjtmc like ?) and a.yxbz='Y' and a.xybz='Y'

select jmxz.yxqq, jmxz.yxqz, dzb.swsx_dm, dzb.zsxm_dm, zsxm.zsxmmc, dzb.ssjmxz_dm, jmxz.ssjmxzmc, dzb.ssjmxzdl_dm, dzb.ssjmxzxl_dm, dzb.swjg_dm, dzb.sxh from cs_yh_swsxjmxzdzb dzb, dm_gy_ssjmxz jmxz, dm_gy_zsxm zsxm where dzb.zsxm_dm = zsxm.zsxm_dm and dzb.ssjmxz_dm = jmxz.ssjmxz_dm and dzb.swsx_dm = ? and (1 = ? or dzb.zsxm_dm = ?) and dzb.yxbz = 'Y' and dzb.xybz = 'Y' and jmxz.yxbz = 'Y' and jmxz.xybz = 'Y' and zsxm.yxbz = 'Y' and zsxm.xybz = 'Y'

select t.UUID, t.DJXH, t.ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, t.SGLRBZ, t.QRRQ, t.YXBZ, t.LRR_DM, t.LRRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.SJGSDQ, t.SJTB_SJ from dj_hwysyxgmnsryddkbaqrxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'
select hbflbguuid, lcslid, djxh, pzhbflwjhjymc, hbflyy, hbflsj, nsrhbfllx_dm, wjsy,lrrq,lrr_dm from dj_nsrhbflbg where djxh=? and zfbz_1='N'
select GLGLUUID, djxh, lb_dm, yxqq, yxqz from dj_djhglgl gl where gl.djxh = ? and gl.yxqq < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and gl.yxqz > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select t.nsrsbh, t.shxydm, t.scjydz, t.ssdabh, t.djxh, t.nsrmc, djzclx_DM, t.kzztdjlx_dm, NSRZT_DM, t.scjydz, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zzjg_dm, kz.jyfw, p.pzsljglx_dm, p.pzsljg_dm, p.pzsljgmc, p.pzzmhwjh, p.zzlx_dm, p.zzhm, p.kyslrq, kz.ZFJGLX_DM, scjydzxzqhsz_dm , ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM from dj_nsrxx t, dj_pzjgxx p ,dj_nsrxx_kz kz where t.djxh=p.djxh(+) and t.djxh =kz.djxh(+) and t.kzztdjlx_dm like ? and t.gdslx_dm =? and (t.nsrmc = ? or t.zzjg_dm =? ) AND T.YXBZ='Y'

select zdsyuuid, djxh, lcslid, yxbz, yxqq, yxqz, zdsyhjkjc_dm, jknd, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj from dj_zdsynsrxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.yxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxqz >= t.yxqq and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.xzqhsz_dm, t.xzqhmc from dm_gy_xzqh t where t.xzqhjc = 1 and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xzqhsz_dm not in ('820000', '810000')

insert into dj_nsrfyhyxx (FYHYUUID, DJXH, XH, HY_DM, YXBZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('650D77886BDD033FD0C3BD38E3CC0D8B', '12445100009778844515', '1', '6820', 'Y', '24406060735', to_date('29-07-2015 16:09:38', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), null, to_date('29-07-2015 16:09:38', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060700', null)
select * from rd_hznsqyrdsq_bhzmxxx t where t.hznsuuid = ? and yxbz = ?
select t.swjg_dm from cs_gy_xtcs t where t.csbm = 'A0000001000000061'and t.csz = '0' and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.swsx_dm, sblm.ssjmsblm_dm, sblm.ssjmsblmmc from cs_yh_swsxsblmdzb t, dm_gy_ssjmsblm sblm where t.swsx_dm = ? and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.ssjmsblm_dm = sblm.ssjmsblm_dm and sblm.xybz = 'Y'

select glb.zszm_dm code,zm.zszmmc caption,glb.sl_1 from dm_gy_zszm zm, cs_gy_glb_zszm glb where zm.zszm_dm = glb.zszm_dm and zm.zspm_dm = ? and glb.swjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) and zm.xybz = 'Y' and zm.yxbz = 'Y' and glb.xybz = 'Y' and glb.yxbz = 'Y'
select z.ccm from qx_swjg_zns z where z.swjg_dm = ? and z.zn_dm = ?

select ls.djxh, ls.shxydm, ls.xh_2 from dj_ls_djxhShxydm ls where ls.shxydm not in (select n.shxydm from dj_nsrxx n where (n.kzztdjlx_dm in ('1110', '1120', '1500') or n.kzztdjlx_dm like '113%') and n.shxydm is not null)

select a.djxh, a.gdslx_dm, a.ssdabh, a.nsrsbh, a.shxydm, a.nsrmc, a.kzztdjlx_dm, a.djzclx_dm, a.fddbrxm, a.fddbrsfzjlx_dm, a.scjydz, a.fddbrsfzjhm, a.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, a.nsrzt_dm, a.hy_dm, a.zcdz, a.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.dwlsgx_dm, a.gdghlx_dm, a.djjg_dm, a.djrq, a.zzjg_dm, a.kqccsztdjbz, b.hjszd, b.jyfw, b.zcdlxdh, b.zcdyzbm, b.scjydlxdh, b.scjydyzbm, b.hsfs_dm, b.cyrs, b.wjcyrs, b.hhrs, b.ggrs, b.gdgrs, b.zzjglx_dm, b.kjzdzz_dm, b.wz, b.swdlrlxdh, b.swdlrdzxx, b.zczb, b.tzze, b.zrrtzbl, b.wztzbl, b.gytzbl, b.gykglx_dm, b.zfjglx_dm, b.bzfs_dm, b.fddbrgddh, b.fddbryddh, b.fddbrdzxx, b.cwfzrxm, b.cwfzrsfzjzl_dm, b.cwfzrsfzjhm, b.cwfzrgddh, b.cwfzryddh, b.cwfzrdzxx, b.bsrxm, b.bsrsfzjzl_dm, b.bsrsfzjhm, b.bsrgddh, b.bsryddh, b.bsrdzxx, b.lsswdjyxqq, b.lsswdjyxqz, b.swdlrnsrsbh, b.swdlrmc, b.whsyjsfjfxxdjbz, b.zzsjylb, b.yhsjnfs_dm, b.zsxmcxbz_dm, b.zzsqylx_dm, b.gjhdqsz_dm, b.ygznsrlx_dm, a.zgswj_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.ssgly_dm, a.fjmqybz, a.swdjblbz, j.kyslrq, j.pzjguuid, j.pzsljglx_dm, j.pzsljg_dm, j.pzsljgmc, j.pzzmhwjh, j.zzlx_dm, j.zzhm, j.scjyqxq, j.scjyqxz from dj_nsrxx a,dj_nsrxx_kz b,dj_pzjgxx j where a.djxh=b.djxh and (a.nsrsbh=? or a.shxydm = ?) and a.djxh = j.djxh(+)
select t.fjmtsxswclbauuid from yh_fjmqygqzrsytsxswclbab t where t.zrfmc = ? and t.srfmc = ? and t.bzrqymc= ?

select DJXH , GDSLX_DM , SSDABH , NSRSBH , NSRMC , n.KZZTDJLX_DM , DJZCLX_DM , FDDBRXM , FDDBRSFZJLX_DM , SCJYDZ , FDDBRSFZJHM , n.SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM , HY_DM , ZCDZ , ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM , JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM , GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM , DJRQ , n.ZZJG_DM , KQCCSZTDJBZ, ZGSWJ_DM , ZGSWSKFJ_DM , SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ , SWDJBLBZ , NSRBM from dj_nsrxx n, dj_ls_nsrgjxx ls where n.zzjg_dm = ls.zzjg_dm and n.scjydzxzqhsz_dm = ls.xzqhsz_dm and n.kzztdjlx_dm=ls.kzztdjlx_dm and n.kzztdjlx_dm in(#macroparam#) and n.nsrzt_dm != '07' and n.nsrzt_dm != '10' and n.gdslx_dm=? and n.yxbz = 'Y'

select wt.wszg, zz.djxh, wt.wtxysuuid, zz.wtxyzzuuid, wt.hjszddz, wt.xjzddz as xjzdz, wt.dzfw as wtdzfw, wt.dzqxq, wt.dzqxz, wt.dzszjfj as wtdzszjfj, wt.jsyjjsl from dj_wtxysxx wt, dj_wtxyzzxx zz where wt.stfdjxh = zz.djxh and wt.stfdjxh = ? and wt.ggbz = 'N' and wt.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select uuid, djxh, szysybh, qsxkzbz, qsxkzh, qyshylb_dm, sylxjh_dm, tsyslbjh_dm, nqysjhdxs, nqysjhdbs, qsyxqq, qsyxqz, sysedc_dm, gsgwfgbz, dxsccgsq_dm, qsxkspjg, qslhzjg, qslhzjgxzjb_dm, bgrq, flzlmc , zgswj_dm, zgswskfj_dm , jdxz_dm , qskdz ,xzqhsz_dm from DJ_SZYSSYDJB where QSXKZH = ? and zfbz_1 = 'N' and zxbz = 'N'

SELECT UUID , DJXH , TZFHHHRZJZL_DM, TZFHHHRZJHM , TZFHHHRMC , TZFJJXZ_DM , TZBL , GJHDQSZ_DM , DZ , YXQQ , TZJE , YXQZ , FPBL , t.tzfhhrdjxh FROM dj_tzfxx t WHERE t.djxh=? AND TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <=t.yxqz

SELECT t.lcslid, t.rdpzuuid, t.djxh, t.nsrzglx_dm, t.yxqq, t.yxqz, t.sjzzrq, t.qxbz, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq FROM RD_NSRZGXX_JGB t WHERE t.DJXH = ? AND (1=? or t.Nsrzglx_Dm = ?) and (1 = ? or (to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.sjzzrq and to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= t.yxqq)) and (1 = ? or to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= t.sjzzrq) and t.zfbz_1='N' and t.qxbz='N'

select a.tdsybh, a.tdzldz, a.ssswjg_dm, a.xzqhsz_dm, a.jdxz_dm, a.tddj_dm, a.tdzmj, a.yxbz, a.qh, a.tdjbxxuuid, b.djxh, b.tdsyzbh, b.tdsyzfzjgmc, b.syqsyxqz from dj_tdjbxx a, dj_tdqsxx b where a.tdjbxxuuid = b.tdjbxxuuid and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.djxh=? and a.tdsybh = ? and (a.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (a.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) and not EXISTS (select 1 from dj_tdjbxx c, dj_tdqsxx d where c.tdjbxxuuid = d.tdjbxxuuid and d.syqsyxqz >= ? and c.yxbz = 'Y' and d.zxrq is null and c.tdsybh = ? and (c.xzqhsz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (c.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = ?) and (c.ssswjg_dm=? or 1=?) and a.tdjbxxuuid = b.tdjbxxuuid )
select nsrxx.nsrmc,nsrxx.djxh,nsrxx.zgswj_dm,nsrxx.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx nsrxx where FDDBRSFZJLX_DM = ? and FDDBRSFZJHM = ? and nsrxx.nsrzt_DM = ? and nsrxx.yxbz='Y'
select t.djxh, t.qyjtjqcylb_dm,t.qyjtdjuuid from dj_qyjtcqcydwrdxx t where t.djxh = ? and yxqq <= ? and t.yxqz >= ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (t.qyjtdjxh is null or t.qyjtdjxh = '0')
select * from yh_nsrfqmsqbaxx n where n.djxh = ? and n.fqmsqqxq <= ? and n.fqmsqqxz >= ? and (n.zfbz_1 = 'N' or n.zfbz_1 is null)
select rd.djxh, max(rd.rdrq) rdrq from dj_fzchrdxx rd, (select ls.djxh from dj_nsrxx n, dj_ls_djxhshxydm ls where n.nsrzt_dm = '05' and n.djxh = ls.djxh) a where a.djxh = rd.djxh(+) group by rd.djxh
select t.fzchrduuid,t.djxh,t.sjgsdq from DJ_Fzchrdxx t ,Dj_Fzchzxxx d where t.djxh = d.djxh and d.lcslid = ?
Select t.* From WBJH_YH_CLGZSMSTC t Where t.Nh = ? And t.Nnch = ? And (1 = ? Or Cp Like ?)

select ssxdqyuuid, xduuid, djxh, lcslid, zdydfdmc, zwmc, zdydfdqylx_dm, zdydfnssbh, gcdydfssjmdgnflyjms, gcdydfssjmdssqkms, zjynzdfzyjyxmjywms, zjynlyydydfdsrze, zjynzdydfdgyrs, dlrxm_1, sfzjzl_dm, sfzjhm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq from rd_ssxddysp_qysfbgb where lcslid=?

select t.uuid, t.sfxxbgbuuid, t.djxh, t.kjdjxh, t.gjyshdnr, t.gjysfshdsfcgzsrblbz, t.xxsgjysxdmc, t.xxsgjysxdxgfltw, t.kxsxggjysxdtkssqk, t.lyyzgjnqtdqtlsdbz, t.lyyzgjnqtdqtlsdxsdybz, t.bz, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjtb_sj, t.gjyssrlx from YH_FJMNSRXSSSXDDYQKBGBD t where t.sfxxbgbuuid = ?

SELECT zj.syjjgdjxh, zj.nsrsbh, zj.nsrmc, zj.zcdz, zj.zgswjg_dm,zj.zfjglx_dm, zj.fzjgcj_dm, zj.hzhbnsqyjglb_dm, zj.jdjnbs,zj.hjqylx_dm,zj.kdqsszyqylx_dm , '' shxydm FROM dj_hznsqyxxbab_syjgxx zj, dj_hznsqyxxbab ba WHERE zj.hznsuuid = ba.hznsuuid AND zj.djxh = ? AND ba.yxqq < = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ba.yxqz > = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND zj.yxbz = 'Y' AND ba.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND zj.syjjgdjxh = '0' UNION ALL SELECT zj.syjjgdjxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.zcdz, nsr.zgswj_dm zgswjg_dm,zj.zfjglx_dm, zj.fzjgcj_dm, zj.hzhbnsqyjglb_dm, zj.jdjnbs,zj.hjqylx_dm,zj.kdqsszyqylx_dm ,nsr.shxydm FROM dj_hznsqyxxbab_syjgxx zj, dj_hznsqyxxbab ba, dj_nsrxx nsr WHERE zj.syjjgdjxh = nsr.djxh and nsr.yxbz = 'Y' AND zj.hznsuuid = ba.hznsuuid AND zj.djxh = ? AND ba.yxqq < = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ba.yxqz > = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND zj.yxbz = 'Y' AND ba.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND zj.syjjgdjxh != '0'

select t.djxh, t.hznsuuid, t.lcslid, t.spwh, t.fwjg, t.zsxm_dm, t.ssswjg_dm, t.ywpzuuid, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.zstybz, t.zsrq, t.zsr_dm from rd_hznsqyrdsqspb t where t.djxh = ? and t.zsxm_dm=? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' AND t.ZSTYBZ = 'Y' and t.zfrq_1 is null
select t.bgqnr,t.bghnr,t.bghnrmc,t.bgqnrmc,t.lrrq from dj_bgdjmx t where t.djxh=? and t.bgxm_dm=?

SELECT WCJYZMUUID,DJXH,LCSLID,WCJYDXZQHSZ_DM,WCJYD,SWJGJG,ZG,NH,WH,BYLCSLID, WCJYHDSSGLZMBH,SWDJD,SWDJDSWJGYJ,YWCJYHDSSGLZMBH,JYFSDMJH,JDXZ_DM,SWJGJBRXM, SWJGJBRQZRQ,SWJGFZRXM,SWJGFZRQZRQ,WSZZRQ,ZMYXQXQ,ZMYXQXZ,WCJYHTZJE,HXRQ, HXLCSLID,BYRQ,YWPZUUID,ZFBZ_1,ZFR_DM,ZFRQ_1,LRR_DM,LRRQ,XGR_DM,XGRQ,SJGSDQ FROM zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx zm WHERE DJXH = ? AND HXRQ IS NOT NULL AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND zm.yxbz='Y'

select t.qcuuid, t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.zlcslid, t.sndzzssjjne, t.sndyyssjjne, t.sndxfssjjne, t.sndqysdssjjne, t.sfyrd, t.snddfqtgshjsjjne, t.bndzzsyjjne, t.bndyysyjjne, t.bndxfsyjjne, t.bndqysdsyjjne, t.bnddfqtgshjyjjne, t.fdcxmtze, t.jknd, t.zdsyhjkjc_dm, t.zsbs, t.zssm, t.gszgswjmc, t.dszgswjmc, t.sjje_1, t.snjkjc, t.szswjg_dm, t.sxxm_dm, t.sxtj_dm, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.scjydz, nsr.zgswj_dm, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.shxydm, nsr.hy_dm from dj_zdsyjknsrcxqc t, dj_nsrxx nsr where t.zlcslid = ? and t.djxh = nsr.djxh and t.yxbz = 'Y' and nsr.yxbz = 'Y'
select t.ssjmxz_dm as code, t.ssjmxzmc as caption, t.yxqq, t.yxqz from dm_gy_ssjmxz t where t.ssjmxz_dm in ('0004135401', '0004135501', '0004135601', '0004135701')
update dj_cwkjzdba_kjbbmc t set t.sjgsdq = ?, t.yxbz = 'N', t.xgr_dm = ?, t.xgrq = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') where t.cwkjzdbauuid = ?
